story:
Summary

Did you know that a typical home insurance does not have enough coverage to rebuild your home, replace your expensive personal property or protect your property from perils in the event of a major disaster? Imagine all these years of paying the premium only to realize that it wasn't enough to get a fresh start, defeating the very purpose of having an insurance.

InsuScribe is a Smart Insurance Bot on a mobile AI platform being developed by Samuh, Inc. that automatically analyzes your home/renter insurance coverage, identifies the coverage gaps and works seamlessly with you and your insurance provider to minimize these gaps and provide you peace of mind on your home coverage!!!  

Any significant change in the cost to rebuild your home or replacement value of your personal property or other gaps that would impact your home and property insurance is automatically reflected back as a change in your coverage that you can choose to accept or reject on your mobile device.

Existing insurance solutions require the consumer to process and understand their insurance policies and the gaps. Not only is understanding these gaps extremely research oriented and time consuming but then finding an insurance solution that minimizes these gaps and monitoring it continuously to ensure the gaps continue to be minimized requires constant analysis and action by the consumer. Even though the insurance companies make annual adjustments to cover these gaps, the adjustments are not enough and do not account for all the changes that would impact your insurance coverage. The end result is that consumers do not have enough coverage to rebuild their homes or replace their personal property or protect them from other casualties in an event of a major disaster. The burden is on the consumer to fix this!

This is where InsuScribe comes into play! The ultimate goal is to take away the consumer burden and have a solution that proactively and automatically takes action to minimize under-insurance and needless premiums and work with your or another insurance provider to ensure the necessary coverage to protect your property. You, the consumer, no longer have to constantly worry about updating your insurance coverage and have the proactive Scribe to work for you!

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to (1) reach the consumer (2) make them aware of the problem and the required solution and (3) sign up the consumer to make this campaign and solution successful. You will get free access to full capabilities of InsuScribe and/or other Bots launched by Samuh, Inc. depending on the perk chosen.

We have spent the last 7 months architecting and are implementing the solution. Your backing will enable us to complete and launch the solution and establish partnership with the insurance providers amongst other partners.

Below is our timeline:

The Impact

Recent natural disasters (Dorian Hurricane, California Wildfires and others) have inflicted tremendous damage to the homes and have shown that majority of homes are under insured. The insurance claim dollars based on your coverage have not been sufficient to rebuild homes or replace the personal property lost in the disaster. The homeowners are living a nightmare settling their lives.

InsuScribe's mission is to automatically detect and eliminate this insurance coverage gap and provide meaningful coverage by proactively working with your insurance provider.

At Samuh, our vision is to simplify consumer life by aggregating your data and making the impact where it makes the most difference starting with your home.

Risks & Challenges

InsuScribe works by aggregating certain data from you. For example, if you purchase a $5000 jewelry, we would automatically work with your insurance provider and provide an insurance quote for your acceptance or decline. If you just got a pet, then we will notify you of any liability coverage gaps you may have with your current insurance and work with your insurance provider and provide a quote for your acceptance or decline. This can be all automated unlike solutions that exist today. Of course, we will share any of this information only if you authorize us to do so. Another example, is adjusting the insurance coverage based on rebuild cost in your area or maintaining inventory of all your personal property along with its replacement value and managing your insurance premium based on these accurate datapoint or providing access to your insurance provider in the event of a disaster for quicker claim resolution.

Not only are the premiums based on your true inventory and its value but also it becomes easier for the insurance companies to process your claims quickly since the chances of fraud reduce drastically. No longer, do insurance companies need to struggle with your claim that you did own the $2000 watch that got destroyed in the fire as they will have the detail if you choose to share it with them.

Outside of typical development risks, the biggest risk for us is being able to get your approval to access the relevant data. Another big risk is in engaging the Insurance Providers which can be mitigated if we have you, the consumer, on board. Even though the Insurance Providers see a lot of value with the information being pulled together that will help them prevent fraud claims, there will be a risk in executing these partnerships.

Our principles are very simple:

  • Maintain Consumer Privacy
  • Data Security without violating Consumer Privacy by deploying military grade encryption
  • 100% Consumer controlled sharing
  • Proactive and Excellent User Experience

Our hope is that the above values will give you comfort to share this information with us and simplify some of your lifestyle problems.​

How do we make it happen?

We are a mobile platform that enables you to aggregate or provide us access to aggregate your insurance related data, structure it and make it available for sharing with Insurance Providers over a platform marketplace. This access is 100% controlled by the data owner.

Our Team

We are a team of data scientists, insurance and platform experts and know how to implement the solution. Being serial entrepreneurs, we know how to create and successfully launch a product.  Please feel free to reach out to us anytime with your question!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please spread the word
  • Goto https://getsamuh.com and subscribe for progress on the project.
  • Or Simply, just drop an email to hi@getsamuh.com

Either way we would want to hear from you!

Privacy

Maintaining your privacy is the single most important cornerstone of our foundation.  All your data is stored using military grade encryption and only you have the private key to access this information. You have 100% control on sharing the data with anyone. Our employees do not have access to your sensitive information. We pledge to abide by the privacy laws like CCPA and GDPR.

Consumer Burden

In this age, the consumer is being hosed with data on all fronts. We spend a lot of our precious time sifting through the data, structuring it and then using it. This needs to be simplified one step at a time. At Samuh, our vision is to simplify consumer life by aggregating your data and providing you structured data for use.

Help us help You!!!

story:
1. All-in-one portable studio easy to use. 
2. Photo studio with foldable design which is unfolding a whole new level of possibilities in smartphone photography. 
3. It enables everyone to take awesome, studio-quality pictures with a smartphone using a simple setup. 
4. Don't worry about taking high quality pictures for your online shop products anymore. 
5. 5500LM light, super bright to provide the adequate light source. This light combined with the silver reflective interior of the tent, provides even lighting to minimize shadows. Your photo will be with pure white background and you don't even need to have the photo copped. 
6. Very easy to install! No other tools needed for the installation and uninstallation.Your bare hands are the only things needed for the installation. Space saving and very flexible. Can be utilized on various occasions or in different places. 
7. Comes with a carrying bag and 3 pieces of PVC background boards (White, orange, black). The boards are wrinkle resistant and water resistant. 
8. Add 3 pieces of non-woven fabrics dackdrops (Red, green, blue). Non-gloss surface allows to soak up all the light without reflective.

Specification

General

MaterialNylon Cloth

LED Quantity2 x 32 PCS

Lumen2 x 1200LM

Color Temperature5500K

Power SupplyInput: AC 110-240V 1A; Output: 12V 2A

Power30W

Available PlugsUS Plug, with CE Certificate

Size40*40*40cm / 16*16*16inch (Unfolded); 45*45cm / 17.7*17.7inch (Fold)

Weight552g (only Tent)

Package Include

Package Contents1 x Main Studio Box
1 x Black backdrops
1 x White backdrops
1 x Orange backdrops
2 x Light Board
1 x Soft Cloth
1 x US Plug Power Supply
1 x Blue backdrops
1 x Red backdrops
1 x Green backdrops

Package Weight

One Package Weight1.95kgs / 4.30lb

Qty per Carton6

Carton Weight11.60kgs / 25.57lb

Carton Size44cm * 42cm * 34cm / 17.32inch * 16.54inch * 13.39inch

story:
In Short:

What a watermelon got to do with open source?

Since you do like watermelon, and since I came up with this idea, let's combine it together. at your kitchen, for FREE:

I'm Ori, from Israel, a self employed mechanical engineer, inventing stuff for companies for a living.

When I tackle a challenge - my mind will not rest until the proper solution is found, and Yes, that's what happened when I was cutting a watermelon for my young boys in a sunny afternoon, a few years back.

 

NOW, Imagine YOURSELF can make 10 people smile with happiness with a wink of an eye, wouldn't it feel good? :-)

How about a 100?   10,000?   500,000 smiling people...
just because YOU decided to give something... Imagine that! 
That's exactly how I feel about sharing my idea with the rest of the world.​
I want to give because it makes me happy, and I feel lucky because I simply can.
I can Give YOU, your FRIENDS and FAMILY, the entire WORLD - a smile in form of a kitchen knife. For free. HA!
Thanking me in form of a minor pledge is optional - and I'll be thankful!
I don't think you should spend more than that anyhow.
(Incomes are majorly for covering expenses, as well as a kick-start for next open-source projects).

Where can you join my ride of good deeds?

Here and now!

 

By sharing with your friends, family, Indiegogo, Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp and so on, is where YOU can HELP (this thing we're doing here) THE MOST! 

This is where you can be PROUD of yourself - spreading these watermelon SMILES all around ... :-)

 

Warning:

Handling knifes is extremely dangerous!

You are the sole responsible for following the above instructions / advices / suggestions, for these are for capable and professional skilled persons using appropriate measures of safety and tools. 

Watch out of getting cuts!

story:
Invisacook launched February of 2019 at the KBIS show in Las Vegas, where we stunned designers, builder and fabricators that they were able to get thru 15mm of countertop surface and cook as sufficiently as those who could only do it thru 6mm like TPB.  We had taken the idea and simplified it, to again work through a more stable product of thickness, simplified the Installation to a simple undermount mounting system with sink clips and given the controller many options, from a full controller, to wireless tablets and also able to control on your personal handheld device.   Here is some links and information on them and that you can review and then start the conversation with Hans on how you could possibly become a Distributor or Dealer.  Also, a PowerPoint Presentation is attached as well.   

Website: https://invisacook.com/

Basic Commercial - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UaLWUQchxe0

Cooking on Countertops –YouTube Show– https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BkuIqGJwXuw&t

WHAT YOU DON’T SEE WON’T BURN YOU

Integrating your existing kitchen model with futuristic technology, Invisacook is specifically designed to defy conventional visual expectations and enhance your overall counter space. Whether you’re looking to install it in your home, in an RV, or on a boat, Invisacook will be there to ensure you’re capable of cooking safely and optimally. In effect, subjecting yourself to the tough decision between functionality or alluring design in your kitchen space is all but a thing of the past.

HOW IT WORKS

Invisacook is installed beneath your countertop. Using advanced invisa-induction technology, it works through your countertop to effectively heat the surface and create an adequate cooking space where there might not traditionally appear to be one. Additionally, as the Invisacook does not generate direct heat, it remains safe to use as traditional counter space when you’re not cooking.

MORE THAN MEETS THE EYE

Invisacook isn’t just faster than both traditional gas or electric-powered stovetops, but it’s also one of the safest possible cooktops to have in your home.  Because it remains mildly warm to the touch, you’ll feel more confident and assured moving around your kitchen with a reduced risk for heat-related burns. Thus, its invisibility remains a primary strength and not a cause for concern.

INVISACOOK CAN BE USED UNDER A VARIETY OF SURFACE MATERIALS.
- Granite
- Porcelain
- Ceramic
- Ultra Compact Surfaces

story:
Hello and welcome to the campaign for ELIAH! When working in an old workshop about a year ago, our journey to ELIAH began: It was cold, so we had to use an electrical heater. We weren't happy with the products: Extension cords, needed floor space, missing temperature controls and so on. So we decided to develop our own! Our main goal was to achieve a product with ease of use and the best comfort possible. ELIAH is what we came up with.

ELIAH is an elegant LED ceiling light with an integrated heater, operated with the ordinary light switches as found in every house. You can adjust ELIAH's six presets to suit your individual application.

We started our company LIQUIDBEAM and - about one year later - our workshop is now well warmed. Time to make ELIAH available for you, the best perfect replacement for mobile and additional space heaters, with plug and play installation.

This is how ELIAH looks like. A real beauty!

 

 

Super easy operation with your light switch.

A simple click turns on the LED light, two more clicks turn on the heating. Other modes are accessible via additional clicks. With a single click you can always turn off ELIAH. The easiest way to control a heater and a ceiling light, sufficient for young and old.

And it is really, and we mean really super-fast. Forget about annoying app updates or empty remote controls when you want just want it to be warm. Select your mode of choice in less than 3 seconds! A total of six modes are available and can be customized at the device! 
 

 

Lighting and heating. Anywhere. Anytime.

In many rooms we need additional heating, and ELIAH is the perfect replacement for mobile and additional space heaters!

The perfect solution for your children’s rooms, cellar and hobby rooms, utility rooms, guest rooms, offices, garages, rehearsal rooms, kitchens, conservatories, attics and more! ELIAH heats and lights up every room, which you don’t want to have heated all the time.  Or rooms where you desire it to be extra warm.

 

Cosy and warm in an instant.

Regarding installation, operation or heating – compared to water-conducting radiators, ELIAH wins in every discipline. End inconvenient and cumbersome heating of rarely used rooms. Put on fast heat by ELIAH!

 

 

Wellbeing without renovation.

Existing ceiling lights can easily be replaced by ELIAH, this will only take minutes. And ELIAH works with your standard light switch, it really does! The maximum current consumption can be set to fit usual circuit breakers.

 

 

Bright light with pleasant colour.

ELIAH features natural colours and good contrast thanks to high quality Osram-LEDs. A beautiful warm-white light-colour of 2700°K and a colour rendering index of 80+ will give you superb lighting.

 

You can set and select up to six individual brightness settings from 10% to 100%. Enjoy the perfect brightness for every application. The LED-dimming is absolutely noise free, we promise! More details below.

 

 

Create new comfort zones.

Use ELIAH to create new comfort zones for you and your loved ones within your existing environment. With ELIAH it is easy, simple and fast. Remember, everyone can operate ELIAH.

 

 

Frost protection.

Winter is coming, so activate ELIAHs frost protection mode! ELIAH constantly monitors and regulates the temperature in a room. No more frozen water pipes or frozen plants in the conservatory, the garden hut or any other room where you need frost protection.

 

 

Immediately utilisable

ELIAH is a ceiling mounted device and therefore immediately utilisable. Forget about old and dusty mobile heaters. ELIAH needs no app and no remote control!

 

 

More space and freedom.

The elimination of mobile heating solutions leaves more space in your rooms. Trip hazards such as extension cords or multi-outlet power sockets are gone, too.

 

 

Your desired temperature.

ELIAH eliminates inaccurate bimetallic thermostats or pointless min/max labels by storing up to six individual temperatures, accurate to the degree. Of course, you can switch between Degree Celsius and Fahrenheit, no need to do any math.

Equipped with a silent fan, driven by a brushless motor, ELIAH circulates air very silent, even when your temperature has been reached. So it can continiously measure the temperature and react fast on even little temperature drops.

 

 

Comprehensive safety.

ELIAH detects temperatures in a fail-safe manner, electric circuits are protected redundantly. The installation on the ceiling prevents the supply and exhaust air from being obstructed. A timed and automatic switch off ensures the safe operation of ELIAH.

 

 

Energy-saving and reliable.

ELIAH uses efficient LEDs, monitors the room temperature precisely and switches off the heating automatically after a predefined time. Therefore, ELIAH is remarkably safe and environmentally friendly. No more overheated rooms or forgotten electrical heaters.

 

 

Timeless design.

We made ELIAH as timeless, plain and flat as possible, to bring you the best design wherever you need it. Air is not soaked in directly under the ceiling so ELIAH does not collect any dust there.

 

 

Brand new.

ELIAH was developed in Germany and here on Indiegogo, together with you, we want to bring this product to everyone who likes it. If you have further questions, please contact us and ask us anything.

 

 

High quality and a long life.

Quality counts and ELIAH is a real long term invest! ELIAH is build solid and only high-quality components are used. So, if you buy one, you will enjoy it with your family and friends for many years to come.

 

What is high quality? High quality means a longer lifetime and absolutely reliable function for you. Components like the Texas Instruments microcontroller, LEDs from Osram, electrolyte capacitors from Panasonic with a very long lifetime, a precisely controllable fan, multi temperature monitoring, an absolutely noise free LED dimming, reliable solid-state relays and other features make ELIAH a product for many, many years to come.

What is the price for high quality? Yes, high quality components cause about 40 $ more than a cost-optimized solution. We believe it is worth it! 

 

LIQUIDBEAM!

 

We are three engineers with experienced background and from different disciplines. We worked or work in industrial branches and are experts in our topics. Please check us out on linkedin if you like! We had a lot of fun bringing ELIAH to the prototype state, and as you can see it looks good and works just fantastic.

Now we need you to bring ELIAH to your home and finally to everyone who likes it. Please remember, that ELIAH will definitely be a long term invest for you and your home.

To start production, we need a pre- financing and we would like to do it with you and your friends via crowdfunding. So, in exchange for your trust you will get a huge discount and of course will be the first one to receive this beautiful product.

So herewith we invite you to join the story of ELIAH.

Please also tell your family and friends about ELIAH, if you like it, or support us.

 

How your funds will be used:

The total required amount for production will be higher than the $ 55 000 and approximately $ 155 000, but we are sure to get the production started. We will start to spend your money, only when the total amount can be achieved.

 

 

 

Some earlier sketches:

 

What about risks?

Yes, there might be always something we cannot foresee. What we did so far was to eliminate many risks. E.g. the risk for technical failure. The whole electronics has been built up and tested. The firmware already supports many of the final features. The mechanical design has been discussed with specialists for squeeze casting and only needs small adjustments.

As you can see, our prototypes already received serious attention and we did real streamlining. Still there might be the need for minor changes in the design to guarantee you the best experience. 

So we are a 100% convinced to bring ELIAH to you, with all its features, just as promised.

 

Our next steps:

After a successful campaign we will immediately start certification process and make the final selection of our suppliers. But we need to have some time to do the right choices, so please understand that we do not try to bring ELIAH this year. We use crowdfunding in the very original manner and it is not just a marketing tool for us.

We will also slowly rise production numbers, to guarantee the best possible quality for you!

 

Timeline:

 

THANK YOU!

Thank you for your interest in ELIAH and LIQUIDBEAM. We hope our presentation of ELIAH convinced you from its benefits.

 

Support us and spread the word!

 

Support us and tell your family and friends about it. We would be very happy. Use the included functions of INDIEGOGO to share the idea of ELIAH.

Give eight quarters or more. Support us with any amount above 2 dollars you would like to give.

After a successful campaign, we will share the list of all supporters on our website, and of course we are very thankful for that. Please let us know, if you do not want to occur. 

 

Technical specification:

 

 

  • Appliance combination with lighting and heating for rooms up to 30 m² (in slightly cold and average climatic zones)
  • Modern casing in matte white (RAL 9016)
  • Dimensions approximately: 370 x 370 x 110 (L x W x H in mm)
  • Heating
    • approximately 2000 (800 + 1200*) Watt max. heating capacity for 230 V AC
    • approximately 1500 (600 + 900*) Watt max. heating capacity for 120 V AC

             * INFO: Power consumption can be adjusted at device to fit typical circuit breakers

  • Temperature can be displayed in Degree Fahrenheit or Degree Celsius
  • Lighting
    • Light output of approximately 40 Watt 
    • Up to 2000 Lumen
    • Osram LEDs
    • Colour temperature 2700° Kelvin
    • Warm white
    • Colour rendering index: 80 +
  • Controlled and regulated with a microcontroller of Texas Instruments
  • Six individual configurations adjustable on the device, each with brightness, target temperature and heating duration
  • CE and FCC

 

F.A.Q.:

  • My country is not on the shipping list, what can I do?
    • For shipping to non-listed countries please ask for a quote.
  • Are all taxes included?
    • We cannot guarantee that, import and trading taxes can cause additional costs. Please ask your local customs for details.
  • Will ELIAH fit to every circuit?
    • You have to check whether your circuit delivers minimum 4 Amps (230 V AC) or 6 Amps (120 V AV).
story_txt:
Hello and welcome to the campaign for ELIAH! When working in an old workshop about a year ago, our journey to ELIAH began: It was cold, so we had to use an electrical heater. We weren't happy with the products: Extension cords, needed floor space, missing temperature controls and so on. So we decided to develop our own! Our main goal was to achieve a product with ease of use and the best comfort possible. ELIAH is what we came up with.ELIAH is an elegant LED ceiling light with an integrated heater, operated with the ordinary light switches as found in every house. You can adjust ELIAH's six presets to suit your individual application.We started our company LIQUIDBEAM and - about one year later - our workshop is now well warmed. Time to make ELIAH available for you, the best perfect replacement for mobile and additional space heaters, with plug and play installation.This is how ELIAH looks like. A real beauty!  Super easy operation with your light switch.A simple click turns on the LED light, two more clicks turn on the heating. Other modes are accessible via additional clicks. With a single click you can always turn off ELIAH. The easiest way to control a heater and a ceiling light, sufficient for young and old.And it is really, and we mean really super-fast. Forget about annoying app updates or empty remote controls when you want just want it to be warm. Select your mode of choice in less than 3 seconds! A total of six modes are available and can be customized at the device!   
Lighting and heating. Anywhere. Anytime.
In many rooms we need additional heating, and ELIAH is the perfect replacement for mobile and additional space heaters!The perfect solution for your children’s rooms, cellar and hobby rooms, utility rooms, guest rooms, offices, garages, rehearsal rooms, kitchens, conservatories, attics and more! ELIAH heats and lights up every room, which you don’t want to have heated all the time.  Or rooms where you desire it to be extra warm. 
Cosy and warm in an instant.Regarding installation, operation or heating – compared to water-conducting radiators, ELIAH wins in every discipline. End inconvenient and cumbersome heating of rarely used rooms. Put on fast heat by ELIAH!  
Wellbeing without renovation.Existing ceiling lights can easily be replaced by ELIAH, this will only take minutes. And ELIAH works with your standard light switch, it really does! The maximum current consumption can be set to fit usual circuit breakers.  
Bright light with pleasant colour.ELIAH features natural colours and good contrast thanks to high quality Osram-LEDs. A beautiful warm-white light-colour of 2700°K and a colour rendering index of 80+ will give you superb lighting. You can set and select up to six individual brightness settings from 10% to 100%. Enjoy the perfect brightness for every application. The LED-dimming is absolutely noise free, we promise! More details below.  
Create new comfort zones.Use ELIAH to create new comfort zones for you and your loved ones within your existing environment. With ELIAH it is easy, simple and fast. Remember, everyone can operate ELIAH.  
Frost protection.Winter is coming, so activate ELIAHs frost protection mode! ELIAH constantly monitors and regulates the temperature in a room. No more frozen water pipes or frozen plants in the conservatory, the garden hut or any other room where you need frost protection.  
Immediately utilisableELIAH is a ceiling mounted device and therefore immediately utilisable. Forget about old and dusty mobile heaters. ELIAH needs no app and no remote control!  
More space and freedom.The elimination of mobile heating solutions leaves more space in your rooms. Trip hazards such as extension cords or multi-outlet power sockets are gone, too.  
Your desired temperature.ELIAH eliminates inaccurate bimetallic thermostats or pointless min/max labels by storing up to six individual temperatures, accurate to the degree. Of course, you can switch between Degree Celsius and Fahrenheit, no need to do any math.Equipped with a silent fan, driven by a brushless motor, ELIAH circulates air very silent, even when your temperature has been reached. So it can continiously measure the temperature and react fast on even little temperature drops.  
Comprehensive safety.ELIAH detects temperatures in a fail-safe manner, electric circuits are protected redundantly. The installation on the ceiling prevents the supply and exhaust air from being obstructed. A timed and automatic switch off ensures the safe operation of ELIAH.  
Energy-saving and reliable.ELIAH uses efficient LEDs, monitors the room temperature precisely and switches off the heating automatically after a predefined time. Therefore, ELIAH is remarkably safe and environmentally friendly. No more overheated rooms or forgotten electrical heaters.  
Timeless design.We made ELIAH as timeless, plain and flat as possible, to bring you the best design wherever you need it. Air is not soaked in directly under the ceiling so ELIAH does not collect any dust there.  
Brand new.ELIAH was developed in Germany and here on Indiegogo, together with you, we want to bring this product to everyone who likes it. If you have further questions, please contact us and ask us anything.  
High quality and a long life.Quality counts and ELIAH is a real long term invest! ELIAH is build solid and only high-quality components are used. So, if you buy one, you will enjoy it with your family and friends for many years to come. What is high quality? High quality means a longer lifetime and absolutely reliable function for you. Components like the Texas Instruments microcontroller, LEDs from Osram, electrolyte capacitors from Panasonic with a very long lifetime, a precisely controllable fan, multi temperature monitoring, an absolutely noise free LED dimming, reliable solid-state relays and other features make ELIAH a product for many, many years to come.What is the price for high quality? Yes, high quality components cause about 40 $ more than a cost-optimized solution. We believe it is worth it!  LIQUIDBEAM! We are three engineers with experienced background and from different disciplines. We worked or work in industrial branches and are experts in our topics. Please check us out on linkedin if you like! We had a lot of fun bringing ELIAH to the prototype state, and as you can see it looks good and works just fantastic.Now we need you to bring ELIAH to your home and finally to everyone who likes it. Please remember, that ELIAH will definitely be a long term invest for you and your home.To start production, we need a pre- financing and we would like to do it with you and your friends via crowdfunding. So, in exchange for your trust you will get a huge discount and of course will be the first one to receive this beautiful product.So herewith we invite you to join the story of ELIAH.Please also tell your family and friends about ELIAH, if you like it, or support us. How your funds will be used:The total required amount for production will be higher than the $ 55 000 and approximately $ 155 000, but we are sure to get the production started. We will start to spend your money, only when the total amount can be achieved.   Some earlier sketches: What about risks?Yes, there might be always something we cannot foresee. What we did so far was to eliminate many risks. E.g. the risk for technical failure. The whole electronics has been built up and tested. The firmware already supports many of the final features. The mechanical design has been discussed with specialists for squeeze casting and only needs small adjustments.As you can see, our prototypes already received serious attention and we did real streamlining. Still there might be the need for minor changes in the design to guarantee you the best experience. So we are a 100% convinced to bring ELIAH to you, with all its features, just as promised. Our next steps:After a successful campaign we will immediately start certification process and make the final selection of our suppliers. But we need to have some time to do the right choices, so please understand that we do not try to bring ELIAH this year. We use crowdfunding in the very original manner and it is not just a marketing tool for us.We will also slowly rise production numbers, to guarantee the best possible quality for you! Timeline: THANK YOU!Thank you for your interest in ELIAH and LIQUIDBEAM. We hope our presentation of ELIAH convinced you from its benefits. Support us and spread the word! Support us and tell your family and friends about it. We would be very happy. Use the included functions of INDIEGOGO to share the idea of ELIAH.Give eight quarters or more. Support us with any amount above 2 dollars you would like to give.After a successful campaign, we will share the list of all supporters on our website, and of course we are very thankful for that. story:
The No Mouse Project keeps mice outside of your buildings before they have the chance to cause any damage inside the walls. It is designed in such a way that :​​

  • It prevents mice from getting inside the walls, ensuring that they can not cause any form of damage to isolation, pipes, cables, etc.
  • It assures great ventilation, to prevent moisture and mushroom from forming inside the walls.
  • It is safe for children, unlike most mouse infestation solvers like poison and mouse traps.
  • It comes in various colors to fit with most house styles, and is very subtle.
  • It can last for years and years without needing any care.


We have tested this product thoroughly where I work, and are so satisfied with the results of the No Mouse Project that we decided to share it with everyone in hopes of saying goodbye to the too-common mouse infestation problem.

My name is Daniel Lévesque, and I have over 32 years of experience as an electromechanical engineer. My machinist friend Mico Bubic and I need your financial help to set up the required production machinery, and to share the product with all of those who have been dealing with mouse infestations.

Thanks a lot for your help, hopefully we can help you back if you're suffering from this problem too.

Daniel Lévesque,
Mico Bubic,
Emmanuel Brissette

-------------

 

Le No Mouse Project empêche les souris d'entrer dans vos maisons avant qu'elles ne fassent de dommages dans les murs. Nous sommes tellement satisfaits des résultats du No Mouse Project que nous avons décidé de partager la solution avec vous et de commercialiser le produit. Mon nom est Daniel Lévesque et je cumule plus de 32 ans d'expériences comme électromécanicien de machines automatisées. Mon ami machiniste, Mico bubic, et moi, avons besoin de votre aide financière afin de construire les machines de production afin de partager ce produit avec vous.

Je vous remercie pour votre aide

Daniel Lévesque,

Mico Bubic,

Emmanuel Brissette

story:
With FancyLight, your home will be more colorful.

Appearance: modern design style

We follow the mordern design style to ensure the luxury and elegance of the system.  With 130cm in height, FancyLight can light-up every corner of your home.

The bulb is made of high quality arcrylic, 125cm in height and 8cm in diameter. The base is made of oak, 14cm x 14cm x 5cm. The interface is simplified with a 5V power input (from adapter) and a control button. Total weight (excluding adapter) is 0.9 kg, or ~2 lbs.

 

Performance: perfect lightshow

There are 6 music-sensing patterns and 8 freestyle patterns. Furthermore, you can setup your own pattern loop - maximum of 8 patterns in a loop. The switch time can be configured from 1 minute up to 20 minutes. Your show will then be unique!

FancyLight is controlled by smartphone app (Android & iOS). Just connect to the master system via bluetooth, and choose the pattern to go. All other systems are slave, and be controlled remotely by the master.

Don't want to sync all systems? Just use the control button on the base to switch between patterns manually.

Please enjoy some freestyle patterns:

 

Delivery

A package of single FancyLight system includes:

  • 01 FancyLight system
  • 01 adapter 5V-6A

story:
Orca Helix can be lowered to 10" off the ground - Sitting ergonomically, means sitting lower; it is healthier to position yourself low, to reduce the chances of colorectal disorders, haemorrhoids, constipation, and is much healthier during pregnancy and more hygienic.

It can be adjusted up to 21" off the ground - making it urinal height, so no more missed shots, no more messes!

Be lifted or lowered - capable of aiding you getting off, whether you have bad knees, muscle pain or bad back.

Orca Helix's has built in bidet - you can be clean and save trees, not only water! You will be able to control this hygienic feature via your phone, or a knob on the left hand side of the bowl.

Maelstrom Flush is an innovative patented flush technology which will use significantly less water than traditional toilet. The flush is a two stage system, which flushes and also rinses it efficiently and effectively. 

Orca Helix has bluetooth/wifi capabilities - control all functions and pre set all your seating/standing arrangements before you even walk into the bathroom, and be in control while you're in it.

Orca Helix comes with built in speakers, so whether you’re taking a bath or just need some entertainment while getting ready to go to work or out, you can now have Orca entertain you with your playlist.

Orca Helix has a sensitive night light that activates in the darkness. With Orca Helix you can use your restroom without turning the light on, which makes sure that there will be no disruption in your melatonin production.

The Lids will clean and sanitize the seat - be germ free with our innovative lid, and while the seat is being cleaned and sanitized, your bowl is being hit with UV light.

THE ORCA TEAM

We are an efficient and prolific team of five individuals from across the globe that came together because of the belief in project, and the impact Orca will make. Each one of us brings a unique skill to make this project a reality. 

 

Lokesh Reddy has had formal mechanical engineering training and his skills are 3D printer utilization and his former experience at Hindustan Aeronautics and Lisi Aerospace put him as an expert in selecting, calculating and testing gear ratios, motor components, and also water and air sealing specialist. His experience as a product development engineer & responsibilities for developing the manufacturing process for new products, made his experience a valued asset at Entijs Canada inc. 

Vancho Stoev, our design engineer has formal training as a mechanical engineer in Macedonia, he is our 3D software drawing expert.

His expertise and in-depth knowledge of the softwares unique features, gave us an advantage in cutting time, and costs by running simulations before we brought the design to real world environment. Jure Korber is our Electrical engineer and he possess multiple degreees Bachelors of Mechanical Engineering, Bachelors in Science, and Master in Engineering.  Jure designed Orca’s PCB’s and took part in programming some of the logic for Orca. His past experience includes with Skyris drone, Stay Safe Aviation Fail Safe Systems, and uFBD Pharmaceutical devices, and many more. Ivan Gochko, the founder of Entijs and creator of Orca, has his own cause invested into this vision. The vision to have adjustable height toilet accessible to those that need it most, the ones that need the independence which some of us take for granted. His Experience in running a construction business for several years, gave Ivan intimate knowledge of how city & house drainage and plumbing system works, by seeing it built from the ground up.

Our Mission!

Our goal with Orca Helix is to produce a product that brings people closer to our natural roots/ways through technological advancement. This means healthier posture during natures calls seatings, and cleaner and more hygienic environment, and of course more sustainability too.

Featured in:

Where did the idea come from?

The idea for Ivan was revolving for years prior to having his construction business, and before his mishap of being temporarily immobile due to a fracture on his foot. Living with his father and ill mother, as a teenager he understood the importance of a facility that was needed for individuals with disabilities.

Once the conception of the actual idea, this disability is what drove Ivan’s passion. Orca Helix is a simplified representation of the original Orca, made for individuals with mobility issues:

Orca Helix is the ideal product Ivan saw as the product he’d want to see in his bathroom. The functions are the result of Ivan’s personal everyday research he did in the special research room we all have at home.

How it works! 

The Lid's:

The Sanitizing Flush: 

Maelstrom Flush is an innovative patented flush technology which will use significantly less water than traditional toilet. The flush is a two stage system, first the larger water openings inside 

the bowl cavities are activated and the water rushes in to flush everything, and then the small openings are activated via a separate valve, and in effect creates a jet stream that rinses the entire bowl, and cleans it efficiently and effectively.

story:
Is the best solution for dealing with your over-sized laundry detergent bottles. Set it and forget it. Just unscrew the original cap & screw on the Handi Hose. Now, use our dispenser to release the soap. Never use a messy soap cup again!

Use Handi Hose with

ALL

Laundry Detergent Bottles

MOST people don't know that ALL laundry detergent makers use the same cap. Which is why Handi Hose is able to work with EVERY large bottle of laundry detergent.

Never Use a Messy Cup Again!

Just pour the soap right into

your washing machine.

 

 

Our Universal Cap with Clip for Hose

Just screw off your old cap and replace with ours!  The built in holder / clip will secure the hose when not in use. 

Ergonomic Spigot

Use it like a regular garden hose.

Ergonomic Spigot

Can also be used with index finger and thumb. 

The whole kit includes:

  • Our Universal cap with built in clip.

  • 3 Ft. of durable clear hose.

  • Our leak proof Spigot.

 

Because someone thought this was a good idea.

 

Right now we are using Form Labs Printers to create each Handi Hose. Which is time consuming and not as cost effective as full scale plastic injection molding. It has been great for the prototyping stages and small scale production. But its time to move on.

It's time to kick off the training wheels.

Where we are at right now:

  • We plan to launch our Indiegogo campaign mid-April.  
  • We will run Our Pre-Order campaign for 60 days. 
  • The Indiegogo campaign was the only way that we could allow people to get in early on this great product.
  • June 1st is Our first run of full-scale manufacturing using plastic injection molding and is the end of our Indiegogo campaign.
  • Our 1st run is for a total of ten thousand ( 10,000) units.
  • On the Indiegogo campaign we are offering ten thousand (10,000) units,  all of our first production run.
  • During June and July we will send out all Pre-orders for all those who have backed us.
  • At the end of July 2019, we will have fulfilled all orders from the Indiegogo campaign and will now process orders for HandiHose through our regular website- www.handihose.com
  • We will have another 10,000 units ready to ship in August 2019 with 3 to 5 days shipping!

So to meet these touch points in out business plan we have:

  • Optimized our designs in CAD for mass production eliminating unnecessary complications from Our injection molds.
  • Sourced multiple manufactures for best quality and supply chain integrity. Here in the USA and in China.
  • Sourced multiple manufactures for different parts to ensure Our unique and patent pending products stay that way and are not easily reproduced.
  • Sourced multiple manufactures to keep costs down on each part. 
  1. The Red Rubber Button
  2. The plunger that dispenses the soap from the spigot via the Red Button
  3. The 2-part handle and spigot
  4. The 2-parts cap with clip
  5. The 3 ft. PVC clear tubing 

When you innovate, you create, you move us all forward. Handi Hose is just the beginning of what We have planned for Handi Products. We have seven (7) more products in various stages of development. Join us on the journey to transforming everyday items into more functional, useful products.  

Sincerely,

The Handi Team
story_txt:
Is the best solution for dealing with your over-sized laundry detergent bottles. Set it and forget it. Just unscrew the original cap & screw on the Handi Hose. Now, use our dispenser to release the soap. Never use a messy soap cup again!

Use Handi Hose with
ALL
Laundry Detergent Bottles




MOST people don't know that ALL laundry detergent makers use the same cap. Which is why Handi Hose is able to work with EVERY large bottle of laundry detergent.
Never Use a Messy Cup Again!

Just pour the soap right into
your washing machine.

 


 
Our Universal Cap with Clip for Hose

Just screw off your old cap and replace with ours!  The built in holder / clip will secure the hose when not in use. 
Ergonomic Spigot

Use it like a regular garden hose.
Ergonomic Spigot

Can also be used with index finger and thumb. 
The whole kit includes:


Our Universal cap with built in clip.
3 Ft. of durable clear hose.
Our leak proof Spigot.


 


Because someone thought this was a good idea.
 


Right now we are using Form Labs Printers to create each Handi Hose. Which is time consuming and not as cost effective as full scale plastic injection molding. It has been great for the prototyping stages and small scale production. But its time to move on.
It's time to kick off the training wheels.
Where we are at right now:

We plan to launch our Indiegogo campaign mid-April.  
We will run Our Pre-Order campaign for 60 days. 
The Indiegogo campaign was the only way that we could allow people to get in early on this great product.
June 1st is Our first run of full-scale manufacturing using plastic injection molding and is the end of our Indiegogo campaign.
Our 1st run is for a total of ten thousand ( 10,000) units.
On the Indiegogo campaign we are offering ten thousand (10,000) units,  all of our first production run.
During June and July we will send out all Pre-orders for all those who have backed us.
At the end of July 2019, we will have fulfilled all orders from the Indiegogo campaign and will now process orders for HandiHose through our regular website- www.handihose.com

We will have another 10,000 units ready to ship in August 2019 with 3 to 5 days shipping!

So to meet these touch points in out business plan we have:

Optimized our designs in CAD for mass production eliminating unnecessary complications from Our injection molds.
Sourced multiple manufactures for best quality and supply chain integrity. Here in the USA and in China.
Sourced multiple manufactures for different parts to ensure Our unique and patent pending products stay that way and are not easily reproduced.
Sourced multiple manufactures to keep costs down on each part. 


The Red Rubber Button
The plunger that dispenses the soap from the spigot via the Red Button
The 2-part handle and spigot
The 2-parts cap with clip
The 3 ft. PVC clear tubing 

When you innovate, you create, you move us all forward. Handi Hose is just the beginning of what We have planned for Handi Products. We have seven (7) more products in various stages of development. Join us on the journey to transforming everyday items into more functional, useful products.  Sincerely,The Handi Team

story:
An environmentally friendly wireless wooden desk lamp that brings nature closer to you. Eha lamp comes with you wherever you desire and brings light and warmth within. 

Simply put - portable elegance

 

PRACTICAL AND CHIC

Design lamps can be seen nearly everywhere, as well as ones made of wood. Even wireless lamps are becoming more and more common. Yet such lightning often sacrifices design for functionality. We, however, brought those two together - EHA lamp is a perfect combination of both style and comfort, wood, and technology.

 

 

UP-CYCLED WOOD

With a desire to stay natural and environment-friendly, we have given new life to excess wood from Estonian furniture factories. EHA lamp is elegant and clean, yet packed with the power of natural oak wood. Bring a piece of nature inside knowing, that not a single tree has been sacrificed for it.

 

 

POWERED BY BATTERIES

EHA lamp is designed for people who feel harassed by short and ugly wires that constantly crowd the power outlets and cause inconveniences. The lamp is wireless and runs on high-quality rechargeable batteries that can be charged with a fast charger. EHA lamp lights up for up to 15 hours straight.  It is also equipped with LED-indicators which show its current battery status when charging.

USB PORTS

You can easily bring the lamp exactly where you need it and use the USB sockets for charging other devices.  Includes a USB port that allows fast-charging for your preferred device.

LED bulb

  • Save up to 80% energy compared to the standard bulb.
  • Long life - 20 000h
  • Perfect for working, writing or reading

 

 

3D LAMPSHADE

Eha luminaires have one of a kind 3D printed lampshades, which, in addition to having a unique look, are much more durable. 

 

 

THREE COLOURS

Take your pick - EHA comes in three colours to make sure everyone has the lamp perfect for their home. Choose your favourite from honey, cognac, and espresso.

 

 

SO WHY EHA?

 

EHA LAMP IN ACTION:

 

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT:

We have been working as a student company for about a year. Now it is time to grow out of our student status and establish a solid position in the market for our design lamps. And that is why we need your help. Each contribution means a lot to us and helps us make our dream come true.

The funds raised will be used for:

  • Establishing a solid production line
  • Increasing our production capacity by hiring more help

What you will get out of it:

  • A desinglight made with care and passion 
  • You will get the lamp with a special campaign price
  • We guarantee that your support will be appreciated and we will work extra hard to ensure that the project will have an outcome that satisfies everyone.

 

WHO ARE WE?

 

EHA - a group of five high-school students from Tallinn School № 21 who finally found themselves a proper pursuit. The company evolved from a student program and is now a fully working company. In 2020 we were given the title. 

​BEST ESTONIAN STUDENT COMPANY 

EHA’s mission is to bring warmth, light and style into every moment.

It is our goal to make a simple item valuable to its owners by giving it a story as well as many modern functions.

The secret of success lies in each of us and in all of us together.

IN THE BOX:

  • The EHA Lamp
  • LED bulb
  • Quick Charger
  • User Manual

 

PRODUCTION

Many parts of the lamp are made by professionals in various Estonian  businesses - then the lamp is put together in our company and shipped by our own team, making sure every lamp is up to our standards.

THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING US!

story:
Naked Sheets: 

Made from 100% Eucalyptus. Soft as silk, strong as polyester, cool as linen, warm as wool and as absorbent as cotton.

 

 

Available Colours:

Dark Blue + White

 

Being made from Eucalyptus Lyocell, our sheets are naturally fast-wicking drawing moisture from the body and 50% more breathable than cotton. This keeps you cool at night, preventing night sweats. It’s also naturally anti-bacterial and hypoallergenic which helps prevent odors and improves hygiene.

 

"Lyocell is composed of nanofibrils — literally very, very small fibers — which are hydrophilic," a quality that makes the fabric better at absorbing moisture, Bahulkar wrote. "This gives the material a unique moisture absorption ability, which in turn makes [it] breathable, softer, [and] less prone to wrinkles."

Vasant R. Kothari wrote in Application of Contemporary Fibers in Apparel - Lyocell, “Completely natural, Lyocell offers a unique combination of the most desirable properties of manmade and natural fibres: Soft as silk, strong as polyester, cool as linen, warm as wool and as absorbent as cotton.”

 

Did you know that your skin works to keep you healthy by discharging up to 1lb of toxins per day? Petrochemical fibers like nylon, polyester, acrylic, acetate or triacetate actually restrict toxin release. You can read more on this at re/make!

Naked Sheets allows the body to breath, detox and regulate body temperature properly!

 

People are tired of sleeping on stiff sheets. Sure, “Egyptian Cotton” gets softer as you wash it… apparently… but who wants to wash their sheets a bunch of times, wasting a bunch of water, just to make their sheets comfortable? The secret to producing Naked Sheet’s sorbet-soft feel was finding the optimal thread (500) and combining it with finer quality threads. We only use fine yarn of 80s x 60s count. Most bed sheets on the market use 60s x 40s yarn count.

Thanks to The Chemistry of Textile Fibres we were able to dive deeper into what truly makes a softer textile. It’s another reason we chose Eucalyptus Lyocell, because the moisture regain is 13% (as opposed to cotton’s 7.5%) and it transports moisture more effectively. Garments and made-up with Lyocell therefore have a high degree of comfort and are more pleasing to touch.

 

Three of the most acutely hazardous insecticides, as determined by the World Health Organization, are used in the top 10 cotton mills.

One of them, Aldicarb, “can kill a man with just one drop absorbed through the skin,” says OTA, “yet it is still used in 25 countries and the U.S., where 16 states have reported it in their groundwater.

At present, many of the key cotton-producing countries are under high water stress. Cotton production currently accounts for 2.5% of the world’s arable land (healthy land that’s good for crops). 

Whereas the Eucalyptus Tree is fast growing and takes up one-fifth of the land for the same amount of consumer material as cotton

 

 

The SAC’s Higg Materials Sustainability Index (Higg MSI) is the apparel industry’s most trusted tool to accurately measure the environmental sustainability impacts of materials.

The Materials Sustainability Index (MSI) is a cradle-to-gate index that evenly weighs environmental impact areas including chemistry, energy and greenhouse gas intensity, water and land intensity and physical waste.

The higher the index is the more sustainable the material is!

Eucalyptus Lyocell is the highest MSI for the best price!

Source: https://apparelcoalition.org/higg-msi/

The eucalyptus used in our sheets are FSC, PEFC, Sustainable Forestry Certified, and OEKO-TEX certified so you can rest assured that your sheets are safe and low impact on the environment.

The MADE IN GREEN label verifies our sheets have been tested for harmful substance processes under environmentally friendly and socially responsible working conditions.

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

The Made in Green label comes with a QR code that gives you access to information regarding our production facilities in which your Naked Sheets were produced, the stage of production to which the facility belongs and the countries in which our manufacturing took place.

It also verifies our sheets have been tested for harmful substance processes under environmentally friendly and socially responsible working conditions.

We work with like-minded people who go above and beyond to give back to their community and the environment that supports them. That’s why we’ve partnered with the world’s only fibre manufacturer using a zero-emission, closed-loop bleaching process.

Our manufacturer works closely with communities on projects ranging from providing education to children in poverty to women’s empowerment to conserving endangered forests.

 

 

On top of saving a ton (literally) of water during our manufacturing process, we will also be donating 50% of our post-Kickstarter business net profits directly to WaterAid who, since 1981, have helped more than 25.8 million people gain access to clean water and 25.1 million people with reliable toilets.

 

Today, more than 750-million people live without safe water and 2-billion live without a toilet of their own. These basic services are human rights: everyone on our planet needs them to live healthy, dignified, and productive lives.

WaterAid has teams in 34 countries, changing millions of lives every year with clean water, decent toilets, and good hygiene.

And they’re just getting started!

 

Just a simple bag made out of the same material as our sheets. We’re proud to deliver Naked Sheets to you in a plant-based 100% home compostable mailer bag! We’re committed to removing plastic from packaging and shipping!

story:
Welcome to Kadir's Atelier

Who are we?

We are Kadir'in Atölyesi (Kadir's Workshop if translated correctly). We are producing wooden designs - mostly Scandinavian - and trying to build our wood workshop. We are located in Turkey but started that journey in Helsinki, Finland.

 

Our Etsy Link:

https://www.etsy.com/shop/KadirsAtelier

We tried a lot of ways to build our workshop but had very small steps last 5 years. Now, we are looking forward to getting more attention on Indigogo and fund our small business with your contributions. 

Some of Our Works

 

 

 

What is "Sisu"?

Yes, we have sisu in our hearts, our minds, and our hands. We are determined to start this small business and turn in into an inspiration. This helps us to continue our journey to create our dream workshop and keep producing recycled wooden furniture and objects.

What We Do

Unfortunately, the equipment and tools we have are very limited, old and a little bit rusty. The place we have now is pretty old and need a lot of fixations on the walls, gate, windows and mostly the roof. 

 

So Far On The Road

 

What We Need

 

To sum up our expences;

+ Online Shop

Shopify Annual Subscription ($ 300 per month) | $ 3.600*

Shopify Website Designer | $ 1.500*

+ Wood Workshop & Fixtures

We're aiming to raise $ 22,000 from the community for fixtures. 

+ Equipments

Dewalt D27300 Planner | $ 2.200*

Dewalt DCD995P2  Drill x 2 | $ 1.200*

Dewalt DWE7491 Jobsite Table Saw | $ 1.600*

Dewalt Dw739 Bant Saw | 1.400*

Dewalt Dwe1622k Magnetic Drill Press | $ 1.680*

Dewalt Dw682k Biscuit Jointer | $ 440*

Dewalt Dw625e Plunge Router | $ 544*

Dewalt Dwe396 Alligator Saw | $ 595*

Dewalt Dws778 Compact Slide Mitre Saw | $ 950*

Dewalt Dwe4597 Angle Grinder | $ 310*

Dewalt Dcs391m2 Circular Saw | $ 700*

Dewalt D26410 Random Orbital Sander | $ 470*

Dewalt DWP352VS Bant Sander | $ 580*

80 Bandsaw | $ 2.200*

*we calculated the price tags according to hepsicurada.com and exchanged them into USD.

________________________________________+

TOTAL = $ 43.099

 

What You Get

Check out our perks and choose one of them. we would love to make them ready and we can send our designs overseas. Mst of the perks are Kuksas, wooden cups of Sami folks who live in Lapland.

• What is Kuksa?

Guksi (or Finnish: kuksa; Swedish: kåsa) is a type of drinking cup traditionally duodji crafted by the Sami people of northern Scandinavia from carved birch burl.

• Where can I use it?

Kuksa is designed for forest and camping use on long or short treks into the forest, lakesides or elsewhere. Kuksas in Finland becomes a lifelong friend and companion! 

• Can I drink hot beverages with it?

Absolutely! It can be used to drink anything from hot beverages like coffee, tea, or herbal tea to cold water from the stream. 
Also, you can use it for your alcoholic beverages like whiskey or vodka.

• How can I wash it?

No need to put it into a dishwasher, or do not use washing liquid. 
A quick rinse or wipe will be enough to reuse it. 

• What is it made of?

Kuksas are made of carefully selected burls from the Ayous or Sapelli wood.

• How can I carry it?

It is light enough to carry in a backpack or on a belt. Being made from renewable sustainable materials Kuksa's can be said to be the true nature product!

• What is the capacity of it?

Approximately 200 ml (6.7 oz)

• Measurements?

Length: 17.5 cm (6.8 inches)
Height: 5.5 cm (2.1 inches)
Width: 10 cm (3.9 inches)

♥ Fashioned with true craftsmanship following ancient traditions. ♥ 
 

The Impact

We have already spent $ 10.000 on our workshop for repairing the roof and walls. With your contribution, we will do more. 

$43k will cover everything we need to re-build our wood workshop physically and online. 

$23k will go towards developing, testing and adding new products to the ones we already produce with a few missing tools or machines.

 

Puzzles to Solve

To be honest, it is one of the hardest things to get people hear your voice. The Internet makes it easier if you know the right people who have the crowd in their hand on their mobile phone. For our sake, we do not know those kinds of people. We cannot improve ourselves with baby steps. So far, we used all our baby steps and it is time to have some guts to make it bigger. 

We still need more training on the online shop, shipping overseas and furniture making process. We have been reading a lot on design, interior architecture & production process. We have been following a lot of online courses on our subject and doing our best to solve our puzzles (not problems, they are puzzles for us).

Branding is a kick on the B's. Detailed and sophisticated. We are trying to keep things simple, as much as we can. We observe every day and night. Learning is what we have so far.

With the support, we will definitely have the time we need to learn more and have the freedom to make it right. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can get the word out and make some noise about our campaign here.

or

You can find us on social media and follow us!

Facebook • www.facebook.com/kadirsatelier
Pinterest • www.pinterest.com/kadirsatelier
Instagram • www.instagram.com/kadirsatelier
YouTube • http://bit.ly/KadirsAtelier

Loving is sharing!

Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

With your contribution, we will do more. $43k will cover everything we need to re-build our wood workshop physically and online. $23k will go towards developing, testing and adding new products to the ones we already produce with a few missing tools or machines. Puzzles to SolveTo be honest, it is one of the hardest things to get people hear your voice. The Internet makes it easier if you know the right people who have the crowd in their hand on their mobile phone. For our sake, we do not know those kinds of people. We cannot improve ourselves with baby steps. So far, we used all our baby steps and it is time to have some guts to make it bigger. We still need more training on the online shop, shipping overseas and furniture making process. We have been reading a lot on design, interior architecture & production process. We have been following a lot of online courses on our subject and doing our best to solve our puzzles (not problems, they are puzzles for us).Branding is a kick on the B's. Detailed and sophisticated. We are trying to keep things simple, as much as we can. We observe every day and night. Learning is what we have so far.With the support, we will definitely have the time we need to learn more and have the freedom to make it right.  Other Ways You Can HelpYou can get the word out and make some noise about our campaign here.orYou can find us on social media and follow us!Facebook • www.facebook.com/kadirsatelierPinterest • www.pinterest.com/kadirsatelierInstagram • www.instagram.com/kadirsatelierYouTube • http://bit.ly/KadirsAtelierLoving is sharing!Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
There is a constant struggle between ultrasonic and evaporative humidifiers. Both types have pros and cons. Ultrasonic devices are powerful, however they leave pools around and white dust on the surfaces. Evaporative ones give more natural humidification but their evaporatie pads are organic what leads to bacteria growth.
evaWAVE combines the best features of both types, what makes it simply the best humidifying solution.

 

 

 

The dry room air is guided by a turbine through the moist EvaBreeze® cartridges and absorbs the water. The air is enriched with moisture in a natural way and cleaned from impurities (such as dust, pollen, pet hair and mites). Silver ionization has an inhibitory effect on bacterial growth and leads to more hygienic humidification. The built-in turbine helps the humidified air spread up to 100 m². The air coming through aroma cartridge fills the area with the tender fragrance.

 

EvaBreeze® material has proven its efficiency twice in our personal air-cooling devices, evaLIGHT™ and evaSMART™. Its effect is achieved due to a nanostructure that enables outstanding absorbing capacity, combining both hydrophilic and hydrophobic effects. This allows the material to efficiently absorb water and easily take it into the air. There is a great evaporation from a small surface. EvaBreeze® is totally safe and is approved by international certificates.

 

Hi-end technologies are designed to take care of our loved ones and our planet. This is what we mean by the Responsive Care approach, resulting in safe and comfortable environment. Our evaporative pads are 100% biodegradable and recyclable. Evapolar devices enable low power consumption and contain no toxic liquids.

Our devices are developed and produced in strict accordance with the American and Canadian safety standards UL 507 and CSA C22.2 respectively. This is also proven by ETL and CE compliance certificates. EvaBreeze® material is officially tested and has proven its safety in the British State Health Laboratory. We are developing evaWAVE in accordance with the highest standards and following our Responsive Care principle.

 



For more than 2 years, you've been supporting us in bringing the concept of personal climate into reality. Together with you, we're happy to turn cutting-edge technologies into easy-to-use devices for your daily comfort.

 

 

 

 

 

Feel free to ask our support team any questions. They are always ready to provide you with any desired information. Don't hesitate to contact us via "Ask a question" at the top of the page. For press inquiries reach us at pr@evapolar.com

 

With your help, we have already launched two successful products that embody the concept of personal microclimate. We received a lot of feedback on our evaLIGHT™ and evaSMART™ air coolers and returned to Indiegogo for the third time with a room humidifying solution. Support us and keep shaping the future of personal microclimate with us!

 

How does evaWAVE humidify the air?

Our air humidifier works on evaporative principle. The water evaporates from the material humidifying the air. Our material has increased specific evaporation area and improved capillary effect (effect of fluid lifting through thin tubes) that allows evaWAVE to humidify the air better than competitors.

What does the humidifying effect depend on?

The humidifying effect depends on two factors: the outside air temperature, the air humidity. The working principle of our products is based on the evaporation process. The higher the temperature and the lower the humidity is, the more actively the evaporation occurs, leading to a greater humidifying effect.

The last factor that influences the humidity change is the turbine speed. By adjusting it, you can choose the most comfortable humidification intensity for you.

How to install evaWAVE?

evaWAVE is very easy to use and is ready to operate right out of the box. All you need to do is fill the water tank, open the aroma cartridge, plug in the device and turn it on, then set up the app control. The water tank needs to be refilled every 6-8 hours as the water evaporates. You can use the device with or without the aroma cartridge, the usage of your own aromatic oils or essences is also possible with the empty aroma cartridge that has to be purchased from us. You can find more detailed instructions on using evaWAVE in the box.

evaWAVE has 1 year warranty. In case of a breakdown, contact our support service at: support.evapolar.com

Does evaWAVE work without a power supply?

When using the Evapolar air humidifier, please make sure you connect the device to a 220V/110V power supply.

How do I know it’s time to replace the cartridge? Do I need to buy an extra cartridge right now?

You need to replace the cartridge at least every 4-6 months. The cartridge lifespan depends on the air and water quality.

Does shipping costs include taxes?

Unfortunately, taxes vary from country to country and Indiegogo platform doesn't allow to charge them. So, please take into consideration tax payment rules and import laws in your country when making a contribution.

story:
Simply the best way to wake up!


With the use of your smartphone or tablet, the Lumino Bluetooth smartplug transforms your bedside lamp into a dawn simulator. Wake up feeling fresh and energized with the natural benefit of light. Afraid that the light won't be enough to wake you up since you worked so hard the previous day? No worries you can also choose your favorite song just as a backup! Sounds interesting doesn't it? But wait Lumino is much more than an alarm clock! 

Studies have shown that wake-up lights that gradually turn on during 30 minutes can help to reduce sleep inertia. The light suppress hormones of sleep and stimulates those who help us to get up and go.

Oversleeping in the morning could also indicate that your body is set for an other time. The light can help to adjust the body’s natural rhythms to suit the working day better and make you feel more awake and refreshed when you have to get up.




A few minutes before your set wake-up time, the intensity of your lamp will gradually start to increase, and your brain will be stimulated by the light, little by little, triggering your body to begin it's wake up cycle. By the time the light reaches full intensity you will wake up on your own without the need for an alarm. This guarantees a natural and efficient wake-up process simulating natural sunrise.

When the light reaches maximum intensity there is also the option of having an alarm with your choice of a tune from your personal library or a tune suggested by Lumino Smartplug app. You may also use the app as a bedside clock to completely replace your old alarm clock!














Thanks to it's easy to use application and affordable price, Lumino makes the benefits of light therapy accessible to everyone!





No more need to keep your old alarm clock! One size fits all!


Laser cut from our very own Canadian Oak


Tasks completed so far:

  • Design of the 120V electronic circuit and API
  • Validation of the light wake up effectiveness
  • Design and fabrication cost
  • Fabrication and assembly schedule
  • Design of the casing and BOM
  • Fabrication of prototypes
  • Development of the iOS application
  • Partial development of the Android application
  • Optimization of the PCB for mass production
  • Design the mold for the plastic casing
  • Certifications first reviews (CSA/UL, EMI)

Remaining tasks and scheduled completion dates:

  • Certifications second reviews (CSA/UL, EMI)       (May 2015)
  • BETA testing versions                                                 (May 2015)
  • Finalize the Android application                                (July 2015)
  • Obtain certifications (CSA/UL, EMI)                        (July 2015)
  • Fabricate the mold for the plastic casing                (July 2015)
  • Deliver Wood Phone Stand                                         (July 2015)
  • Launch production                                           (September 2015)
  • Deliver Lumino to all our backers!                     (October 2015)



We have been working on Lumino for the past year and we've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make Lumino available to you and the millions of people who have never before had the chance to wake up with a dawn simulator. Usually money is the limiting factor since the standard dawn simulator can be over a couple hundred dollars but we envision everyone waking up gracefully. Let's make our mornings pleasant, our nights softer, and our lives even greater!

So why should you support us?

  • Be the first to get Lumino and all of it's benefits.
  • Wake up gently and feeling refreshed instead of sluggish.
  • Get the stress of your day away with the relaxation mode!

Since James and Phil met during their studies in mechanical engineering 5 years ago, they have completed various successful projects: range extender for electric cars, guitar effect units, wooden sail boat, epitaxy equipment, LED lamps, etc.

During winter 2013, unable to find an affordable and efficient light therapy lamp, they decided to devise their own solution and Lumino's story began. 

Wanting to get the best advises in all different fields of expertise, they teamed up with software developing professionals, electrical engineers, advisers and mentors so that Lumino can become a well thought out product.



American model only?

Actually, the Lumino smartplug is design for American standard plug. We are working to develop an European plug but is not ready yet.  Maybe it will work with adapters, but we can't guarantee anything.

What is the range of Lumino?

We use latest Bluetooth technology (BLE 4.1). This means 50 feet of range including going through walls, enough to cover almost every home.

How many alarms can I set per Lumino?

The app can support up to 10 different alarms per Lumino. An alarm is defined as a change of intensity over a period of time with a backup sound or not. You can decide to repeat the alarm throughout the week or to select the days you want it to ring or not. For example, you can set an alarm for your work, one for the night and another for the weekend.

Can I turn off the phone for the night? Can I use it in Airplane mode?

When you want to program a plug, you need your phone with the Bluetooth activated. Once you have program the plug, you no longer need a connection with it except if you want a sudden change. For the backup sound alarm, you must keep you phone ON and the Lumino app on foreground for iOS app. We suggest using the phone stand to show the time or you can put the phone face down and the screen will turn OFF. You must not close the screen with the side button. You can use airplane mode with no problem. Android version is more flexible.

Can I lock my phone's screen?

You will turn off the backup sound alarm if you lock the screen. It’s only a concern on iOS version. But we are working on it as we speak for the next app update :)

How many Lumino may I control with a single phone?

You can pair your app with a maximum of 10 Lumino.

Can I control a Lumino with different phones? What if someone else also want to control it?

A Lumino can be paired with several phones. For example you could set the alarm one day and the next day someone else could do it. Each time someone programs a new alarm, it will erase all pending alarms set by another device. We have also the possibility to add a password to a device to keep the control of it.

How can I be ensure my lamp won't respond to a nearby device that is not my own?

You can add a password to lock it from undesirable user. If you forget the password, you can simply unplug it for an hour and you will be able to connect to it again.

Which kind of bulb I can use?

Any kind of dimmable bulb: incandescent, Dimmable LED, Dimmable CFL, Halogen, …

What happens in the event of power outage during the night?

No worries! Even without light, your phone will still ring when it's time to wake up! Lumino also has backup power just in case.

Which Bluetooth protocol version is used?

Bluetooth Smart 4.1

What's the maximum power output? Can I control several lamps with a single Lumino?

Lumino is rated for 240W. We suggest to use an extension to control both your beside lamp to get the best dawn/dusk simulation experience or relaxation session.

What it the relaxation session?

During the relaxation session, the lamp connected to your lumino device will brighten and dim at a pre-determined rhythm for the duration of the session. By matching your breathing with the rhythm set by the gentle light, you will enter a state of relaxation that will facilitate slumber. The sessions are based on yoga breathing exercises and help to relieve stress at the end of your busy day.

How do I get the app? Is the app free to use?

The Lumino Smartplug app will be available for free in the App Store and Google Play.

How long is the warranty?

Warranty is 1 year.

Should I use LED instead of incandescent bulb? Is there any science behind that lighting solution?

Blue light from cold LED bulb are the best solution for an efficient wake up. Studies show that the impact of blue light on the concentration of melatonin, the sleep hormone, has been proven in several scientific studies. Conventional bulbs also have an effect on these hormones, but less than LED. Research on the effects of light on human body is still a pretty new field of investigation. Yet we've seen more and more research work published in the recent years to include the Harvard Medicine School, the NASA and several sleep centers though Europe.
