story:
Syncs with the Sun

OrchidBox automatically syncs with local sunrise and sunset times. 

Wi-Fi + Cloud Connected Growing

OrchidBox is connected to our cloud and can be controlled from your own apps.

Ultra-High Efficiency LED Lights

The LEDs used in OrchidBox won the Prism Award for Photonics Innovation for their efficiency. Combined with precision lenses, OrchidBox simulates natural sunlight while outputting the least amount of heat.

 Water Sensor

OrchidBox features a patent-pending water sensor design that never fails to detect when water levels are low and alert you.

 Precision Components

OrchidBox was built to stand the test of time and look great.

 Intelligent App

Our simple app lets you control OrchidBox settings from wherever you are. Grow smart!

 Museum-Grade Acrylic

Our acrylic is made from an injection-molded Lexan medical-grade polycarbonate. It's scratch-proof and looks great.

Water 2x Per Month

With its patent-pending design, OrchidBox conserves water, meaning you only have to water it twice per month.


 

Add Green to Any Space

Simplicity. OrchidBox fits anywhere, whether it's your home, office, or school. OrchidBox makes a great conversation piece whether it's on your night stand, kitchen counter, or desk at work.

- Bedrooms - Kitchens - Bathrooms - 

- Rooms with no windows - Offices and cubicles -

Never Run Dry

Our patent-pending water sensing technology lets you know when it needs to be refilled. The front LED indicator slowly changes to red to let you know it needs watering. When it's low, just open the box and refill until the light turns green:

When it runs dry, OrchidBox automatically adjusts itself by dimming the light so that the plants will live longer. The optical technology lasts for the lifetime of box and will never fail to detect when plants need water.

Grow Wheatgrass and Sprouts

Wheatgrass is grown from wheat seeds, and takes about two weeks to reach a harvest-able height.

Dual Spectrum

Advanced LED Lighting

Set the mood and simulate nature with our world-class powerful lighting system. OrchidBox automatically adapts lighting based on your location.

Daylight-to-dusk lighting effects

Kids Love to Watch OrchidBox Grow

OrchidBox is great for kids - both in the classroom and at home.

Fully Customizable Environments

Simple yet smart.

OrchidBox can be controlled via smartphone and automatically turns on and off based on time of day.

A Natural Mini Ecosystem

OrchidBox is suitable for a wide variety of plant life.

From Prototype to Production

We've been working on OrchidBox since the beginning of this year and we are just about ready for production.

Our first-generation prototype vs our second-gen prototype.

Technical Specifications

Project Timeline

 

 

In the News

Risks and Challenges

Hardware startups have been called the "double black diamonds" of startups. With any hardware startup, there are immense risks and challenges on all fronts. Almost every step of the way has tremendous pitfalls that can cost a budding organization time, money, and people. We mitigate these risks and challenges by budgeting appropriately and utilizing the immense expertise of industry experts along every step of our journey. We are fortunate to be working with some of the most talented and driven individuals all over the world, and we have a wide distributed and local team that is working hard to overcome all of the obstacles we face, from areas such as software, security, plastics, manufacturing, electronics fabrication, assembly, packaging, logistics, marketing, visual design, PR, and intellectual property law.

One of our biggest risks is the lead time of injection-molded parts, which is the amount of time it takes to receive an order after placing it. We have already secured suppliers for most of our components, but due to the high up-front cost for injection-molded components, we cannot start the process until we receive the initial funds from our campaign. The lead time for injection-molded parts is typically 6-8 weeks or more. In addition, we have a few more components, such as the wire harnesses, that have similar lead times. Our goal is to deliver the units before the dates that we have set.

We believe that having a wide, trusted network to rely on not only makes for a happy workplace but makes it much easier to deliver a high-quality product. While we anticipate many life-changing challenges, we believe we will have the fortitude and expertise to overcome all of them.

About OrchidBox

Our Story

OrchidBox was started by engineering and plant enthusiasts to leverage technology and design to facilitate plant life. We noticed that while devices on the market seemed cool on the surface, they were often large and required a lot of maintenance. They also failed often and were costly to maintain. Many of them simply weren't suitable for what they claimed. In 2015 we started exploring the concept of a smarter and simpler device. Between 2015 and 2018 we perfected the design, adding only the features necessary to create a low-maintenance terrarium that anyone can use. Our first patent was issued in April of 2018, and have filed another. The OrchidBox dream is simple: produce devices that help people get started with plants, so that living spaces around us can become more green.

Mission

Our mission is to increase conservation and conservation awareness by developing micro-climate-controlled devices for plants that are simple and stylistic.

Through our work, we increase awareness for threatened plant species, and increase the total amount of livable space available to plants.

 

Thank You for Your Support!

Rest assured your funds will be used wisely to ensure delivery of the units you purchase and also to further our mission. We've tested and refined the design for three years now, and it's finally production-ready. We love this product and we can't wait to see the smile on your face when you get your very own.

 

-The OrchidBox Team

story:
QuadCooker -microwave assistant-

Short Summary

Background and Qualifications:

  • I have always enjoyed coming up with solutions for life's everyday challenges, and I am proud to introduce my first patented device...the QuadCooker microwave assistant.  I have an MBA and over 25 years experience in product development and marketing
  • Using the QuadCooker in my home has made meal time much more convenient; we all eat together--nobody has to wait for their food! I wanted to share this Amazing device with the world!!  Indiegogo offers a wonderful platform to accomplish this goal, so here we are... 

  • Contributing to this Campaign will help launch a brand new theme in cooking!!  The QuadCooker [microwave assistant] will meet the various needs of all people--one microwave at a time!!

 

What We Need & What You Get:

  • The Project calls for $49,500 for tooling and the first 1750 piece production run.  Tooling is expensive for plastic injection molding, and the QuadCooker--microwave assistant--has three unique parts that require tooling: 1) The Base Plate, 2) the Walls (one tool makes both walls), and 3) the plate/shelves.  Each $23 contribution gets you 1 Base, 2 Walls, and 3 Plate/Shelves (one complete Quadcooker unit!)
  • We are offering the first edition QuadCooker as a perk to the first 1750 backers!!
  •   In the unlikely event we do not reach our goal all investments will be returned to the backers

 

The Impact

Your Contribution to the QuadCooker microwave assistant campaign will open the doors to a whole new cooking solution for microwave ovens!!

  •  For Years People Have Been Cooking in their Microwaves One Dish at a Time--Well! Those Days Are Over!!  We have an excellent Product that is a real game changer!
  • I have been a tinkerer and inventor most of my life, and with this project I (at the encouragement of most everyone I had shown it to) have finally taken it to the next level--the product level.  My education and background have availed me the opportunity to conceive the idea, design it, produce it, and market it!
  •  As the Video illustrates, I wanted a product that could easily cook/warm-up more than one dish at a time in the microwave-- and found nothing acceptable on the market . Having seen the prototype at work, I have NO doubt that the QuadCooker will be a very useful piece of kitchenware/cookware for generations to come!!!

 

Risks & Challenges

 With my MBA and long career in sales the most challenging aspect of the project has been finding the right professional resources to bring my concept to fruition and to protect the intellectual property:

  • Through diligent effort I found a design firm that could help me get this off of the ground and introduce me to a lawyer for the patent protection.  
  • Working with the designer for several weeks tirelessly enabled me to move from concept to a prototype reality!
  • With the concept "on paper" the next logical step was to build a professional prototype. Fortunately I was able to work directly with a local 3-d printing company to produce the model seen in the above video 
  • With the design finalized and the patent filed for, the remaining challenge IS to secure the funding to bring this Amazing Product to Market!!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help now either come back before the campaign ends to participate OR let your friends and social media friends know about this amazing piece of Kitchenware!!:  OR OR-- There are MANY ways you can help with this project:

  • You can contribute any other amount also--large or small (at the top of the page)!
  • Please Help Me to Get the Word to your Friends and Family!!
  • Don't Forget To Share this Wonderful Product Launch via all of your favorite social media channels!!

story:
Gadget Flow Innovation Award Winner

 

 

Featured Product on:

 

Limodo Window Wizard 

Protect yourself and family from potentially harmful dust particles and allergens! These collect on windows even when they look clean. Daily window cleaning is a must.

We all spend far too much time cleaning windows in our home. Since we’re not professional window cleaners, we end up streaking the window, using too much product, and potentially endangering ourselves to reach unsafe locations. Not to mention we miss out on doing the things we love!

That’s what inspired us to create the Limodo Window Wizard. 

This all-encompassing smart window cleaning robot is able to spotlessly shine your windows. All you do is fill it with your favorite cleaner and step away. The rest is history. With smart-cleaning technology and edge detection capability, your automatic cleaning robot will be able to handle every inch of cleaning so you don’t have to worry about it.

To top it all off, a powerful compatible Limodo app will make it easier than ever before for you to set and track the progress of your at-home window cleanliness. 

 

Safer Window Cleaning

How many of us have endangered ourselves trying to clean windows in attics, above sea level, etc.? With the Limodo Window Wizard, using its powerful suction technology, this smart cleaner can reach hard-to-reach spots while you relax after a long day of work. Plus, you can use it as many times as you want in any given period, especially if you are expecting guests or company. 


Hi-Tech Features

Path Detection System: With the Path Detection System, choose your path plan on the remote or app and the robot will automatically follow the set path and detect the size of the window and clean accordingly.

 

 

Edge Detection System: The Edge Detection System is a built-in smart system that uses sensors to detect and avoid the edges of the desired cleaning area, helping it to hug the very edge of the window so it effortlessly cleans all elements of your space. This system is what allows avoiding collision or falling off the edge. 

 

Powerful Suction System: The secret ingredient of Window Wizard is a powerful suction system generating an internal vacuum that both keeps the Window Wizard firmly in place like magic and at the same time makes the unbelievably sparkling clean result possible. 

 

30-Min Battery Backup: No power source next to a window? no problem!, we’ve embedded a 30-minute battery backup that will keep the Window Wizard from shutting down or failing to complete its intended cleaning path.

 

App and Remote Controlled: We believe convenience is a must and not a luxury. That is why we made it easy and convenient to control your Window Wizard either from the provided remote control or the dedicated app for IOS and Android.

 

Lower Noise: Who wants to listen to the annoying noise that comes out of a vacuum cleaner or dishwasher? No one! That’s why we made the Window Wizard to be low-noise, so it can quickly clean all of your windows without undue attention.

 

Hook Anti-Fall System: Although the powerful suction system keeps the Limodo Window Wizard firmly in place, as an added precaution, the Window Wizard is equipped with a hook anti-fall system for your peace of mind.

 

Why We Need Your Help

We have found the right high-quality production partner in China. However, production runs need a minimum order quantity MOQ requiring a large upfront commitment. In order to fulfill a large shipment of Limodo Window Wizards, we really need your help.

We are hosting the Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign to raise funds by offering the Limodo Window Wizard on pre-order at a heavily discounted price compared to the retail price. With your help we will be able to make the Limodo Window Wizard a reality!

ALL OR NOTHING If we don't reach our goal of $170,000, we don't get paid by Indiegogo and funds will be refunded to backers by Indiegogo

 

Our Indiegogo Campaign Perks

For a limited time period, we are offering the Limodo Window Wizard exclusively to Indiegogo backers at heavily discounted prices compared to the robot's retail price. There are two perks to choose from (The Super Early Bird price and The Early Bird price). Don't miss out on our once in a life time incredible Super Early Bird price (limited to only the first 600 backers!).

What is included in the box

The following are included in each order of the Limodo Window Wizard:

  • The Limodo Window Wizard robot
  • Remote control
  • 2 Cleaning pads
  • Power adapter
  • 4M (13.1 FT) DC extension cable
  • 4M (13.1 FT) Safety Cord
  • User manual

 

The All Black Color

When the campaign ends, we will send out surveys to everyone and at that time you will be prompted to choose your desired color of the Limodo Window Wizard.

At the moment the Window Wizard is only available in white. When our Indiegogo campaign reaches our stretch target of $600,000, the all black color will be unlocked and available to all. So spread the word! and help us reach our stretch goal. 

 

 

The Timeline

 

Limodo Window Wizard Technical Specifications

  • Average Power: 75W
  • Suction Power: 2800Pa
  • Adapter Input: 100-230V 50/60HZ 2A (Please check your local power specifications)
  • Adapter Output: DC24V  3.75A
  • Cleaning Speed: 2.5Min/Sqm
  • Noise Level: <65 dB
  • Backup Battery Type: 14.4V/650mAh Li-ion
  • Backup Battery Charging Time: 2H
  • Backup Battery Working Time: 30Min 
  • Dimension: 250*250*85MM

 

Limodo Referral Program

Join our Kickbooster commission program. You can sign up and earn commissions for simply spreading the word about our campaign.

Click on the below link to sign up. You will then be provided with a unique link to share on social media. For every Window Wizard pre-ordered through your link, you will receive a 15% commission!

Commission Program Sign Up Link

 

About Us: Limodo Technologies  

Limodo is a disruptive technology startup focused on innovative solutions to solve everyday needs. We are determined to use smart technology to change our everyday lives. Limodo products are designed with the highest quality standards in mind ensuring a reliable and user-friendly experience.

Our first product, the Limodo Window Wizard, represents the future in cleaning technology, effectively replacing the need for any kind of professional window cleaner. We are so excited to introduce this kind of new-age cleaning to people around the world.

The Window Wizard is just the start as we aim to roll out a series of innovative products that help make our daily routines that much easier and freeing up time for all of us to enjoy life!

For more details please visit our website www.limodo.com

Follow our social media pages

FACEBOOK

INSTAGRAM

YOUTUBE

story:
Having seen my own child be the victim of a crush injury, I know how devastating it can be. Things you previously never dreamed could hurt you, are now front and center.

This campaign is important to me, because I feel we can prevent crush injuries. Over 40000 hospital visits a year show just how dangerous things in your own home can be . Having the backing of our contributors will allow us to greatly reduce the number of injuries in the home, with the added benefit of saving your electronics from permanent loss.

 

 

The Atlas TV Safety Bar was developed to provide additional support for flat screen TVs that are mounted on their factory supplied feet.

 

 

Given that TVs are very heavy they are prone to fall over if bumped or pushed, this could be by a child, pet or even an adult. This could not only be costly, but fatal.

 

Using a combination of vacuum, polymers and micro-adjustment, Atlas brings a new dimension to stability .

 

 

Its unique structure means its suitable for heavy-duty use, is transferable, strong, and reliable.

 

If you have a flatscreen, and don’t have it wall mounted, Atlas will add the peace of mind you didn’t even know you needed.

 

Given the adjustability of the bar, it can be used to stabilize monitors, desktop computer towers and many other items that can come loose and become a danger.

 

 

Having gone through 27 revisions and over 200 hours of testing , we are confident in the ability of the Atlas TV Safety Bar to greatly reduce crush injuries.

 

 

We are looking to fund the manufacturing of 1000 bars with the help of this campaign.

 

Even if we don't hit our total funding target, we have supplemental low-volume manufacturing techniques to offer all backers a unit - guaranteed.

story:
In 2017 while travelling through India, as you do when travelling overseas me and my family were buying a lot of drinking water in plastic bottles, as much as we were caring for clean water we were also worrying about the amount of plastic water bottles we were throwing away.  One day while shopping we noticed this shiny copper bottle it caught my immediate attention – a stylish re-usable bottle that wasn’t plastic and when I asked about it, they explained that it was “Ayurvedic and good for health”.  Aayu in the ancient language Sanskrit means health and Veda means study.  After making further enquires and research about it I realised that this is one of the most ancient and natural ways of purifying water, plus it also tastes good and also kept our water cool.

When we came back to Melbourne, Australia we started to sell the initial copper water bottles online (www.aayu.com.au) and they have been selling well, after a year of operating this up and running business, we wanted to introduce a new design and everywhere we looked we found similar looking bottles, we came up with an improved version in particular with the silicon lids making it more practical and added a silicon sleeve for grip, this adds to the finishing look, we also changed the packaging by going with completely recyclable material and keeping in line with our environmental friendly motto. 

The Copper water bottles are 100% pure copper and seamless, which has various wellness benefits whilst reducing plastic bottle wastage that go directly into the landfill. The design has been taken into careful consideration in a practical, aesthetical and eco-friendly alternative water bottle.  

 

Our pledge for funding will go towards achieving our goals, in particular this would help with manufacturing and marketing expenses.  If you would like to join us in our journey for a more sustainable future we would appreciate your contribution with this project.

In terms of funding, we are seeking AUD 3500.00 for manufacturing and marketing the product.

In this modern world where we have UV filters and RO purifiers to purify water, the concept of drinking water stored in a copper vessel might sound old-fashioned. However, this age-old practice referenced in ancient texts of Ayurveda is now supported by several scientific studies.

Storing water in a copper vessel creates a natural purification process. It can kill all the microorganisms (moulds, fungi, algae and bacteria) present in the water that could be harmful to the body and make the water perfectly fit for drinking.

According to Ayurveda (Ancient India natural medicine), drinking copper-enriched water first thing in the morning on an empty stomach helps balance all three doshas (Kapha, Vata and Pitta)

1.  Prevents Water-Borne Diseases

2.  Keeps the Digestive System Healthy

3.  Aids Weight.

4.  Boosts Heart Health 

5.  Beats Anaemia 

6.  Slows Down Aging 

7.  Stimulates Your Brain

8.  Fights Inflammation 

9.  Regulates Thyroid Gland
story_txt: In 2017 while travelling through India, as you do when travelling overseas me and my family were buying a lot of drinking water in plastic bottles, as much as we were caring for clean water we were also worrying about the amount of plastic water bottles we were throwing away.  One day while shopping we noticed this shiny copper bottle it caught my immediate attention – a stylish re-usable bottle that wasn’t plastic and when I asked about it, they explained that it was “Ayurvedic and good for health”.  Aayu in the ancient language Sanskrit means health and Veda means study.  After making further enquires and research about it I realised that this is one of the most ancient and natural ways of purifying water, plus it also tastes good and also kept our water cool.When we came back to Melbourne, Australia we started to sell the initial copper water bottles online (www.aayu.com.au) and they have been selling well, after a year of operating this up and running business, we wanted to introduce a new design and everywhere we looked we found similar looking bottles, we came up with an improved version in particular with the silicon lids making it more practical and added a silicon sleeve for grip, this adds to the finishing look, we also changed the packaging by going with completely recyclable material and keeping in line with our environmental friendly motto. The Copper water bottles are 100% pure copper and seamless, which has various wellness benefits whilst reducing plastic bottle wastage that go directly into the landfill. The design has been taken into careful consideration in a practical, aesthetical and eco-friendly alternative water bottle.   Our pledge for funding will go towards achieving our goals, in particular this would help with manufacturing and marketing expenses.  If you would like to join us in our journey for a more sustainable future we would appreciate your contribution with this project.In terms of funding, we are seeking AUD 3500.00 for manufacturing and marketing the product.In this modern world where we have UV filters and RO purifiers to purify water, the concept of drinking water stored in a copper vessel might sound old-fashioned. However, this age-old practice referenced in ancient texts of Ayurveda is now supported by several scientific studies.Storing water in a copper vessel creates a natural purification process. It can kill all the microorganisms (moulds, fungi, algae and bacteria) present in the water that could be harmful to the body and make the water perfectly fit for drinking.According to Ayurveda (Ancient India natural medicine), drinking copper-enriched water first thing in the morning on an empty stomach helps balance all three doshas (Kapha, Vata and Pitta)1.  Prevents Water-Borne Diseases2.  Keeps the Digestive System Healthy3.  Aids Weight.4.  Boosts Heart Health 5.  Beats Anaemia 6.  Slows Down Aging 7.  Stimulates Your Brain8.  Fights Inflammation 9.  Regulates Thyroid Gland

story:
It is a portable projector but works like a smartphone. Charge it and Play it instantly.

 

Guaranteed delivery worldwide

 

Most of the "Full HD" mobile projectors are not really Full HD. If you take a close look at the specs, the resolution of a typical mobile projector is "WVGA: 480p" and even the “high-performance” projectors are "HD: 720p." This was the technical limit of the mobile projector...Until NOW!
D029 is able to go beyond the technical limit, and successfully materialize crystal clear Full HD: 1080p quality!

 
                    
 
 

With D029, you can enjoy sharp and crisp images even with this large display.

If the brightness of a projector is low, the image will be dot-like, rough and dim when its enlarged. But D029 produces 200 ANSI Lumens to ensure the picture is clear with for any screen size from 20-200 inches.

 

 

Hold your popcorn tight because everything will look real! The awesome quality of 3D will take you right into the movie. (3D viewing glasses are sold separately)

 

 

Take the front row for your favorite movies and shows! You can use any streaming services on Android 7.1.2. If you need to use an application for your business presentation, gaming, cooking, exercising, or anything else, Google Play is available as well!

You can also connect your phone, tablet, TV or computer using Bluetooth, Airplay and E share!

 

 

 

The D029 has a built-in 3W full-range stereo speaker! The high-quality treble and bass sound will immerse you in any movie or show.

However, we understand that no snowflakes fall in the same spot. You can customize your sound preference by connecting D029 to your favorite audio device and personalize the whole experience!

 

 

Just sit back and relax. D029 automatically corrects vertical keystone and autofocuses for you!

 

 

No wait, No lagging, No delay! The fast 5G WIFI will consistently provide the best quality!

 

 

Who likes to carry a heavy projector, untie the cords, connect the projector, set up manually and install it? With D029, all you have to do is to click the Power Button!  

Like a smartphone, the High-Performance Touch Panel lets you operate everything without a remote controller! However, you can use a remote controller or even a keyboard if you choose to do so.

 

 

The D029 is extremely lightweight and easy to carry anywhere! It’s only 850 grams (29.9 ounces) and smaller than a water bottle. It’s time to carry the Smart Mobile Projector! Your business meeting will go smoothly with the versatile D029, and your movie day or game time with your family and friends will be a blast!

 

 

D029 is here for you even if your phone or tablet runs out of battery. You can charge your device as long as you have the USB cable! Simply plug in the second USB hub.

 

Stretch goal

 

Make your movie night extra special 

You can have a romantic night with your significant other or invite your friends and family to make the night something more fun and special! You can have a movie night, game night, karaoke night, you name it.

 

Lay down and enjoy your relaxing time

Did you have a long day? Why don't you lay down, relax and watch your favorite show!

You can attach D029 to any tripods without extra tool or accessory.

 

Take photos/videos with cool effects  

Running out of an idea for an Instagram post? You can pick any background and take your photo or video to the next level.

 

Share your idea instantly

Just a click of the button, you are ready to share your incredible idea to many people. D029 is the simple method but adds a lot of value to your teaching and presentation.

 

Decorate your wall without any installation 

Use D029 as a tool to paint a wall! 

Or, you can use it as a wall picture! Awesome thing is that if you wear 3D glasses, your art comes alive!

You got more cool ways to use D029?

Share with us!

                                  

We collaborated with HOTTACK, a PCBA solutions company specializing in smart android electronic product design, hardware & software engineering, manufacturing, and sales with more than 11 years of core research and development contract as the second developer of Rockship. We have acquired ISO 9001-2015, SG, and BSCI quality standards that meet international standards.

We found D029 at the Hong Kong Electronics Fair and it was a prototype at the time.  We create video contents so we examined the D029 strictly whether the performance is not good, or the native image quality is actually low. Out of all the mobile projectors at the fair and what we have seen, D029 was the far best in quality and function. We decided to invest in D029 and take it to the next level! 

 

 

D029 Specification

 

What is in the box?

  • D029
  • Remote Controller
  • PSE certified AC adapter

 

Certification 

  • Certification of Management System Certification

 

Major Media Press Releases

  • Lifehacker
  • GIZMODO

 

Risks & Challenges

As we described, we are fully ready for mass production and shipping D029. However there may be delay in shipping due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Currently, the parcel-post items' shipment from Japan to the U.S. by air is temporarily suspended. Hopefully, the suspension will be lifted by December, or we will ship D029 by surface.

 

Can't contribute D029 but love D029? 

Please get the word out about D029 to your family, friends, strangers, and people who are next you right now! We may consider an extra discount for those of who helped us to grow our business! Tank you for being awesome!

story:
After the pandemic hit, public safety has become a big priority in our community. Our hands have the capability to carry and pass on millions of germs per handshake, that's why frequently washing hands is important! However, in between our handwashing, we come into contact with many high-touch surfaces, one of the dirtiest of all being door handles. Research has shown that door handles can carry over 1,300 types of germs and bacteria. That's where UVWAY comes in, minimizing that spread and keeping everyone safe is our main priority. By using an automatic sensor the UVWAY turns on its built-in UV-C light for 10-30 seconds killing off any harmful pathogens present on the surface.

 

 

Often forgotten about, door handles lead as one of the five dirtiest surfaces in a home. The CDC urges to wipe down high-touched surfaces frequently. However, after every use is wasteful and not possible in busier places such as businesses or restaurants. In research done by the University of Arizona, a sample of a virus was placed on a door handle and within two to four hours, that virus had spread to 40-60% of the workers and visitors. Research has also shown we enter our homes and bathrooms with hands that could be carrying up to 10 million germs that can linger for hours. Although brass or copper door handles are used for their antimicrobial properties, new research has found that it becomes less effective from layers of human sweat after extended use and requires a minimum of a few hours to kill germs. So we created the UVWAY, the self-disinfecting door handle to help minimize this problem and help keep you, your loved ones, guests, and customers safe. 

 

 

 

 

 

We want to help our community adapt to a new normal. A normal that allows us to go out to eat, shop, explore while keeping everyone safe. In order to give back to our community, we need YOUR help. You can support us by buying our product, following us on our socials, and sharing about us.

                

 

 

 

 

 

UVWAND:

  • UVC LED - Mercury-Free and Ozone-Free
  • Deep UV disinfection LED lamp beads technology breakthrough up to 99.9% sterilization rate in 10 seconds with up to 10,000 hours of LED life all in a small, light, and sleek stick.

UVAIR:

  • Car Ionizer Air Purifier, Removes Dust, Cigarette Smoke, Bad Odors, Release Anion- Available For Automobile and Small Room
  • Made of aluminum alloy metal with high hardness making it durable with a beautiful finish. 
  • Extremely quiet and low noise.

UVMAX:

  • Extremely quiet UVMAX Filter.  A 5-in-1 Purification System with 7 Layers of Protection
  • Normal mode (3 speeds) Sleep mode, Auto mode 
  • Pre-filter, True HEPA Filter, Active Carbon, Catalyst UV light, Negative ION
  • Removes: Smoke, dust, cooking smells, mold spores, pollen, bacteria, toxic household chemicals, pet dander, and more

 

About Us:

UVWAY is a Canadian start-up company founded by Mechatronics Engineer Elijah Erb and Business EntrepreneurJi Seo. Together, the two co-founders came together and created a company that aims to prevent and reduce the spread of infectious diseases through innovative technology and simple solutions.

story:
As Seen On:

It's All About the Smiles!

The Smile Vial is a tiny magnetic vase for flowers and small plants. It’s designed to make good things happen. For every one bought, one will be given away to someone in need of a little kindness in their life.

Many different ways to add a bit of nature to your space with the Smile Vial.

Smile Vial is all about creating smiles, starting with your very own. As science continues to show us, nature has an incredibly positive impact on our well being. Making a conscious effort to look for and celebrate all the little beautiful things around you is a simple and easy behavior that leads to a greater sense of gratitude. Making it a regular part of your life can have a profound effect.

Use Smile Vial with any cut flowers.

The Smile Vial was designed to require minimal effort. One or two small flowers at a time is all it requires and they’re easy to find. In addition, small succulents or tillandsia plants are easy to grow in the Smile Vials. It’s all beautifully simple.

Grow low maintenance succulents and tillandsia plants.

Add personal touches to appliances.

Stick to any ferromagnetic metal surface.

Use metal screws or thumbtacks to add Smile Vial to furniture.

Add personal touches to any piece of furniture.

Convert existing fixtures to beautiful floral displays.

Greet or surprise loved ones with beautiful floral arrangements.

The Smile Vial will also allow you to celebrate what’s important in your life. Reminding yourself of a positive affirmation or goal is empowering and tends to make us happier so it is definitely worth a shot.

Celebrate the important stuff with the art board.

The art board is a simple rectangular piece of powder coated metal. There are countless original arrangements you can create using photos, laminates, fabrics, or various other materials you can stick to it. Trying to showcase a few different ways to use the art board was one of the most enjoyable parts of this project so far. It will keep your inner-maker in creative bliss for hours.

Pleas share the kindness.

Lastly, the smile Vial is about the net benefit, not profit. My inner idealist was always more motivated by positive social impact rather than a financial one. The Smile Vial was intended to be shared so profit was never the main objective. For the price of a nice greeting card, it is easy to share it with friends and loved ones. Additionally, every Smile Vial purchased will benefit a stranger in need of a little kindness. The details of the Buy One, Give One initiative are described down below.

In summary, the Smile Vial project is all about sowing smiles and making people happier by:

  • Providing a simple way to inspire appreciation of natural beauty around us.
  • Celebrating and supporting what’s important in life .
  • Encouraging creative flow from making stuff with the art board.
  • Reminding you about the positive impact you made in a stranger’s life.

    • Buy One Give One Initiative

    The Buy One Give One initiative is not as much about charity as it is about having compassion for ourselves and others. With every purchase of a Smile Vial, one will be given to someone in need of a little kindness. Kindness matters and sometimes even the simplest of random acts of kindness can have a profound effect, far beyond that which was intended. But, that's only the beginning.

    In time, I aim to broaden the reach and impact of the project by supporting various charitable organizations with proceeds from Smile Vial sales.  There is no shortage of causes in desperate need of funding and social entrepreneurship is one of the most financially sustainable ways to support them.  The Smile Vial project is committed to a mandate of positive social benefit.  Portion of the proceeds from every Smile Vial sale will always be allocated towards supporting worthwhile social initiatives for as long as Smile Vials are being sold.  I started this project with that specific objective in mind.


    Perks & Rewards

    The Smile Vial is designed to last. The vial will be made of polypropylene so it won’t break if you drop it. It will be available in a variety of colors starting with frosted clear, graphite, and magenta as shown below. The top holder will be made using a soft elastomer to make it nicer to hold and to prevent it from slipping. A neodymium (aka rare earth) magnet, encased in the holder, will secure the Smile Vial to any ferromagnetic metal surface, including some stainless steels. The note insert is a thin polymer film. It will be supplied blank so you can write on it with any marker and reuse it for as long as you want.

    The art board is a plain 5 x 7 inch anti-corrosion coated metal surface. It comes with a magnetic strip so you can stick it to other metal surfaces such as your fridge. You can also hang it just about anywhere you’d like using readily available fasteners. Lastly, it conveniently fits standard photo frames so you can match it to your existing décor.

    The Smile Vial Set comes with three vials of the same color. You’ll be able to choose one of three colors (frosted, graphite, magenta) but you don’t have to decide now. Final selection can be made once you receive the backer survey at the end of the campaign.

    The Smile Vial Art Board Kit includes the Smile Vial Set, as well as, the Art Board and magnet strip. Access to original wallpapers will also be included for free to all backers so you can download and print them for free.


    Risks and Challenges

    Risks and challenges are minimal. I designed and developed a lot of products. I have also successfully run crowdfunding campaigns in the past so I know what it takes to meet shipping and delivery deadlines. 

    Your support will be used to fund the final production run. Your input and contribution will also help to determine other critical production aspects such as initial product volume, color and accessory preferences. Removing the guess work and creating exactly what you want will save a lot of valuable time and money.


    Shipping & Delivery

    We're almost there and we're ready to go. Once the project is funded, tooling and production will ensue. First batch of Smile Vials will ship as early as February and the fun will follow shortly thereafter.


    Let's Make Good Things Happen

    The Smile Vial is an awesome little product on a mighty mission and I cannot wait to get it into your hands. Please support the Smile Vial project and let’s make good things happen!

It will be supplied blank so you can write on it with any marker and reuse it for as long as you want.
The art board is a plain 5 x 7 inch anti-corrosion coated metal surface. It comes with a magnetic strip so you can stick it to other metal surfaces such as your fridge. You can also hang it just about anywhere you’d like using readily available fasteners. Lastly, it conveniently fits standard photo frames so you can match it to your existing décor.

The Smile Vial Set comes with three vials of the same color. You’ll be able to choose one of three colors (frosted, graphite, magenta) but you don’t have to decide now. Final selection can be made once you receive the backer survey at the end of the campaign.

The Smile Vial Art Board Kit includes the Smile Vial Set, as well as, the Art Board and magnet strip. Access to original wallpapers will also be included for free to all backers so you can download and print them for free.

Risks and Challenges
Risks and challenges are minimal. I designed and developed a lot of products. I have also successfully run crowdfunding campaigns in the past so I know what it takes to meet shipping and delivery deadlines. Your support will be used to fund the final production run. Your input and contribution will also help to determine other critical production aspects such as initial product volume, color and accessory preferences. Removing the guess work and creating exactly what you want will save a lot of valuable time and money.

Shipping & Delivery
We're almost there and we're ready to go. Once the project is funded, tooling and production will ensue. First batch of Smile Vials will ship as early as February and the fun will follow shortly thereafter.

Let's Make Good Things Happen
The Smile Vial is an awesome little product on a mighty mission and I cannot wait to get it into your hands. Please support the Smile Vial project and let’s make good things happen!

story:
We are just a couple of dudes who absolutely love NFTs and love showing off more. We hail from tech and marketing backgrounds and are obsessed with the idea of merging the two together into an aesthetically pleasing and secure NFT display. One of the super nerds on our team also has a cybersecurity background so you know your stuff will be safe!

 

Our goal is to create the first stand alone NFT display to provide a secure way to view your NFTs on large screens. You will no longer have to pull your phone out every time you want to show your friends your digital art collection. 

 

The display will be run using a Raspberry Pi (or other form of processing unit), which will also house an NFT wallet app that fully integrates your See NFT Display with your existing NFT wallet. You will be easily able to control the display to scroll through different NFTs directly from the wallet integration app, or using an infrared remote.  We plan on integrating with all major NFT applications in the future, but will start with ERC-721 driven NFTs.

 

The integration of NFT wallets directly into the SEE NFT Display provides enhanced security when compared to mirroring applications that just project your NFTs onto  existing devices. These mirroring applications present security vulnerabilities by sharing hash and private key information across potentially unsecure WiFi networks to displays that may lack the necessary security protocols to keep your NFTs safe. See NFT Displays will leverage existing security protocol of NFT wallets, making them safer and more secure. This allows you to still enjoy your NFT collection while knowing that it is safe.  

 

The display will also display the serial number associated with each NFT, featuring a programmed custom QR code that can be scanned to prove ownership. This is how your friends will know you really are true the owner of your awesome NFT collection!

 

The displays will  be able to support still and live images, and we plan on adding speakers in later releases. We are planning to create the displays in the below 3 sizes. All displays will be very sleek with a bezel-less design with rounded edges. We plan on expanding to even larger displays after the initial production for this Campaign. 

 

Sizes:

  • See NFT Display - 10.1 Inch (iPad Size)
  • See NFT Display XL - 15.6 Inch (Large Laptop Size)
  • See NFT Display XXL - 21.5 Inch (Computer Monitor Size)

*All Images are fabricated representations to portray the desired finish product*

See NFT Display - 10.1 Inch (iPad Size)

 

 

See NFT Display XL - 15.6 Inch (Large Laptop Size)

 

See NFT Display XXL - 21.5 Inch (Computer Monitor Size)

story:
special period

Let's fight the epidemic together

Mask + glasses Fog in a second

"Car accident" staged in minutes

 

Tsinghua glasses cloth, which is made with the surface interface nano-processing technology of Tsinghua University Tianjin High-end Equipment Research Institute as the core. Using it, you can get more efficient, safer and more advantages anytime and anywhere.

Surface interface micro-nano technology&New surface material development and preparation technology

We have done a lot of research, the application of a variety of materials and various self-processing technologies can better meet our daily needs. The anti-fog technology in Tsinghua glasses cloth is applied to the anti-fog of large national high-speed railway stations.

 

More applicable objects: 

not only suitable for glasses, swimming goggles, car mirrors, bathroom mirrors, mobile phone screens, photographic lenses, helmets, ski goggles, you can use it in more places

Our honor and certificate

Surface interface processing technology had got more Patent&ISO & SGS & international inspection certificate, authoritative and safe

Our team support

Tsinghua University Tianjin High-end Equipment Research Institute, established in 2014, is an important position for Tsinghua University to train compound leading talents and high-level innovative talents.

There are 39 research institutes, 4 joint research centers, and 11 research laboratories

Covering the four strategic areas of robotics and intelligent manufacturing, micro-nano manufacturing and energy saving and environmental protection, biomedical machinery and health, and high-end equipment. We are committed to applying certain advanced material technologies to all aspects of people's lives to make life safer, healthier and more comfortable. Painted life"

CHSmart Life is a derivative industrialized civilian product brand of Tianjin high-end equipment

High-end Equipment Research Institute of Tsinghua University. We are committed to applying certain advanced material technologies (such as nanomaterials, polymer materials, composite materials, etc.) to all aspects of people's lives to make life safer, healthier and more comfortable. Painted life"

 

We need you

We are asking you to take this first step into the future with us. Whether that means repping our brand around town, sharing the campaign across your favorite social media channels, or jumping in with both feet and picking up an early bird deal on our first batch, we can't do this without you.

We are committed to applying more advanced material technology to life and we’re excited to link arms with you on this glsses cloth adventure. While it is exciting, it is also a big commitment and we understand that. Let us know if you have questions and we will get back to you. Let's do this thing

SHIPPING DETAILS

Depending on your country, you may be responsible for paying for customs, duties, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information. If the customs/duties are not paid and the shipment is returned to us, you will be refunded, minus the shipping cost.

CONTACT US

Please contact us via email and we'll get back to you shortly.

- Customer Support : chsmartlife@gmail.com

- Business Inquiry : chsmartlife@gmail.com

story:
Do you want to be a landlord and collect rents without large investments? Do you want to secure your financial freedom and a steady cash flow? Then be part of our world-changing company & start earning great returns.

Welcome to the world-changing real estate company

We have a unique concept both for home buyers and investors by utilizing blockchain technology in the real estate industry.

About Us

Travel Birdz is a real estate agency like no other. Created by one of the most trusted property management experts, trusted technology partners and solicitors, Travel Birdz combines the best in personal service with a state-of-the-art technology. Travel Birdz has a smart vision for homeownership’s future, by utilizing blockchain technology and NIKA tokens in the real estate industry. We are not looking at a short-term venture. Travel Birdz is a long-term business model backed by investors like you. The Travel Birdz team has the drive and determination to make Travel Birdz the world’s biggest Real Estate company. Why settle for anything less than the best?

Our project is not just a token sale; it truly is an investment into a world-changing idea. We will grow from strength to strength, emanating from the commitment and dedication of the Travel Birdz team and the many investors who have already offered their services to bring Travel Birdz to the forefront of the real estate acquisition process.

Whitepaper: https://travelbirdz.co.uk/assets/whitepaper.pdf

Process Flow explanation: https://travelbirdz.co.uk/images/docs/PROCESS%2... 


PROBLEM                    

1. Tenants, young couples and individuals cannot afford to buy a property but are forced to pay rent instead. After years of paying rent, they own nothing.

2. Banks are charging high interest rates and asking for a minimum of 20% down-payment, excellent credit score and a guarantor. 

3. Potential investors with a great business plan cannot move forward due to lack of own capital.

4. Landlords are paying huge fees and share percentage of their income with estate agents.

5. Landlords very often do not get rent paid for a few months, sometimes years.

6. Home buyers and potential investors don´t have enough capital for down-payment or have a bad credit score.

CHALLENGES

1. What if you can buy a property without bank and down payment?

2. What if you collect rent even if you don’t have enough capital to buy and own real estate?

3. What if you don’t need to deal with banks?

4. What if you can’t lose your capital investment?

5. What if your investment brings you steady cash flow each month and grows in value at the same time with no effort on your side?

6. What if long-term tenants can own something with their rent payment?


SOLUTION

1. Travel Birdz owns its eco-system based on blockchain technology.

2. Travel Birdz issues its own token “NIKA”. 

3. Each NIKA token represents ownership in the company and its assets, like a company stock.

4. NIKA token is supported by company`s real estate assets.

5. NIKA token never loses value because it is supported by real estate.

6. NIKA token will be offered in exchange markets which will increase its value exponentially.

7. Each NIKA token holder will receive monthly payments received from collected rents. 
 

OUR UNIQUE ECOSYTEM


Travel Birdz utilizes blockchain technology in the real estate industry by introducing our NIKA tokens.

 

HOW IT WORKS

1. Travel Birdz sells NIKA tokens to investors in exchange for FIAT currency (ICO)

2. Real estate buyers or tenants who cannot secure a loan with the bank will ask Travel Birdz for financing without down-payment

3. The buyer pays a 3 months security deposit

4. Travel Birdz will buy real estate and sign “Rent-to-own” contract with the new buyer

5. The buyer is a tenant until the whole loan is repaid.

6. The real estate is a collateral for financing

7. Travel Birdz (NIKA token holders) is the real estate owner until it’s paid off by the buyer

8. The buyer pays monthly rent until the end of the “Rent-to-own” contract

9. NIKA token holders receive monthly profit collected from the rent

10. In case the tenant is not paying the rent, he loses “Rent-to-own” contract and Travel Birdz will find a new tenant or sell the property

11. Investors who want to invest in real estate but don`t have enough capital are part of the Travel Birdz eco-system (investor`s pool) and share earnings proportionally to their investment

12. Travel Birdz acts as a property manager for the whole contract duration

Tokenization
A token is a digital representation of a real-world asset, value, or function. One of the most exciting use-cases of blockchain technology is that it helps tokenize real-world assets. It will make possible to trade real estate assets without a third-party. Think about it, instead of buying a property, you are buying simple tokens.

Fractional Ownership via Tokenization
Instead of owning one property, it can be possible to buy tokens and co-own the property. To understand how this will work, let’s take a hypothetical example. To invest in an average Malibu beach house, costs more than $6,000,000 which is out of the most people’s budget. However, if the property is tokenized, investors may invest what they are comfortable with and jointly own the investment with other token holders and still realize the investment return rate without fully funding the entire investment.

Liquidity
Real estate has long been considered an illiquid asset since it takes time for sales to conclude, which isn’t the case with cryptocurrencies and tokens since they can, in theory, be readily traded for fiat currencies. However, as tokens, real estate can be readily sold. A seller doesn’t have to wait for a buyer who can afford the whole property to get some value out of their property.

Decentralization
Blockchain commands trust and security as a decentralized technology. Information stored in the blockchain is accessible to all peers on the network, making data transparent and immutable. One only has to go back to the housing bubble crash in 2008 to see how greed and the lack of transparency of institutions can have catastrophic consequences.

Costs
The transparency associated with a decentralized network can also trim down costs related to real estate transactions. Beyond the savings made by cutting out intermediaries, professional fees and commissions, there are other costs such as inspection, registration fees, loan fees, and taxes associated with real estate.

OUR ROADMAP
 

 

Digital world has taken the planet by storm and Travel Birdz will be at the forefront of crypto-funded homes for many years to come.

story:
All day long, your dog or cat goes looking for water – and it's up to you to keep the bowl full. For many pet owners, this is a major inconvenience. You want to show your pet the care and attention he or she deserves, but the busier your life gets, the more of a pain it can seem to go running back and forth between the tap so often.

So, you go looking for a solution. Sooner or later, you come across pet water fountains. This is a thrilling innovation. If you look around at the market, though, you realize that despite how many pet water fountains there are, none of them live up to your high expectations. They're loud, they're difficult to maintain, or they're not entirely safe or clean.

This is where we at PETSCEO come into the picture.

 

 

Our team has engineered a pet water fountain that goes above and beyond the market standard, it is all that you could ever want for your cat or dog.

Called Niagara, our pet water fountain is quiet to the point of near silence (less than 36 decibels). This is because of the unique approach we have taken to the waterways that make the water fountain functional.

 

It is, at the same time, safe and clean. Water circulates through filters ( filter screen, PP filter cotton, medical stone and weak base ion stone, and high strength activated carbon) .

 

Hearing all of this, you may think that Niagara must be a challenge to maintain – but it's not. The water level sensor turns off the fountain to prevent burnout, and at the touch of a button, you can turn it off manually.

To get into dynamic mode, simply press the button down for 5 seconds. When you need to fill Niagara, it reminds you, via a red indicator light.

 

Best of all, because we have used ABS food grade plastic and because there is no  induced current, the fountain running on a special power supply design with three plugs and Type-C socket, Niagara is safe for your cat or dog to use, of course! – and marvel at the innovation at your pet's paw.

 

PRODUCT TEST VIDEO SHOW

 

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, we are turning to you for help raising the funds that we need to bring Niagara to market. To say thanks to everyone who contributes to this campaign, we are offering some exclusive rewards, including early access to Niagara.

* It's suggested that to change the filter in 6 months.

Product Verification

It's always hard to develop a new product. It related to the product concept, industry design, mechanical, electronic, prototype making, mold making, trail production then mass production, every detail counts, which lead us to the success. At this moment, we are proud to announce that Niagara have already been completed the product test and trial production in the past few months, which means the product is ready for the mass production. Can't wait to let you guys feel the waves!

About Us 

Hello, this is PETSCEO, a team gather with pet lovers. In recent years, our furry friends has take important role in our lives, even act as a soulmate. More demands will comes with more characteristic. After years of being pet owners, we found that a good pet product shall take good care of both the owner and the user, but the existing are not good enough.In 2019, we decided to move forward with whole new pet brand by ourselves. Drinking and Eating shall be the first two basic things, and the drinking is our first choice. Before the idea come out, in order to get more details of pet behaviors and needs, we kept interviewing different pet owners, read authorized researches and consulted the pet clubs for more perspectives. #Niagara Pet Water Fountain is truly the one made in hearts.   

PRESS KIT

 

 

One More Way to Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Niagara by sharing a link to the campaign page on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of Niagara before we go live, the smoother this process will go.

We appreciate all your support. Thank you!

At this moment, we are proud to announce that Niagara have already been completed the product test and trial production in the past few months, which means the product is ready for the mass production. Can't wait to let you guys feel the waves!About Us Hello, this is PETSCEO, a team gather with pet lovers. In recent years, our furry friends has take important role in our lives, even act as a soulmate. More demands will comes with more characteristic. After years of being pet owners, we found that a good pet product shall take good care of both the owner and the user, but the existing are not good enough.In 2019, we decided to move forward with whole new pet brand by ourselves. Drinking and Eating shall be the first two basic things, and the drinking is our first choice. Before the idea come out, in order to get more details of pet behaviors and needs, we kept interviewing different pet owners, read authorized researches and consulted the pet clubs for more perspectives. #Niagara Pet Water Fountain is truly the one made in hearts.   
PRESS KIT
  One More Way to HelpIn addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Niagara by sharing a link to the campaign page on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of Niagara before we go live, the smoother this process will go.We appreciate all your support. Thank you!

story:
In November 2015 the Idea hit me like a ton of bricks sitting in my apartment looking at the piling mountain of jewelry on my vanity with not much space to work with.  Jan 7th 2016 though, I basically lost everything in a day. As I watched the last light bulb come down from a failed store I put everything into, I stood in the empty space in awe of how easily things could be gone.  I then went home to an empty apartment I couldn’t afford to keep anymore and sat on the only piece of furniture left, one pillow, and thought God, what now?  I have nothing but debt in my name. Alone and distraught that day the only thing that made me get up and keep going was the sheer belief that one day I would see the satisfied look on customers faces and be happy  in the knowledge that my idea would have made someone’s life just a little bit easier as it did mine. So I got up and kept working. 

Coming up with the idea was the easy part. Sourcing the right manufacturer, getting 3D designs, choosing the right color and dimensions was the hard part.  Working out the right ascetics was daunting. I remember days where all I thought about all day was coming up with the right design.  I will never forget the day I figured it all out, I literally jumped up and down.  Here we are June 2017 a little over a year and a half after the inception of the idea and I am finally successfully selling my first batch of Wall Mounted Storage Boxes but I need to produce way more if I intend to sell globally.

This product is close to my heart because it was made for the busy woman on a budget working with limited space. It was also made for the woman who is trying to keep her space neat and organized while staying stylish and saving time.

What We Need & What You Get

There is so much more I would like to accomplish with this product but I need roughly $60,000.00 in order to produce 5000 units in different colors, sizes and designs to sell and market globally. I would love to go to trade shows like NY Now and exhibit my product there.  I would love to see satisfied customers all over the world and this money would help me accomplish all of these things.As a perk of contributing over $60 I will give you a free tote bag with my logo on it as a small thank you for supporting.

If I don’t reach my entire goal I will use whatever funds I receive to produce and keep moving forward with production.

I think that this is the future of wall storage and travel accessories. We live in a time where we are living in smaller and smaller spaces but we are buying more and more things. Also we a travelling to more and more places and this is the perfect solution to all these problems.

Having tried and failed in business before I am well aware of all the risks involved but this time with all of my experience and a new found faith I am certain that I have what it takes to overcome the risks and finally see my dream become a reality.

I understand that not everyone can contribute but I would appreciate any support I can get like and share the campaign any way you can spread the word will be well appreciated.

story:
«Sunlight» is compact flashlight is powered by solar energy at the expense of established solar battery. 

 

It was made of plastic and unstainable metal. 

 


It is easy to assemble and disassemble.

 

There is light sensor. 

 

Flashlight turns on at sunset and turns off on rising automatically. 

 

Our flashlights have sliders of inclusion and switches off so you can turn it off if it's necessary. 

 

LED lamp is taken like a basis for lightening.

 

«Sunlight» is protected from moisture, so that rain and snow are not hindrance. 

 

You haven’t got to charge or change the battery because there is solar battery which saves up energy in the afternoon. 

 

«Sunlight» leaves amazing pattern on the grave because of form of protective plastic.

 

It is easy to use «Sunlight». You can put it everywhere.  

Flashlight will be perfect decor for your house.

 

 

Also you can take it to campaign or to holidays out of town because you haven’t got to charge it!

 

 

REWARDS

 

 

Why did we decide to create «Sunlight»?

It is because other flashlights are bad quality or too expensive. So that we find optimal solution: we have done simple, beautiful flashlight high quality! 

 

 

 

Our future purposes:

 

  • 100 000$ - We are going to do lantern for house with colorful lamps for putting it in your room. 

 

  • 500 000$ - We are going to do app for smartphone, to help you change colour, brightness, turn on or turn lamp off. 

 

 

Contact us

Sunlight_go@mail.ru

 

 

«Sunlight» is completely ready and now we are going to the mass production, but again, we need all your help to bring the cost down for the mass production.


Please help us sharing "Sunlight" on your Facebook and Twitter, just simply click the link below.

 Thanks!

 

We are waiting when our flashlight will be with you!

story:
67 Layers Japanese AUS-10 Steel | Premium | Ultra sharp | 8" Damascus Chef's Knife.

• The handle is made of G10, fiberglass. Extremely strong and durable.  

• The blade is made of 67 layers AUS-10 steel, from Aichi Steel Corporation - Japan. Hardness range from 58-62 HRC, good corrosion resistance and extreme sharpness. The perfect choice for a premium, high quality kitchen knife.

• Swedish design.

 

 

NIKKALA 8" Specifications:

 

• 67 layers Japanese AUS-10 steel. Hardness range from 58-60 HRC, good corrosion resistance and extremely sharp. Perfect for premium quality kitchen knives.   

• G10 fiberglass handle instead of Micarta. G10 is also used in handgun grips, structural supports etc and is extremely strong and durable. Glass fibers are what make the G10 so tough. Because the handle is made of glass fiber, it does not absorb water and moisture. So you don't need to worry about the knife getting wet. However, always hand wash your knife and dry it with a cloth after using it.   

• Engraved logo.  

• Luxury mosaic rivet on the middle of the handle.

 

Story:  

My name is Mikael Holmqvist. Im a 26-year-old guy from Stockholm, Sweden.

I have started to really like cooking. Why?  

I was walking through the mall one day and saw this super luxurious knife behind a glass monitor. It was a Japanese chef's knife. 63 layers of steel. Handle made of Micarta. Wow, it looked so stunning!  

However, it was really expensive. (The price tag: 4990SEK, around €460)  

That's where my idea was born. What if I could remove the middle man and start my own knife company? Design my own premium and luxurious kitchen knives with the same or even better quality, for a reasonable price? 

After months of designing, tweaking and testing; I finally came up with a sample that matched my idéa. I found a supplier in the Guangdong province that met all my needs in quality, durability and pricing. 

The result: 

The 8" NIKKALA chef knife. Much better priced than the €460 knife I saw in the mall. The best part: It's made of better materials.

 

So why the name NIKKALA?

Well, my grand father was from Nikkala. A small fishing village way up in northern Sweden, where the fishermen always have valued sharp quality knives.  

I wanted to make this as a tribute for him. He is 87 years old right now (He was 87 years old, but he just passed away now in 2018. Sadly, he never got the chance to see this beautiful knife in person. But he heard about my 755% over-funded Kickstarter campaign last year)

He was really proud of me when he heard about that, and that I had started a knife company with the name of his small village, and had buyers from more than 28 countries worldwide.

 

The Japanese letters: 日本 means Nippon (Japan). The AUS-10 steel comes from Aichi Steel Corporation - Japan.

 

Risks and challenges:

There is not so many risks and challenges since the knives we sell already are in stock. There could be some minor issues with the shipping, but not anything that can't be solved.

In our last Kickstarter campaign we didn't have any delay with the shipments to all our 157 customers. 

We use FedEx and have shipped to over 28 countries worldwide. We have not had a problem with any customer not receiving their product. And since we have the knives in stock, shipping is even faster. Allow us 1-2 weeks after we have received the payment from Indiegogo.

After that, you should receive your knife within 2 weeks.

story:
The Maze Box is a fun and addictive game that helps keep your personal items secure. It is created with an engraved pattern that is hidden when the box is closed. In order to open the box, the user must push, pull, and rotate the lid of the box in the correct pattern.

The Maze Box has been designed by FORM3D, a product design and prototyping firm. We have been working on the Maze Box for over a year and have created several prototypes to determine the perfect shape, sizes, patterns and materials for this box.  

There are two sizes- ideal for storing a variety of personal items.

Short box


Long box


We have used our 3D printers to create several working prototypes of the Maze Box. But now that the size and shape have been finalised, we will be using injection moulding and CNC engraving to produce a larger number of boxes economically, while ensuring we have flexibility with the patterns. 
We will be using a high strength plastic so that the box won't get damaged in case it is dropped (or thrown in frustration)!
 


Injection Moulding


CNC Engraving

The Maze Box comes in a standard single colour straight out of the injection moulding machine. Backers have the option of choosing beautiful marble-like finishes that are created through an innovative method of painting called hydro dipping.

The maze patterns have been designed to be difficult to solve, and also double up as an addictive game. The patterns we create take a very long time the first time anyone tries to open the box. However after learning the pattern, users should be able to open the box in under 15 seconds. 



Patterns will be changed every 100 boxes produced in order to keep them unique. If you order 2 boxes, we will ensure both have different patterns (unless you specify otherwise).

We will provide backers with a 2D cheat sheet of their pattern via email in order to make it easier to open their boxes the first time. However, we encourage backers to refrain from using it! Please message us and let us know if you'd rather not receive the cheat sheet. 

Backers also have the option to create their own totally unique maze pattern using a proprietary retro game that will be provided to them after the campaign is successfully funded!

When creating a pattern, backers must keep in mind that a good pattern includes-
1. Dead ends
2. Wrong turns
3. Moves in all directions

 






 

PERKS

 

 
 

REFERRAL OFFER

We wholeheartedly appreciate your interest in our product, and we do understand that not everybody can make a contribution. But you can always spread the word about our campaign through your network, and we might find some potential backers from there. 
If enough friends, colleagues and connections from your network make a contribution via your profile's referral link, we will send you your own Maze Box! 

Please remember for a backer to count as a referrer, you must promote our campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account.

Please note that if you're located overseas (outside India), you may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees (i.e. VAT/GST).


FORM3D Solutions is a product design and prototyping firm based in Pune, India. We started in 2014 as primarily a 3D printing firm but have expanded into a product design firm that handles design, prototyping, small and large scale manufacturing, and supply chain management for our clients. Every once in a while we launch our internal passion projects like the Maze Box!


If we raise over $20,000, we'll donate $5 per box produced to iTeach Schools. 

iTeach Schools runs 5 secondary schools which are completely free for students in Pune, where government-funded mandatory schooling ends after the 8th grade. Catering to the most under-resourced students, who are at the highest risk of drop-out before Grade 10, iTeach Schools has managed to achieve significant growth in literacy levels, self-awareness and student leadership since its founding in 2015.

To know more, visit their website:
http://www.iteachschools.org/



Interested in writing about us?

Please feel free to email us directly at admin@form3d.in

Help us bring this project to life.

story:
Elastic sheets don't work! All the straps, and clips don't help. The drawstring is the answer!

 

Getting into a freshly made bed is heaven. But that doesn't last long and the bottom sheet gets wrinkled and bunched up pretty quick and by morning its a mess.

---BENEFITS OF DRAWSTRING DESIGN---

  • Total end to sheets popping off the corner of the mattress.

  • Sheets stay flat and wrinkle free beneath the sleeper.

  • Puts an end to pulling the bottom sheet tight every morning.

  • Eliminates wrinkles allowing the enjoyment of the fabric quality.

  • Eliminates the fight against the elastic while putting the sheet on.

  • Eliminates any need for suspenders, straps, pins or clips.
     

The Comfy-Snug Drawstring Sheet gives you that
"just-made" feeling, night after night.

 

Reviews From Amazon

(70% 5 STAR)

Editresson "Holy Grail of fitted sheets!!!!!!!"

"We have a California King and were constantly pulling down the edges of the sheets in the morning and many times they came off during the night. We even tried the sheet clips both diagonal from edge to edge and the ones just on the edge, nothing worked. We bought the drawstring sheets and will never go back."

NLusk "Perfection"

"I LOVE this sheet. It is absolutely perfect. We have a king size adjustable bed and so normal fitted sheets are all but useless and annoying... These sheets are the answer. They fit perfectly snug around all sides of your mattress and they are soft."

Smith "Just the sheet I was looking for!"

"...I had not been able to find a fitted sheet that would actually stay on my Tempurpedic mattress until I tried the Comfy Snug drawstring sheet.... I am so happy I no longer have to get out of bed in the middle of the night to put my fitted sheet back on the mattress!"

S. Weible "Husband is the Ultimate in Sheet Removal while Sleeping"

"...My husbands days of pulling the bottom sheet into his nest are over!! These sheets stay put!!... ...he has not been able to budge them while sleeping. First sheets in 20 years that have been able to do that!!!"

A, Teel "Perfect for Adjustable Bed!"

"If you have an adjustable bed, get these sheets! We have struggled with every kind of sheet and every kind of strap to hold them on and no matter what we did the sheets never stayed on the bed. I find these purely by accident and bought them even though I was sure they wouldn't stay because nothing had. It hasn't moved an inch, and even holds our bed cover in place."

 

The design features of the Comfy-Snug drawstring sheet are:

-The Curved Hem
-The Corner Gather Panel
-The Hands-Free Cord Lock

The Curved Hem

The curved hem allows the distribution of the force in the cord evenly along all four sides of the bed.

The curve also allows the cord to get around the corners without making an abrupt turn, which would create a ton of friction in the corners.

 

The Corner Gather Panel

(VIEWED FROM THE BOTTOM)

The Gather Panel allows for the corner to be loose with plenty of extra fabric to gather providing the adjustment of the corner area as needed to accommodate a wide range of mattress thicknesses. This feature allows the gathered fabric to remain loose and not bind the cord and along with the curved hem, provides that the cord can be drawn up and tightened from one point.

Innovative Hands-Free Cord Lock

Tightening the Comfy-Snug sheet is aided by the hands-free cord lock. Pulling the string ends apart, as seen in the video, is how the slack is taken up in the cord. Releasing the cord after tightening, automatically drags the locking wedge in, which grabs both cords in a vise like clamping action.

The is a big breakthrough for the easy tightening of this sheet. There is no need to tie the cord like with a pair of sweats. Other types of cord locks were tested but could not generate the friction force needed to hold the Comfy-Snug sheet tight enough. This wedge-lock design is positively locked by the force pulling the sheet tight and gets tighter with more tension. Other locks with springs etc, failed to hold.

Cord Lock is well tested, functional and the mold is ready for another production run.

This is the injection mold for the cord lock.

 

 

CAMPAIGN OFFER


T400 Sateen Cotton in White or Taupe.
In Sizes:
King Set
Queen Set
Twin XL Set


If the campaign surpasses the goal and reaches $22,000, other sizes will be released and possibly another color (sand) as shown below. If that occurs, previous backers will be alerted if they want to change their color choice.

 


Unlike other products offered on this platform, the risk of this campaign will be next to nil since over 5000 units of this product are already in use, so it is verified functional and the production is quite simple as it is a basic sewing operation.

 

JUMP IN AND BACK THIS CAMPAIN TO END YOUR LOOSE ELASTIC SHEET BLUES!
