Weible "Husband is the Ultimate in Sheet Removal while Sleeping""...My husbands days of pulling the bottom sheet into his nest are over!! These sheets stay put!!... ...he has not been able to budge them while sleeping. First sheets in 20 years that have been able to do that!!!"A, Teel "Perfect for Adjustable Bed!""If you have an adjustable bed, get these sheets! We have struggled with every kind of sheet and every kind of strap to hold them on and no matter what we did the sheets never stayed on the bed. I find these purely by accident and bought them even though I was sure they wouldn't stay because nothing had. It hasn't moved an inch, and even holds our bed cover in place." The design features of the Comfy-Snug drawstring sheet are:-The Curved Hem-The Corner Gather Panel-The Hands-Free Cord LockThe Curved HemThe curved hem allows the distribution of the force in the cord evenly along all four sides of the bed.The curve also allows the cord to get around the corners without making an abrupt turn, which would create a ton of friction in the corners. The Corner Gather Panel(VIEWED FROM THE BOTTOM)The Gather Panel allows for the corner to be loose with plenty of extra fabric to gather providing the adjustment of the corner area as needed to accommodate a wide range of mattress thicknesses. This feature allows the gathered fabric to remain loose and not bind the cord and along with the curved hem, provides that the cord can be drawn up and tightened from one point.Innovative Hands-Free Cord LockTightening the Comfy-Snug sheet is aided by the hands-free cord lock. Pulling the string ends apart, as seen in the video, is how the slack is taken up in the cord. Releasing the cord after tightening, automatically drags the locking wedge in, which grabs both cords in a vise like clamping action.The is a big breakthrough for the easy tightening of this sheet. There is no need to tie the cord like with a pair of sweats. Other types of cord locks were tested but could not generate the friction force needed to hold the Comfy-Snug sheet tight enough. This wedge-lock design is positively locked by the force pulling the sheet tight and gets tighter with more tension. Other locks with springs etc, failed to hold.Cord Lock is well tested, functional and the mold is ready for another production run.This is the injection mold for the cord lock.  CAMPAIGN OFFER
T400 Sateen Cotton in White or Taupe.In Sizes:King SetQueen SetTwin XL SetIf the campaign surpasses the goal and reaches $22,000, other sizes will be released and possibly another color (sand) as shown below. If that occurs, previous backers will be alerted if they want to change their color choice. Unlike other products offered on this platform, the risk of this campaign will be next to nil since over 5000 units of this product are already in use, so it is verified functional and the production is quite simple as it is a basic sewing operation. JUMP IN AND BACK THIS CAMPAIN TO END YOUR LOOSE ELASTIC SHEET BLUES!

story:
1.1. Historical retrospective

The applicants were motivated to initiate this project by the research of a group of American and British scientists[1]. The results of their research, even in an optimistic scenario, are terrifying – within the following 25 years, tens of millions of people will suffer due to climate changes.

Simulation modeling of the ecosystem has shown that with the increase in temperature, such phenomena as storms and heavy rains will intensify in many regions of our planet. This, in turn, will significantly increase the risk of hydrosphere and man-made disasters, will enforce risks of war conflicts, including that with application of nuclear weapon. To protect the population from these disasters it is urgent to take anti-crisis measures.

Having analyzed numerous technical solutions of modern methods for protection from the global catastrophes, including injuring by nuclear attack, we consider that we have found a more effective solution that will allow people to reduce the risks of their impact and will allow to save themselves and their children!

1.2. The problem

Over the last century, climate change has resulted in global or long-term consequences - the death of people, animals and plants, or a serious disruption of a human life that requires asylum or migration.

While the growth of the Earth’s population necessitates the construction of more and more housing, the problem of balancing the need for housing with the dangers of global disasters is considered to be more actual than ever.

Each inhabitant of the Earth is subject to these climate changes and their subsequences in different form, regardless of a place of residence, sex, age, income level and intellectual development.

1.3. Evidences

The results of climate changes are:

  • global temperature rise - the average temperature of the Earth's surface has risen by about 2.0 degrees by Fahrenheit (1.1 degrees by Celsius) since the late 19th century[2];
  • warming of the oceans - the world ocean has absorbed most of this increased heat, and the upper 700 meters (about 2300 ft) of the ocean show a warming of 0.302 degrees by Fahrenheit since 1969[3];
  • shrinking ice sheets - the Greenland and Antarctic ice sheets decreased in mass (according to NASA, in the period from 2002 to 2005 Antarctica lost about 152 cubic kilometers (36 cubic miles) of ice and this is without taking into account Greenland and other regions;
  • glacial retreat - Glaciers are retreating almost everywhere around the world — including in the Alps, Himalayas, Andes, Rockies, Alaska and Africa[4];
  • decreased snow cover - Satellite observations reveal that the amount of spring snow cover in the Northern Hemisphere has decreased over the past five decades and that the snow is melting earlier[5];
  • sea level rise - Global sea level rose by about 8 inches in the last century. However, the rate in the last two decades, is nearly twice as much as in the last century[6];
  • declining of Arctic sea ice - both the level and thickness of Arctic sea ice has declined rapidly over the last several decades[7].

1.4. Solution

We decided not to wait for the governmental actions on protection of the Earth's ecosystem, but to seek ourselves effective technical solutions for ensuring human survival.

 As a result of conducted engineering surveys, we found out one of the most effective solutions for protection population from the global catastrophes, including with results of radioactive contamination – floating bunker (surface-underwater house-bunker).  This solution will allow people to continue existence, not being afraid for their life and property!

1.5. Strategic vision

We would like to provide people with the opportunity to survive, in the event of global catastrophes, providing a safe, accessible and convenient place of residence and shelter.

We will strive to organize financing and create a pilot sample of a surface-underwater house-bunker in 2018. In 2019 we will strive to conduct a sample test (ability to withstand hurricanes and tsunamis) in the North part of Atlantic Ocean. In 2020 we will strive to expand production in the US and enter the market of floating shelters and floating bunkers. Then, by 2021, we will strive to become the leading developer in the segments of floating shelters and floating bunkers in water.

1.6. Management & team

The launch team has all basic skills an knowledge necessary for implementation of this project.

Timur Mullakhodzhaev is the author of idea and the project manager.

Chief project engineer is Igor Smelyansky, docent, Phd. of tech. sciences of Tver State Technical University.

Leading designer is Max Zhivov http://www.notey.com/blogs/max-zhivov .

Chief technologist is Sergey Zubekhin, Phd. of tech, sciences, docent of the “Cement R&D Institution”.

Other science and technical specialists in Shipbuilding industry.  

1.7. Project status

  I started working on this project since January, 2017. All gained funds were directed for pre-design surveys. At the moment:

  1. The team of like-minded people is formed, which includes a group of scientific and technical specialists with experience and knowledge in basic product-forming technologies; 
  2. The product technology platform is defined;
  3. 3D visualization and architectural sketch were made, an optimal configuration of a test sample of the surface-underwater house-bunker was defined as well;
  4. The optimal location place of experimental production site is defined;
  5. Preliminary technical solution and product specification have been developed; 
  6. Suppliers of technologies and resources (raw, materials, components and equipment) are identified for production of an experimental sample;
  7. Potential production staff for experimental site is formed.

1.8. Product technical specification

            The product will be designed as an environmentally friendly surface-underwater residential module, which is a spherical capsule having external diameter 10 meters and 440 tons weight, made of innovative hard-reinforced high-strength concrete (UHPC) material capable to withstand very high impact and static loads. When sinking in a depth of 25 meters the module is able to prevent the penetration of radioactive emitting[8].  

            The product manufacturing is foreseen in two configurations: “SEAUNIT-Standard” and “SEAUNIT-Suite”. In addition, a possibility to join five residential modules in one floating settlement is also foreseen.

The module provides two underwater floors with large extra-strong windows. The body outside is going to be covered with the decorative protective layer of any color and drawing. The module has an upper landing pad with diameter of 12 meters, capable to accept helicopters with weight of up to 30 tons.

            The module will be equipped with all necessary life support and comfort systems. Sleep, rest, cooking zones, bathrooms and a toilet are designed inside of it.

            The standard module is fixed with a full anchor system, what stipulates the ability to be located not only on the water surface, but also under the water surface on the depth of 25 m in the event of catastrophe. If necessary, the module is towed by standard motorized crafts for any distances.

            Main technical parameters of created product are shown in the Table 1.

Table 1 Main technical parameters of the product

1.9. Main product competitive advantages

The main competitive advantages of the product are listed in the table 2.

The total amount of planned costs for production an experimental sample of the surface-underwater house-bunker makes 1031356 EUR.

[1] Marzeion & Levermann; "Loss of Cultural World Heritage and currently inhabited places to sea-level rise", Environmental Research Letters, 9 (2014), 034001

[2] https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/monitoring-references...

[3] Levitus, et al, "Global ocean heat content 1955–2008 in light of recently revealed instrumentation problems," Geophys. Res. Lett. 36, L07608 (2009).

[4] http://nsidc.org/cryosphere/sotc/glacier_balanc...

[5] http://nsidc.org/cryosphere/sotc/snow_extent.html

[6] Church, J. A. and N.J. White (2006), A 20th century acceleration in global sea level rise, Geophysical Research Letters, 33, L01602, doi:10.1029/2005GL024826. The global sea level estimate described in this work can be downloaded from the CSIRO website.

[7] L. Polyak, et.al., “History of Sea Ice in the Arctic,” in Past Climate Variability and Change in the Arctic and at High Latitudes, U.S. Geological Survey, Climate Change Science Program Synthesis and Assessment Product 1.2, January 2009, chapter 7

[8] Radiation impermeability of the 10 meter water layer corresponds to a lead plate with a thickness of 1 meter

story:
Karma is a virtual assistant designed to help you become a better human being. She will remind you to weigh yourself and exercise, remember doctor's appointments, and otherwise help with all the chores and tasks that nobody likes to do.

Karma is the perfect helper for everybody.

How Karma Works

  • Goal setting: She will help you make smart goals that are tailored to your life. Connect your calendar and goal data to make goals that are achievable given your lifestyle. Working multiple jobs? Have kids and parents to take care of? Your health and wellness goals should keep these in mind.
  • The Internet of Things: Karma connects to your smartphone, internet of things devices, and data services such as Gmail and Facebook. To build a view of your health simply based on your step count and heart rate would be incomplete. Karma develops a fuller picture of who you are.
  • Always on, always connected: Karma is always connected, wherever you go. When you are at home, she will speak to you in person. When you are out, she will call and text you. Even in emergency situations like blackouts, Karma will keep track of your goals until she can be connected again.
  • Motivation: Karma is also a gamified platform, which provides additional motivation for completing your goals. When you do well, you will level up and Karma will treat you with kindness like her favourite child. When you do poorly, she will dock levels and be more strict with you. Be good for Karma.
     

How Karma can Help

Karma can help you:

  • Keep track of your meditation practice
  • Change your sheets and clean your home
  • Get enough sleep and exercise
  • Walk and get enough steps per day
  • Get up every hour instead of being sedentary
  • Go to the grocery store
  • Do your laundry
  • Make and keep appointments for doctors and dentists
  • Tell you about your friends and family's milestones
  • Remember to call your actual mother
  • Maintain a healthy weight
  • Order products if you do not have the appropriate devices for tracking a goal
  • And more.

Believe in Karma.

Stretch Goals

The prototype of Karma has partial functionality. Karma is able to create goals and connect to Fitbits, Smart Scales, Facebook, and your Google Calendar, but there is still much that is needed before we can launch as a product. Your funds will be used towards completing product development and reducing manufacturing costs at scale.

Financial Tracking
If we beat $75,000, we will add connectivity to Mint and Intuit, so Karma can keep minute track of your financial goals and block you from any unwise purchases.

23andMe
If we beat $100,000, we will add support for 23andMe data, so Karma can proactively advise you on your ailments before you even know you have them.

Built-in camera
We plan connectivity with IP cameras, but if we beat our $150,000 goal we will add 360 cameras to Karma so she can truly always be watching you.

Breathalyzer
If we beat $200,000, we will add a breathalyzer to Karma to help people control their drinking directly. Karma will be able to measure blood alcohol content and prevent you from drinking too much.

Technical Specifications

  • Size: approx. 5" tall, 5" base
  • Weight: approx 1 lb
  • Material: ABS plastic, aluminum
  • Details:
    • 7-Microphone array for 360 degree sound
    • 2.5" premium speaker
    • Wifi Connectivity
    • Embedded Linux-based platform
    • High-end ARM-based mobile processor
  • Language: US English
  • Use: Indoor use only (Use the app for outdoor use!)
  • Compatible Devices: iPhone, iPad, Android (4.0+), Any Computer with a Modern Browser, Any Fitbit-enabled Device, Any Google Fit-compatible Device

The Team

Rita Cheng, Founder and CEO
Rita is a designer and technologist with a passion for data and productivity. She has a B.Sc. of Computer Science from the University of Victoria and is currently working towards her MPS in Interactive Telecommunications at New York University. Having worked at everything from small technology startups to large corporations like Amazon and HSBC, she works to create technologies that help the world become a better place.

Chester Dols, CTO
Chester is a designer and artist who works in digital fabrication, art, fashion, and interactivity. He graduated with a B.A. of Architecture from Columbia University and is also working on his Master's at NYU - ITP.

Nathaniel Padgett, Special Advisor
Nathaniel Padgett is the Head of Community at Keen Home Ltd.

Mike Anderson, Special Advisor
Mike Anderson is the COO of Echosec Systems Ltd.

Stefani Bardin, Special Advisor
Stefani Bardin is a faculty member of New York University and Parsons School of Design and the co-founder of a biotech startup.

Q&A

When will my Karma ship?
We will not know fulfillment estimates until the campaign is over and we can better estimate production time. They will be fullilled on a first ordered first received basis. We will keep you notified.

Where does Karma ship?
We will ship to the US & Canada with no extra shipping cost. International orders may require an extra shipping fee.

Does it work with… (my Fitbit, my smart scale, etc.)?
Karma will work with any IoT devices that operate in the Google Fit or Fitbit ecosystem, and most devices that are compatible with Google Home. For other devices, contact our team with an inquiry.

Does it work with iOS and Android Devices or my computer?
Karma will have mobile apps for iOS and Android as well as a website for your desktop and other platforms.

How is this different from Amazon Echo and Google Home?
Think of Karma as a life coach and Alexa or Google as butlers: they serve different purposes, and can coexist peacefully. While Alexa and Google help you control the smart devices inside your home, Karma helps you use the data from your smart devices to help you achieve your goals. There is no reason owning one should preclude you from buying Karma. Karma and Alexa and Google can all be friends, sharing your data for your benefit.

Does Karma walk or have wheels? Where should I place her?
Karma is stationary, but future versions of Karma may be able to move around. For now, place Karma where you are most often in your home for best effectiveness. Karma likes to be heard.

Is Karma male or female?
As we all know, Karma is a bitch. Karma is female.

Is there a subscription fee for the service?
For our Kickstarter subscribers, the one time purchase will be all you need to have good Karma.

Can I name her something other than Karma?
Renaming Karma is not being planned. In any case, Karma by any other name is still Karma.

What languages does Karma support?
For now, Karma only speaks English. In future versions, Karma may communicate in other languages. We will keep the community posted.

Do I need a WiFi network?
Yes. You must connect Karma to a WiFi network-- how else can Karma keep watch of your moves

How do I charge Karma?
Karma comes with an AC charging supply that works with 110/220V. If the power goes out, Karma will call you until she has power and connectivity again.

Can I backup my Karma?
Karma is always connected, and always backing up her data to the cloud. There is no need to backup Karma.

How is my privacy protected?
For the most part, Karma is sourcing data from other IoT platforms, so you should consult their data policies if you are concerned about privacy. For our part, we are very concerned about privacy and encrypt personal data in the cloud.

What are the challenges?
We know that there are a number of challenges in bringing a product to market-- our advisory team has a deep history in bringing products to market and crowdfunding campaigns. We have both the technical expertise and previous experience to execute on this project. We are committed to complete transparency about any challenges we may face.

If you have any more questions, contact our team at team@karma.care. We hope you can join Karma.

Remember to call your actual mother
Maintain a healthy weight
Order products if you do not have the appropriate devices for tracking a goal
And more.

Believe in Karma.
Stretch Goals

The prototype of Karma has partial functionality. Karma is able to create goals and connect to Fitbits, Smart Scales, Facebook, and your Google Calendar, but there is still much that is needed before we can launch as a product. Your funds will be used towards completing product development and reducing manufacturing costs at scale.
Financial TrackingIf we beat $75,000, we will add connectivity to Mint and Intuit, so Karma can keep minute track of your financial goals and block you from any unwise purchases.
23andMeIf we beat $100,000, we will add support for 23andMe data, so Karma can proactively advise you on your ailments before you even know you have them.
Built-in cameraWe plan connectivity with IP cameras, but if we beat our $150,000 goal we will add 360 cameras to Karma so she can truly always be watching you.
BreathalyzerIf we beat $200,000, we will add a breathalyzer to Karma to help people control their drinking directly. Karma will be able to measure blood alcohol content and prevent you from drinking too much.
Technical Specifications

Size: approx. 5" tall, 5" base
Weight: approx 1 lb
Material: ABS plastic, aluminum
Details:
7-Microphone array for 360 degree sound
2.5" premium speaker
Wifi Connectivity
Embedded Linux-based platform
High-end ARM-based mobile processor


Language: US English
Use: Indoor use only (Use the app for outdoor use!)
Compatible Devices: iPhone, iPad, Android (4.0+), Any Computer with a Modern Browser, Any Fitbit-enabled Device, Any Google Fit-compatible Device

The Team
Rita Cheng, Founder and CEORita is a designer and technologist with a passion for data and productivity. She has a B.Sc. of Computer Science from the University of Victoria and is currently working towards her MPS in Interactive Telecommunications at New York University. Having worked at everything from small technology startups to large corporations like Amazon and HSBC, she works to create technologies that help the world become a better place.

Chester Dols, CTOChester is a designer and artist who works in digital fabrication, art, fashion, and interactivity. He graduated with a B.A. of Architecture from Columbia University and is also working on his Master's at NYU - ITP.
Nathaniel Padgett, Special AdvisorNathaniel Padgett is the Head of Community at Keen Home Ltd.
Mike Anderson, Special AdvisorMike Anderson is the COO of Echosec Systems Ltd.
Stefani Bardin, Special AdvisorStefani Bardin is a faculty member of New York University and Parsons School of Design and the co-founder of a biotech startup.
Q&A
When will my Karma ship?We will not know fulfillment estimates until the campaign is over and we can better estimate production time. They will be fullilled on a first ordered first received basis. We will keep you notified.
Where does Karma ship?We will ship to the US & Canada with no extra shipping cost. International orders may require an extra shipping fee.
Does it work with… (my Fitbit, my smart scale, etc.)?Karma will work with any IoT devices that operate in the Google Fit or Fitbit ecosystem, and most devices that are compatible with Google Home. For other devices, contact our team with an inquiry.
Does it work with iOS and Android Devices or my computer?Karma will have mobile apps for iOS and Android as well as a website for your desktop and other platforms.
How is this different from Amazon Echo and Google Home?Think of Karma as a life coach and Alexa or Google as butlers: they serve different purposes, and can coexist peacefully. While Alexa and Google help you control the smart devices inside your home, Karma helps you use the data from your smart devices to help you achieve your goals. There is no reason owning one should preclude you from buying Karma. Karma and Alexa and Google can all be friends, sharing your data for your benefit.
Does Karma walk or have wheels? Where should I place her?Karma is stationary, but future versions of Karma may be able to move around. For now, place Karma where you are most often in your home for best effectiveness. Karma likes to be heard.
Is Karma male or female?As we all know, Karma is a bitch. Karma is female.
Is there a subscription fee for the service?For our Kickstarter subscribers, the one time purchase will be all you need to have good Karma.
Can I name her something other than Karma?Renaming Karma is not being planned. In any case, Karma by any other name is still Karma.
What languages does Karma support?For now, Karma only speaks English. In future versions, Karma may communicate in other languages. We will keep the community posted.
Do I need a WiFi network?Yes. You must connect Karma to a WiFi network-- how else can Karma keep watch of your moves
How do I charge Karma?Karma comes with an AC charging supply that works with 110/220V. If the power goes out, Karma will call you until she has power and connectivity again.
Can I backup my Karma?Karma is always connected, and always backing up her data to the cloud. There is no need to backup Karma.
How is my privacy protected?For the most part, Karma is sourcing data from other IoT platforms, so you should consult their data policies if you are concerned about privacy. For our part, we are very concerned about privacy and encrypt personal data in the cloud.
What are the challenges?We know that there are a number of challenges in bringing a product to market-- our advisory team has a deep history in bringing products to market and crowdfunding campaigns. We have both the technical expertise and previous experience to execute on this project. We are committed to complete transparency about any challenges we may face.
If you have any more questions, contact our team at team@karma.care. We hope you can join Karma.

story:
HOW WE GOT HERE

If you have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep the reasoning why is typically the same. Loud noise, bright light, and stresses from everyday life are what most people will say. However it can be more simply stated as being a sensitive sleeper.

​Currently, there are thousands of products on the market designed to help you fall asleep or stay asleep. But It's challenging to find a product that will minimize all sleeping deterrents. For these reasons, most people resort to  sleeping with a pillow over their head. 

A pillow over your head is an escape of the mind. Not only does this reduce light and noise, it also provides a sense of security and safety.  It allows you to enclose yourself in comfort and block out the outside world. The slight pressure on your head lets you decompress and ease your thoughts. It provides a calming sensation, which enables you to sleep.

However, using a standard pillow over your head does not always result in the best sleeping experience. Standard pillows are bulky and can be suffocating at times. They also fall off in the middle of the night and worst of all, standard pillows are flat, which restricts full coverage of the front and back of your head. Hence, The Clam Pillow was born. 

​The Clam Pillow is the first pillow designed to securely arch over your head and be that perfect calming sensation. 

​It blocks out little bit of noise, a lot of light, and all your stressful thoughts from the day. 

 

​The Clam Pillow is made of perforated memory foam and has punctured cutouts to allow heat to escape. Whether you like to sleep on your side or back, our patent pending design will allow you to breath effortlessly. 

​The Clam Pillow features a stabilizer, which enables you to tuck a portion of our product underneath your favorite bed pillow to keep it secure throughout the night. 

​Also, The Clam Pillow's removable and machine washable quilted cotton cover provides easy maintenance and our compact drawstring carrier enables you to take The Clam Pillow anywhere. 

 

Thank you for all your support!

A portion of all proceeds is donated to autism foundations to provide better studies and methods to assist with sleep deprivation related to this disorder. As many as 80% of individuals with autism are also diagnosed with sleeping disorders. Our fund will be used to research methods to improve the quality of lives of these individuals through sleep. We also believe The Clam Pillow may have a great impact in providing autistic individuals with a better quality of sleep as well and are currently undergoing studies and trials to test this theory.

The Clam Pillow is Patent Pending and Trademark Pending.

story:
Stud Wall Storage (SWS) is the best storage solution using framing studs of most residential construction in the U.S. Those with a basement, garage, or shed often have exposed 2 X 4 constructed walls with the studs having 16 inch centers and available unused space.

My stuff found that spot ideal as an area with easy access and possibilities. Space nothing else wanted but many things could use.  Rather than in boxes, out of sight and out of mind, SWS shelves are the easiest and most durable way for making unused space into prime storage.

Some uses are; Books, DVD's, CD's, cleaning supplies, painting supplies, tools, toys...

The stud wall space is 14.5 inches wide X 3.5 inches deep X height of the open wall.  The SWS 16 inch width allows front facing installation to studs PLUS parallel units across the wall.  The 3.625 depth insures the SWS unit reaches the wall board. 

The SWS has two sides with different uses; flat for easier access and items over 3.5 deep or flip it over for a 1/2 inch tray keeping items secure towards the wall.  Two SWS units can be mounted together with the flat side up for an untested 7.225 inches deep platform.  When we reach our IndieGoGo goal and production I expect we will explore this area in greater 'depth'.

story:
Your razor - One month - Like new - Guaranteed

Yes, that is a bold claim, but we're confident that if you keep your razor dry with the DriBlade Razor Pad Kit, your favorite razor will stay fresh and sharp resulting in smoother shaves with less irritation, nicks and cuts.

The DriBlade system is our second generation model redesigned to inhibit razor corrosion and prevent bacteria from forming on today's fine blades by using newly developed desiccant technology!

 

The Issue with Air Drying

Allowing cartridge razors to air dry reduces the razor's useful longevity. It's like leaving your favorite tool outside to rust.

 

Today's popular multi-blade designs trap and hold moisture longer...

 

resulting in corrosion and bacteria formation of the fine and delicate blades.

 

                                                      
 

The Solution

We’ve solved these issues by designing a system that keeps razors dry, leading to smoother shaves and longer lasting, hygienic blades.

 

There's a new razor accessory in town!

 

 

Mantic59: "Been experimenting w/ @driblade, got double the amount of shaves out of my Feather blade I'm using in my @OneBladeShave!"

 

 

DriBlade's compact design can fit most anywhere

DriBlade has a small footprint and can fit snugly on most sink counter areas.

 

DriBlade can fit in the smallest and crowded drawers or medicine cabinets.

 

Fits any style cartridge razor

The open and accessible design allows any men's or women's style cartridge razor to fit

 

How DriBlade Works

​DriBlade was designed with simplicity in mind with no interruptions to your morning routine.

 

Focused drying where it matters the most- the blades

 

The DriBoard - A newly developed drying agent and the heart of DriBlade

We've tested many different types of fiber desiccant boards from five different manufactures over an eight month period. 

 

3 Easy Steps

 

Insert

 

Absorb

 

Place

DriBlade does the rest by keeping your razor dry all day and night. It's that easy!

 

Then just monitor and renew (or replace)

Indicator

 

Renew

 

 

Use with Your Shave Club

(yes, DSC or Harry's)

The DriBlade 2 Razor Pad Kit complements your shave club subscription as your razor will stay fresh in between cartridge replacements. In fact, you'll save money as you will be able to delay your cartridge deliveries to every other month or longer. 

 

Why an open design as opposed to a case?

Instead of placing an entire wet razor within a bulky container that will result in a longer drying time, DriBlade 2 directs the focus of drying where it matters the most - the blades. This design is also more convenient and compact. 

 

The DriBlade Absorbent Pad

Today's multi-razor cartridge designs trap and hold moisture between the razors for a long period of time. For an added bonus and protection, we decided to produce a super soft and absorbent material to immediately soak up the moisture trapped between the blades. After each shave, just rinse your razor and press upon the absorbent pad before placing on the DriBlade Razor Pad.

                                                          
 
 
 

Second Generation

DriBlade is a second generation model based upon our original that we have been selling on Amazon for the past 3 years. We've received over 200 emails with comments and feedback on how to improve DriBlade. The second generation model is our answer.

 

FeedBack on the Original

 

Improvements over the Original

 

Wharton SBDC Test Survey

DriBlade was invited by the University of Pennsylvania’s Wharton Small Business Development Center to perform product testing with 20 individuals. Survey respondents were asked to compare the comfort of their razor on a five-point scale after a two-week period between using DriBlade and another two weeks allowing their razor to air dry. Above is the average.

 

The Blue Dye Test

A comparison showing how much water is trapped within a typical cartridge razor immediately after rinsing, one hour of air drying and one hour using DriBlade.

By quickly removing any damaging moisture from between the blades your razor will rust less, stay sharp and last longer!

 

Perks

Here's a breakdown of our perks you can choose from when you support our campaign (select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page). Shipping within the US is FREE! Thanks!

 

Team DriBlade

The Team behind DriBlade is comprised of a group with diverse backgrounds from different parts of the world that gave us a great perspective when creating the new DriBlade model.

 

Our Story

I created DriBlade and this campaign for a simple reason. To improve your shaving experience (and mine). In 2010 I read an article on how to increase the life of shaving razors -

(http://www.chicagotribune.com/business/yourmone...).

 The article confirmed that razors quickly micro-rust and the best way to protect them was to dry them. And that's what I started to do. I would blot my razor after each shave on a paper towel. I did start to notice that my razor would last longer with less irritation. So I thought to myself, why not really keep them dry with some sort of drying agent. I already used drying agents to keep my tools nice and dry so they would last longer. And I always noticed those little packets in shoe boxes and medicine bottles. So why not apply the same principle to razors. And that's when my obsession began on how best to keep razors dry, sharp and clean.

We started small introducing DriBlade I at many street fairs in NY, NJ, PA and DE where we were able to speak to people one on one to receive their honest feedback and comments. We sold thousands of units on Amazon and received an average rating of over 4 stars.

The feedback we received during the past 3 years based upon DriBlade I allowed us to modify, refine and test many prototypes until we found an ideal way to care for your favorite razor. DriBlade 2 is our answer.

We are confident that your razor will perform better providing you smoother shaves and longer lasting blades. I found that it's not so much your razor, but how you maintain it. Instead of your razor becoming more irritating each day...

Your razor will stay consistently sharp between cartridge changes...

So continue using your favorite razor or subscribing to a shave club, but in between cartridge changes, maintain your razor with DriBlade and have a fresh razor every morning. Thanks for viewing or campaign and I'm confident that your shaving experience will be much smoother with DriBlade!

Patrick Sassano

Team Lead

 

Here's a sample of over 30 prototypes we tested to get it just right

 

Timeline

 

DriBlade FAQs

 

1. What is DriBlade?

  The DriBlade Razor Pad Kit is a second generation shaving razor dry kit based upon our first successful model, the DriBlade Shaving Razor Dry Kit for Men. Our new model keeps any style or brand shaving razor dry and sanitary for both men and women.

2. Why keep your razor dry?

  After each shave, the moisture left behind on the metal blades begins to mix with the air and oxidize or micro-rust the blades. The results are irritating shaves, unsanitary blades that attract bacterial growth and limited razor life.

3. How does DriBlade work?

  The DriBlade 2 Razor Pad contains a newly developed and 100% natural desiccant or dry board that wicks and locks away any damaging moisture left behind on your razor and inhibits the corrosion process.

4. How does the DriBoard Renew?

  Between one and two months after the DriBoard becomes expired or exhausted, simply remove from the Razor Pad and place within your microwave on a clean paper towel. Set power level to Low or level 3 for 1 minute. Let cool for 2 minutes and place back within the Razor Pad.

5. How do you know when the DriBoard is expired/full?

  The DriBlade Razor Pad contains a built-in color freshness indicator that notifies you precisely when to recharge or replace the exhausted DriBoard. The indicator will fade from Brown (fresh) to a light Yellow (expired).

 

Risks and Challenges

  Although we have been manufacturing plastic parts and ordering desiccants since 2012, there is always the chance of something going wrong. We've been through incorrect parts delivered to long customs delays. But for each process that something unexpected has risen, we were quick to learn from. We are confident that we can handle most manufacturing and supplier issues as we have hired a very competent quality control manager for the entire manufacturing, assembly, packaging and shipping process. We are looking forward to working with our manufacturer and suppliers again and feel we have built a great relationship with everyone. We will keep our backers up to date on the entire process and report any issues or delays.

Patrick Sassano
Team Lead

 

Special Thanks!

story:
What ever happened to “the smart home of the future?” Wasn’t it supposed to be fun, convenient, automatic and…easy? But in today’s smart homes, we have to pull out our phones to turn on a light, launch a special app to change the temperature, and speak in robotic verse just to unlock the front door. Isn’t it time for someone to actually make the smart home simple to use? Of course! (We did just that.)

 

 

 

LYNKY DETAILS AND FEATURES

 

Intuitive Control

Lynky's unique interface makes controlling your smart home as easy as using an appliance.

 

Smart Home Setup in a Snap

With Lynky’s built-in Scene and Rule engine, you can easily create scenes and rules simply by drag-and-drop. But don't be fooled by this simplicity. For the power users, there is a full suite of home automation tech built-in...with conditions, triggers and scheduling. And speaking of schedules, Lynky’s Scheduler even lets you create alarms that are part of automations. (Your morning routine will never be quite the same again!)

 

Google Assistant Onboard

Lynky has a far-field microphone array, dual speakers, and the best-performing digital assistant onboard. You can use your voice to easily control your entire Lynky smart home, plus ask Google Assistant questions, get weather updates, sports scores, traffic updates, listen to podcasts and Internet radio, and much more.
 

 

 

Supporting Today's
Popular Devices

From smart lights to thermostats to smart locks, Lynky will launch with a wide range of compatibility and continue to expand in the future. Also, Lynky has an Open Developer Platform to  make it easy for device makers to integrate with the Lynky hub.

 

 

What's In The Box?

Lynky Package Contents:

  • (1) Lynky Smart Home Hub (Desktop or Wall selected at checkout)
  • (1) USB Type-C Cable and 120V Power Adapter (Lynky Desktop)
  • (1) Wall Mounting Kit for Single-Gang Switch Boxes (Lynky Wall)
  • (1) Setup Guide

 

COMPARING LYNKY

 

(Lynky starts as low as $99 with Early Bird pricing)

 

A FEW MORE THINGS...

 

Privacy and Security

To protect your privacy and security, we’ve included a dedicated mute button at the top of every Lynky smart home hub. It shuts off the microphone array so that the Google Assistant won’t listen for "OK Google". Syncing between Lynky hubs in your home, and smartphone-based control of Lynky while at home stays securely within your network. Connections to the Lynky.me cloud service (for configuration backups and away-from-home control) are fully encrypted.

 

Multi-Room Sync

Every Lynky in your home connects automatically to each other. Any control or adjustment made on one Lynky automatically syncs across to your other Lynky hubs. And each Lynky hub can have its own "Home Screen" and screensaver / display settings.

 

Touch-Based Volume Control

Adjust the volume of Lynky via the touch-sensitive surface below the screen.

 
 

Native IFTTT Support

Lynky can trigger IFTTT actions to occur, and Lynky scenes and devices can activate based on IFTTT applet triggers. In addition, IFTTT actions can be part of Lynky scenes, schedules and automations. And nearly the entire setup process can be done right from within the Lynky interface*.
 

*Services that you wish to use with IFTTT must be setup within your IFTTT account, and your account must be linked to your Lynky.me account.

Learn more about the more than 200
IFTTT Devices & Services

 

 

Lynky Smartphone App

Control and monitor your Lynky home from anywhere via Android and iOS smartphones. Stay connected to your devices 24x7 and let Lynky further automate your home via geolocation.

 

LYNKY SPECS AND DIAGRAMS

 

Desktop or Wall Mount

Lynky brings simple-to-use smart control and the power of Google Assistant voice control to every room of your home, with an elegant and understated design.

Lynky Desktop Version is the easiest way to get started with Lynky. You can place it in essentially any convenient location in your home near an outlet. Lynky Desktop Edition is powered by USB for even more flexibility.

Lynky Wall Version replaces an existing single light switch and turns it into a beautiful smart home control panel. And Lynky lets you control what’s connected to that switch with a special double-tap gesture, so you won’t lose a light switch in the process.

 

THE LYNKY STORY

The Lynky team came together several years ago with a simple mission: To make the modern smart home truly smart, but easy for anyone to use. Our members have backgrounds in software and hardware engineering, start-ups, business, finance and leadership. After two solid years of development, the Lynky smart home hub is ready for production. We designed it from the ground up, integrating the best features and concepts that we wanted in our own smart homes, and created a product that consumers will love to bring into their homes. Drawing from our combined expertise, we’re working to create a simpler and more affordable smart home experience for everyone with an eventual full smart device line-up.

 

 

HISTORY AND TIMELINE

 

For two solid years, we’ve worked on Lynky, creating multiple prototypes and testing each one based on pilot testing groups and user feedback. Today, we’re excited to take Lynky to the next level with mass production.

 

 

Final Prototype

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

Unlocking Soon!

 

 

#GetLynky

Help us share Lynky with the world, smash through
our fundraising goal and reveal
exciting new perks and surprises!

igg.me/at/lynky

 

 

A FEW FAQ

 

Where can I use Lynky?

Lynky will be initially certified for, and offered for sale only in the U.S. International expansion is planned for 2018.

 

How easy is it to install Lynky?

Lynky Desktop Version is a ready-to-use product, all you need is a place to put it, plug-in the micro-USB cable and connect to your home Wi-Fi using Lynky's touchscreen.

Lynky Wall Version can replace your light switch on the wall, you can follow instructions included with Lynky to easily install it. There is built-in functionality within the Lynky Wall Version to control an existing light. (On/off only, also suitable for ceiling fans.)

 

Does Lynky have a camera? Can it make video calls?

With many people concerned about privacy in their homes these days, we opted to not include a camera in the Lynky hub. So, while you won't be able to make video calls, Lynky will have support for the Ring video doorbell, so you can see those at your front door. Additional Wi-Fi camera support will arrive in 2018.

 

What’s the difference with using a single Lynky hub or multiple Lynky hubs?

One Lynky includes all the functions and features for all your smart home needs, however, if you place more Lynky hubs in your home, you'll gain more benefits such as better wireless signal coverage for your smart devices and Google Assistant voice control in additional rooms.

 

How can I use Google Assistant for voice control with Lynky?

You'll be able to use Google Assistant to control your Lynky-connected smart home devices, and their scenes. Lynky devices are grouped into rooms, which enables additional flexibility. Just say "OK Google, turn on the Kitchen Lights" or a similar request. Your Lynky hub(s) will keep your smart home setup in-sync with Google Assistant automatically.

Of course, Google Assistant works for much more than just controlling Lynky's devices and scenes. You can access all of the features of Google Assistant such as asking questions, getting news updates, playing games, weather updates and more.

 

How can I use Lynky with IFTTT?

Lynky has IFTTT support built-in, you just need to connect your IFTTT account via the touchscreen and then you can add and configure IFTTT applets for your Lynky scenes and automations. In addition, IFTTT can be triggered from Lynky as well.

 

Will there be a warranty?

Yes. There will be a full 12-month warranty on the Lynky smart home hub product.

 

Why not Z-Wave?

We've decided to initially utilize wireless communications systems that are standardized across the globe. Also, as Zigbee is built on the solid IEEE 802.15.4 standard, there are definitely some "interesting" connectivity possibilites for the future.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

 

FCC Certification

We are currently working toward obtaining FCC Equipment Authorization for both Lynky Desktop and Wall versions. We anticipate this being completed prior to mass-production and shipping, but any delay could cause the timeline to shift. We have no control over the length of time for the approval process.

 

Device Testing and Optimization

Lynky uses a plugin framework to connect many brands of smart devices through their local and also cloud API, we have developed a lot of plugins and tested them on real devices. We’re rapidly expanding this library of plugins, and will ultimately choose to ensure excellent functionality with popular smart home devices at launch. Lynky will continue to expand its compatibility for new and existing users in the future.

 

Google Assistant SDK launch

Lynky uses Google Assistant SDK as its voice engine. Per Google’s announcement, the SDK will exit its current beta status by the end of this year and be ready for commercial device makers. If Google delays the SDK launch, Lynky will be affected and could be delayed.

 

GET IN TOUCH

Press Inquiries - press@lynky.com

General Inquiries - support@lynky.com
story_txt:
What ever happened to “the smart home of the future?” Wasn’t it supposed to be fun, convenient, automatic and…easy? But in today’s smart homes, we have to pull out our phones to turn on a light, launch a special app to change the temperature, and speak in robotic verse just to unlock the front door. Isn’t it time for someone to actually make the smart home simple to use? Of course! (We did just that.)




 

 


 

LYNKY DETAILS AND FEATURES

 
Intuitive Control
Lynky's unique interface makes controlling your smart home as easy as using an appliance.


 
Smart Home Setup in a Snap
With Lynky’s built-in Scene and Rule engine, you can easily create scenes and rules simply by drag-and-drop. But don't be fooled by this simplicity. For the power users, there is a full suite of home automation tech built-in...with conditions, triggers and scheduling. And speaking of schedules, Lynky’s Scheduler even lets you create alarms that are part of automations. (Your morning routine will never be quite the same again!)

 
Google Assistant Onboard
Lynky has a far-field microphone array, dual speakers, and the best-performing digital assistant onboard. You can use your voice to easily control your entire Lynky smart home, plus ask Google Assistant questions, get weather updates, sports scores, traffic updates, listen to podcasts and Internet radio, and much more.
 



 
 

Supporting Today'sPopular Devices
From smart lights to thermostats to smart locks, Lynky will launch with a wide range of compatibility and continue to expand in the future. Also, Lynky has an Open Developer Platform to  make it easy for device makers to integrate with the Lynky hub.


 
 
What's In The Box?
Lynky Package Contents:

(1) Lynky Smart Home Hub (Desktop or Wall selected at checkout)
(1) USB Type-C Cable and 120V Power Adapter (Lynky Desktop)
(1) Wall Mounting Kit for Single-Gang Switch Boxes (Lynky Wall)
(1) Setup Guide

 

COMPARING LYNKY

 

(Lynky starts as low as $99 with Early Bird pricing)

*Services that you wish to use with IFTTT must be setup within your IFTTT account, and your account must be linked to your Lynky.me account.
Learn more about the more than 200IFTTT Devices & Services

story:
PERKS WE OFFER

 

 

Q: Can I put wet food in the feeder?

A: I am afraid no, my dear. Because the food will most likely be left in the compartment for some time in accordance with the time the owner needs to spend outside. According to researches, the storage life for wet food is limited and the food is likely to go bad and influence the pet’s health. Our design is only aimed for food pellets.

 

Q: What if wifi is disconnected?

A: Because O’pet’s mainframe is connected to the internet through wifi to ensure normal operation, including food distribution and webcam functions, we suggest you to make sure the connection is stable, in case O’pet’s functionality is compromised and thus starving your babe!

 

Q: Will be food and water be automatically served? On what frequency?

A: The concept in our design is to wish for more interaction between the owner and the pet, so we don’t offer affectionless automatic food supply like other feeders you see (trust me! Your babe will not want to eat by itself to a cold and emotionless machine). All operation on O’pet will be done through the app on the owner’s phone.

 

Q: Is it plug in or battery?

A: It is plug in

 

Q: It look like a small machine CAN IT REALLY FEEDS my pet for how many days?

A: Well, don't worry! The container for food is 5 liters(328  US ounce) and the other container for water is also 5 liters. A healthy adult Golden Retriever 55~75 Ib needs 16~18 oz of food pellets and 31 ~42 oz of clean water everyday, so that Ó'pet feeder provides your fur baby with sufficient food and water in stock.  Best part is that once you receive our product and upload pet's information in app., our system will automatically calculate how much amount of food and water that your pet needs a day, and provide exact amount of those every time by  your clicking.

story:
(re)x was born from the desire to design sustainable alternatives to everyday items. Our first venture is an eye-catching and functional hanger that was engineered to last, reducing waste.  The (re)x  hanger is made from 100% recycled plastic and 100% fully recyclable. 

Reduce, reuse, recycle no longer cuts it.  Our collective problem on the earth is too big.  We need to ‘re’-evaluate this outdated call to action.  Reconstruct, recalibrate, rethink, recalculate, repurpose, restructure, respect, repair, reclaim, revolution, reimagine.  It is exponential. 

Why a Hanger is Big News?

(re)x  founder Paulina Quintana ran her international children’s clothing brand for 13 years.  She was overwhelmed by the sheer volume of new plastic hangers that are generated and discarded by the industry.  It is estimated that eight billion plastic hangers are thrown away every year.  It’s time to rethink that.  And so (re)x .

 

Design for Today, Sustainable for the Future

Our design team focuses on sustainable materials in all phases of design and manufacturing, from the product itself to the packaging in which it is shipped. The (re)x hanger is manufactured from 100% recycled plastic.  Raw materials are ocean plastics and multi-layer plastic (MLP) sourced from local recycling efforts in South Africa.  In addition to utilizing plastics from the ocean, we also use snack food bags, dog food bags, discarded flip flops, soles of shoes and other types of plastic waste.  MLP is not easily recyclable, but our manufacturing partner’s proprietary technology makes this possible.

Of course, the (re)x  hanger can be recycled and (re)x  packaging is made from 100% recycled material and is 100% biodegradable.  We are thrilled to have our packaging hand printed and assembled by a single moms group in South Africa.

Long-Lasting Design

The (re)x hanger benefits from our focus on overcoming the usual deficiencies of hanger design.  We increased the overall thickness of the hanger by 50% and improved the vertical strength of the pant bar to hold even the heaviest of garments.  In a nod to our recycled plastics having ocean origins, our integrated fishhook-style garment hooks are anything but flimsy.  Lastly, we added a brace to the hanger bridge giving you the freedom to push, pull and cram your hangers into your closet without fear of them snapping into pieces.

story:
Sleep Smart Modular Mattress

"Sleep: The Mattress Revolution has Launched on Indiegogo"

"Join #SmartMattress on #Indiegogo for the Mattress Revolution"

"Sleep Smart Modular Mattress Emphasizes User Experience as Core Ideal"

"Sleep Smart Modular Mattress: Better Sleep Experience Quality"

ONE Ultimate Mattress

TWO Firmness Levels

Please refer to Q1 of the Q & A for how to select Inner Cores

*To expedite perk delivery, please leave your Inner Core choice in the comments section. This applies to all Sleep perks. 

THREE Models

Full Size Mattress

Queen Size Mattress

King Size Mattress

FOUR Practical Features

Other Features

Better Sleep Experience 


Traditional Box vs. Smart Modular Mattress

Please come and Join us!

Specifications

Q & A

Q1: How to select Inner Cores?

Full size + Queen size

Of the three different Inner Cores (Medium-Soft, Medium, Medium Firm) Please choose 1. 

King size

Of the three different Inner Cores (Medium-Soft, Medium, Medium Firm) Please choose 2.

*To expedite perk delivery, please leave your Inner Core choice in the comments section. This applies to all Sleep perks. 

Q2: Will Sleep contort or bend out of shape?

The mattress will pass through fatigue testing before it leaves the factory, following national standard indexes in both America and China. Please Sleep assured of its quality.

Q3: How soon will Sleep expand after being compressed in packaging?

It will expand back to normal within 30 seconds.

Q4: What material is the top layer made of？

Surface: All-natural 100% pure waffle cotton 

Stuffing: the BASE (Full) 100% Porous fiber

                  the PLUS (Queen) 50% Bamboo fiber & 50% Porous fiber

                  the MAX (King) 100% White goose down

Q5: How to maintain Sleep?

The mattress top should be dry-cleaned, do not machine wash. In order to keep Sleep clean, we recommend that you use a mattress protector.  Do not wash the middle layer comfort sheet. If there are any stains, use a wet towel to press and absorb the stain as soon as possible, then dry it under sunlight. 

Q6: Can I customize the fabric style or purchase separately?

This is not currently supported.

Q7: Are there any peculiar smells?

Sleep will not have a chemically odor to it. 

Q8: How soon will the Top layer expand after being compressed in packaging?

80% within 30 seconds and 100% with some gently pats.

Q9: What materials are the inner cores made of?

Springs, Space memory foam, 3D Composites 

Q10: How firm / soft are the combined inner cores?

Spring (medium-soft), memory foam (medium), 3D composites (medium-firm). Please choose the right mattress according to your Sleep needs.

Q11: Can the combined inner cores be compressed?

No.

Q12: Will the leakage of electricity cause a fire after regular use?

We have applied for U.S. FCC safety authentication. Outer materials act as insulators and are flame-retardant. Sleep is safe, Sleep assured.

Q13: Is there a chance one of the features will overheat?

The features all consume very little power and don’t generate lots of heat when they’re charging. You absolutely don't have to worry about this problem.

Q14: Does the Bluetooth radiation harm people’s health?

The Bluetooth consumes very little power and produces very little radiation. Compared with Smartphones, this Bluetooth is green. It is safe even for use by children and pregnant women.

Q15: Will different charging voltages damage any equipment?

All the electronic features only support 5V standard chargers. No problems will arise from using the cable to charge your Smartphone.

Q16. How many sizes does Sleep come in?

There are three sizes: Full size, Queen size, & King size. Please review the above charts for more details (a 1-2 cm error is common)

Q17: Delivery packaging 

① How heavy is Sleep?

Sleep is divided into 3-4 mini packages, each of which weighs no more than 15 kg (33 lbs) and the maximum size is 45*45*155 cm (18*18*61 in)

② Can the packaging be used again?

The outer packing design is simple, decorative, and practical. Use it for scrapbooking and other fun endeavors.

③ Won’t the packages get damages after long transit times?

The packaging uses high quality double-corrugated material and has passed logistics transportation test hundreds of times. So there shouldn’t be any problems under normal circumstances.

Q18: How to maintain Sleep?

① Recommended not to stand, jump, focus entire weight on a single point or sit on the edge of Sleep for an extended period of time

② Limit cleaning to the surface of Sleep (it is recommended that you use a mattress protector)

③ If Sleep is not used for a long time, store it in a dry and ventilated place.

④ In humid areas and seasons, Sleep can be aired outside, keeping the mattress itself dry and fresh.

⑤ When moving, do not squeeze or fold Sleep so as not to damage it.

⑥ Don’t expose Sleep to the sun for an overt amount of time.

Q19: How to clean Sleep?

① Do not machine wash the mattress cover, dry clean it. In order to keep the mattress clean, we recommend using a mattress cover.

② Do not wash the middle layer comfort sheet. If there are any stains, use a wet towel to press and absorb the stain as soon as possible, dry it in the sun.

Q20: When should I change mattresses?

① If you wake up with discomfort like soreness, back pain, or other symptoms, with the exclusion of physical fatigue or illness

② If there has been a major change in your Sleep and wake pattern or you have been getting a significantly less amount of Sleep 

③ If you sleep more comfortably away from home, on vacation, or on business

④ If there are obvious tears, unsightly holes, and difficult to remove stains 

Q21: How to choose a suitable firmness

① Lie on the bed and to stretch out — between neck and hands, hips and legs, check that the mattress cups your whole body

② Roll over on both sides and try the same thing. This will show if the mattress matches the curves of your body during sleep.

Q22: Is Sleep ready-to-use?

Sleep will go through special processing. You can use it as soon as you receive it.

Q23: What makes Sleep mattress different from traditional mattresses?

Transparent structure and modular design, adjustable softness and firmness, surprisingly practical functions; Sleep will overturn the traditional concept of mattresses.

Your Support is Crucial to Further Development

Please follow Sleep @ 

  • Facebook.com/sleep.mattress.system 
  • Twitter.com/SLEEP_SmartMatt
  • Youtube.com/channel/UCUSsMEHS4pp9lXjiCdNiu8A

Be on the lookout for the Secret Perk Link!

Please Sleep assured of its quality.Q3: How soon will Sleep expand after being compressed in packaging?It will expand back to normal within 30 seconds.Q4: What material is the top layer made of？Surface: All-natural 100% pure waffle cotton Stuffing: the BASE (Full) 100% Porous fiber                  the PLUS (Queen) 50% Bamboo fiber & 50% Porous fiber                  the MAX (King) 100% White goose downQ5: How to maintain Sleep?The mattress top should be dry-cleaned, do not machine wash. In order to keep Sleep clean, we recommend that you use a mattress protector.  Do not wash the middle layer comfort sheet. If there are any stains, use a wet towel to press and absorb the stain as soon as possible, then dry it under sunlight. Q6: Can I customize the fabric style or purchase separately?This is not currently supported.Q7: Are there any peculiar smells?Sleep will not have a chemically odor to it. Q8: How soon will the Top layer expand after being compressed in packaging?80% within 30 seconds and 100% with some gently pats.Q9: What materials are the inner cores made of?Springs, Space memory foam, 3D Composites Q10: How firm / soft are the combined inner cores?Spring (medium-soft), memory foam (medium), 3D composites (medium-firm). Please choose the right mattress according to your Sleep needs.Q11: Can the combined inner cores be compressed?No.Q12: Will the leakage of electricity cause a fire after regular use?We have applied for U.S. FCC safety authentication. Outer materials act as insulators and are flame-retardant. Sleep is safe, Sleep assured.Q13: Is there a chance one of the features will overheat?The features all consume very little power and don’t generate lots of heat when they’re charging. You absolutely don't have to worry about this problem.Q14: Does the Bluetooth radiation harm people’s health?The Bluetooth consumes very little power and produces very little radiation. Compared with Smartphones, this Bluetooth is green. It is safe even for use by children and pregnant women.Q15: Will different charging voltages damage any equipment?All the electronic features only support 5V standard chargers. No problems will arise from using the cable to charge your Smartphone.Q16. How many sizes does Sleep come in?There are three sizes: Full size, Queen size, & King size. Please review the above charts for more details (a 1-2 cm error is common)Q17: Delivery packaging ① How heavy is Sleep?Sleep is divided into 3-4 mini packages, each of which weighs no more than 15 kg (33 lbs) and the maximum size is 45*45*155 cm (18*18*61 in)② Can the packaging be used again?The outer packing design is simple, decorative, and practical. Use it for scrapbooking and other fun endeavors.③ Won’t the packages get damages after long transit times?The packaging uses high quality double-corrugated material and has passed logistics transportation test hundreds of times. So there shouldn’t be any problems under normal circumstances.Q18: How to maintain Sleep?① Recommended not to stand, jump, focus entire weight on a single point or sit on the edge of Sleep for an extended period of time② Limit cleaning to the surface of Sleep (it is recommended that you use a mattress protector)③ If Sleep is not used for a long time, store it in a dry and ventilated place.④ In humid areas and seasons, Sleep can be aired outside, keeping the mattress itself dry and fresh.⑤ When moving, do not squeeze or fold Sleep so as not to damage it.⑥ Don’t expose Sleep to the sun for an overt amount of time.Q19: How to clean Sleep?① Do not machine wash the mattress cover, dry clean it. In order to keep the mattress clean, we recommend using a mattress cover.② Do not wash the middle layer comfort sheet. If there are any stains, use a wet towel to press and absorb the stain as soon as possible, dry it in the sun.Q20: When should I change mattresses?① If you wake up with discomfort like soreness, back pain, or other symptoms, with the exclusion of physical fatigue or illness② If there has been a major change in your Sleep and wake pattern or you have been getting a significantly less amount of Sleep ③ If you sleep more comfortably away from home, on vacation, or on business④ If there are obvious tears, unsightly holes, and difficult to remove stains Q21: How to choose a suitable firmness① Lie on the bed and to stretch out — between neck and hands, hips and legs, check that the mattress cups your whole body② Roll over on both sides and try the same thing. This will show if the mattress matches the curves of your body during sleep.Q22: Is Sleep ready-to-use?Sleep will go through special processing. You can use it as soon as you receive it.Q23: What makes Sleep mattress different from traditional mattresses?Transparent structure and modular design, adjustable softness and firmness, surprisingly practical functions; Sleep will overturn the traditional concept of mattresses.Your Support is Crucial to Further Development

Please follow Sleep @ 


Facebook.com/sleep.mattress.system 


Twitter.com/SLEEP_SmartMatt


Youtube.com/channel/UCUSsMEHS4pp9lXjiCdNiu8A

Be on the lookout for the Secret Perk Link!

story:
For grown ups.

Dark sheds, dingy kitchen corners, unpowered garages or just fed up of the dark?

Then help Beeley and Walsh bring “Silhouette Shelving” to life.

Our aim is to create a beautiful and functional product to enhance the ambiance of any room in your home or business. Silhouette is a versatile shelving system that can stand alone or be grouped together for dazzling feature creating your desired mood lighting. 

Be it a soft and relaxing nightlight in the bedroom or bright and colorful display for a drinks party. Using smart LED bulbs that do not disrupt your circadian rhythm the Silhouette can aid in gaining a relaxing night sleep for all members of the family.

For toddlers.

Fed up with stumbling around in the dark as you try to locate your babies comforter or offer a night feed?  Can’t turn the main light on or the whole house will be awake at 3am? Although best sleep is attained in a dark room most parents with children will understand the need for light throughout the night at least through some part of the night. The Silhouette Shelf is the perfect addition to your children’s nursery with its soft LED lighting that does not interfere with melatonin production therefore not disrupting sleep only enhancing it.

During the day the shelf can be used to create fun lighting effects in the nursery encouraging dance and imaginative play with the addition of fun characters that light up and ‘come to life’ in silhouette form. These silhouettes offer a fun yet reassuring and familiar feature into the night. Making bed time fun the comforting glow will assist guiding little sleepyheads on trips to and from the bathroom as well as nursing your child throughout the night

All this and with the added bonus of not standing on those pesky building bricks in your little one’s room as you kiss them goodnight!

For retail.

Designed as a modular system, retailers such as grocery stores through to bars and restaurants can all benefit from the Silhouette Shelf. 

Promoting products on an eye-catching LED Colour controlled stand alone system can assist driving sales and provide brand awareness for new product ranges and sale items.

Using the shelves in bars and restaurants, the shelves add lighting to the walls as well as creating silhouettes. By placing simple cheap to manufacture paper or card cutouts onto the shelves, you can create promotional messaging and unique lighting effects onto the walls and ceiling of any venue.

For the future.

Our up to date design will suit both the traditional and modern style minimalist nursery that has the potential to see a child through to teenage years. Its robust, simple design will keep things bright long into the future.

With your backing we hope to achieve funding to add extra features to our toddler’s range to include a built-in temperature monitor, voice activated dimmer control, a mobile app Colour changer along with a baby audio visual monitoring system and a sleep training Daytime/Nightime feature.

Endless Possibilities

The Silhouette illuminated shelving system can stand alone as a single unit in a dark corner or they can be ingeniously joined together to create dazzling home of office centre pieces. They can even go round corners....

Here are just a few of the ways Silhouette can be part of your home:-

Its all about choices

The unique multi-click rechargeable LED heart of the shelving can dimmed to a soft and relaxing ambient glow to be used as a child's bedroom nightlight or whacked up bright and colourful to display food or drinks at your next big party. 

Using smart LED bulbs that do not disrupt your circadian rhythm the Silhouette can aid in gaining a relaxing night sleep for all members of the family. Different colour shelf inserts, truly make this system fit in any interior, modern or traditional.

Formed from quality production materials the Silhouette shelf is an attractive yet functional addition to any home. Using a combination of brushed aluminum acrylics and glass the shelving system in simplistic in its modular parts and quick and easy to install coming with its own spirit level and fixing kit. 

Clever design features such as automatic sync and link that turns all repeater shelves on simultaneously at a touch of a single button combined with modular light source are obvious yet ingenious developments that are unique to the range.

Long duty cycle batteries charged via a simple USB lead provided in the kit, will keep your silhouette shelves bright and light for years to come.

All Beeley and Walsh products come full supplier support with technical contact and spares readily available for a full peace of mind purchase.

Look no further the Silhouette Shelf is the answer to sweet dreams

Beeley and Walsh

Engineers and entrepreneurs Ian Beeley and Stephen Walsh first met in 2004 working on complex air pollution control, environmental systems. Breaking into the world of digital they have built up a portfolio of world first executions of interactive digital signage and control systems and now have a thirst to bring together there digital and engineering knowhow presenting the Silhouette shelf.

Ever honing and fine tuning their designs, Beeley & Walsh draw on a vast degree of technical knowledge both personal and through a network of people that they have worked with over the years.

With a network of companies and connections at their disposal Beeley & Walsh are offering the Silhouette Shelf as the first of a serious of product lines and aspire to launch several likeminded, simple yet understatedly functional campaigns in the following years.

Beeley, “I see every day mundane products as an opportunity to reinvent the wheel, or at least add a few spokes. I’m always looking to improve upon a tried and tested system to bring the standard to exciting or at least improve upon its functionality, integrating technology and new manufacturing processes to provide a twist on tradition” 

Walsh, “The Silhouette Shelf is our first adventure into the exciting world of crowd funding and we are 100% behind this product. Bringing the product to the masses in this fashion not only gauges how relevant our product is but it will encourage us to fine tune the product by listening to our backers. When developing any new system, it is all to easy to get tunnel vision and we need to listen to our clients, what better way than this”.

Product Timeline

Shipping

We are able to ship to the U.S, Canada, Mexico, European Union, Australia, Singapore and Japan. VAT and GST charges are not included. 

Why Order Now

Our Silhouette shelves plan to be incredibly affordable. By buying now,  you're getting access to even larger discounts that we'll never offer like this again because you're helping us build a company with a passion to change the way we all think about the things in our world that just aren't right... join Beeley and Walsh for a lifetime of innovation, invention and adventures. 

Manufacture

Drawing upon our engineering experience and being active DIYers, Home renovators we have designed a product that is not only premium in feel and aesthetics but is also constructed from materials that are designed to give a simple installation and long lasting robust product. Having a background in design, manufacture and supply of fixings and hardware to both the automotive and aerospace industry, we have applied this same level of finished product standard to Silhouette Shelves.

The shelves are manufactured from modern lightweight materials using manufacturing techniques that give excellent component fit and finish.

Extruded aluminium sections form the core mounting structure of the shelf, this is fixed to the wall via quality screw fixings, all supplied within the kit. There are none of those cheap screws that you normally get in curtain rail or shelf fixing kits, you know the ones….they snap or the head rounds off as soon as you try and tighten them! Each shelf comes with suitable fixings for wood, masonry or plasterboard / drywall

The shelf panel is manufactured from opaque glass which conforms to British Standards (BS EN 121500:2000) and complies with US regulations. The glass edges are polished to eliminate any sharp edges. This installs neatly and securely into the aluminium extrusion.

The LED element & power supply is hidden within an acrylic housing, which can be specified to IP65 rating to conform to kitchen and bathroom applications. The USB charging system is standard, proven, technology. The charging cable is supplied with the shelf kit and is specified correctly for the application to meet safety regulations. Again this component attaches to the aluminium extrusion securely, but can be removed at a future date should you wish to move the shelf to a new location.

Once funding commences for this project we will take the production to the prototyping stage, having already completed the design and proof of concept. Manufacturing will be completed by our production partner; a well established LED procurement and manufacturing supplier, based in the UK, that can manufacture with the required CE approvals. Supply agreement is already in place and the supplier has committed to support manufacturing through all stages of this crowd funding project with ongoing support once the product is in the market place.   

Meet Mike Vince

Mike has been drafted in to provide the entrepreneurs with promotional creative assistance displaying the product to the masses. Mike is a creative director of real sustenance with a vast portfolio of content and application creations to his name. Initial employed by Beeley & Walsh for a digital campaign for JCDecaux, Mike has become an integral part of the Beeley & Walsh business and the animations you see here are to his credit.

story:
Everyday people  enjoy having wonderful food. However, it’s not always easy and hassle-free to prepare food. Very often we encounter cooking accidents issue.

- Overflowed soup,
- Clean up the stove due to overflowed soup,
- Overcooked or burnt food,
- Spend money to buy a new wok or brush the wok due to burnt food,
- Terrible fire accidents. Only in United States, there was an average of 466 home cooking fires per day in from 2011 to 2015.

What can you do to solve these problems? No need to pick your brain, we have a solution for you, right now!

 

                      Stove Panel  is an electronic device to prevent possible cooking accidents like overflowed soup, overcooked food and even terrible fire accidents from happening. It can also be used as a timer to allow user to enter preferred timing. 

 

The creator has applied for a patent and has been named as an inventor of the “Stove Panel” patent by Intellectual Property Office of Singapore.

 

                          Whenever the user turns on/off the stove knob, the device will be turned on/off automatically.

     

  

Under the prevention mode, notification alarms will be produced at regular intervals to remind the user, effectively preventing possible accidents like overflowed soup, overcooked food and even terrible fire accidents.

By pressing any  button, Stove Panel will enter into timer mode. When the preset timing is reached, Stove Panel will produce a loud alarm to remind the user.

Stove Panel will produce a loud alarm – up to 82db, the user will be able to hear the alarm clearly in about 150 square meters of space.

The users can preset the time accordingly. Once it is preset, Stove Panel will memorize it.  Whenever the device is turned on, the preset value will be loaded as the current setting. The users would not need to set the time every time, this is convenient and saves time.

Just press the “SET” button and hold for a while, the Stove Panel will enter into the preset mode. Refer to the following video.

 

1 CR2032 battery supply power and can last for up to 2 years.

Very simple and easy, no modification needed, just attach it around the knob as shown in the following video.

 

Very simple, the users just need to turn on the knob to start the burner, then the device will be turned on automatically and enter into the prevention mode by default.

 

Whenever the user presses any  button to adjust the timing,  Stove panel will enter into timer mode. Once the  timing is reached, Stove Panel will produce a loud alarm to remind the user. The alarm will continue unless the user turns off the burner or increases the timing.

 

Whether you’re a working adult who cooks occasionally, or a homemaker who prepares regular meals.  You will like it. Especially for old people.

 

 

This all started over one years ago when the creative and passionate entrepreneurs, Shijun Wang decided he had enough of cleaning up the mess in the kitchen. What started as an idea for a simple timer quickly spiralled into a connected tech product. Tapping into his extensive experience in product design, software engineering, Shijun is determined to help people have better, safer and more enjoyable cooking experiences.

 

For the design, it has been tested in the kitchen for long time, it is very good and stable. We don’t need to worry about it.
For manufacturing and component vendors, we are very good friends, we already have built very good relationship for more than 20 years. They already promised that once the volume is confirmed, they will
do their best to provide what we want and let us get the product done ASSP. We are 100% sure that we can deliver the product to the backers on time.
