story:
Urban Collection’s Adjustable Cutlery and Accessory Drawer Organizers

Life is busy and can be stressful. Why not simplify things where you can and start with organizing your kitchen drawers? With that in mind, we designed our patent pending Adjustable Cutlery Drawer Organizer and Adjustable Accessory Drawer Organizer. We were inspired by the idea that a quality product should be adjustable, innovative and beautifully designed as well as uniquely functional. 


The Notorious Kitchen Junk Drawer

We all have one (or two or three). Chances are, you rifle through a jumble of useful yet extraordinarily disorganized utensils and gadgets at least once a day. It can be both time consuming and frustrating to deal with chaotic, untidy spaces. While other brands offer small organizers that only expand part way, are made of low quality, flimsy material, and/or simply fall apart in the drawer, the Urban Collection line was created to eliminate these issues. 
 

 

Think Customizable

Our patent pending organizers offer several practical solutions to your messy drawer dilemma. Our organizers fit your stuff – not the other way around. You can create spaces as big or as small as you need. Because our depth is approximately  18”, it fits your drawer better. The width can be adjusted and locked anywhere along the way to offer a variety of size options that fit your drawers best.


 

Dividers can be added to create segments in the tray to establish just the right amount of space for your spatulas, wooden spoons and whisks. Our removable subdividers slide back and forth to allow for versatile adjustments, making room for your smaller items such as measuring spoons, cake decorating tips and chip clips.

 

Sizes

Cutlery Organizer - Approximate Sizes                    

Closed   Depth 18”  x  Height 2.16”  x    Width 15”    
Open      Depth 18”  x  Height 2.16”  x    Up to 25.5”


Accessory Organizer - Approximate Sizes 

Closed   Depth 18”  x  Height 2.1”  x  Width 15”
Open      Depth 18”  x  Height 2.1”  x  Up to 24.5”
 
Our products are BPA free and food grade safe. 

Both models are available in two color combinations:  

Blue/Grey                         Red/Grey

 

 

 

Why Buy Urban Collection Organizers

We are different than the competition:

  • Larger than the competition with much more room for storage
  • Adjustable and Expandable to FIT your exact needs
  • Locking mechanism ensures that the organizer stays secure and together
  • Deeper so it fits better into your drawer and provides more storage room
  • Dividers can be added to separate the space in the trays
  • Subdividers are fully adjustable so that you can customize the organizer to fit your accessories and gadgets
  • Made of stronger, more durable material
  • BPA free and food grade material
  • Beautiful and stylish accent to your kitchen 

 

 

Money Back Guarantee!

We are so confident you will absolutely love our products we are offering a money back guarantee. If you order one of our organizers and for any reason do not like it, simply send it back to us within 30 days of receipt, no questions asked! We will refund your purchase price less the cost of shipping and handling
 

The Story of Urban Collection 

In the summer of 2016, my family and I downsized from a house in the suburbs to a small condo in the city.  Space was definitely an issue.  We decided to remodel our new kitchen to be more user friendly and efficient.  When the renovation was complete, I saw that I needed an organizational solution for my drawers.  

I purchased several products and brought them home.  I was completely dissatisfied with all of them.  What I encountered was poor quality, flimsy material, and products that were badly designed and ugly in appearance.  As a result, I was left with messy drawers that made it hard to find anything without a time consuming struggle and lots of frustration.

I knew at that very moment that I wanted to design a better utensil and accessory drawer organizer.  This is just the beginning for me as I truly believe there are many uses for adjustable home storage solutions!

Urban Collection is the gift of clean, streamlined, personal spaces – from my home to yours!
 

 

FAQs 

How do I expand my Adjustable Cutlery Organizer and my Adjustable Accessory Organizer? 

Simply grip the partially exposed blue or red thumb-grip and pull! The tray will lock into place at any size you want.  It’s that easy. Our organizers expand to fit most drawer sizes.  

How do I adjust the size of the various compartments in my Adjustable Cutlery Organizer or my Adjustable Accessory Organizer?

In our cutlery drawer organizer, there are 3 dividers that can be easily snapped into place in the tray to partition off the tray area.  There are 3 subdividers that snap in place and adjust to make your compartments the size needed for your own unique accessories.

Our accessory drawer organizer includes 6 dividers and 6 subdividers and works the same way to customize your drawer your way.  

How do I remove the dividers in my Adjustable Cutlery Organizer or my Adjustable Accessory Organizer?

Simply snap the dividers and subdividers out of your tray by pulling lightly upward. 

What are the dimensions of my Adjustable Cutlery Organizer?

Depth - 18”
Height - 2.16”
Closed width - 15”
Open width –  up to 25.5”

*** Sizes are approximate ***

What are the dimensions of my Adjustable Accessory Organizer?

Depth - 18”
Height - 2.10”
Closed width - 15” 
Open width – up to 24.5”

*** Sizes are approximate ***

What color options are the Adjustable Cutlery Organizer and Adjustable Accessory Organizer available in?

Both models are available in blue/grey and red/grey.  

Are the Adjustable Cutlery Organizer and Adjustable Accessory Organizer BPA free? 

Yes, they are BPA free and food safe.

 

Timeline

 

 


Got feedback, further questions, or a special request? 
We’d love to hear from you. Drop us a line at info@myurbancollection.com.

Let's get social!

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Pinterest
story_txt:
Urban Collection’s Adjustable Cutlery and Accessory Drawer Organizers

Life is busy and can be stressful. Why not simplify things where you can and start with organizing your kitchen drawers? With that in mind, we designed our patent pending Adjustable Cutlery Drawer Organizer and Adjustable Accessory Drawer Organizer. We were inspired by the idea that a quality product should be adjustable, innovative and beautifully designed as well as uniquely functional. 

The Notorious Kitchen Junk Drawer
We all have one (or two or three). Chances are, you rifle through a jumble of useful yet extraordinarily disorganized utensils and gadgets at least once a day. It can be both time consuming and frustrating to deal with chaotic, untidy spaces. While other brands offer small organizers that only expand part way, are made of low quality, flimsy material, and/or simply fall apart in the drawer, the Urban Collection line was created to eliminate these issues.  

 
Think Customizable
Our patent pending organizers offer several practical solutions to your messy drawer dilemma. Our organizers fit your stuff – not the other way around. You can create spaces as big or as small as you need. Because our depth is approximately  18”, it fits your drawer better. The width can be adjusted and locked anywhere along the way to offer a variety of size options that fit your drawers best. 
Dividers can be added to create segments in the tray to establish just the right amount of space for your spatulas, wooden spoons and whisks. Our removable subdividers slide back and forth to allow for versatile adjustments, making room for your smaller items such as measuring spoons, cake decorating tips and chip clips.

 
Sizes
Cutlery Organizer - Approximate Sizes                    
Closed   Depth 18”  x  Height 2.16”  x    Width 15”    Open      Depth 18”  x  Height 2.16”  x    Up to 25.5”
Accessory Organizer - Approximate Sizes 
Closed   Depth 18”  x  Height 2.1”  x  Width 15”Open      Depth 18”  x  Height 2.1”  x  Up to 24.5” Our products are BPA free and food grade safe. 
Both models are available in two color combinations:  

Blue/Grey                         Red/Grey
 

 

 
Why Buy Urban Collection Organizers
We are different than the competition:

Larger than the competition with much more room for storage
Adjustable and Expandable to FIT your exact needs
Locking mechanism ensures that the organizer stays secure and together
Deeper so it fits better into your drawer and provides more storage room
Dividers can be added to separate the space in the trays
Subdividers are fully adjustable so that you can customize the organizer to fit your accessories and gadgets
Made of stronger, more durable material
BPA free and food grade material
Beautiful and stylish accent to your kitchen 

 

 
Money Back Guarantee!

story:
About Us

In today's pet subscription box world, there is an over-saturation of dog and cat products. There are NO boxes currently running for reptiles, despite there being over 4.8 million reptile owners in the United States alone. 

That's where Jurassicrate comes in. Not only do we aim to provide high-quality nutrition to our scaly friends, but we aim to do it inexpensively. Each month, the crate will include 5 - 8 items that are backed with great reviews and used often in the reptile community. We will source these items at the best prices so owners can get more than their money's worth in each crate.

In addition to diets, the crate will include fake plants, hides, food bowls and more. We are planning on inserting a booklet in each crate with reptile information. Think of a Zoobook. But miniature. And just as adorable.

With our funding, we hope to get our first orders out and get us started. We are happy to provide receipts for transparency. The money also will go to other start-up costs including formally becoming a business, insurance, website upkeep, etc.

We hope you're interested in our idea and help fund us. We will be eternally grateful and plan on doing special things for our founders.

Thank you for reading.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to get funding to get our initial bulk orders out. Once we get that, we should be set for future boxes. Furthermore, we want to become an LLC, insurance and get any sales permits we need to actually be up and running.

Prices:

  • Bulk Order: $1362
  • LLC Creation, Insurance + Associated Paperwork: $350
  • If we do not get fully funded, the funds will go to creating the LLC so that we can get business loans for Jurassicrate. If we do not get enough to fully fund the LLC creation, it'll still be used toward it. We will be able to provide proof of this.

...So what is in it for you? For our backers, we are offering tons of goodies including special crates specifically curated for you and your reptiles. We will be personally contacting each of our backers to get an idea of what products they want in their crates. We are offering unique crates for a year after backing. Furthermore, you will be on our website (if you'd like) as a helping founder of Jurassicrate.

Risks & Challenges

Development of Jurassicrate has been running smooth and on schedule. Only a completely unpredictable event such as the shortage of some key materials could delay our production, and then only temporarily. This is has been a very well thought-out project, and we are confident of, and committed to, delivering a quality product on time.

Of course, you're welcome to your investment back if this does not come to fruition, but that is not in the foreseeable future.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to make a contribution, but are still interested in this idea, please share this page and Jurassicrate's idea wherever you can! That helps immensely. Visit us at www.jurassicrate.com.

 

Thank you so much.

story:
Description

The base crafted from pure organic wood is fitted with three bright LEDs. The lights are powered by 9 volt batteries that are housed inside the wooden base. A transparent block of resin decorated with oaken wood and artificial natural ornaments helps scatter the light evenly in a soft and luminous fashion. The result is an an aesthetic ornament that blends well in and lights up any required space. 

 

Inspired From Nature

Our design draws its main inspiration from nature. Most of us live in urban settlements saturated by concrete structures. The elements we use in our design give us that little touch of nature lacking in our lives. We use oak and walnut as wood, and artificial replicas of authentic leaves and flowers because real ones don’t survive properly in the resin and lose their beauty during curing. The woods, leaves and flowers eye-catchingly blend in the design and give a satisfying glow with the LEDs.

 

Aesthetic

From adorning conventional to modern house hold, in bedrooms, living rooms, kitchen, bookshelves, side tables, counters or any other possible place you could think of in your personal or official premesis, the natural design of our lamps make it possible for them to look aesthetic in any space.

 

 

 

Color Psychology / Light Therapy

Do you feel more calm in a blue room? Or does the color red trigger a sense of excitement and passion? 

Just as different colors trigger certain emotions, the light the illuminates our surrounding can dramatically affect our moods.  It can improve or disrupt our sleep, cognition and overall wellbeing. It can improve mood and stabilize our circadian rhythms, helping us get a better and deeper night’s sleep. Psychologically, light can decrease depression scores and even increase cognitive performance such as reaction time and activation. Artists and interior designers have long used this idea in their designs and now you can too.

We give freedom to choose the color of light. So be it reading your book on a cold winters evening in warm yellow light or meditating in the peace of purple light, you can have it anyway you desire.

 

Timeline

 

Risks & Challenges

Until now, different prototypes have been developed and final design is obtained. Right now we are in the mass producton stage, Florashine lamps are currently produced and sold on the local markets.

However, we have a risk of managing excessive demand in terms of production, and shipping. Following suggestions are thought to be solution for the risk.

  • Currently we have a production capacity of 300 Lamps/month. After a small amount of investment, it can be increased to a few thousands Lamp/month. If the campaign reach above USD 50k, we will make the investment and have more than enough production capacity.
  • We are currently producing Florahine lamps, so we will start shipping immediately at 30 September, after the campaign ends.

 

Who We Are

We are a group of engineers with passion for innovation and creativity in our products, earlier this year we had an idea of making a lighting product that lights up our spaces in the most exquisitely peculiar manner.

After a process of thinking through many possible impressions and experimenting on prototypes, one of the ideas we came up with an elegant design made of clear epoxy resin and wood that incorporates analogous elements to mimic nature’s essence in any possible environment.

story:
Traditional sponges and towels are hotbeds for bacteria activity, and over time, they can turn into serious health threats. The thing is, there has not been a lot of pressure on the industry to fix this problem, due in large part to an overwhelming lack of public awareness. The problem, however, is still definitely there.

With our silicone shower / face / kitchen brush, we are turning the entire concept of this product on its head. Our brush is made out of FDA-approved, food-grade silicone, making it soft and easy to dry, but most importantly, this brush is safe, preventing the sort of bacteria build-up that you see in cloth and other porous materials.

 

If you care about your health, you want one of these brushes for your bathroom, your kitchen, your laundry room – basically anywhere you need to scrub anything. It is time to kick germs and bacteria to the curb, and the only way to do that is to get rid of the sponges and towels that we have become so dependent on. Our silicone brush is the answer.

 

 

The research doesn’t lie. One group of researchers based out of Furtwangen University in Germany studied 14 different used kitchen sponge samples, and do you know what they found? 362 different types of bacteria stuck within the foam. Sponges are a hotbed for bacterial activity. To learn more, check out http://www.sciencealert.com/you-don-t-want-to-k....

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are turning to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $27,000.  These funds will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing our silicone brush on a large scale. As a thank-you, we are offering everyone who contributes to this campaign the opportunity to reserve their own silicone brush before anyone else gets one (and at a huge discount too!). We have already created a prototype tooling, this brush could fit both right hand and left hand.
This brush works!

Your health matters. We believe that wholeheartedly, which is why we think this product is so important. Other companies are content with letting you use second-rate towels and sponges, products that build up harmful bacteria over time. We are not. We want to change the market by introducing a superior option.

 

About Us

Our team is composed of 3 members: 


Eddy is the CEO, Major is Mechanical Engineering, worked in Pilkington  (The World top 3 Auto glass manufacturer) and Amphenol (The 2nd biggest connector manufacturer) as PM (Product manager) and Marketing Manager over 10 years, designed many industrial product when work in these 2 company. Has the passion of design product, now Eddy has his own team, this Silicone Brush is the first product, hope you could be our backer, support us to make this product to be successful.

Echo is the Marketing Manager, work in e-commercial company  for 5 years, she's in charge of product promotion.

Bob is the Design Engineer, Eddy's university classmates, work as design engineer for over 10 years. Focus on product structure design.

Shipping

Where we ship?
Global shipping. Free shipping for US and China

When we start shipping?
When the funding succeeded

When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
In Jan. 2018 as expected

Frequently Asked Questions

About

What is it?
It’s a Silicone Shower/Facial/Kitchen Brush

Why should we use it?
1. It’s much more sanitary brush than traditional sponge/brush.

2. Very comfortable.

How much does it cost?
INNERNEED will sell silicone brush at $10, but we are offering our first supporters an exclusive Indiegogo price for super early bird $6 at 40% off for 500pcs, after 500pcs, we offering supporters at $7 at 30% off.

What do we get when we order?
Sanitary Silicone Brush

Why are you crowd funding?
Your health matters. We believe that wholeheartedly, which is why we think this product is so important. Other companies are content with letting you use second-rate towels and sponges, products that build up harmful bacteria over time. We are not. We want to change the market by introducing a superior option.

 

Tech Specs

What is the uniqueness of this product?
1. Food grade FDA approved silicone raw material.

2. Ergonomic grip design.

What are the dimensions?
128mm×126mmx 26mm / 5.04inchx4.96inchx1.02inch

How does it work?
Put fingers into the 3 holes, works for both left and right hands, wet the brush, put lotion on the bristle, then wash face or body, it will have a lot bubble in this way.

Where is it manufactured?
China

What certifications do you have? 
FDA/LFGB/SGS/RoHS

Customer Services

Is there a warranty?
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis, at some point, we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

What is your return/ exchange policy?
If you received your product and you aren't satisfied or it’s broken, you may exchange it for a new one within 60 days.  You need to pay shipping & handling fees.

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?    
Yes, customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped outside of the China and US may be subject to import taxes, customs duties, and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties, and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; INNERNEED has no control over these charges.

 

We are on Track to Deliver

2017   Apr              Product idea

2017   May             3D Data many version

2017  June             1st 3D print prototype

2017   Aug              2nd -3rd  3D print prototype

2017   Sep              1st Prototype

2017   Oct-Nov      2nd Prototype and Validating test

2017    Dec             Indiegogo Launch and mass production tooling.

2018  Jan               Product is available to the world.

Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; INNERNEED has no control over these charges. We are on Track to Deliver2017   Apr              Product idea2017   May             3D Data many version2017  June             1st 3D print prototype2017   Aug              2nd -3rd  3D print prototype2017   Sep              1st Prototype2017   Oct-Nov      2nd Prototype and Validating test2017    Dec             Indiegogo Launch and mass production tooling.2018  Jan               Product is available to the world.

story:
Do you have Dyson cordless vacuum?

Have you ever felt uncomfortable
with your index finger due to its power button?

If so, please pay attention!

 


 

What is the FINGER FREE?

- If you want to keep the power button pushing without your finger,
   You can do it with FINGER FREE.
- And if you want to turn off, you can do it as quick as the original button.
- This is for Dyson cordless vacuums - V6, 7, 8


What are the Key points?

- Easy to install : Takes less 10 seconds
- Easy to use : Push with index finger and push with your thumb. That's all.
- Safe to use : Whenever you need to stop, just tear off with your thumb.

* You've already confirmed these Key points, if you watched our YouTube video.
   If not, you can check below.
 

 
 
What is the status of project?

- We are on the Prototype stage. (Nov 23, 2017)
- We're going to make a contract with a factory for massive production.


When can I get the FINGER FREE?

- If this our INDEIGOGO funding achieve the goal,
  Shipping will start on March 2018.

 

Thank you very much!
Happy end of year :)

story:
The Teaflo

We worked for over one year to develop the Teaflo and now it's ready.

 

The product features:

  • Time Increment Button - Simply push the buttons (1m=1minute, 10s=10seconds) as many times as needed to arrive at the time you desire.
  • Digital Time Readout - Allows you to see clearly what time you have set.
  • (Can) Cancel Button - If you put in a time by mistake, you can push the button and it will reset the unit back to zero.
  • (Por) Pour Button - If for some reason, you don't want to wait until the timer has finishes it's count down, you can simply push "pour" and the system will bypass the timer and dispense the tea immediately.
  • Makes up to 25 fl ounces (650 ml) of tea.

Inspiration

Teaflo and its founders recognized that, even with all the steeping products on the market, there was not one affordable steeper available that was easy to use and provides control over the exact amount of steeping time.

One morning, over a cup of tea, the idea was born to design products that will allow tea drinkers the opportunity to enjoy a perfect cup of tea every time. They immediately began designing the product on a note pad and one month later they completed the first prototype.

(Above is the first generation prototype)

After completing the prototype the founders filed for patents around the world.  Much consideration went into deciding whether to go straight to market or launch a crowdfunding campaign. In the end we decided to begin tooling and launch on Indiegogo at the same time.

(Above is the Second Generation Prototype)

Why Teaflo Works

Steeping time is one of the most important cosiderations when preparing a good cup tea. The Teaflo allows the user to control the steep time down to increments of 10 seconds. This combined with the convenience of Teaflo being a portable application allows tea enthusiasts to steep a perfect cup of tea at work, home, or even on a picnic.

 

How is it powered?

The Teaflo is powered by a rechargeable battery. A standard USB cable plugs into the side of the Cap. It takes about 20 minutes to fully charge. A fully charged battery should last about 2 1/2 months if used 2-3 times daily.

What We Need & What You Get

The Teaflo is not a complicated product to use or produce. For this reason we are going to begin setting up production during our campaign rather then waiting until the end like most other campaigns. We will be using funds from Indiegogo supporters to finish our production and also to develop other tea related products and even create a line of different teas from around the world for our customers to enjoy.

We are awarding all of our Early Bird sign ups with their choice of ether the Teaflo Stand or 2 Double-Walled Glass Tea Cups. Both options have a value of USD $18.00. This means our first 500 customers will essentially receive the product at USD $30.00.

Because we are starting production now, we will be delivering the product to our supporters in just a few months. We will be able to do this because we are going to get a "jump start" on production at the same time we start our campaign on Indiegogo.


 

The Founders

Teaflo was developed by two friends (Curtis Horn and Brian Lewis) that met many years ago at California State University, Fullerton in the science department.Brian majored in biology and Curtis majored in physics. The two have remand good friends since leaving college and now their science background was a useful tool in developing the Teaflo.

Brian Lewis

Brian now lives in Shanghai with his wife and daughter. He has been working in manufacturing and product development for over ten years. Brian has worked with companies such as 3M, Honeywell, Radio Shack and many others.

(Brian Lewis, above)

Curtis Horn

Curtis is a physicist and licensed control systems engineer in California with 17 years’ experience in Instrumentation & Controls. After leaving academia he has practiced in many industries as an engineer including manufacturing, water/waste-water, nuclear, petroleum and power.


Project sizes he has participated in have varied from single instrument installations to multi-billion dollar plants. In addition he has worked for companies (such as AECOM, WorleyParsons, and ST Microelectronics) ranging in size from a small (under 10 employees) start up to multinational corporations with 10’s of thousands of employees in varying roles, including engineering & management.

 

 

Teaflo is very easy to assemble and clean.

It takes about 10 seconds to separate the parts for cleaning. It takes about the same amount of time to reassemble the product for use again. The Teaflo is also "dishwasher friendly".

 

Teaflo is ideal for all types of Tea, Hot or Cold.

The Teaflo is ideal for people who love herbal and traditional teas. The timer allows one to control steep time down to ten second increments which allows the Teaflo to be used to make ice tea as well as hot teas.

 

How is the Teaflo made?

  • The Steeping Container is made using Tritan. Tritan is a high grade BPA Free material that provides the highest level of safety available for our customers.
  • The filter is made from a high quality stainless steel.
  • The Cap has a sonic-welded seal and has been constructed to be water resistant. The cap is capable of withstanding spills and can withstand large amounts of water exposure. It has a silicon seal-lining throughout and a water-proof coating on the PCB, thus the Cap can be submerged under water for short periods of time without damage.

Delivery and Timeline

story:
Nowadays smartwatches and hi tech devices, increasingly advanced and complex, are invading our markets. Or, at least, it seems so. Indeed a lot of people , especially the less nerd and tech-loving ones, are wondering

WHAT THE HECK ARE THEY FOR?

Do I really want a contraption more than 70g heavy, with a battery that lasts only one day, sticking out of your shirt leave like a huge, fluorescent, backlit pimple?

Reading texts, making calls, playing games, managing appointments, checkin the weather: is it really useful to have all these features on an extremely small display tied to the wrist, especially when we already have the world in our pockets, on a comfortable HD display?

YPORIA BANGLE, the smart reply to the silly fashion of the moment.


WHAT IS IT?


Unlock your phone without password, pin or biometric sensor.

Just bring the bangle to the back of the phone. All in total safety, using the official app or a third-party one.

  Phone theme and settings combined to your outfit

Black Yporia Bangle for job meetings, red for cocktails, fluo for parties. The phone theme will automatically change following the Bangle you wear, as connectivity and safety settings will do. Everything is completely customizable and normal sticky NFC tags are also supported, increasing overall flexibility.

Share your contact information, with just a touch.

All NFC enabled devices are supported (smartphones, computers and other). V-Card is a wide supported format.

And... Share anything you want!

Texts, images, videos and any other filetype. When stored at your wrist, they will be ever accessible and easy to share.

The photo frame pendant, 2.0

Yporia Bangle is the way to turn back tangible your best digital memories. Its' a hi-tech device, with a heart.

No batteries, no wires, no mess.

NFC chips use the electromagnetic field generated by the phone to supply power to the transmitter. Always ready to use.

Open NFC door locks

There are a few on the market, but we are working to make our own! Look at the "what's next" section :)

THE COMPANION APP, EASY AND BEAUTIFUL AS THE BANGLE


Yporia smart bangle is a universal gadget, compatible with every device and app that supports NFC. With the companion Yporia App you can use all of its functions in a user friendly, fast and simple interface.


Safe phone unlocking

Bring your personal bracelet near your phone rear cover, even with gloves. Forget PIN numbers, biometric sensors and passwords. Safer, easier.

 

Bangle-dependent phone themes and settings

Black Yporia Bangle for job meetings, red for cocktails, fluo for parties. The phone theme will automatically change following the Bangle you wear, as connectivity and safety settings will do. Everything is completely customizable and normal sticky NFC tags are also supported, increasing overall flexibility. It's an Yporia product, never forget it.

 Share and save

Empty your pockets, throw away business cards and digitally share your contact information to new customers or advertise your website trough link-sharing.
Yporia Bangle is a stylish memory, able to save everything you want and keep it safe inside his beautiful steel frame, always in touch with your skin. As an added feature, every NFC reader in the world will be able to retrieve stored memories, even without our App.
Make a special gift, link a bracelet to a picture and then link it again around the wrist of someone special to you.

 

MY BANGLE

Choose the material and color you prefer, add a personalized engraving on the inner steel surface,  choose the number of NFC tags.

You won’t find another bangle like this.

You won’t find another Bangle like yours.

The waterproof plastic coating is very resistant: show off your Yporia Bangle on the beach, in the pool or in the Sahara.

The body, machined in hypoallergenic marine grade stainless steel, won’t show a scratch even after rough usage and won’t bother you under hot conditions.

Is the office your habitat? Are you an evening wear king? Let your leather or tissue Yporia Bangle tell everyone your class and attention to details.

Light and elegant, it’s the detail that makes a difference

Yporia Bangle, whoever you are, it's made for you

Current available colors and materials:


HOW IT'S MADE


Premium quality marine steel. Hypoallergenic, it is extremely flexible and retains its luster over time.

 

NFC tags need to be isolated from the metal. The special insulating layer ensures correct functionality, with a thickness of just 0.5 mm (1.5 alpha version). 

 

Yporia bangle can fit up to three NFC chips. They are universally supported and can be read (and written) by any device equipped with this technology.

 

The outer layer is fixed by special adhesives that bind it to the layer behind. Customization possibilities can satisfy anyone: glossy and bright plastic, rubber with embossed texture, leather, and even fabrics like Denim.



Yporia Bangle is outstandingly comfortable and lightweight with its thickness of  only 1.4mm (2.5 alpha version) and 14mm width.

Due to minimum order quantity (MOQ) of some components of the Yporia Bangle, 1.4mm Bangle total thickness is assured only if the campaign rises a minimum of 150 000 $. Otherwise, a maximum thickness of 2.5mm is guaranteed and 1.4mm is at full Yporia discretion.

Packaging and shipping solutions

We are still thinking about all the possible packaging solutions but we are mainly oriented towards two possibilities. In the first case, your personal Yporia Bangle will be shipped inside a premium leather bag, without added costs. The second solution involves a small cardboard box, fully decorated and conceived as a fashion gift box, available for 9$ (plus the perk cost). However, we are still evaluating other ideas so please give us your feedback!
Please remember to add the Shipping Perk: shipping to Italy is free; add 6$ for EU,USA and rest of the world. If you prefer a trackable shipping please remember to select the 15$ perk.

Our old prototypes:

How to choose my personal Bangle?

Choose the perk you prefer and place the order. Following "how to claim a perk" topic in the Indiegogo Help Center, you'll have to contact us providing your color/material/personalization choice. We are also developing a section on our web site dedicated to product personalization: Indiegogo users will be able to log in and select colors, materials and personalizations. Stay tuned!

Status of the project & next steps

We've spent the last year designing the product, developing the app, testing the prototypes and taking contacts with possible manufacturers. Now, when we are finally ready to start  Bangle production, we need your help: only with a minimum quantity of ordered Bangles we can obtain mass-production prices for materials, workshop operations and assembly. In details, next steps after the campaign will be:

  • Order all the materials such as stainless steel, leather and insulating layer
  • Order the molds for plastic injection
  • Order NFC tags
  • Machine steel and produce plastic covers
  • Assemble, and eventually personalize, the product 
  • Perform quality tests
  • Produce packaging
  • Ship to your home

We are optimistic about shipping out Yporia Bangle the first weeks of June; however, due to possible production delays, we take no responsability for breaking this deadline.

Similar products

If you think that Yporia Bangle is not as innovative as we claim, we... agree!

There are already wearable NFC products on the market, NFC technology is available since 2006 and competing with smartwatches and last hi-tech devices from huge manufacturers is no way within our reach.

So, what are we doing??

Well, Yporia Bangle is not an hi-tech device. Our Bangle is a jewel, in step with the times; other NFC gadgets are, let me say, ONLY GADGETS. Yporia Bangle was designed to be the main part of a bigger dedicated system, in conjuction with our Android App and a cloud space.

Our Bangle is beautiful, long lasting, with a cloud system that offer exclusive services, completely different from what other NFC-based products do

It is the only unlocking device sold "ready to use", with no need to hack your phone, without hundreds of settings and drawbacks.

It is the only NFC device fully customizable, designed to transmit a personal message, made to show who you are.

It is the only device made from steel and premium materials, instead of cheap silicone rubber.

It can be read from any NFC device,  anytime, anywhere, without needing to install apps and other software.

It is battery-less, cable-less, waterproof, shock resistant.

It is slim, lightweight, comfortable.

It is

SIMPLY. BEAUTIFUL.

Take a look at the gallery! (also available on Indiegogo)

WHO WE ARE

Students at the Polytechnic of Turin and high school classmates, we are three 23 years old with much initiative. Always been technology addicted and “nice things” lovers, we see Yporia Bangle as our launch pad.

Following all its development, son of sleepless nights and head strikes against our desks, from scratch to the innovative and beautiful yet so simple product it is now, is our greatest satisfaction.

People always ask us why we have such ridiculous profile pictures:
"Perchè si."

HOW WAS THIS PROJECT BORN?

The same way best ideas come to life. Two friends at the pub, some wine and a smartphone in their hands.

Following our idea and wearing Yporia Bangle since it was a sharp rough piece of metal, worked once in a day and lose glue on our wrists, we developed the whole project keeping well in mind what is our concept of a good porduct and a successful team.

First of all, Yporia Bangle is a very beautiful object. The smooth edges of the marine steel, its shine and flexibility. The soft coating that hides electronic parts.

Yporia is Italian manufacture, valuable materials and design. Yporia stands for innovation, a glance to the future, head in the clouds and feet down-to-earth.


WHAT'S NEXT?

We have big plans for the future. First of all, we'll open our business to traditional off-line marketplaces, taking contacts with possible local dealers and partners in the tourist industry (hotels, clubs). Following this purpose, we are currently developing an NFC door lock. Moreover, we are working on many other projects, really attractive for both  the Indiegogo audience and the traditional marketplace, which will all be "sons" of Yporia Bangle. In other words, supporting this campaign means supporting the birth of a new and -we hope- long lasting innovative company.


MERCHANDISE

Yporia T-shirts. WOW! (Included in >100$ perks)

sleepless nights and head strikes against our desks, from scratch to the
innovative and beautiful yet so simple product it is now, is our greatest
satisfaction.

People always ask us why we have such ridiculous profile pictures:"Perchè si."
HOW WAS THIS PROJECT BORN?
The same way best ideas come to life. Two
friends at the pub, some wine and a smartphone in their hands. 
Following our idea and wearing Yporia Bangle since it was a sharp rough piece
of metal, worked once in a day and lose glue on our wrists, we developed the whole project keeping well in mind what is our concept of a good porduct and a successful team.
First of all, Yporia Bangle is a very
beautiful object. The smooth edges of the marine steel, its shine and
flexibility. The soft coating that hides electronic parts.
Yporia is Italian manufacture, valuable
materials and design. Yporia stands for innovation, a glance to the future,
head in the clouds and feet down-to-earth.
WHAT'S NEXT?
We have big plans for the future. First of all, we'll open our business to traditional off-line marketplaces, taking contacts with possible local dealers and partners in the tourist industry (hotels, clubs). Following this purpose, we are currently developing an NFC door lock. Moreover, we are working on many other projects, really attractive for both  the Indiegogo audience and the traditional marketplace, which will all be "sons" of Yporia Bangle. In other words, supporting this campaign means supporting the birth of a new and -we hope- long lasting innovative company.MERCHANDISE
Yporia T-shirts. WOW! (Included in >100$ perks)

story:
Broogs Smart Lamp is a multipurpose lamp for your bedroom, living room, study, and wherever else you want it to be.

This simple lamp provides all the conveniences of a bedside lamp with a multitude of smart device notifications and features. You can set the mood around you, charge your smartphone, and even check if you have any missed calls or messages.

In case of a blackout or you need to leave the room for a moment at night, say for a glass of milk, it doubles as an excellent hand-held lantern. The removable lantern (located in the center of the lamp) will last around 3~4 hours and when you plug it back in, it’ll recharge for future use.

The lamp was designed to shift light away from your eyes for when reading at night or looking around in the dark. This relieves any unnecessary stress keeping your eyes comfortable while you unwind.  

Broogs, with its 160,000 integrated LED lamps, can change into any color that you want through an easy-to-use smartphone application.

This LED lamp also uses 20 times less energy than your standard bulb so it can be used for 20+ years.

Broogs has built-in USB ports for charging your mobile devices faster than when plugging it in to your laptop or PC. This also eliminates the need to have a separate wall charger plugged in as Broogs charges just as fast.

You can even use the lantern portion to charge your external batteries or devices. 

The lamp has a built-in high-quality Bluetooth speaker that can connect to your Bluetooth devices to play any audio you please. The sound disperses through the bottom of the device, creating a much more pleasant acoustic experience throughout the room.

The level of brightness can be adjusted from 0-100 with just a touch of your finger and can be set to automatically light up when the room is completely dark. To turn off the lamp, all you need to do is touch the base.


The associated Broogs app can be downloaded for free from the Google PlayStore or the AppStore. 

When you activate notifications through the app, you will receive alerts for calls, texts, alarms, etc. the way you intend it to. Through further updates of the app, we’ll be expanding the notifications to mails, Facebook, Instagram, and other SNS platforms.

As the smart lamp gets updated through your smart phone app, you’ll continue to see the next level of functions that we add to our device. Just like when you see new features when you update your smartphone OS, you’ll see new additions to our smart lamp functionality as well and experience new features.

Broogs will be manufactured at an optimal size to enhance the look of your room while being able to perfectly light it up as well. 

We’ll be offering 3 types for you to choose from. You can select the color of your liking from either  all white / all black / white+milk.




Risks & Challenges

Although with time and money you can design great products, it’s the user experience that’s hard to design. How convenient is my product? Does it get rid of discomfort for my users?

Us here at Broogs have had a lot of experience in the UX (User Experience) field and have made a lot of products related to IoT (Internet of Things). We’ve come across a lot of instances that we couldn’t even fathom in regards to user discomfort. That is expected. But it’s catching these issues and resolving them that makes us good at what we do.

The smartlamp is the first product to come out of Broogs. As such, we’ve worked hard to make a good product that users will come to love.

With any new product, unexpected issues can arise whether they be technical, financial, etc. We’ll work hard to keep our deadlines so our backers can have the product they paid for.

We’re working at full speed to develop a finalized product and will try to keep our promise of a May delivery.

As you look at our product and appreciate it, if you share our vision, we’ll gladly take any support or investment that can be given.

We hope that we’ll receive a lot of interest from the Indiegogo community.

story:
***Note: You don't need to know your filter size to order. We'll get that info from you after funding!***

Did you know home air filters should be changed every 1-2 months? Does it matter? Yes! Dirty air filters are the root cause of most HVAC repairs. And they drive up utility costs the dirtier they get.

We've got the solution: an air filter membership that sends you the exact sizes you need, exactly when you need to change them.

Meet FilterAnthropy

***What Makes Us Different?***

Our business is built on two fundamental benefits to our customers:

  1. Deliver a high-quality filter to our customers exactly when they need to change it.
  2. Turn an ordinary household purchase into an engine for making the world a better place.

No one else has the flex-schedule delivery system (see below for details) we'll have and no one else has philanthropy at the core of their business model. There simply does not exist a membership program like FilterAnthropy.

Why Should You Fund Us?

Here's the best part of this whole project: you're gonna buy filters somewhere (at least you should), so why not buy them from us? You'll pay the same or less as any store you go to, including Amazon. Plus the filters come exactly when you need to change them. And on top of everything, every time you buy a filter, it will be helping low-income families overcome poverty.

Who Is This For?

If you have home air filters that need changing, this is for you. If you're like most people, and you have a hard time remembering to change them, this is for you. If you believe businesses should be built on making a positive difference, this is for you. This. Is. For. You. So pick the option that best fits your needs and let's get this project funded!

A Clean Filter Saves You (Lots of) Money

The longer you leave a dirty air filter in, the harder your A/C equipment has to work to pull the air through, which means costly repairs and high utility costs. It also means dirty air in your home. FilterAnthropy will send you high-quality, USA made air filters on a schedule that fits your needs.

Flex-Schedule Delivery

Our flex-schedule will get the filters to you exactly when you need to change them. When the weather is hot or cold that means your HVAC equipment is working extra hard and the filters get dirty faster. Because of that we'll send new filters more often when this happens. When the weather is mild, you don't need filters as often so we deliver them less often.

How we do it: we monitor the weather in your area and schedule your deliveries based on how hot or cold it is where you live. This unique business process is currently being considered for patent.

To keep this Indiegogo campaign simple, each package/perk we're offering will get you a new filter every 2 months. But once our website is live you'll be able to choose between the flex schedule OR a standard delivery of every 1, 2, or 3 months.

Let FilterAnthropy help save you money on repairs and utility costs with our air filter membership program.

A Dirty Filter Means Dirty Air In Your Home

The filter above was only about 4 months old when it was removed. That's a whole lot of dust and dander! Your home air filters are designed to help clean the air in your home without compromising the efficiency of your HVAC equipment. But when your air filters are dirty, they can't do either of those. The result is air that is less and less clean. 

Let FilterAnthropy help you keep your home air clean with our flex-schedule auto-ship membership.

We Will Carry All Sizes & Multiple MERV Ratings

No matter what size air filter you need, we will have it. And you don't need to know your filter sizes to support our campaign! We'll get that info from you after the campaign has funded.

We will also carry multiple MERV rated filters: MERV 8, MERV 11, MERV 13. MERV rating refers to the strength of the filter. The lower the MERV rating, the less the filter captures.

On the other hand, the higher the MERV rating, the greater strain on your HVAC equipment, even with clean filters. 

For most people, we recommend MERV 11. But no matter what your preference, FilterAnthropy will have the filter quality and size you need.

Want to geek out about MERV ratings? Here's a handy infographic:

Not Just Selling Filters, Making A Difference

Our goal isn't just to solve an important problem in people's lives, but to use FilterAnthropy as an engine for helping others overcome poverty.

Our founder, Leo Ebbert, was inspired by his work with another company he helped build: Mission Belt. Mission Belt took an amazing men's belt concept and turned it into a way to beat poverty.

The company got its big break on the hit-show Shark Tank where the founders made a deal with Daymond John. Here's a picture from when Kevin O'Leary (aka Mr. Wonderful) stopped by to say hi. That's Leo on the far right.

Since being on Shark Tank, Mission Belt has given over $1.5 million to help more than 60,000 low-income people grow or start a small business. 

That's the same vision we have for FilterAnthropy! With our help, you can save a ton of money on repairs and utility costs all while making this world a better place. In other words: buy a filter, help save the world.

In order to accomplish this, we're partnering with KIVA, a non-profit microlending organization. For every filter we sell, we'll donate $1 to the cause, which can be as much as 40% of the profit. Those dollars will add up, and KIVA will use them to make small, low-interest loans to help people living in poverty grow or start a small business. It's a hand up rather than a hand out.

Tiers & Rewards

You'll save money by buying filters from us as compared to the big box stores or even Amazon. But you'll really save by supporting our campaign today. We're offering discounts up to 30% off retail! And of course the more you buy now, the more you'll save.

Filters That Actually Work

Our filters are high-value, low-cost, and made in the USA. Our filters are the same price or even less compared to big box stores and Amazon all without compromising quality. 

Never Changed A Home Air Filter? It's Super Duper Easy!

You simply locate the air return(s) in your home, open the grate, remove the dirty filter, replace it with the clean filter, and close the grate. Here's a 1-minute how-to video:

Finding your filter size is also easy. Just look on the existing filter(s) in your home. It will be printed in large print indicating the length, width, and depth. For example: 14x20x1.

But don't worry about the sizes right now! Just pick the package/perk you like best, order one for every air grate you have in your house, and we'll get the size from you later. 

Timeline & Milestones

July - Campaign completed & orders placed to suppliers

Late August/September - Inventory arrives & fulfillment begins

September - New website completed & ready for customer sign up

October - First KIVA loans funded

story:
Marscapes: Bringing Mars to You

Commemorate Mariner 9's 50th Anniversary 

As Mars continues to capture the imaginations of many, the team at WhiteClouds has decided to direct their expertise upward as well. We have compiled a collection of Marscapes to celebrate the 1971 launch and subsequent mission of Mariner 9. In nearly a year of orbiting, Mariner 9 was able to capture and send 7,329 images (and roughly 54 billion bits of data) back to Earth.

WhiteClouds' Marscapes are incredibly realistic reproductions of the Martian terrain based on pictures and topographical data gathered from multiple scientific resources.

You will be able to choose different sizes, design styles, framing options, color borders, and quantities.

 

These 3D decor pieces are NOT simply flat 2D prints of images.  Marscapes are raised surface models of the Martian landscape. 

 

 

Section of Athabasca Marscape showing how changing daylight and shadows create a unique fourth-dimensional appearance (“Time”).

 

A Marscape style, frame colors, and size to match any room

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You will have your pick of one of five style options for each Marscape you choose with an additional style as our first stretch goal. You can specify your style preference when you check out or once we confirm the order before shipping. 

There are eight available sizes for our Marscapes, based on framing options below.

 

 

 

 

As a final touch to complete your Marscape, we apply an elegant matte border. There are two border choices; a sand finish that simulates the Mars surface or a felt flocking (similar to jewelry box lining). Frames are made from high-quality anodized extruded aluminum in either Stardust Silver or Eclipse Black. Each Marscape has a specially formulated UV-resistant coating applied to its surface that eliminates glare and the need for any kind of glazing.

 

Shipping will be charged after the campaign ends. You will receive your pledges, add-ons, and stretch goals in the least expensive shipping method - usually combined into one package.

These shipping costs are estimates. Actual shipping costs will be determined in the Pledge Manager and will be paid in US$.

 

 

 

 

How are Marscapes made?

While the process of making these 3D topographies is proprietary and more complex than it looks, we can tell you that it has taken seven years of developing different methods of 3D fabrication that has brought us to this point. Our process includes some traditional techniques, some next-generation 3D printing methods, and a lot of experimentation with different materials and mediums. To create one topography, it flows through many different expert hands from 3D modelers, digital artists, 3D printers, mold-makers, painters, finishers, framers, quality control, and so on.

 

At WhiteClouds, we began turning visions into tangible realities in 2013. Over the years, we have proudly made several projects for NASA. A few of the more notable projects include full-color 3D printed models of the Eta Carinae Nebula and a collection of raised relief terrain models of Earth's Moon. Both projects coupled data supplied by NASA scientists and our in-house design and manufacturing resources.

 

 

Why does WhiteClouds care about the project?

WhiteClouds' founder and CEO, Jerry Ropelato, is a longtime space-enthusiast. His mother gave him a telescope at age nine and he quickly set it up to gaze at the moon. His previous company, Purch, acquired Space.com in 2009 and was, in turn, able to travel to Cape Canaveral to see the launch of the Ares I-X launch in 2009. His experience at the launch sparked a more profound interest in space travel and possibly doing so in his lifetime.

Many of us at WhiteClouds are former Space.com employees. We love space, and especially Mars. It is a privilege to bring you these unique 3D Marscapes. With these crowdfunding-only rewards, you are getting the coolest, first-of-its-kind décor, unlike any other. Back this project, and be a part of our mission to create these stunning and unique landscapes of Mars.

story: <

----------------------!!!--------------------------!!!----------------------!!!--------------------------!!!

Introducing the world's first portable flame detecting alarm with free from mal-function, alerts your phone, providing a cause of a fire, and more. The elligo is the next leap in whole fire alarm system, offering you to design your safety independently, wherever you are.

 

Doesn’t respond to fires from daily equipment and cooking appliance like a gas stove or a burner

 

 

 

 

 

We have tested elligo in real-life situation. It constantly shows that detects a flame and alerts the phone immediately. Check the videos below. 

 

 

 

Elligo is not the best solution to prevent fire accident, but we are guarantee elligo can contribute to reduce the possibility of a tragedy. 

 
From anywhere, you and your family can know what’s going on. "elliGO" is always on your phone. *ios is available in October.
 
 

 

For the first time ever in a flame/smoke detector, “elliGO” helps you check the cause of a fire by sending an image of the scene 3 minutes prior to the fire’s detection. “elliGO” is embedded with logic technology that repeats the backup and deletion of image files in the device using its 10-second frames. It also provides another live images up to 30 seconds by a second.

 

 

Just check and submit. Time-machine data can be utilised as an evidence for your insurance claiming. 

 

 

Experiencing another level of fire solution

How about your camping site or garage?

 

You can travel with elligo. any place you desire will be elligo’s site to detect. (however, please be away from direct sun.)  

 

 

 

You don’t have to worry about the power connection. Elligo is suitable with USB B - C type. Just go off with any external battery pack. It will provide another level of safeness where you go. 

 

Ex. 5000mA battery pack guarantees about 25 hours usage

 

Put on anywhere you desire

 

 

 

elliGO's service is designed to protect your information. Time-machine data doesn’t leave your elligo and is never backed up to server or anywhere else. ‘GDPR’, ‘ISO 27017’, ‘ISO 27001’, and ‘AES 256’ standards are applied.

Firmware Over-The-Air (FOTA) is a Mobile Software Management (MSM) technology in which the operating firmware of elligo is wirelessly upgraded and updated by its manufacturer.

 

There’s no need to wire-connect “elliGO” to a computer as smart wireless firmware updates are available through Wi-Fi.

 

 

Fire outbreaks are unpredictable. Fires threaten our households, including our loved ones, and in worse cases, it even threatens the human race. For us to live in prosperity, safety has to be our one and only top priority. It is not an exaggeration if the demand for 

smoke detectors is based on humanity's desire to live and protect.

We can experience many fire tragedy by mass media.

 

Smoke detectors are everywhere, but people started to turn their backs due to frequent malfunctions and low-performance levels. Furthermore, it has become common in 

cases where we don't even know the installation date or if it even works properly. We have no other option but to rely on pre-existing smoke detectors.

 

Do you believe it is working?

 

 

 

 

We came up with “elliGO” to solve the shortcomings of existing fire alarms such as inconvenient installations and not being able to control & monitoring, and to create a user-centered product.

 

Following the manufacturing process, prototypes, and commercialisation (that took nearly a year and a half), we finally succeeded in developing “elliGO.” The trial product and service operation were completed in March 2021, and “elliGO” will undergo its Indiegogo campaign in July 2021 and officially launch in the coming December.

 

Compare with others

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Samsung electronics Engineer, art-work designer, and semi-professional cyclist. Lead the development of over 30 product types as an expert in the R&D field of fire detectors utilizing sensors. Based on this technology, we have been mapping out an enterprise that grafts ICT technology into the firefighting industry. 

 

Hi buddy

 

“elliGO” is designed as an unique and sensational device. It will work with “our next elliGO: smoke & carbon monoxide detector”. You will experience another level of fire solution. It just begins. 

Next project

 

You work. "elliiGO" Watches

 

 

 

 

This campaign is powered by FUNDINGINSIDER. Providing an All-Inclusive/ One Stop Crowdfunding service for developers to freely express their ideas. All the way from consulting, video productions, and marketing! Beyond expectations.

 

Risks and challenges

 

We take on new challenges every moment. Those challenges gave birth to “elliGO,” and now it’s waiting to be chosen by all of you who are the world’s trendiest through the first Indiegogo campaign. We will present the best safety companion “elliGO” to you by continually improving our technological development and manufacturing process. We are confident that “elliGO” will satisfy our customers who have guaranteed, trusted, and believed in our product quality. We made a difficult decision of delaying the mass production to release a high-quality product that could fully satisfy users because our goal is to perfectly protect your property and life with “elliGO” that will be laid somewhere amid a valuable space.

story:
Meet Luzi


Luzi Smart Lamp is an advanced sleep system that uses therapeutic light, personalized sound, and voice commands to help  you fall asleep faster and wake up more refreshed. While you sleep, Luzi charges your devices through the 4 USB ports, or via the optional wireless charging base.


Sleep Features:

  • Get to sleep faster with a sleep routine that is tuned to your body
  • Wake up to a beautiful sunrise and soothing music
  • Relevant Recommendations™ on how to sleep better
  • Luzi Sleep App integrates with the Luzi Lamp to help you get to sleep faster and wake up refreshed. Be led through guided meditation, hear soothing sleep sounds, go through a sequence of lights made to increase melatonin (your bodies' natural sleep chemical), and more


Partners

We Need Your Support!

We're here on Indiegogo because we need your help. We are a team of software engineers and entrepreneurs advised by leading sleep scientists, but we need our backers support to complete the product. We already have a working prototype of Luzi and know we can make it even better and help millions of people but we need your help to get this to production!

What do you get for your support?

The Impact

Not getting a good night's sleep is terrible. Not getting a good night's sleep multiple times a week is even worse.  It happens to many people on the Dream Team and to a lot of the people we know. It is estimated that upwards of 50% of adults in the modern world suffer sleep disorders one or more nights per week. Luzi may not be able to solve all your sleep problems, but we are sure that it can help you get a much better night's sleep than you have in the past.

The Dream Team

The team behind Luzi (called the Dream Team because we pretty much have to call ourselves that) built Luzi because we all either had sleep problems or knew someone who did. We thought it was incredible that even though we spent 1/3 of our lives sleeping, the most advanced sleep systems were apps that gave you a sleep score... We already know when we don’t sleep well, we need a solution! We decided that we would create a system that not only told you how you slept, but would actively help you sleep and give you individualized Relevant Recommendations on how to sleep better. We do this by pairing our mobile app which has a bunch of awesome features with our smart lamp which has a beautiful speaker system, wireless and wired charging capabilities, and is chock full of sensors.

Joel Burke
CEO
Joel is a lifetime entrepreneur and has worked on projects ranging from enterprise applications to student housing platforms. In his free time he likes taking naps and working with startups and entrepreneurs. He volunteers with StartX, the Stanford startup accelerator helping with marketing initiatives and with Draper University, an innovative school for entrepreneurs, helping their students as a mentor.


Dr. Green
CSO
Dr. George H. Green, Ph.D. has been actively involved in the sciences and arts all his life. He has logged more that 50,000 clinical hours as a psychophysiologic therapist utilizing both biofeedback and neurofeedback technologies since 1976. He is one of the pioneers in the field of neurofeedback and holds two patents in the area of brain/computer interface.


Tark Abed
DESIGN
Tark has over 20 years of product design experience and has worked on projects developing innovative and beautiful hardware solutions for both major enterprises and smaller startups. Prior to founding his current company, Mighty Studios, he was creative director of Speck Design in Palo Alto.


Bill Creekbaum
ADVISOR
Bill has been in product management for nearly 20 years, and for the past 10 has been focused on successfully delivering SaaS and Cloud Applications to the market. Prior to joining Oracle, Bill has worked at Microsoft, Mindjet, and more.


Tom Burke
ADVISOR
Tom is an entrepreneur at heart, having founded several successful startups over the course of his career. He has been responsible for both hardware and software design teams in the high tech space. Since his last company was acquired, he is now VP of Product Marketing for a large European based company.


Timeline


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute monetarily, you can still help Luzi live! Tell your friends, family, coworkers, and mailman about Luzi using Indiegogo's share tools!

Contact Us

If you have any questions about Luzi, please contact us at Hello@luzilamp.com

FAQ

  1. What is the science behind Luzi? 

    a. Since we have integrated a custom designed LED producing millions of color combinations, along with a sophisticated sound system capable of very low frequencies, Luzi is able to provide a wide range of options for healthier sleep, never before offered in a consumer device. Here are some of the studies we based our features on:
    • NIH Resources
    • NIH Study
    • Sound's Effect on Sleep
    • Sleep Foundation- Hear

  2. Wow, Luzi sounds incredible!  How do I know you can actually build it?"                 a. We're an experienced team of engineers, designers, and entrepreneurs with excellent track records of building and delivering innovative products. 

  3. What exactly is the patented Luzi Sleep system and how does it help me get to sleep faster? 

    a. The Luzi Sleep system uses a combination of binaural beats, HRTF (head-related transfer function), IRF (induced resonant frequencies) and harmonic theory, applied in such a way as to produce sounds that encourage the human brain to shift into the metabolic maintenance modes associated with healthy sleep. The Luzi lamp audio system was custom designed to be able to reproduce these low frequencies that will help you get to sleep faster than you ever thought possible.

  4. Does Luzi know when I get to sleep and what sleep state I am in?

    a. We have partnered with Fitbit and Luna to monitor your sleep state and pass that information to Luzi so we can learn what helps the most with your sleep. In the near future we plan to offer an optional sleep band that will be much more precise than other alternatives on the market.

  5. Do you have a beta test program for Luzi so I can get my hands on one earlier?

    a. Yes, drop us a line at hello@luzilamp.com and let us know if you are interested! We will have limited numbers of beta units, so please understand we cannot fulfill all requests. And we will ask that those participating in our beta program provide regular feedback at least weekly on their experience and suggestions.

  6. Is Luzi available in stores?

    a. Luzi will be sold only through our Indiegogo campaign link during the first 60-90 days, then available through our website after the Indiegogo campaign is closed. We do expect to offer Luzi via premium online retailers in 2016 and closely followed in select traditional retail stores.

  7. What countries is Luzi currently available in?

    a. Luzi will initially be available in US, and followed shortly thereafter in Europe. We plan to offer additional major countries within 2016, please drop us a line at hello@luzilamp.com if you are from a country outside the US and we will add you to our notification list once available.

  8. What color is Luzi available in initially and when do you plan more options?

    a. Luzi is available in white and black initially. We do plan additional colors soon after our initial launch based on votes by our backers.  Prior to shipping, you will be able to specify which color you prefer.

  9. How does the voice control work on Luzi? 

    a. We use advanced speech recognition software that responds to various commands to control all the typical things you might want Luzi to do for you. Some of the common commands include:
    • “Light On” (or off)
    • “Set Alarm”
    • “Start Sleep Cycle”
    • “Set the Mood” (for your favorite mood music)
    • “Play XXXXX” (play a track from your music library)
    • “Light Dim” (dims 25% at a time for each command)
    • “Light Color XXXXX” (change light to a specific LED color)

  10. How does the stereo mode work if I own two Luzi Lamps?

    a. If you install two Luzi Lamps in the same room (i.e. one on each night stand), the pair will operate in stereo audio mode, providing a much richer listening experience.

  11. If my power goes out, what happens to my clock on Luzi?

    a. Luzi has a battery backup to retain your settings including the clock. So no need to worry whether you will have an alarm if you lose commercial power.

  12. Does Luzi operate autonomously or does it require my smartphone or tablet?

    a. Luzi does not require the use of a smart phone or tablet as it is designed to operate autonomously.

  13. What is the Luzi app for? 

    a. The Luzi app is used mainly for initial setup and configuration of the lamp (more advanced settings). It is not required for basic functionality of the lamp.

  14. What smart phones and tablets is the Luzi App compatible with? 

    a. Apple iPhone 5S or newer and iPad Mini, iPad Air or iPad 4 or higher, all running iOS 8.3 or higher. We also support most Android phones or tablets running Android v4.4 or higher.

  15. What sensors are in Luzi and what are they used for? 

    a. Temperature sensor is used for measuring the ambient temperature of that room. Microphone is used to talk to Luzi and also auto-detect snoring (if activated). Ambient light sensor is used to auto-dim the display

  16. Does Luzi offer Apple Health and Google Fit interface? 

    a. Luzi will have an interface to both Apple Health and Google Fit to consolidate your health data and provide more meaningful personalized recommendations.

  17. For the Luzi wireless charging base, which technologies are supported and which specific devices? 

    a. The wireless charging base will support both Qi and PMA standards. This means it will be compatible with most smart phones available today that support wireless charging including the Nexus 7 and Samsung Galaxy S6 and S6 Edge. Even iPhones using a 3rd party case will work if they adhere to Qi or PMA standards. 

  18. How does the Apple Watch stand work? 

    a. The optional Apple Watch stand attaches to the Luzi wireless charging base. It uses the standard wireless charging cable that comes with the Apple Watch, simply route the cable in the hidden channel and plug the USB into the back of Luzi!

  19. Will Luzi support charging of other devices besides Apple Watch? 

    a. Yes, we will offer other popular smart watch options in the near future! Please drop us a line at hello@luzilamp.com as to what devices you would like to see us support.

  20. When will the wireless charging base and Apple Watch stand be available for sale?

    a. We plan to offer these for sale prior to shipment of Luzi, subject to hitting our stretch goals for this campaign!

  21. Can I personalize the voice on Luzi? 

    a. Yes, Luzi will come with several choices initially and more will be added in the future.

  22. What are the dimensions of Luzi? 

    a. The Luzi Lamp is approximately 5” square and 13” tall.

  23. Is the LED light included? How long does it last? 

    a. Yes, the color LED is included with the Luzi lamp and will offer many years of life (25,000 to 50,000 hrs of use).

  24. What is the warranty on Luzi?

    a. 1 year

  25. What is the cost of shipping?

    a. Luzi will be shipped at no additional charge within the US. Shipments to Western Europe are $69 including insurance.  Shipping costs for other countries will be announced in the future once available.

Luzi, Luzi Lamp, Luzi Sleep, and Relevant Recommendations are Trademarks of Inventjin, LLC

story:
Make it Smart and Simple and make it Now!

How often was your creativity overshadowed by technical complexity? 
Why is instant messaging your friend on a social media site easy but commanding lights in your backyard requires hacking skills?

If you want we are going to change that right here and right now. 
We ask you to invest in us and we will make it happen.

For instance

If you have any device that has buttons that turn things on and off (that operate on 3.3v or else you will need some resistors or diods) then you can simply connect on of the Telepathy's outputs to that that button (don't forget about connecting common GND first) and then simply by typing a www adress in your browser ( lets say 10.0.1.104/set_pin?p1=1 ) you can send signal to that device. It will work with control panels, remotes, LED controllers etc.

If you know basics of HTML and can create basic html form then you can create a simple usable website to control multiple devices in your local network using one or multiple Ethernity modules. 

If you know jQuery or angularJs then you can create state of art application to control your inteligent home.

Moreover, most intelligent home apps (like NODEred) support doing http request of of the box so you can build logic based on signals you read from ( .../get_pin?p3=p3) and write to (.../set_pin?p5=5) the device through Telepathy.

What You Get

Ready to use USB powered WiFi device that works in your home network and:
  • Behaves like a simple web site that receives page requests even from your standard web browser and acts accordingly.
  • Can send 0/1 (0V or 3.3V)  signals to device or read them and return through http, as well as read analog (one port) and send PWM wave(4 ports)
  • Can send/read industry standard TX/RX aka Serial.
  • Can be customized using serial connection (option for power users).
You can connect temperature sensor, control blinds, turn lights on and off, animate LED stripes (depends on type of stripe you have), automate all kinds of sensors and routines.

We have configurate the Telepathy so that if you connect two specific pins with each other before you plug it in to power, then it will start as a wireless network access point so that you can connect to its network and open a page which lets you choose your main home wireless network and provide password so that, next and each time, Telepathy will connect to your home network and work like a www server with web pages (addresses) which you just call  or open in browser to send or read signal through Telepathy.
Telepathy:
  • supports LUA 
  • runs on ESP8266 esp12-f
  • has USB port for power source because it is a worldwide standard. (you choose the charger that fits you best for you particular case wether it is about color, shaper or socket type)
  • uses LM1117 that is said to support any voltage between 5-12V so you can connect it to higher voltage if needed.
  • Has Get_Pin, Set_Pin, Set_PWM, Get_Analog methods.
  • Built in support for humidity sensors reading, programmable LED stripes library (send sequence of colours to individual LEDs in the stripe if it supports it)
  • and more...
Please leave requests for more functions in comments section, and we will try to implement them so that they will be also available out of the box on Telepathy before we start shipping.

What We Need

We need to order parts in bulk to keep the end price reasonable.
By contributing you vote for the future to become reality now, and evey vote show that what we do matters.
We will use this money to:
  • Order electronic parts.
  • Design and manufacture final body.
  • Audit the software.
  • Perform additional reliability tests. 
  • Setup a web site with plugins that you will be able to download to your TELEPATHY at will to extend its functionality.
  • Design and assemble a box.
  • Pack and send the final product to you.

What we have

We already have a working prototype. We are at the final step towards commercialization.

You can also help by...

Spreading the news. Please share, discuss, brainstorm and suggest new ideas. You can make a difference.
Note about shipping:
Please note that the shipping will be performed in order of contributions.
story_txt:
Make it Smart and Simple and make it Now!
 How often was your creativity overshadowed by technical complexity? Why is instant messaging your friend on a social media site easy but commanding lights in your backyard requires hacking skills?
If you want we are going to change that right here and right now. We ask you to invest in us and we will make it happen.

For instance

If you have any device that has buttons that turn things on and off (that operate on 3.3v or else you will need some resistors or diods) then you can simply connect on of the Telepathy's outputs to that that button (don't forget about connecting common GND first) and then simply by typing a www adress in your browser ( lets say 10.0.1.104/set_pin?p1=1 ) you can send signal to that device. It will work with control panels, remotes, LED controllers etc.
If you know basics of HTML and can create basic html form then you can create a simple usable website to control multiple devices in your local network using one or multiple Ethernity modules. 
If you know jQuery or angularJs then you can create state of art application to control your inteligent home.
