story:
The “Internet of Things” is just beginning

Technology experts all agree that within a few years most of us will begin to rely more and more on Smart Automation to control the “Internet of Things” all around us.  From your kitchen appliances to your security system, everything is connected…and all of these smarty pants devices need a boss like MAX that can tell them what to do and when to do it so YOU don’t have to be bothered.

 

What MAX can do

MAX seamlessly integrates all types of devices through a variety of interface connections including HDMI, Bluetooth, WiFi, and Z-Wave. Once MAX is in control of a device you can use our advanced Voice technology and talk to MAX, or use the full featured smart phone app. MAX can perform many tasks at the same time and the more you use it, the more MAX “learns” what you want it to do.

 

Let technology make your life easier for a change

We have all grown up with movies that offer us a glimpse into the future. In Back to the Future we saw Food Re-Hydrators and Hoverboards. We watched as Marty talked to his TV and it displayed multiple things on command. In Marvel’s Ironman, Tony Stark dazzled us with holographic displays and of course “Jarvis”, his own personal Artificial Intelligence system capable of just about anything he asked.

But here we are in 2017 and where are the flying cars and robots we have been waiting so long to see?  It seems like we are coming up short in the FUTURE department.

Until now

Introducing MAX, the world’s only all in one Smart Home Media Control Center with Customizable Voice Command and expansion components that allow you to turn your entire house into your own personal “Jarvis-like” Artificial Intelligence System.  Control your entire home from your TV or Smart Phone (using the MAX app) with voice commands or remote control…and that’s just the beginning.

 

MAX

 

Active App Technology

Our “Active App” technology (Patent Pending) allows multiple devices and apps to display simultaneously on your TV to eliminate the not-so-smart task of switching your TV Input just to use a “smart app” for one minute. Imagine watching your favorite show, or playing a game and you need to see a quick video on YouTube that is related to what you’re doing…simply ask MAX to open YouTube and search for whatever you like. The app opens over top of your current media source, and you can even split the screen to watch side by side. The future is finally here!

 

Open Source and Device Compatibility

MAX is designed to be friendly with almost any device that uses HDMI, Bluetooth, Wifi, or Z-Wave. The software is open source so that many apps can be installed and used to create your own custom experience.  Connect Cable and Satellite receivers, Xbox, Playstation, home audio, laptops, tablets, phones, Smart Home Automation, security systems, and much more!

 

The OSD (On Screen Display)

Easily open the MAX OSD with Voice Command or Remote and toggle thru custom categories with favorite apps and features for a wide variety of readily available functions. Here you can instantly switch between HDMI devices and Apps without ever switching your TV input.

 

Apps and more!

MAX comes preloaded with many of your favorite apps, and you can easily install many other apps that can be used for Active App display, and many other smart home functions.

 

Active App OSD

Many apps can be displayed “over” or along with your current source to avoid clunky switching.

 

Split Screen Capability

Gamers and Sports enthusiasts will love this feature. It’s like Picture and Picture on steroids. You can choose any HDMI device, Wireless Device, or Software App and display them together on your TV. Play a video game while watching a tutorial, or watch Second Screen Experiences Live along with your favorite TV shows. Amazing!

 

Monitor your security cameras anytime

 

See who is at the door with instant notification!

Don’t you hate when you settle in to watch a good movie and suddenly the doorbell rings? With a doorbell camera (sold separately) MAX will instantly show you who is at the door…now you can ignore pesky sales knockers trying to interrupt your fun!

 

Side screen Apps

Certain Apps can be designated to occupy the side of the TV so that you can look up info about favorite actors, some Wikipedia facts or even a live Twitter feed during a show!

 

For all the Cord Cutters out there…

MAX has an Antenna input and a full featured TV Channel Guide for all of your OTA (Over the Air) channels. Simply plug in your HD Antenna (sold separately) and let MAX detect everything in your area. Bye-Bye cable bill!

 

Smart Home just got a heck of a lot smarter

Now you can control everything in your house, from the TV Command center or the phone app. Imagine the possibilities!

Here are just a few things you can do with smart hardware (sold separately)

  • Smart Lighting
  • Front Door Lock
  • Doorbell Cams
  • Garage Door
  • Thermostat Control
  • Window Blinds and Curtains
  • Multi-room Audio
  • Appliances
  • Security cameras
  • And more!

 

Advanced Voice Command Technology

Unlike some of the other voice command products out there, MAX is completely customizable and will respond to whatever name you teach it. Additionally, MAX will listen to multiple commands like “Open YouTube, Search for How to Play Guitar”. When finished you can say “Thank you” or just say nothing and the voice command function will turn itself off after a few seconds.

NOTE: MAX is compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Home, and also compatible with a wide range of Smart Home products that operate using WiFi, Bluetooth, and Z-Wave. (ZigBee not supported)

 

Expand the power of Voice Commands!

We realize that much like Alexa and Google Home, MAX cannot hear you talk to it from every room in the house. For this reason we have developed a Voice Command addon component (sold separately) to give your house the true “Tony Stark” experience. Just plug a Voice addon into any standard wall outlet and MAX will discover it. Now you can give commands from anywhere in the house!

 

MAX Features and Functions

  • HDMI Devices (4 Inputs, 1 Output)
  • Bluetooth
  • WiFi
  • High Speed USB (2) for External Drives/ Stored Media
  • Ethernet Port
  • Z-Wave for Smart Home Automation Devices
  • OTA (Over the Air) HD Antenna Input
  • OTA Channel Guide Display
  • Active App Technology (Patent Pending)
  • Voice Command (Customizable)
  • Open Source Software
  • Pre-installed Apps
  • Easy to install Apps from providers
  • Smart Home Control Center (for compatible products sold separate)
  • Remote Control Included
  • Voice Command Expansion Module (sold separate)
  • Split Screen Functionality (Multi layered display)
  • Notification System (for selected Apps and Security features)
  • Compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Home

 

Timeline: The Road to Success

Our Story

Power Digital Media is a small group of creative people dedicated to bringing inspired ideas to life. Collectively we have spent many years working in various areas of technology, software, and engineering. 

One day we were having lunch and talking about the usual "I wish they would hurry up and invent..." type of things when it occurred to us that we should get out there and help the future of technology instead of waiting for it to happen.

Now we are on the way to releasing a fantastic product and with the help of the Indiegogo community we will have many more inspiring and creative ideas to come.

Why did we choose Indiegogo?

Of all the ways we could have chosen to raise funds for MAX, we were most excited about the prospect of crowdfunding. The Indiegogo community is known for finding the ideas that truly inspire and backing them with great passion. We love the idea of getting direct feedback from our backers and look forward to hearing what you have to say about MAX.

What will we use the funding for?

Right now we need funding to complete our MAX prototype and source out a manufacturer capable of delivering a high quality product at a fair price. Once the prototype is complete we will be launching a BETA Phase and anyone that chooses the BETA Perk will be a part of the first people to use MAX at home and give us feedback.

Appreciation

We would like to thank everyone in the Indiegogo community for considering MAX as an investment worthy project. Even if you are unable to contribute financially at this time, please help us to get the word out on Social Media.

story:
Meet SureKey. It’s the world’s first add-on for your keys that gives you peace of mind that your house is safe.




“Did I lock the door?” 30% people wonder after they leave home. This is a known short-term memory problem resulting from the automation of everyday activities. You can go back and check your lock or save your time and increase your confidence with SureKey. 

SureKey was successfully funded on Kickstarter by 323 Backers !

 

 

 

 

 

 

To recap – SmartLocks make life easier, but they cost more to buy, have  inherent security risks, and you still need a physical key and have to  replace the battery often. SureKey doesn’t send your lock status  anywhere, so you don’t need to worry that a hacker could track you to  rob your home. 

 



 

 




 

Thanks to the advanced MEMS (microelectromechanical system) sensor,  SureKey tracks every movement of your key, no matter how small, in 3D by  accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer.  Once you put in your key  in the lock, the MEMS sensor wakes up the processor to analyze  movement.  No random motion can precisely repeat a key rotation in a  lock, so there is no risk of an incorrect status.

 

 
When you want to check the current status, you just need to look at the  device. The MEMS sends a notification to the processor that the position  was changed to horizontal relating to the ground or was quickly  rotated, indicated locked or unlocked. 
 
 

 


 

During our last holiday, we had to leave at 3 a.m. to catch our  flight. While waiting at the airport, went ran through our checklist.  “Did I definitely lock the door?” Uh oh. I couldn’t call a friend  because it was 5 a.m.

 

 

(Robert) I started researching potential lock  solutions and was surprised and disappointed to discover how easy it is  to hack SmartLocks. (I think advanced systems are easier to hack.) I  believe in the KISS rule - Keep It Simple, Stupid.

That helped me  determine the ideal solution. We began the fun part of building a small,  intelligent piece of technology to solve the global problem of  automation of daily activities, and SureKey was born.

 

 From the left: Matthew, Isabel, Rob and Radoslaw.

 


 


 

 

 

 

The device is mass production ready. Thanks to the simple and reliable  design, we can make it really affordable and deliver it soon. Upon  successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates on this page  or our social media. The first shipping will be in January 2019. Worldwide shipping available. 

 

Press Kit 

If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at surekey.io

We are looking for investors, international distributors and  retailers. You are more than welcome to contact us at contact@surekey.io

 

 

While there are always risks and challenges with creating and delivering a brand new product, we've minimized both by having the entire process, from production to delivery, already set and arranged.

We have already signed agreements with key suppliers and manufacturers, and our prototype has been finalized. We have the required technical expertise when it comes to the consumer electronics market. In the last seven years, we have developed, manufactured, and sold a wide range of electronics devices worldwide. We've got some experience under our belts.

All of this, along with our strategic partnerships with experienced crowdfunding and fulfillment experts leaves little room for error and ensures a very quick delivery.

story:
About Boo

Hi, thank you so much for stopping by! My name is David and I am the founder of Boo Delivery. I am a graphic designer by trade and some of my non-profit works have been for the Jane Goodall Institute. I am now setting out to create my own brand, a tree-free alternative to traditional toilet paper.

My product Boo, is a new subscription-based tree-free toilet paper alternative that I believe will change your life and could make a significant impact on the environment for the better. I recently discovered tree-free toilet paper products at my local grocery store and could honestly not notice the difference. The problem was, it was super overpriced and the company did not do anything for any cause. I'm setting out to not only produce an affordable tree-free toilet paper but, to also give back at the same time. I believe that supporting bamboo-based products is a small switch that could make a HUGE difference on the environment. Paper is out, Bamboo is in.

A Next-Generation Fiber.

It can take up to 20-30 years for a normal tree to reach full maturity, then it is cut down to make virgin pulp tissue. Boo is tree-free, to begin with. The organic bamboo pulp used to make Boo is the best alternative because it grows 20 times faster than trees, and does not need to be re-planted after every harvest.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $20,000 to make Boo a reality. This will cover our production costs, manufacturing shipping and storage and marketing of the Boo product for its first run.

  • Your contributions to Boo will go to finalizing first orders and getting it to our first customers.
  • $15 will get you a pack of Boo!
  • I do not have much money but if we do not reach the milestone, I plan to personally put up the remaining start-up costs towards making Boo a reality. In the worst case, I will refund 100% donations.

The Impact

We plan at the start to pledge to give back to threatened ecosystems by 5% sales of every pack of toilet paper sold to 1% for the Planet, American Forests Foundation, and Conservation International. We have this infrastructure already set up on our website. To make this happen we need to get up and running!

  • Learn more about our pledge to give back to these non-profit organizations.
  • Boo is 100% ecologically biodegradable, sustainable and septic-safe. It's really the perfect fiber.
  • Boo's fulfillment center offsets the environmental impact of its warehouse guaranteeing each shipment is 95% carbon neutral. Learn more here.
  • Know you are doing good by using Boo.

Risks & Challenges

  • In full transparency, we are trying to cover our start-up costs for our initial run of toilet-paper. We would love your help in any way. 
  • In the worst case, we will refund 100% donations.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • It would be so, so, so, amazing to spread any noise about Boo over social networks. We would be so grateful for any contributions regardless of how small.
  • Our website is https://www.boodelivery.com and Instagram is @boodelivery . Please like and follow!
story_txt:
About Boo
Hi, thank you so much for stopping by! My name is David and I am the founder of Boo Delivery. I am a graphic designer by trade and some of my non-profit works have been for the Jane Goodall Institute. I am now setting out to create my own brand, a tree-free alternative to traditional toilet paper.
My product Boo, is a new subscription-based tree-free toilet paper alternative that I believe will change your life and could make a significant impact on the environment for the better. I recently discovered tree-free toilet paper products at my local grocery store and could honestly not notice the difference. The problem was, it was super overpriced and the company did not do anything for any cause. I'm setting out to not only produce an affordable tree-free toilet paper but, to also give back at the same time. I believe that supporting bamboo-based products is a small switch that could make a HUGE difference on the environment. Paper is out, Bamboo is in.

A Next-Generation Fiber.
It can take up to 20-30 years for a normal tree to reach full maturity, then it is cut down to make virgin pulp tissue. Boo is tree-free, to begin with. The organic bamboo pulp used to make Boo is the best alternative because it grows 20 times faster than trees, and does not need to be re-planted after every harvest.
What We Need & What You Get

We need $20,000 to make Boo a reality. This will cover our production costs, manufacturing shipping and storage and marketing of the Boo product for its first run.

Your contributions to Boo will go to finalizing first orders and getting it to our first customers.
$15 will get you a pack of Boo!
I do not have much money but if we do not reach the milestone, I plan to personally put up the remaining start-up costs towards making Boo a reality. In the worst case, I will refund 100% donations.



The Impact
We plan at the start to pledge to give back to threatened ecosystems by 5% sales of every pack of toilet paper sold to 1% for the Planet, American Forests Foundation, and Conservation International. We have this infrastructure already set up on our website. To make this happen we need to get up and running!

Learn more about our pledge to give back to these non-profit organizations.
Boo is 100% ecologically biodegradable, sustainable and septic-safe. It's really the perfect fiber.
Boo's fulfillment center offsets the environmental impact of its warehouse guaranteeing each shipment is 95% carbon neutral. Learn more here.
Know you are doing good by using Boo.


Risks & Challenges

In full transparency, we are trying to cover our start-up costs for our initial run of toilet-paper. We would love your help in any way. 
In the worst case, we will refund 100% donations.


Other Ways You Can Help

It would be so, so, so, amazing to spread any noise about Boo over social networks. We would be so grateful for any contributions regardless of how small.
Our website is https://www.boodelivery.com and Instagram is @boodelivery . Please like and follow!

story:
Primary Objective

  • JaduPC: an initiative to improve the lives of some, if not millions and billions.

  • JaduPC is primarily designed for the people in the rural and semi urban people in developing countries. JaduPC’s goal is to connect all humanity to internet with proper contextual knowledge, 

  • Cheapest EASY TO USE Computer in the World (starting from $50) 

 

JaduPC in Media 

 

P Alo bit.ly/JaduPC-news1

P Alo English: http://bit.ly/PAlo-ENG  

Daily Sun: http://bit.ly/jpcSUN 

 

 

JaduPC White Paper: bit.ly/JaduPC-wp  

 

JaduPC Pre-Order:  bit.ly/jpcorder 

 

 

Possible Impact JaduPC will have in the rural societies: 

JaduPC has the potential to solve 9 UN SDGs, which pretty much covers a lot of problems JaduPC can solve.  

1. Industry and Innovation

2. Quality Education

3. Good health

4 and 5. Gender Inequalities and also Gender Equalities

6. Decent Woe force and Economy Growth

7. Sustainable Cities and Communities

8. Clean Energy

9. No Poverty

- everything illustrated with Storyboards in our website: www,jadupc.com (will be added soon)
meanwhile Google Photos link: 
 

  • JaduPC and JaduOS: 

    - a custom mini computer with Custom OS - based on Linux and Android.

    -     functional prototype is ready for piloting 

    - We are ready for for mass production.

    - Our Custom OS in constantly improving. JaduPC and JaduOS is in Patent Penting status in UK, UK, India, China Bangladesh. 


    NEED Support for Piloting and bring this awesome product into the market. 
    All of he fund will be utilized for JaduPC - we will even maintain an open book for funders to see how their money is directly improving a family, some lives.
     

  • Current Status: 

    - Great response from Bangladesh Market based on the prototype. 

    - Had a recent China trip to identify the correct manufacturer. 

    - Need to expand JaduPC team and operational activities. 

    - Hoping to initial piloting in 3-4 rural and semi urban areas of Bangladesh. 

    - Upon successful piloting in Bangladesh, spread all over Bangladesh - next target Africa and other Asian Countries.

     

  • Challenges Ahead: 

  • Fund Raising

  • Finding the best technology and partners from China and in Bangladesh. 
     

  • Finding the best distribution channels for mass sales. 

  •  Parenting with the right companies

  • Team scale-up for Iterative JaduPC and JaduOS development

    Risks 

    Even if a big player tries to come to the market with a similar product. High paid employees, suited, corporate goons - can never mix with an average rural user as we will be. Thus we will know their needs and goals better. And keep on improving the product as per user needs. We will always be ahead of the game. 

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    - Please suggest how to improve this pages,

    - Please critique 

    - Please Advise 
     
    Feel free to visit our FB page: fb.com/jadupc - for more content.  

    Feel free to drop us a line say hello@jadupc.com - how you may wish to help. 
     
    Cheers,

    Masrur Hannan,
    Founder, JaduPC,

    mh@jadupc.com

story:
Short Summary

Hello, My name is Donatas. For the last few years I have come to UK for better life, been working as a truck driver in the UK. But it never gave me the inner joy. From an early age, I have enjoyed woodworking and joinery.

About 2 months ago I went back to Lithuania and started making oak and epoxy resin tables and chairs. At the moment I only produce for the local market and well-known customers, everyone is fascinated with my products. However, I hope to find overseas partners who can show and sell my products. For products I use natural aged and dried oak, chestnut, apple wood. I also compose with moss, acorns, coins and anything else you can come up with. I am completely committed to the fantasy of my clients and try to fulfill their wishes (last my work is resin table and chairs with top from beer corks). 

I have skills,I have opportunity, I love what I do, I put all my heart in my products.

 

What I Need:

Now I do almost everything by hand, with extra tools and machinery allow me to do my beloved job faster. My fundraising goal is calculated to cover tools to take full advantage of this unique opportunity. It includes the following:

  • Auto feed planner machine
  • Wood cutting machine

  • dust collection system

  • workshop equipment

PERKS!

Receive a personalized thank you and get extra discount for future purchases on any contribution of $10 or more (U will get discount code personally)!

For $100 U will get 10% discount for future contracts and small cutting board(also free shipping via registered post) .

For $150 U will get 10% discount for future contracts and small and medium cutting board, also U can choose your color of resin (also free shipping via registered post) .

for $250 U will get 10% discount for future contracts and small, medium and big cutting board, also U can choose your color of resin and shape of boards (also free shipping via registered post).

 

For $500 U will get small triangle cofee table and choose color and wood (oak, chestnut, apple tree).

 

For $1000 U will get coffe table (U choose size, color, shape, and wood) and production preference.

The Impact

Reaching this goal will give me time to intensively develop my craft and work in a way I have not been afforded until now, and one I don't know if or when I can recreate. My creative process and perspective are being enriched more by this experience than any current alternative. That enrichment will ultimately express itself through my work, how I show-up in this world. Also I hope to find a partner who can distribute this beauty.

The good news is all challenges are all manageable, just a bit slower to work through than I would like. Additionally, they are enhancing my problem-solving skills and depth of experience.

story:
Why this idea?

Hi, we'd like to welcome you to our page, thank you for considering contributing to our campaign.

So, how did this idea of ours come up? Well, it's quite literally a shower thought.
We all know the feeling when during shower time your lost hair gets all wet, tangled, sticky and sticks to your hands. There aren't many options you got, basically you either smear it on the tiles (If you think about it, it's a bit 'Eww')

...or you just wash it off and later collect it from the drain protector if you have one (Which is way more 'Ewwww').

 

From now on you have a better option!

We have designed the HairHanger in a way that allows you to simply run your fingers through it and at the end of your shower just simply discard the tangly hair. (Due to the fact that the hair spends a few minutes drying on the HairHanger, the hair becomes easily disposable). Not only is it more sanitary, its design, small size, and colour choices allow you to fit it into your bathroom interior. In addition to being handy, it can be a cheerful patch of colour to your bathroom.

 

How we got here and what the future holds

 

What We Need & What You Get

Of course, an idea isn't worth much without implementation - and that's where you, the contributors come in.

We have successfully managed to create the design with the help of good friends and engineers, we found the perfect manufacturer, the distributor, but this is as far as we can get without financial support. So far all the contributions - apart from some legal fees - were the courtesy of fellow university students. But in order to be able to mass-produce our product and get it to your doorstep at a low price, we need quite a large minimum order.

So how can you help us? Obviously, by pre-ordering the HairHanger for yourself, your family (or your significant other, we all know you are bothered by all that hair left around). If you cannot contribute, we understand, however if you think this is a cool idea you can help us make it happen just by spreading the word. We would love you to join the campaign and help us make the HairHanger become a reality!

The manufacturing can only begin if the contributions reach the set target. By Indiegogo's policy you carry no risk, it's all on us.

You can choose from the colours below to make sure it matches your bathroom's design:
All White - Suits most of the bathrooms, All Black - If you want something dark
Pink - Satisfy your inner princess, Turquoise - Because why not?
(The following pictures are early renders)

 

Meet the inventors

We are Laura and Daniel, two young students from Budapest, studying at the universities of Oxford and ELTE, respectively. We both have long hair, so we know the struggle. One day during shower time in the communal shower of the campus, this idea emerged and we both knew immediately that this idea was worth pursuing. After a few months of planning, consulting with friends, engineers and designers, finding the right manufacturer we finally came to the start of the Indiegogo campaign. We knew that we don't have the financial background to do this on our own, so we decided to turn to the community. We trust that if this idea is worthy to be completed we will have your support.

Thank you very much in advance!

Laura and Daniel

If you are interested in ordering a larger amount or you are a prospective wholesaler, or you have any other business related inquires, please contact us at hairhanger@gmail.com!

 

Legal disclaimer: Patent Pending. The above seen renders and prototypes are subject to slight change in future.

story:
CAT TREE consists of a climbing surface and nano suction cups that together create a grip that has been tested and can withstand cats up to 6kg (13lbs).

It takes only seconds to install, doesn't leave any marks and can be applied onto any flat, smooth and clean surface but will have the best grip and is recommended to be used on the metal, plastic, glass, and lacquered wood.


CAT TREE consists of sections that put together create the climbing surface. Add as many as you want! One sections' dimensions are 19 cm x 30 cm x 0,5 cm.


To fit in your interior design CAT TREE is available in 6 colors: blue, green, red, purple, grey and white.

 

Project timeline

Raising the funds will allow me to start production on a daily basis and hopefully will help my second goal - moving to the countryside. To produce larger amounts I need to raise 4000$ for materials and tools. 
 

Thanks to my cat

I came up with the CAT TREE only because of my cat Pamela who is sooo active that I constantly need to come up with new games and activities for her.

My goal is to help other cat owners who live in the city center and want to improve their cats daily activities but have no option of letting their cat out.


Please share if you like this idea. Meow!

story:
We did our homework. We know what is important for your safety and security.

  • Naber successfully launched the Naber - Neighborhood watch app which is used by thousands of users in multiple neighborhoods to create safer neighborhoods.
  • Now with a popular demand for cameras we added innovation to the boring traditional camera technology. We are looking to bring better security to your neighborhoods with our advanced PATENTED technologies of artificial  intelligence to enhance your identity and security at affordable prices

 

 

  • By contributing to this campaign, you could help create better and safer neighborhoods.  Integrating these devices into our NABER - Neighborhood watch app helps better collaboration and neighborhood watch. The best way to protect your community is by sharing and watching out for each other.

 

  • Comparative study and benefits

     

 

WIFI ENABLED

  • VIDEO DOOR LOCK
  • DRIVEWAY CAMERA

STORAGE

  • Local storage on hub -SD card or external drive
  • Free CLOUD storage for first 3 months
  • Use SD card storage for local recordings.

BATTERY LIFE

  •  Lithium based batteries provide extended life
  •  Additional battery back available or request.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to raise $150,000 dollars to help us build the product.
  • Be an early bird and get huge discounts. We have limited quantities.
  • If we don't reach our goal, we plan to return your funds.

The Impact

  • Naber's vision started when we wanted to make our neighborhoods safer by launching the Naber App, because we found the  need to build a better and secure neighborhood. These devices help secure your home and your neighborhood by enabling you to share incidents related to crime and suspicious activity with your neighbors. Let us make a difference by watching out for each other with the help of these devices.
  • Naber's team built and launched a successful neighborhood watch app platform a few months back which has reached hands of 5000+ users and has successfully engaged multiple neighborhoods. It is gaining great traction Please checkout  https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/naber-neighborh...
  • Now we want to take this to the next level by helping our neighborhoods with devices that can take your security to an advanced level.

Risks & Challenges

  • The founding team are computer engineers and have exposure to both hardware and software. The team members have worked long hours to develop a prototype. However we foresee some technical and some operational challenges at this time
  • We already have a team that has a strong handle on the technical challenges. The operational issues can be solved by adopting to process optimization

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Make some noise for us if you can. First influencers are the core to help spread the word and encourage to contribute to the campaign.
  • You can do so by using the Indiegogo share tools, facebook, twitter, youtube and google.

story:
Roll and store

All you have to do is to roll your belt and put it on TomBelt. Simple. This is how your precious belt will not lose its shape and will not get damaged due to improper storage. TomBelt is truly the best way to organize your belts!

 

Take advantage of the unused space 

By using TomBelt you can take advantage of the unused space in your wardrobe and make sure that your belts are not lying around or dropping from wardrobe pole anymore.

 

Organize also other accessories

Primarily designed for belts, TomBelt can also be used for storage of other items that fit on. For instance a tie, a scarf or a neckless or ... something else? You decide!

 

Timeless design and finest materials

We took a great care of choosing the best materials for TomBelt. The body of TomBelt is made of hardwood and coated with oil. Magnetic button and leather strap make sure that your belt stays on TomBelt.

 

Different types of high quality hardwood available

Currently there are available TomBelts made of nut and maple wood. More wood types coming!

 

TomBelt is handmade

Each TomBelt is unique since the assembly of TomBelt requires many handmade steps.

 

TomBelt is easily installed

Thanks to the double-sided tape is TomBelt easily attached onto desired place. Without drilling or hard work. Furthermore, TomBelt can also be problem-free removed and, if desired, placed to some other spot.

 

TomBelt timeline

Delivery guaranteed

As soon as our goal is reached, we will start the preparations for first production batch. We are personally guaranteeing the delivery of every TomBelt ordered.

 

How the story of TomBelt began

When I was living in a student dorm and in smaller apartments there was always a lack of space for a proper storage of clothes and accessories. My belts were lying and hanging literally everywhere. I have couple of them and most of them are leather made. Everyone who owns a leather belt knows that it loses its proper shape and the surface starts to crack if not stored properly.

I searched the Internet how to store my belts but no solution was good enough. Drawers with dividers take too much space and are not suitable for every wardrobe. There are many hangers for belts on the market, but most of them will tilt on one side if you do not maintain a balance. My biggest problem with hangers was that I could not store my favorite type of belts – belts with a pin buckle. 

Therefore, I started designing a solution that meets all needs. After several prototypes the TomBelt was born.


 

Why do we need backers

We would like to invite you to back our project and get your own high quality TomBelt delivered to your doorstep. Your support will allow us to start the first production batch and assure further improvements. 

 

Other ways you can help

Your financial support is welcome but your hearty support is even more important!

Please spread the word out and make all the noise you can about this campaign!

Use the Indiegogo share tools! Use Facebook! Send mails to all your friends!
story_txt:
Roll and store
All you have to do is to roll your belt and put it on TomBelt. Simple. This is how your precious belt will not lose its shape and will not get damaged due to improper storage. TomBelt is truly the best way to organize your belts!

 
Take advantage of the unused space 
By using TomBelt you can take advantage of the unused space in your wardrobe and make sure that your belts are not lying around or dropping from wardrobe pole anymore.

 
Organize also other accessories
Primarily designed for belts, TomBelt can also be used for storage of other items that fit on. For instance a tie, a scarf or a neckless or ... something else? You decide!

 
Timeless design and finest materials
We took a great care of choosing the best materials for TomBelt. The body of TomBelt is made of hardwood and coated with oil. Magnetic button and leather strap make sure that your belt stays on TomBelt.

 
Different types of high quality hardwood available
Currently there are available TomBelts made of nut and maple wood. More wood types coming!

 
TomBelt is handmade
Each TomBelt is unique since the assembly of TomBelt requires many handmade steps. 
 
TomBelt is easily installed
Thanks to the double-sided tape is TomBelt easily attached onto desired place. Without drilling or hard work. Furthermore, TomBelt can also be problem-free removed and, if desired, placed to some other spot.

 
TomBelt timeline

Delivery guaranteed
As soon as our goal is reached, we will start the preparations for first production batch. We are personally guaranteeing the delivery of every TomBelt ordered.
 
How the story of TomBelt began
When I was living in a student dorm and in smaller apartments there was always a lack of space for a proper storage of clothes and accessories. My belts were lying and hanging literally everywhere. I have couple of them and most of them are leather made. Everyone who owns a leather belt knows that it loses its proper shape and the surface starts to crack if not stored properly.
I searched the Internet how to store my belts but no solution was good enough. Drawers with dividers take too much space and are not suitable for every wardrobe. There are many hangers for belts on the market, but most of them will tilt on one side if you do not maintain a balance. My biggest problem with hangers was that I could not store my favorite type of belts – belts with a pin buckle. 
Therefore, I started designing a solution that meets all needs. After several prototypes the TomBelt was born.
 
Why do we need backers
We would like to invite you to back our project and get your own high quality TomBelt delivered to your doorstep. Your support will allow us to start the first production batch and assure further improvements. 
 
Other ways you can help
Your financial support is welcome but your hearty support is even more important!
Please spread the word out and make all the noise you can about this campaign!
Use the Indiegogo share tools! Use Facebook! Send mails to all your friends!

story:
I'm 40 years old man and I haven't made a single Pancake. My wife thinks that no one cares if I can make a pancake and I want to prove her wrong. Fellow men - HELP ME!

I want to make perfect Pancakes and surprise my family with homemade breakfast.

Goals:

  • $5 I might read a Pancake recipe
  • $10 I'll get a Pancake flipper thing
  • $30 I'll buy a proper Pancake pan (not really sure how much it costs)
  • $40 First try - I'll make a video of me trying and probably failing miserably.
  • $50 I'll keep trying and trying until I'll succeed and make at least one Pancake. Than I will eat that pancake. Just to be sure that it is delicious.
  • $60 Pancake breakfast - SUCCESS!
  • $75 Pancake party at my place!
  • $100 I will try a different recipe
Lets prove that man who never cooked can create something special and more complicated than a tea.
 

Risks & Challenges

I might not learn how to make amazing pancakes but I'll do my best. I'm not a quitter.

And that's all.

story:
We think that you'll agree with us, CarryMaster is simply a great product! Not only for the benefits it provides you, but also the environment. Now, like never before, you can get in and out of the shops quicker and with less fuss, while leaving a positive impact on the environment. Having your own personal shopper also means no longer worrying about the germs and possible contamination of your food due to the publicly used shopping cart. 

With CarryMaster there are: 

  • No more plastic bags - meaning less plastic pollution. 
  • No more short drives to the shops - meaning less carbon pollution.
  • No parking challenges - meaning less stress.
  • AND you get some exercise while you shop!

Checkout (with) the CarryMaster...

So what is it?

The CarryMaster is a premium three-wheeled, multi-terrain trolley. Manufactured with high quality components such as high grade anodised aluminium and plastic elements with glass filled nylon for durability. It's strong and built to last.

It has been painstakingly designed over a number of years, with ease of use and convenience for the user in mind. The result is a highly manoeuvrable and collapsible shopping cart, that even has a coffee cup holder! 

It has the ability to carry four reusable saddle bags that are detachable and have a carry capacity of up to 32kgs or 70lbs. These 4 detachable, durable saddle bags each have a cover flap protecting the contents from rain and direct sunlight and the bags are especially designed to be used at the supermarket checkout for easy packing. If needed, the hardware can be removed from the bags to be washed.

The combination of the three all-terrain wheels and the T shaped handle bar style (which also has provision for a drink bottle) makes controlling and manoeuvring the fully loaded CarryMaster very easy for everyone... Young and old.

CarryMaster is great for

  • High rise apartment dwellers without a car
  • Elderly people who want their independence
  • People reliant on public transport

Specifications

  • CarryMaster is made of high grade anodised aluminium
  • All plastic components are glass filled nylon
  • 4 x heavy duty & machine washable bags
  • Non-marking rubber tyres
  • Two rear wheels are fitted with independent brakes to ensure trolley remains fixed in position when … loading or unloading
  • Front wheel stabiliser ensures the CarryMaster will not tip over

Dimensions

Length: 98cm | 38.6"
Height: 37cm  | 14.6"
Width: 41cm | 16.1"
Weight: 7kgs | 15.4lbs (folded)

Other Applications

  • Don’t just use your CarryMaster at the supermarket. It has many other uses:
  • At BBQs and family picnics
  • At various sporting clubs for moving equipment
  • In caravans when travelling around 
  • In offices of lawyers, accountants and other organisations to deliver documents to various departments
  • At the marina to help take items to your boat or yacht
  • Deliver catalogues or marketing materials to households
  • Move materials or parts around factories - 
  • ......The possibilities are endless

Benefits

Better for your fitness

"Incidental exercise (the exercise we get during daily activities) is the key to offsetting 'kilo creep' and can lead to a surprising fitness improvement. This "little by little" cumulative effect is the key to incidental exercise as walking burns about eight kilojoules a minute." 
Michelle Bridges from the Biggest Loser http://www.smh.com.au/lifestyle/diet-and-fitness/fitness-the-easy-way-20110904-1jsy5.html  

Experts suggest walking 6,000 steps a day to improve health and 10,000 steps a day to lose weight as brisk walking helps reduce body fat, lower blood pressure, and increase high-density lipoprotein. Weil, Richard, MEd, CED. “Walking.” MedicineNet. Accessed: December 26, 2012 and Galloway, Jeff. Walking: The Complete Book. New York, NY: Meyer & Meyer Verlag, 2005

Great for the environment

Annually approximately 500 billion plastic bags are used worldwide. More than one million bags are used every minute. http://www.ecowatch.com/22-facts-about-plastic-pollution-and-10-things-we-can-do-about-it-1881885971.html  

Car trips of under a mile add up to about 10 billion miles per year, according to the 2009 U.S. National Household Transportation Survey (NHTS).2 If we all chose to power half of these short trips with our feet instead of petroleum - That’s like taking about 400,000 cars off the road each year. https://www.epa.gov/greenvehicles/what-if-we-ke... 

Good for your health

 “Grocery store shopping cart handles have more germs than public restrooms, making them one of the worst public places for germs, according to researchers.” 
http://abcnews.go.com/GMA/OnCall/story?id=2859060

Pack your shopping how you want to... 

The CarryMaster has four heavy-duty shopping bags. Spread your shopping out to maximise balance and minimise squashing.  Pack your groceries the way you want so unpacking when you get home is easier.

Folded and Ready to Store...

When collapsed the CarryMaster can be easily stored away. It becomes less than a metre in length and is no wider than the handlebar. Store it in a cupboard or under a bed.

Safety comes first...

The make up in design with three wheels provides stability.  The two rear wheels are fitted with independent brakes to ensure the trolley remains fixed in position when loading or unloading. Tyres are non marking rubber for easy use on all surfaces without leaving wheel marks.  Not recommended for use in sand or mud.

The Stabilizer  

When in use the CarryMaster stabiliser ensures the CarryMaster will not tip over.  Located on the front wheel of the CarryMaster, simply push the stabiliser down to activate. 

Carry heavy items with ease

At the back of the CarryMaster, there are 2 fold-able support bars to carry heavy items like boxes, cases of beer/water etc. 

Stop using plastic bags

It is estimated that worldwide, shoppers are using approximately 500 billion single-use plastic bags every year. Of those, 13,000 to 15,000 are dumped into our oceans every day. The reason we are so reliant on plastic bags is that they are just so easy to use. CarryMaster solves that problem, by actually making it easier to switch to a reusable option.

About the Inventors 

Keith and Victor came together to create the CarryMaster.  Both from Melbourne, Australia they met while Victor was a masseuse and Keith had cronic back pain.  Then over many years they created The CarryMaster.  

Both from diverse backgrounds and with a common passion for Australian Football Rules they both saw a need for a simpler way to do grocery shopping and created a solution!   Today Keith McArthur is a Builder who loves to fish and supports Essendon in the AFL while Vic has developed a reputation to “Fix” anything that’s broken (from bodies to buildings) and they call him “Mr Fix it”.  He follows the AFL with a passion and his favourite football team is Carlton. Vic used to be a sports masseur for the AFL.

story:
Short Summary

Box file shape scratch board for cats. Cats need to sharpen their claws regularly. To prevent they scratch on furniture, you need scratch pad. 

  • Box file shape for easy storage on shelf.
  • Natural wood with soft edge and round corners for safety.
  • Interchangeable scratch mat for long term use and better for the environment.

 

I am a product designer from Hong Kong, i would like to bring eco-friendly, durable and creative product to live

Environmental Commitment


Scratch file is a projects that concern about the Reusability and recyclability, we have interchangeable scratch mat for long term use and also reuse. And we choose environmentally friendly packaging. Hope our little steps can help our earth a better planet.
The file is made by wood and the mat fabrics, the packaging is using uncoated paper. The whole product we refuse to use plastics.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • My goal is looking for HKD 15000 for the moulding and manufacturing process

  • Pledge HK$ 200 or more
    Single Early Bird
    Get one early bird product which later will cost you HKD300, a 35% off deal
    contains 5 supplementary mat and a main body set
    September 2020
    SHIPS TO Anywhere in the world

Risks & Challenges

We are concerning the copy cat issue if we publish it online prior than the manufacture, and being stolen by someone else.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please share the idea to friends if they need one !

story:
My name is Tomasz Gawron, I'm an inventor of the world's first antiallergic cat litter. 

 

"Naturally Non Allergic" is a series of absolutely new generation product with patented formula. This litter is made from natural ingredients like plant material- sunflower shells. Sunflower shells does not contain protein that maybe cousing allergies in pets and people. All litter ingredients used in the production process have food certificates. We created and patented this revolutionary "Naturally Non Allergic" litter because we heard the needs of pets' owners, looking for the best natural, organic products which are more effective than those avalible on the market in line with the current awareness of being eco.

 

Key Benefits of "Naturally Non Allergic":

  1. Non allergic;
  2. Compostable;
  3. Extreme economical;
  4. Dust free;
  5. Quick and extreme effective odour elimination;
  6. Quick clumping;
  7. 100% organic ingridients with no artificial additivies;
  8. Biodegradable;
  9. Easy to scoop and flushable;
  10. Lightweight;
  11. The product has no negative effects if consumed;
  12. Organic with no artificial additives (pure, natural product).

 

Patent and laboratory work on this brilliant cat litter has been completed and the time has come to start production.

I collect for the purchase of the production line, creating a place for production and all the necessary materials to start production.

 

I do it the same way as I did eight years ago when I started working on this project.

I didn't think it would turn out to be such a brilliant cat litter.

 

This cat litter is made of 100% plant fibers, including sunflower shells and it holds all the best features of current cat litters. “Naturally Non Allergic" is a series of absolutely new generation  product with patented formula. This litter is made from natural  ingredients like plant material- sunflower shells. Sunflower shells does  not contain protein that maybe cousing allergies in pets and people.

 

“Naturally Non  Allergic" meets the expectations of all those who attach importance to  ecology. We have created a product from natural, naturally occurring on  our planet and completely renewable and biodegradable raw material. Our  litter is created from sunflower shells formed in the production of  sunflower oil and grains for human consumption. You do not have to cut  down trees or use artificial ingredients to obtain the raw material  needs for that product.

 

One of the biggest advantages of  “Naturally Non Allergic" litter is its  unrivaled ability to absorb unpleasant odors. Compared to other litter  from leading brands, sunflower shells litter is the best in absorbing  and retaining the smell of cat urine. Tests prove this

 

New generation of Cat Litter!

“Naturally Non Allergic” is a series of absolutely new generation product with patented formula. This litter is made from natural ingredients like plant material- sunflower shells. Sunflower shells does not contain protein that maybe cousing allergies in pets and people. All litter ingredients used in the production process have food certificates. We created and patented this revolutionary “Naturally Non Allergic” litter because we heard the needs of pets’ owners, looking for the best natural, organic products which are more effective than those avalible on the market in line with the current awareness of being eco.

 

“Naturally Non Allergic” meets the expectations of all those who attach importance to ecology. We have created a product from natural, naturally occurring on our planet and completely renewable and biodegradable raw material. Our litter is created from sunflower shells formed in the production of sunflower oil and grains for human consumption. You do not have to cut down trees or use artificial ingredients to obtain the raw material needs for that product.

 

“Naturally Non Allergic” has a dark gray color and a natural slightly sunflower fragrance. It is characterized by a significantly lower level of dusting, thus reducing the risk of cats suffering from upper respiratory tract infection.

“Naturally Non Allergic” is recommended by veterinarians primarily because it does not cause allergies in cats and humans, but also because is low dusting, good absorption of odors and hygiene of use.

 

Hypoallergic is not non allergic.

“Hypo” is a word of Greek origin and means “Less”. Therefore,  products marked as Hypoallergenic mean nothing less, no more than simply  less allergic products. However, these are not non allergenic products.  Each product can therefore be hypoallergenic, but not all can be  non-allergenic.

The term hypoallergenic appeared in the 1950s. It sounds scientific,  but it was created for the purposes of marketing and advertising, mainly  cosmetics. Quickly it was widely adopted in other industries.

 

The widespread use of the word hypoallergenic based on the fact that  there are no strictly defined standards or guidelines which allows the  product to be considered hypoallergenic. There is no legal or scientific  definition of the word hypoallergenic.

 

Naturally non allergic is a future concept of cat litter. First in the world non allergic litter made specially for demanding cats and their owners. Cat with different types of allergies need a special treatment to make their life more comfortable. Naturally non Allergic cat litter is not only safe for cat with allergies but also easy and clean in used. Non allergic feature is achieved thanks to patented formula based on naturally and non allergic sunflowers hulls.

 

What is a cat’s allergy?

 

Allergy is primarily associated with an overreaction of the immune system, and its symptoms can be very diverse. In some cats, the allergy is mild, but in some cases the symptoms are very bothersome and negatively affect the quality of cats life.

 

There are many types of allergies and allergens and many types of therapy. To make the right diagnosis, you need the right tests, but most common factors causing allergies in cats are mites, fleas, something in their diet, and allergens in their environment. Sensitizing agents causing allergies include: 

  • fleas venom,
  • food allergens,
  • inhalation allergens,
  • contact allergens

DA: dermatitis atopica most commonly associated with inhaled allergens.

The main allergens in this case are:

  • house dust mites,
  • epidermis,
  • tree pollen,
  • grass pollen,
  • crabgrass, fungi.

DA symptoms in cats:

  • itchy skin is the most often located around the mouth, on the tips of the paws;
  • lichen skin changes;
  • ear and conjunctivitis, sometimes asthmatic changes.

In the case of contact allergy, the reaction occurs as a result of direct skin contact with the allergen. This usually applies to skin lesions after contact with plastic beds, collars, toys. The skin lesions are most visible at the place of contact with the allergen. Treatment consists of removing the sensitizing object and desensitizing the cat.

 

Cats treatment

Treatment focuses on eliminating the sensitizing factor. To detect an allergenic agent, should be carried out tests similar to those performed on humans. Tests can be done only in larger facilities.

The most common hypersensitivity to several allergens, which are ubiquitous and unavoidable. Once we know the allergen, we can begin to desensitize your pet. In this situation, water allergens are administered subcutaneously and their concentration is gradually increased. Desensitization in this form lasts several months. The effects are obtained when the cat is allergic to only one allergen.

The owner should be aware that the pet affected by atopy will suffer from relapses for the rest of its life.

 

 

We created and patented this revolutionary “Naturally Non Allergic"  litter because we heard the needs of pets’ owners, looking for the best  natural, organic products which are more effective than those avalible  on the market in line with the current awareness of being eco.


US Patent 9861072

Canada Patent  2861806A1

 

We strive to create and market litter for allergic cats. Even a small amount of donation can significantly help build a factory. Every donation matters. Building a factory is not only a dream come true – your contribution is a help for every cat and its owner who are waiting for allergy cat litter.

 

Let's build a factory and help all cats with allergies. For this yours  need help. Me and millions of cats are waiting for your help. Together,  let's create Naturally Non Allergic made in the USA.

 

What can we do for the Earth?

Every minute the Earth surface shrinks by an area equal to 36 football fields. But all of us can do something that matters. Important is to make a thoughtful decision during daily shopping. Choose natural and eco-friendly products. Naturally Non Allergic cat litter is made in 100% from natural ingredients. But the most important, “Naturally Non Allergic” cat litter is made from sunflowers shells – product than is a waste from oil production. Something that normally is a waste right now can be used as a full blown product.

Make wise decision every day and help our planet.

 

Amazing formula!

The hulls of the sunflower is edible, so it will not harm if it will be swallowed by your pet or a human. Even if swallowed more of the clumping litter, it will not hurt because “Naturally Non Allergic” thanks to the patented composition, cat litter will clump up only in cat urine, not react with others liquids as well as with saliva. Sunflower husk fabric litter is safe for kittens, cats prone to infections and convalescents after surgery.

 

We are going to produce four types of cat litter:

 

Best for Long-Haired Cats  

For those of us who own Persian, Ragdoll, Birman, or many of the other long-haired cat breeds, we know that the long hair can really make them stand out and be quite beautiful. However, we also most likely can all relate to the frustration that exists when it comes to long-haired cats and their cat litter.

Finding the best cat litter for long-haired cats can be quite the task! The litter particles seem to easily stick to the hair, causing it to be tracked all over the room and even the house. This can be especially true on litters that are lighter and/or have finer particles, as they are easier to move and can get caught up in cat hair.

Thankfully, there are some litter products that help to minimize this issue and even some examples that are formulated specifically for long-haired cat breeds. Typically, these products will have heavier and larger granules that are made of materials that are less likely to stick to cat hair.

There can be some potential tradeoffs, however, in that these larger granules can sometimes not be as effective at clumping or moisture retention so it is important to try a few different examples out and see which works best for you and your cat.

 

Multi-Cat

Naturally non allergic is made from 100% natural sunflower shell, which provides superior odor control, absorbs four times better than clay litter, and is virtually dust-free. Naturally non allergic is all natural, toxin-free, and 100% biodegradable, which means it’s safe for you, your cat kid, and the environment. Our formula is perfect for pet parents of multi-cat households who are looking to maintain a clean environment with a natural, fresh scent.


 

Naturally Clumping Cat Litter

Made from 100% natural sunflower shell, Naturally Clumping Cat Litter produces tight clumps in as little as 10 minutes – and doesn’t stick to the litter box. This super-absorbent formula works best for pet parents of one or two cats and provides superior odor control, absorbs four times better than clay litter, and is virtually dust-free. Plus, Naturally Non Allergic is toxin-free and 100% biodegradable, which means it’s safe for you, your cat kid, and the environment.


 

Non-Clumping Natural Pellet Litter

For Cats and ALL Small Animals

While all of Naturally non allergic sunflower shell formulas spark a cat’s wiring to bury their business in nature, our non-clumping pellet litter isn’t just for cat kids. This formula is ideal for all small animals, rabbits, ferrets, and other. Naturally Fresh Pellet Litter is made with a proprietary blend of the fibrous materials found only in walnut shells. This litter provides superior odor control, absorbs four times better than clay litter, and is virtually dust-free. Ideal for pet parents looking for a non-clay litter at a great price, our non-clumping pellet formula controls up to 6x more odor than other leading non-clumping litters.

 

"Naturally Non Allergic" meets the expectations of all those who attach importance to ecology. We have created a product from natural, naturally occurring on our planet and completely renewable and biodegradable raw material. Our litter is created from sunflower shells formed in the production of sunflower oil and grains for human consumption. You do not have to cut down trees or use artificial ingredients to obtain the raw material needs for that product.

OVERVIEW

Our concept is to invent a growth seat that corrects the development of children’s bones.We on only manufacture ergonomic products that are more beneficial to health.We also integrate fitness cross-border fashion creativity into work and life.Every innovation is redefining the future,realizing the ultimate ergonomic working method while fully experiencing the crossover of art and savoring the joy of life .

Want to know more?Scroll down and stay with us we'll explain.

Most people do not have supportive furniture in their house, leaving children mold their spines to the shape of a “C” and reinforcing their bad habits encourages the neck and shoulders to roll forward.The problem is that it’s not an obvious disease – it’s a slow and subtle injury that could really affect them in later life. Children can develop bad postural habits from quite an early age. Poor posture is also linked to mood, self-confidence, breathing, digestive problems and stress. It can become a vicious cycle – kids slump.  Want to know how you can help your children improve posture ? 

Oye ! Our ergonomically designed smart chair allow for correct sitting posture for children keeping child comfortable in long seating/study hours.

OPPORTUNITIES

We are very fortunate to have partnered with a world class chair manufacturing company who is ready right now to initiate production on the tooling required to make your oye magic chair.  Working with them we will institute a high quality, tried-and-true process to ensure a timely delivery of the highest quality chair possible.  This is not a fly by night start up - by virtue of  relationships in the chair world we are able to access manufacturing capabilities usually only available to the big guys.​

At present, Our design has been shaped and samples have been produced. We won the gold award for children's furniture design in 2020:

✅ Height Adjustable 290mm-460mm

✅ Leaned Forward-Patent Design

✅  Mute Safety Brake Wheels With Gravity Sensor >20kg on/off

✅ Maximum Comfort-Zero Pressure Mesh Seat

✅ Waterproof ,Fireproof and Mold Resistant Material/Washable

✅Compatible Smart Function

 

We try to produce the first batch of products for the US market.We expect this crowdfunding to reach the predetermined goal, and we will launch the market immediately. 

Our fundraising amount is transparent and will be used in R&D and production to ensure that children in society who need to be cared for are cared for as soon as possible.

We hereby appeal and hope that everyone will share our seat products that care for children and protect children's bone development with more people in need.We are looking for solution how to create the opportunities for our Bakers to profit out of our success, therefore you will be always first on the list to find about all sorts of opportunities which could make you profit from our growth. 

DELIVERY

The Backer deliveries will be executed in 2 months after the 1st round investment is closed, according the current estimations in January 11  2020. We offer 5 years warranty for all  products, First year free replace any parts ,2-5 years repair fee will be charge .

story:
Seniors who are bed ridden and require home care or anyone who would like to sit up comfortably in bed to read, watch TV, browse the internet etc. 

So home care is now and in the future, a reality. With The Incliner it will make their life more enjoyable without being an expensive burden. PLEASE SHARE and CONTRIBUTE

Inexpensive bed comfort for everyone.

 

 

The "Dorm Incliner" will be useful for students doing their home work in bed. The Dorm Incliner is Custom fitted to Dormatory style beds.  

Students need The Incliner. They now lean up against the wall with a bunch of pillows. The Incliner can be easily removed so it can be taken home and used on the same size bed at home, (39" wide)

 

We eventually will have a powered Incliner with remote control with battery backup (Late 2017). 

If you know a person that could use The Incliner let them know about it. They will love The Incliner. It will help them sleep and breathe easier. Show them the video. 

Summary

Its sad to know that there are children, adults and seniors, that need hospital type equipment at home but they can't afford the very expensive equipment. With your help we can change this. Please help me bring this to market.​​​ With your contribution large or small, the funds will be used for production, equipment, and further develpment. With your help we can make this happen. I am very passionate about The Incliner because it will help so many people.

The Incliner will easily adjust to fit your bed. In only minutes you will be using The Incliner. If in the future you go to a different size bed, your Incliner will adjust to it also. 

You may already know someone that can use The Incliner, a student, brother, sister, mother, father, grandmother, grandfather, aunt, uncle, or neighbor. Send them this video. Send this video to everyone to help get the word out that The Incliner is available. CONTRIBUTE TODAY

Thank you so much. PLEASE SHARE

story:
Zee Summary

Zee Smart Controller is the ultimate interface for your home. Manage all your smart home devices from a single device that is always in the same convenient location. The system that can develop and grow with you. Start with one controller and expand as your needs change. Though, once you have one you will soon want one in every room of the house.

What is Zee Smart Controller? 

 

Zee Smart Controller is a single device for managing and controlling all your smart devices in your home. Replaces existing light switches and turns your existing lights into "smart lights" with advanced control features for everything else. Automate and control multiple devices, schedule functions all from the interactive interface. Simple and minimalist design that's easy to configure and even easier to use.


We identified that existing light switches are typically well located in rooms where you enter or exit a room and would be the ideal location for a smart home interface.  To do that we also needed to replicate or replace the light switch itself as part of the solution.  From there the concept of the Zee Smart Controller was born

Smart Lights + Interactive Labels

The Zee Smart Controller is a direct light switch replacement and can replace up to 4 switched circuits in a single Zee Smart Controller, two of which can also dim lights up and down. The other two are relay switches that can be used to switch on an extractor fan or to open your garage door.  Because Zee Smart Controller connects to existing light switch circuits no other rewiring is required for a standard two wire AC circuit homes. Interactive label technology takes the guess work out of which switch does what. 



Convergence Technology

Bring it all together in one place with Zee Smart Controller. Do away with multiple controllers and single product apps that can't talk to each other. With one touch control scenes that can set the perfect mood: close the blinds, lights at 50%, warm white and select that perfect playlist for your multi-room audio.



Built in Smart Senses

A truly smart device with not only real time clock features but also temperature and ambient light sensors. Use the temperature sensor like a thermostat to manage heating, cooling and ventilation systems to maximise comfort and minimise cost with home or away modes.

Security

Not only can you interface your Zee Smart Controller into your alarm system, you can also use it to give a "someone is home" look even while you are away. Because of Zee Smart's learning features it can apply random algorithms to open/close blinds, turn lights on or off at certain times in certain rooms, turn audio systems on/off just as if you were there.

Internet of Things "IoT"

Learns, develops and grows using Internet of Things technology (IoT). Configured and backed up in the cloud you are always sure of the latest features. The Zee Smart Controller becomes the ultimate interface for your home. You can control your home from any Zee Controller, or any managed device from the app or your web browser.

Task Scheduling

Zee Smart Controller can even do the boring stuff clever. Use the built-in scheduling functions to control when pool pumps and heaters should come on or when to water the garden. Using smart inputs you can make sure the pool heater isn't on when the power price is high, or water the garden when it's raining.

Distributed Architecture

Our unique distributed architecture does away with the need for a central controller.  Each Zee Smart Controller can operate independently or as part of a cluster of Zee Smart Controllers.  This means you can start with one and grow your system as your needs or budget allows.  It also means that in the unlikely event you have an issue with a controller your whole home doesn't go offline.

Specifications

Confirmed:

  • 110 to 240V AC input
  • 2 dimmer output circuits (400W max)
  • 2 on/off relay controlled circuits
  • Powered from existing mains light circuit
  • WiFi 802.11b/g/n
  • Sensors:
    • Temperature
    • Ambient Light
    • Proximity
  • Customised Android OS
  • Multi-touch capacitive touch screen
  • 5" display
  • Android, Apple, PC and browser control 
  • Cloud configuration and back-up 


Prototype Development and Timeline

Prototype

We know this product works and have built a proof of concept working prototype but we have a lot of work to do still which is why we need the help of the IndieGoGo community to take the prototype into a product suitable for commercial release.

The key differences between this prototype and the production version we are working on will be:

  • Larger LCD display of 5"
  • Two component parts, the mains side and the user interface side
  • Coloured front glass with capacitive touch screen interface.

We are keeping the design as simple as possible.  There will be no front facing screws so need to keep the mains component secured inside the the wall with a simple plug and magnetic hold for the controller interface. A clean glass front surface with the temperature sensor hidden in the side and the light and proximity sensors facing forward behind the glass. 

Timeline

Following a successful Indiegogo campaign we will focus all our efforts into refining our product for commercial release.  Having being through several prototype designs to prove the concept we know what works and what doesn't and are confident on an early 2017 delivery. 

Risks and challenges

We know how important it is for us to fulfil our promise to you, our backers, and deliver Zee Smart Controller on time and as described.

We believe the product we have come up with is unique and new, and with that comes challenges. We identified the need to make home automation a reality for everyone and believe products today are fragmented, complicated and expensive which we don't think is smart.

Our vision is a product that can manage all smart devices in the home but recognise some products will be harder to support than others. We have coined the phrase "convergence technology" for the home as we seek to develop an interface and platform for managing the home environment.

We also identified existing homes as a critical market and that any solution must work with existing home wiring set-ups. We selected WiFi as the standard communication platform, while not perfect in every home is getting better all the time and we didn't want to introduce new complexity into our system. We believe WiFi can be made stable to ensure high reliability. For those who love wires we will also include a wired Ethernet option.

We have already made a few prototypes and know we can make this work but taking a product from proof on concept to production requires a lot of effort. As our product connects into mains wiring we also need to do all the testing and certification prior to delivery. We have already conducted initial validation of our design with a recognised testing laboratory and already know we are on the right track.

Developing the on-line experience to continually deliver updates and support for additional products is a daunting but necessary task. We see the cloud based system for managing and configuring the Zee Smart Controller as one of the critical elements to ensure a quality experience. The cloud based system we see as something that will continually develop, grow and evolve over time.

Key risks: 
1. Safety, testing and regulatory compliance 
2. Managing budget 
3. Managing project scope 
4. Procurement of components 
5. Contract manufacturing 
6, On-time delivery and to specification

story:
We know our mission is grand and and we wouldn't have it any other way. We're a team of passionate professionals on a quest to deliver an incredibly reliable product for you, your lovable dog and precious cat. With just as strong of a desire to save our planet and as many animals as we can along the way.

Though manufacturing is solidly in place, production delays and unforeseen circumstances may arise- but our entire team is on board to make sure that everything runs as smoothly as possible. We're perfectionists with our own unique skill sets and have taken everything into account from seam to stuffing and a smooth delivery.

After seven rounds of prototypes we got it right and we can't wait to deliver the perfect, most clean pet bed to you. Once received and loved, we're confident you'll be excited about our next eco-friendly product launch with GEMMA and our dedicated team. At this point, the biggest risk we foresee is not being able to get your fur baby out of bed because they're just too comfortable and can't be bothered.

story:
-Our Mission-

Our goal is to give cat owners an alternative to declawing, a surgical procedure that amputates the tips of a cat’s toe bones to prevent their claws from regrowing. Declawed cats often experience phantom pain, increased aggression, and even arthritis when they get older. We want to put Purrfect Paws out into the world so that no cat ever has to go through this painful procedure ever again.

Our one true goal is the complete health and wellness of cats everywhere. If Purrfect Paws becomes a reality, it could end declawing forever.

-Our Fundraising Goal-

If we reach our goal, we'll hire a product development company with access to labs and chemists. Since Purrfect Paws is still in the prototype stage, we still need to do more research to perfect (purrfect?) the formula. Hiring a product development company for this kind of product will cost us roughly $10,000 (our goal is a little higher than this to offset the costs of manufacturing perks, shipping, etc). The more money we raise, the more flexibility we'll have when finding the right company for our product.

If we don't reach our goal, we'll use all funds we received to find another way to get Purrfect Paws produced. We'll do whatever it takes to see this product become a reality.

-Perks-

By donating to this project, not only will you be helping us to protect cats the world over, but you'll also be able to receive some stylish perks! Express your cattitude boldly with a Purrfect Paws t-shirt, or be the closet cat lover that you are with discreet Purrfect Paws socks. Whatever your style, Purrfect Paws has apparel for you! Live with the knowledge that you helped cats and became a fashion icon.

-Why Purrfect Paws?-

Purrfect Paws is unlike any other product on the market. Unlike nail caps, Purrfect Paws doesn't require you to use superglue on your cat. To apply Purrfect Paws, you simply dip your cat's nails into the solution and it dries in under a minute. Since Purrfect Paws is a liquid, it will conform perfectly to the size and shape of your cat's nails. It'll be a perfect fit every time, and you will never accidentally superglue yourself to your cat ever again.

-Thank You-

Thank you for reading this all the way through. We truly believe that Purrfect Paws has the potential to change the pet care industry completely. With your help, we can bring Purrfect Paws to market and save countless cats from suffering!

We hope you can become an honorary member of the Purrfect Paws family!

Follow Purrfect Paws on Social Media!

Follow us on these social media sites to get updates and spread the word!

https://twitter.com/purrfectpawsnow

https://purrfectpaws.tumblr.com/

You can use the social media buttons next to the "Back It" button to share this page directly! Also, if you don't care about getting merchandise (and becoming a fashion icon) you can use that "Back It" button to type in a specific amount you want to donate.

To find out more about the origins of Purrfect Paws, check out this message from the creator of Purrfect Paws, Cassandra Joseph!
