If we reach our goal, we'll hire a product development company with access to labs and chemists. Since Purrfect Paws is still in the prototype stage, we still need to do more research to perfect (purrfect?) the formula. Hiring a product development company for this kind of product will cost us roughly $10,000 (our goal is a little higher than this to offset the costs of manufacturing perks, shipping, etc). The more money we raise, the more flexibility we'll have when finding the right company for our product.
If we don't reach our goal, we'll use all funds we received to find another way to get Purrfect Paws produced. We'll do whatever it takes to see this product become a reality.
-Perks-

By donating to this project, not only will you be helping us to protect cats the world over, but you'll also be able to receive some stylish perks! Express your cattitude boldly with a Purrfect Paws t-shirt, or be the closet cat lover that you are with discreet Purrfect Paws socks. Whatever your style, Purrfect Paws has apparel for you! Live with the knowledge that you helped cats and became a fashion icon.

-Why Purrfect Paws?-

Purrfect Paws is unlike any other product on the market. Unlike nail caps, Purrfect Paws doesn't require you to use superglue on your cat. To apply Purrfect Paws, you simply dip your cat's nails into the solution and it dries in under a minute. Since Purrfect Paws is a liquid, it will conform perfectly to the size and shape of your cat's nails. It'll be a perfect fit every time, and you will never accidentally superglue yourself to your cat ever again.
-Thank You-

Thank you for reading this all the way through. We truly believe that Purrfect Paws has the potential to change the pet care industry completely. With your help, we can bring Purrfect Paws to market and save countless cats from suffering!

We hope you can become an honorary member of the Purrfect Paws family!

Follow Purrfect Paws on Social Media!
Follow us on these social media sites to get updates and spread the word!
https://twitter.com/purrfectpawsnow
https://purrfectpaws.tumblr.com/
You can use the social media buttons next to the "Back It" button to share this page directly! Also, if you don't care about getting merchandise (and becoming a fashion icon) you can use that "Back It" button to type in a specific amount you want to donate.
To find out more about the origins of Purrfect Paws, check out this message from the creator of Purrfect Paws, Cassandra Joseph!

story:
My name is Buddy Auclair. I was born in beautiful British Columbia, Canada. I am a 33 yr old aspiring entrepreneur. My campaign is one near and dear to my heart and it’s called “Hemp Cutlery”. I came up with this when I noticed how much I hated the taste and texture of steel and wanted a spoon or fork that wouldn’t taste like anything but what I was eating. Hemp cutlery can provide that and much more!  Hemp is one of the strongest, safest, greenest, and most reliable negative foot print materials around. It can help people build homes that will last forever, help people live longer live’s, and soon maintain our economy for generations to come.  Hemp will be a sustained product in every market out there, and with your help Hemp Cutlery will be too. That is the 1st of 2 reasons I am reaching out for your help. The main reason is the young hero in the video attached, my nephew Jayden, who fought hard for 18 months to beat brain cancer and stay with his family.  He never got a chance to experience life, but he sure taught everyone a lot in his short life.  The fact that nothing could be done is what hurt the most.  Watching my loving family go thru trying times like this gave me the drive to do something to help, so I came up with “Hemp Cutlery”. I couldn't help him live, but I can help his legacy that he leaves.  Go to jaydenstadfoundation.org to read his story. This foundation does not donate to research, but rather to the families battling DIPG who are given limited time after diagnosis to make memories with their child.

My goal is to raise $15,000 to cover costs such as material needed (hemp, which is not cheap), designing, manufacturing, trademarking, overhead, packaging, marketing, storage, distribution, shipping/handling, and  as much outsourcing as possible.

 My goal is to achieve and sustain “Hemp Cutlery”, allowing me to fund Butterfly Kisses and make my nephew proud. Help bring a trend setting 100% hemp cutlery line to the table.  I ask for your help to fund “Hemp Cutlery”  and help fight the good fight.

Thank you in Advance!

“Hemp cutlery” the way to a greener future and an end to DIPG (Don't worry Jayden..We got this!)

story:
What Makes Us Unique?

 

Remote Feeding Management - Ensure your pet is always eating the right amount of food on the right time no matter where you are. Give you the easy and precise way to manage your pet’s feeding routine.

Flexible Food Tray- To create pet’s good eating habit and keep the rest food clean, food tray will be opened up when meal time begins, and closed up when meal time ends.

Anti-Jam Conveyor System – It will solve the food jam problem and make sure the feeder running normally.

 

Anti-Pinch Protection Patent - The food tray will stop closing up if the anti-pinch sensor detected any obstacle, making sure pet is safe.

Dry & Wet food Feeding- The common feeder is only available for dry food supply, our feeder has solved the problem of wet food feeding, which makes the baby pet to eat properly.

 

Easy to Clean - Detachable structure, easy to take out the body part for cleaning, keep the food fresh and healthy.

 

Real-time Camera- we cooperate with leading company in security monitoring project. Make sure the camera to work stable, getting to know your pet in time.

 

Precisely weighing –Precise built-in weighing cell makes sure the feeder dispense the correct amount of food. It will alert you when it is short of food storage.

 

Effective Backup Battery- Smart Pet feeder contains a 2400mAH lithium battery which can keep the machine running for 30 days without power supply

 

We are now at the stage of production.

Our products have passed a number of technical tests and have acquired certification authority.

Where and when do you ship?
We ship Smart Pet Feeder worldwide. We plan to start shipping the feeders to early 10 backers within 1 week of after the campaign ends, and the feeders of other backers are expected to be shipped within 1 month after the campaign ends. But the time of delivery depends on local delivery speed and customs clearance.

What is the shipping fee?
We offer free shipping for deliveries to US, EU, JP, CA, MEX, AUS, MY, SG, HK, and TW. For other countries, a small surcharge can apply. Simply click on the pledge and select your delivery country, you will automatically see what the shipment costs are for your selected country.

How about duties and taxes?
Please note that the backer is responsible for all local taxes and import duties. We will try our best to declare a comparatively lower value for the product.

What happens if you don't reach our goal?
The backers still will receive Smart Pet feeders even if we don’t reach our goal. And the Feeders will be shipped within a month after the campaign ends.

What language version of APP do you have now?
We have English and Germany language version APP right now. And Japanese APP is under testing and will come out in the end of 2017.

What kind of warranty do you offer?
The feeder comes with a 1 year warranty.

Can I get a refund?
If it is before the end of the crowdfunding campaign please refer here: Refunds: Can I get my money back? Then you can require a refund directly from Indiegogo.

If it is after the crowdfunding campaign has finished but before the dispatch date of your smart pet feeder, please contact us at artdoudesign@gmail.com. We will arrange your refund as soon as possible. 

If it is after the fulfillment of product, you won’t be able to receive a refund.

For questions please contact:  artdoudesign@gmail.com

story:
The story

 

We all know how much room baby furniture can consume as your little one grows into a toddler. And we are here to change that, change the way you think of nursery furniture. 

Here we introduce you to a long-lasting solution for the smallest ones.

 

This all-natural birch wood multi-use crib not only rocks your newborn to a safe sleep, it grows with your family to become a cot bed and a rocking horse that will last for years of play. The crib converts to a toy box for maximum storage, and the reversible, detachable blackboard constantly encourages creativity.

 

I'll explain each of these options a bit more here.

1. Swinging cradle. 

 For about the first six months of life, your baby can gently and naturally rock to sleep in this convenient mini crib/baby cradle swing; all you need is a 40x80cm mattress. The rocking motion is a tried and true way to lull your infant to a sound sleep and give you the parent the respite you deserve.

2.Crib

 You can use the swinging crib until your baby can lift him/herself from the sleeping surface. At that point, the swinging motion should be disabled entirely for safety reasons (it takes only a minute).  But no worries, your baby can go on sleeping in the crib until it gets too small - and still, it is not the end of the story. The crib turns into a toy box, and its design will fit to most interiors.

3. Toy storage

After your baby outgrows the cradle, you can use it as a toy box to keep all those toys tidy. The toy box even allows you to store toys without continually opening the lid.

 

4.Blackboard

The nifty detachable, reversible chalkboard is there to encourage expression while keeping the walls clean. It's an outlet your child can use again and again.

5. Rocking horse

The rocking horse is suitable for all ages; it withstood our tests with a 100kg man, so it promises years of fun. And if you add one more child, they can take advantage of the rocking cradle at the same time.

There have been many great products on Indiegogo that are made by reusing old materials giving them a new life, and so reducing unnecessary spending. We have taken the other approach - by adding more functions to our furniture, we add longer lifetime and reduce the ecological footprint.

 

We have already gotten some feedback from our customers, and it truly is encouraging : 

Lovely cradle with lots of additional features

This cradle is beautifully made and of great quality. Not only is it comfortable for our baby to sleep in, but it's also very stylish. The assembly was extremely quick and easy without any screwdrivers required. The cradle comes with a blackboard which doesn't have to be attached straight away (or can be, if there are older siblings that might want to use it). Overall a great product and I highly recommend it.

Well made and sturdy, nice finish

Purchased for a friend's first baby boy, as with most cribs the mattress was purchased separately. It was easy to assemble as long as you follow the instructions, Prices are well finished and fit as they are supposed to. It's a lovely little rocking horse and is very sturdy. At 4 months old he's in a cot now and it's already filling with toys.

 

 

About us a bit.

 

My name is Risto, and I am taking care of international sales in our family company, Adensen Furniture. We are from Estonia - you know, the small European country where Skype and Transferwise originate.

 

The creator of our nursery furniture sets is Heiki, my father. He is a father of six - I see a clear connection here when we talk about how he came to these ingenious ideas in furniture development.

 

We began to produce multi-functional furniture around 2008, got some lovely feedback from the customers, and have been going on in that direction ever since. It's a no-brainer for many parents - instead of buying one piece of furniture, you get many more options on how to use it.  You don't need to dread what to do with all the furniture that needs to be changed several times before your baby gets to teenage.

Even though we've been around awhile, we haven't managed to get our products to a broader audience. Here today, we are asking you to help us spread the word about what we do and check out one of our most beautiful products. 

 

The History

 The first version of The Swinging Crib and The Rocking Horse is from the year 2008 - here is an old picture of my co-worker and me together with The Horse in our old factory - taken by a local newspaper photographer (that's me on the right).

 

Initially, The Crib didn't look so good, almost like a wooden box (see below).

By re-designing the cradle, making it more open, we got a beautiful little crib accompanied by the faithful horse :

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Our products are unique in more ways than one. But it is also more expensive to produce multi-functional furniture. The higher price point makes it more difficult for us to sell our long-lasting products. So we took a look at our production, and after spending some time considering the various options, we found the lowest hanging fruit, as far as making our products cheaper goes : 

Today we outsource the production. To reduce the price in the best possible way, we should bring one part of production in-house. For that, we will need to purchase some smaller woodworking machines (edge sander, spindle sander, router, portable spindle sander), and exactly that is why we are asking your help today. Our thought process went as follows

The workflow is in three stages :

CNC work. All the details for The Swinging Crib and The Rocking Horse and most of the details for Adensen Smart, our two nursery furniture sets, are cut out on a CNC router. It is expensive, especially when we are not ordering many units at the time, but we really can't avoid it - the nature of the product requires it. The prices for CNC routers suitable for us begin from around 10000 EUR.

Manually preparing the products for painting: this is time-consuming but one of the most critical parts of the workflow. We will check over all the details and smooth all the sharp corners and edges so that the product is safe and feels pleasant to touch. Tools and the few smaller machines for these operations cost together around 5000 EUR.

Painting. Painting is done on a half-automatic painting line to ensure excellent quality. The equipment for high-quality finishing (it doesn't need to be the automatic line, we are talking about manual spraying here) is costing around 10000 EUR. 

The solution

Today we want to take the manual operations to ourselves. We know how to do it, but we don't have the equipment. The 6700 EUR we need for purchasing the machine is the goal for us today (there will be taxes reduced from 6700 EUR)

 

Your help will be invaluable. Should you tell a friend, share our campaign in social media, pledge or even get one of our unique nursery furniture sets yourself - either way, we are grateful and always will be. We have two different furniture sets as perks, both are one of a kind, and there is nothing like this out there today) 

 

 

The Goal

Our goal is to give you furniture that has meaning; you could even say - personality. And by doing that we make life easier for the parents, improve the quality of life for children, make the world greener. 

If we can deliver our message of long-lasting furniture to more people, we can reduce unnecessary spending, one crib at the time. 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Selling big and bulky products has many challenges.

The main issue to solve is transport. In the campaign, we have written out delivery prices sent as separate orders. And these prices are relatively high. The only way to reduce fulfillment prices is to get enough purchase orders from one country - to be able to send a whole pallet (truckload or even container, depending on the distance) to local fulfillment centers and then home delivery from there.

As an example for the United States - to fill a 20 ft container with The Swinging Crib and The Rocking Horse, we need around 250-300 orders. That would reduce the delivery cost to the US by approximately 50 % per order. Today the only option we have is to send all the PO-s separately. If we can get enough orders to send bigger shipments to farther destinations, we'll reduce the shipment costs to our customers accordingly.

We have a preliminary agreement with a freight forwarding company, and they can help us to solve these issues.

The packaging. To protect every detail from getting scratches on the way, we use packaging foam. The corners of the box have extra protection in them. All this to ensure that all of our products won't get damaged on the way to you.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

We do appreciate all of you, our supporters, people interested in our work, and hope you'll take the minute to share our campaign with your friends.  Even if you are not interested in baby furniture today, maybe you know someone who is?

Please share our campaign with your friends and family, it will help us more than you know.

story:
1. How does it work?

Writing a message

Everything is controlled by a mobile app through a really easy process.

 

Attaching files

You can attach any file you want. You can also choose photos you would like to be printed and attached to the letter. Other files will be included in the form of a link. For the letters, there will be an option to send them on a pendrive soon.

 

Delivery date

You can select when you would like the message to be delivered. You can send it either right after your death or a selected number of days after the death. This makes it possible for you to send more than one message at different times.

You can also send messages on a specific date in the future.

 

Delivery methods

For now, you can choose from either a Letter, E-mail or SMS but soon I’ll also add social media messages and posts options.

Letter delivery

For the delivery of the letter select which paper and envelope colors you would like and select the delivery address. You can also choose the recipient and addressee that will be printed on your selected envelope. Those fields are optional and you can write anything in them. The selected envelope will be placed in a bigger, protective envelope which will have the actual address(s) provided by you earlier.

Email / SMS

For E-mail and SMS, the only thing that you will need to provide is the recipient’s email address or phone number. The recipient will then receive an e-mail or SMS with a link to our website where they will be able to read the entire message and download any attached files.

Social media (soon)

For social media posts and messages, I’m thinking about posting something on the Facebook feed, sending messages on Messenger, adding photos to your Instagram account, posting something on Twitter and more. I’m still during development and will see what options will be possible to code. By buying electronic messages on Indiegogo you will have access to all of them once they will be available.

 

How do I know that you’re alive?

There are two options.

1. Post Scriptum allows you to invite and connect with friends. These will be marked as your "trusted person" who is able to notify us if you have passed away with a click of a button. However, after they do it you will still have 24 hours in which you will be able to postpone that time with a special button from option 2 described below.

2. You can tell us that by clicking the button in the bottom left corner. Each time you click it you postpone the time by 3 days. You can also hold a button to postpone it by any other number of days. Just in case you are going somewhere with no internet access for a long period of time. You will get a notification once the timer is coming to an end. So don’t worry. You won’t miss it.


 

Pricing and additional options

When it comes to costs it will be 14,99$ for letter and 0,99$ for electronic delivery.

Because I want to make Post Scriptum as accessible as possible to everyone, I decided to set a limit for each message to 100MB of storage space and 20 years of validity and 1 printed photo of their choice. If you want to increase any of the listed above, more options are purchasable.

 

2. About me and Post Scriptum

How did it all start?

Ok. So after watching a popular tv series “Ghost whisperer” as a child, I wanted to have skills like the main character. Talking to dead people and helping them with their unfinished business sounds like a great profession, doesn’t it? For years I’ve been wanting to code my own project. I’ve always had a head full of ideas but never had the time to realize these ideas. So finally, after hitting rock bottom of a comfortable 9-5 job I decided to finally fulfill my dreams. And that’s when I decided to combine my dream from when I was a child and my programming skills. Thus began my journey of Post Scriptum. Initially, I was hoping to finish this project within a few months' time, but after my 9-5 and daily life routine my motivation wasn’t always there, but after two long years… I finally made it.

 

Why Indiegogo?

I find Indiegogo a place where people can vote whether an idea should be brought to life. I did my best to code this project. I’ve put my heart and sleepless nights to finish it. Now it’s your turn to decide if you would like to see something like this in our world or if I should give up on it. It’s true, I’m playing it safe. I want to check if there’s any interest in this kind of service. The thing is that it’s just me and my idea. You are on your side of the screen and on the other side it’s just me. Not some big team. There’s no one I share this path with. I haven’t even told about this project to anyone till last month when I told my mother and best friend to check what they think about it. To bring this project to life, I need your help.

 

But… Why? It’s kinda weird man.

Maybe a little. But from my point of view, I thought that when I leave this world my loved ones would want to hear from me and that is something that has really motivated me to finish this project. And on a global scale, it's my vision that no one would ever leave this world without saying goodbye. Just imagine it. Isn’t it beautiful? We would finally be ready for it, no matter when it comes. And the grief after losing someone could be a little less if we had a chance to hear a goodbye from that very special person.

We never know when death is close to us, we escape it every day, imagine if you left the house without saying bye to your mom properly, imagine your last meeting with your best friend being a silly argument, wouldn’t you like to give them that closure and reassurance that you love them regardless?

 

Did anyone help you create Post Scriptum?

Yes. The logo was made by Ardimas Ramadhan @garasigrafis and letters photos were taken by Łobzowska Studio (Cracow / Poland). And two most unique, intelligent, beautiful people I have ever seen on the face of this entire earth god damn helped me translate this (thanks Justyna and Malik ^_^).

I’m also planning to hire someone for a better user interface but first I want to check if there's any interest in service that Post Scriptum provides.
story_txt: 1. How does it work?Writing a messageEverything is controlled by a mobile app through a really easy process. Attaching filesYou can attach any file you want. You can also choose photos you would like to be printed and attached to the letter. Other files will be included in the form of a link. For the letters, there will be an option to send them on a pendrive soon. Delivery dateYou can select when you would like the message to be delivered. You can send it either right after your death or a selected number of days after the death. This makes it possible for you to send more than one message at different times.You can also send messages on a specific date in the future. Delivery methodsFor now, you can choose from either a Letter, E-mail or SMS but soon I’ll also add social media messages and posts options.Letter deliveryFor the delivery of the letter select which paper and envelope colors you would like and select the delivery address. You can also choose the recipient and addressee that will be printed on your selected envelope. Those fields are optional and you can write anything in them. The selected envelope will be placed in a bigger, protective envelope which will have the actual address(s) provided by you earlier.Email / SMSFor E-mail and SMS, the only thing that you will need to provide is the recipient’s email address or phone number. story:
Why join the BYO (Bring your Own) container movement. ♻️

We get it. Plastic takeaway containers are convenient. Cheap. And easy to discard. But at the same time, they're identified as one of the key contributor of plastic waste increasingly being dumped into our oceans. A study estimates 2025 million takeaway containers are being used per year in the EU alone.

 Our MISSION. Our Takeaway Dream. ? ?

Our dream is to have a disposable-free takeaway future. A future where sustainable alternatives such as Final Bowl are given a chance over single use plastic takeaway containers. This is alongside initiatives such as Trashless Takeaway that promote the BYO movement among food establishments as a means to combat single use containers.  

Why Final Bowl. ?

Regular containers are not conditioned to be carried around. They're bulky, take too much space, and too inconvenient. 

Final Bowl is portable, a mere 1.5 inch thick (once collapsed), and weighs a few hundred grams. Just having one in your bag can save more than a few disposable takeaway containers each week. We can do this! Join us in the BYO Container Movement!  

We have made every effort to make it as slim as possible, to make it as portable and a breeze to carry. 

 

Food grade silicone ?+ ?+ ?

Final Bowl does it all with food-grade silicone material. Silicone has traditionally been used for baking, with its lightweight and durable attributes. Final Bowl offers maximal capacity and minimal footprint. 

 

Freeze fresh fruits for that easy smoothie fix ?+?+?

Chop your favourite fruits, freeze them, then toss it to your blender for that frothy texture. Whilst frozen fruits will be a pain to extract from regular glass or plastic containers, Final Bowl's flexible silicone container makes it a breeze, making it easier for you to achieve that healthy lifestyle you always wanted.

story:
When you buy a pen, we will plant a maple tree in your honor. The trees will be planted in an area where they will be guaranteed to thrive.

When the trees have grown somewhat, we will publish a photo of the newly created “Kickstarter Forest”.

Planting is planned for spring/summer 2020.

On average, a fully mature tree produces 260 pounds of oxygen. That’s enough oxygen for 2 people. So, in essence, your pen purchase will provide oxygen for 2 people. That’s a pretty awesome gift!

We go out to the local maple forest and find the loveliest fallen trees to make our pens from. Each piece is chosen with care to produce the finest looking pen.

Our master pen turner has been turning pens for quite some time and creates a literal piece of art with every pen, sanding to the finest grain and polishing to a flawless finish.

The clips and tips of our pens are made from 24K plated gold. Carefully taken care of, they will never fade or tarnish.

Our pens produce some of the smoothest writing you’ll ever experience. They just glide along every surface that you’ll put them on.

As a unique twist, the pens are varnished with a combination of pure maple syrup and linseed oil. The result is a beautiful finish with a delightful maple odor. You’ll be tempted to eat your pen!

story:
The Cork booklift, a simple block of cork that holds books & tablets at a gentle, comfortable angle. 

 

 

It puts coffee table books on display and makes using tablets and reading more comfortable. 

 

It requires zero set up - Just drop in your book and start reading. A bookstand with all of the benefits and none of the gadgetry. 

 

Convenient for cookbooks, iPads, coffee table books, and bedtime reading. A little lift and tilt makes a huge difference. 

 

 

It all started as a simple cookbook holder. Most of the cookbook holders on the market are too complex. Multiple parts, clamps, levers, adjustments, straps, and chains? We had a simpler idea: pick one angle, remove the clutter, and make it work with as many books as possible. 

 

We prototyped it and it worked beautifully. That prototype found its way into every other room of the house. Reading on the couch, studying for exams, playing with an iPad; it became a constant companion. 

 

 

Where it works 

 

  • On the countertop - Where this whole project started: a super-simple cookbook holder.  No clamps, no adjustments, no fuss.
  • On the coffee table - show off thick books and photo albums, opened to a favorite page. 
  • On your lap - the booklift holds the book covers just open enough to hold the page, freeing up your hands to hold a beverage, a pencil, or absentmindedly twirl your hair.
  • On the desktop - Lifting the book up off the table frees up space for notes, ingredients, or a laptop; dramatically improving ergonomics. 

 

 

 

" The Booklift is one of those amazing objects that you didn't know you needed until you experienced it. "

- Craighton Berman, Founder of Manual

 

 

 

 

“ I am very impressed with its performance! I used it all around my kitchen and it worked perfectly in every situation! Chefs use huge professional recipe books, some times up to 1000 pages, and the booklift never failed.  ”

- Karen Bankoski, Executive Chef

 

 

 

 

The details 

  • The booklift tilts the book forward 10 degrees reducing glare from overhead lights
  • It holds the book 90% of the way open, helping it to stay on the right page
  • Flipped over, it's perfectly flat which works with phones and tablets making gaming, scrolling and Sunday crosswords all more comfortable.

 

 

 

  • The cork surface grips the cover with no need for a bottom ledge — protecting the bottom of the book from nicks and dings. 
  • Perpendicular sides allow it to rest alongside the books on the shelf. 

 

 

" This whole project started out of a desire to make cookbooks easier to manage in the kitchen and actually cook with. They take up a ton of counter space and common kitchen lighting glares off the pages. A little tilt and lift makes a huge difference. With the booklift at work, the cookbook now floats above the countertop keeping the book safe from the wet, messy surface. "

 

 

Cork is absolutely amazing (!)

The cork oak evolved its thick protective bark to protect itself from insects and forest fires. Cork is water-proof, fire-proof, insect-proof and very insulating. It’s hydrophobic so it’s resistant to stains. The Booklift itself is drop-proof, durable and lightweight for shipping. 

 

 

A cork oak’s bark can be harvested every ten years over its’ 200 year lifespan. That's 200 years of removing CO2 from the environment. The removal of the cork from the trees is fully sustainable; still done by hand to avoid damaging the tree.

Cork is recyclable and compostable so at the end of the Booklift's long life, there's a plan in place to dispose of it responsibly.

 

 

We've been working with a factory in Portugal to get a quote and make a set of prototypes. As soon as we’re funded, we will cut permanent aluminum tooling to make production units at large quantities.

 

Revision is the creative duo, Damein Williams and Nate McCracken. We started Revision to make products that blend aesthetics with creative manufacturing.

We launched our first Kickstarter project, the Convex bottle opener, in 2020 and delivered two months ahead of schedule. We’ve planned for as many unforeseen risks as possible and we’re hoping to deliver fast on this project as well.

 

Perks

Here's a quick break down of the perks; 

Add-ons

If you're looking for a little more, here's some of the other things we've designed:

The Cal bookends, two steel bars bent over one another to form an elemental bookend. A great addition to your bookshelf which we designed for Craighill.

Or round things out with a Convex bottle opener. A huge ball bearing reimagined as elegant home decor. Mirror polished stainless steel or 18 Karat gold plated.

All of these available at 15% off.

 

 

 

 

 

Thanks for reading to the bottom. Scroll back to the top and SMASH that pledge button! After backing you can follow along on our Instagram and Facebook or check us out on Pinterest. If social media isn't your thing you can keep up with us via our newsletter Curio. 

 

Music: Funky Garden by Ketsa

 

We truly appreciate your support!

story:
Kids are the center of family life, and where there are kids, toys inevitably follow. So, where does one put all of these toys to avoid having a cluttered house which  constantly needs cleaning up? DeSu Play Box is our take on a Danish designed multifunctional storage box- a high quality, eco-friendly and durable storage box that can be unfolded to become a soft place for your kids to play. Furthermore, this Play Box is designed to blend in with your furniture at night when the kids are asleep and to unfold for a world of fun during the day. DeSu Play Box embraces both kids and adults alike, and allows for both fun and organising to go hand in hand.  It is a perfect solution for a busy family. 

Designed with both aesthetics and functionality in mind, DeSu Play Box can blend into any home (minimalistic or ornate); therefore, DeSu Play box comes in 5 different color variations; dark gray / blue, light gray / purple, all light gray, all dark gray, and light gray / dark gray.

DeSu Play Box is an alternative to your everyday play mat and storage box. Made from thick felt cushions, the Play Box gives your kids a soft and warm place to play, and it even helps reduce the sound from falling blocks. 

Unfolded, the play mat is 90 x 90 cm, folded the box is 32 x 32 x 32 cm. Plenty of space for your toddler to sit and play and large enough to store all their favorite toys.

 

Strong magnets hold the box together, so you do not have to fumble with buttons or zippers. Simply fold the box and the toys are packed away, keeping your home organized and clean. Take it on the go to see the grandparents or friends. Your kids will have familiar place to play, and you will not need to worry about cold floors or tidying up.

 

Just like other parents, we care about our kids and we care about the environment. How is the DeSu Play box sustainable?  To us, sustainability means quality in materials. It means that our storage box is designed to last. We have made several prototypes and spent months testing, in order to make sure that the box can withstand everyday use. You can even put it in the washing machine, so you can use it long past the toddler years.

We made sure we used just the right amount of magnets with just the right strengths, so that the box is strong enough but not too strong for kids to use. Most importantly, the DeSu Play Box is CE tested with high Danish standards to ensure absolute safety. This means that the box is fire tested and tested for small parts. To make sure that there are no harmful substances in the box, we have used Eco-Tex certified materials. You can therefore feel assured, when letting your kids play on and with DeSu Play Box. 

 

More is coming soon as we are working on add-ons for DeSu Play Box. Turn the box into a city landscape and enjoy hours of fun. By fastening the city landscape to DeSu Play box using the magnets you can enjoy the same fast and easy tidy up.

story:
Clique para ver a campanha em Português

Legendas PT também disponíveis no vídeo em cima.



PLY&co. is a Portuguese brand of ecological furniture established in Porto, Portugal, that only uses woods and derivatives from sustainably managed forests, namely birch plywood, Valchromat® and Portuguese cork.

Our concept minimizes the waste of the raw materials and promotes an entirely manual finishing, with ecologic products, by traditional craftsmen.

The raw materials used and fittings were reduced to the maximum, so that all the pieces are born of the same board. The few “leftovers” go for recycling and saw dust for energy producing. 
We bring you here on Indiegogo our small big idea - the SIT'ABIT !


SIT'ABIT is not just a stool. 
It is made from wood, without chopping forests down! A cool piece of furniture crafted with individual care and holding a story to tell.
Composed by just 3 pieces that fit together at a shake of a lamb’s tail: no glue, nails or screws, nor any tools for setting it up! 


For example, the SIT’ABIT Cork Jr. is a seriously playful and ecological children’s stool, made of this unique natural material, resistant yet soft, that is cork, is a didactic yet funny piece. 

Dismountable it allows flexibility of use, easy storage and the transportation costs get reduced.

Take it in our 100% organic cotton, hand-made Tote Bag anywhere you go !

It will be yours with perks above 50€ !

We eliminated all complexity, resulting in a minimal form that holds elegant simplicity while being a friend of Nature. SIT'ABIT is a cool, remarkable product that will catches the eye… and  conveys a story that matters to all.







We are "on the market" for sometime now, acquiring great applause and continuous reconaissance from our peers and national public but we want to deliver more to the most!
This means showing our work to the world, starting here on Indiegogo !
If successful, we'll take it to selected fairs and exhibitions, for which we are often invited to, but can´t afford the cost!
And to reach this we need the usual: a bigger production run that enables us to negotiate the best prices with our local suppliers and optimize logistics, rewarding your support and attaining cash-flow to do the following...


... we need a certain amount of orders that ensures us a minimum production to deliver more at the best prices ! 
By helping us in this process, we'll continue supporting the pretty much depleted local economy, ensuring the jobs of the people that make PLY&co.

We want to ensure our future productions run efficiently, maximizing sustainability, by providing work to us and our local specialized wood-workers, that are living not-so-easy times.
What we do are not just more stuff with a function; above all they must symbolize an attitude towards the planet and towards life. 
You see, we love design, yet we live simple and sustainable lifestyles that keep us in touch with our roots right here in Portugal, taking care in producing individual, hand crafted, versatile pieces that, above all, connect us back to Nature!



- buying the best quality materials; 
- placing a substantial order to the CNC-milling providers; 
- paying for local craftsmen to finish it; 
- making our reduced packaging customized (manual silk screen print);
- delivering your stool(s) to you.

Then, we'll conquer the world! :-) If you value us, there are a lot more that probably will too.
The web is great, but we must go physical too. We named it: trade shows and international exhibitions !


Pretty much like the lambs wool the cork is the bark of this peculiar Mediterranean tree: the sobreiro (cork oak).


The bark is peeled without harming the tree - which actually becomes stronger and healthier after each crop - by specialized labourers every 9 years. 
The Portuguese Montado has the biggest number of cork oaks in the world, whereas strong legislation monitors the keeping of this legacy.

Cork has great thermal, acoustic and water repellent characteristics besides its cozy touch and looks. A material that keeps the best wines and champagnes ageing for better speaks for itself.

In order to make this possible, accurate snap-fit assembling, achieved through CAD/CAM technology is the base of the craftsmen’s work that hand-finish each piece, with local artisans and non-toxic products, giving our furniture its character but also an actual good fit and ability for the user to maintain it.

 


The pieces are assembled without glues, nails or screws, thereby promoting its reuse and later recycling. As well, the simple design and snap-fit assemblage reveals an educational and joyful experience for children and grown-ups.
The stool isn't a pain to put together like other ready-to-assemble furniture. It is assembled or taken apart in less than 30 seconds! 
It features a handle on one of its legs and is very practical to take, to travel or to store away with its reusable packaging when not needed.
With a smooth safe design it aims boosting the understanding of the constructive logic by children. Therein lies its educational and playful power.


With these products one also takes a story to tell to others. Especially to the ones that will continue our work – the children! We want them to also be an environmental entrepreneur along with PLY&co.!
Kids love to safely interact with it. And the cork stool is pretty much damage-proof. Its child-friendliness and safety indeed invite kids to hang around with it, finding a restful friend when tired of playing…!


The amount of packaging is reduced as well, making it possible to go with the SIT'ABIT anywhere. Take it outdoors and enjoy the lawn even when it’s wet.






It’s not about intricate high-tech features but how simple things can connect us back to Nature and to each other. 


Richness comes with the Storytelling of the sustainable process behind stuff!





"The attitude that PLY&co. introduced in the market and design panorama has a curious freshness. The combination of traditional Portuguese materials with an essential design, pure and elegant, are pramount in these products. The practical forms they declare are an example of how well-made objects can be an indispensable tool in our day-to-day. " 
Roberto Cremascoli, architect
Curator of the Remade in Portugal

"Cork is an exemplary material in the area of sustainability for being a natural product, renewable and recyclable. The conception of the SIT'ABIT stool matches perfectly with the whole cork logic: nothing is wasted, everything is transformed!"
Lino Rocha
Amorim Cork Composites Manager

"The stool found a great spot in my apartment. It feels good to see people that truly believe in their project, especially when these are beautiful.
I didn't expect to find this in a music festival and it was a really good surprise.
Thank you very much!"
Mathieu Bonnin, client from Paris, France

"The SIT’ABIT stools are super! They're perfect for the adults and the children in our house and I'm a huge fan of the photo frames.
I love the shape and design, I have 3 now, all different colours but due to the unifying design they work really well together.
Thanks again!"
Claire Ransom, client from the UK




Any doubts about the shipping to your country, please CONTACT US !   goeasy@plyeco.com


Our flat-pack concept always pays off when contributing more!
Engage your friends on this campaign and save more ! 
> Please check the PACK perks, nr. 7, 8, 10 and 11 above !


It's easy to carry, even as aircraft cabin luggage ! 
Local pick-up available to all !
Travel to Porto and reduce the footprint - Pay us a visit, take it with you and save more, taking also a bio tote-bag for free (or the paid shipping cost in equivalent perks value).
A win-win situation.

• We aim to deliver all items before December, the date will depend on how many stools are ordered, if we can do it faster, we will.
Note: priority will be given to first funders and, among those, to the resellers

*We know it doesn’t look a huge improvement nor we'll put an USB slot anywhere, but it does require Research & Development to achieve what many grow-up’s ask from us: 
Smart simplicity ! Just having this cool and friendly cork stool made bigger! 

BUT WHY WE CANT MAKE IT RIGHT NOW ?
Cork is a durable yet flexible material. In order to have stability we improved the thickness of the actual stool's parts to 25mm, to safely carry the weight of a person up to 70kg. But to extend the height 10cm more, from 35 to 45cm and the load up to 120kg we need time and testing to achieve it, without losing our simple, affordable and honest concept.
That’s what we’ll aim for, giving our funders the opportunity to buy it later at an astonishing launching price !




We are architects and designers that love good design and healthy living.



As designers with years of experience, we know that every project comes with risks... However, since we already produced some small runs, there is little ones associated with managing a bigger production.
Bigger risk would actually be a HUGE amount of orders, while a blessing it could also cause some delays. In order to overcome that as soon as we acquire success to order large quantities, we'll secure a safe place at our suppliers agenda.
And we will always be transparent and keep everyone appraised about the progress of things.

 “…to connect craftsmanship with the industrial process so that you can have some imperfections, more human touch in the product, so that people also connect themselves with it. Craftsmanship in a product shows that a design is about human condition, is about daily life.”
Hella Jongerius


Thank you so much for supporting us growing ! 



CHARACTERISTICS

What are the dimensions and weight of the SIT'ABITs?
SIT’ABIT Cork jr. mm: W260 x L260 x H350 / in: 10,23”x10,23”x13,77” weight 2,4kg /5,28lbs
SIT’ABIT adult size mm: W300 x L300 x H450 / in: 11,81”x11,81”x17,71” weight 3,3kg / 7,26lbs
SIT’ABIT HIGH mm: W300 x L300 x H750 / in: 11,81”x11,81”x29,53” weight 5kg / 11,02lbs

Is the SITABIT waterproof?
It has been designed without electronic components to hassle you. Therefore it withstands harsh environments and weather conditions. As any wooden piece shouldn’t be left wet for long. A dry cloth will do it, the Cork version even comes with a fine sandpaper to remove stains or scribbles. Easy, safe and simple.

Can I keep my stools shiny and new?
As long as you’re not the kind of person that can’t tell a pair of pliers from a screwdriver you will.
The finishings are either RAW (fine sanding, varnishes free), ECO (natural waxes and oils) or ECO-Dur (water based matt varnish). The first 2 are totally DIY maintainable and the 3rd only goes over the birch plywood and is stronger yet very easy to renew if deeply scratched.

I'm 1,80m / 6"4, Can the stool be bigger?
Besides the 2 SIZES - Junior (Cork) and Adult (Birch) - we have a fine barstool version that you can order, benefiting from your 20% discount, and making sure you’ll be the master of entertaining among your friends. 

PRODUCTION

Where are the SIT’ABIT made?
100% produced in Portugal. 
95% of the raw material is Portuguese and the rest is from Europe. 
We want Children to only PLAY WITH, not DOING THEM.

Is there a warranty?
Yes, we offer a standard 2 years warranty against manufacturer’s defects. (but the fact that our products are free from messy High-Tech features gives us confidence to assure you a flawless product).

* Important: The finishing process lends itself to small variations. Those just highlight the artisanal nature of the project, as each SIT’ABIT is finished by hand and absolutely unique, just like the trees are.
** Outside the E.U.? Please be aware that certain items may be subject to import duties. As far as we know, this shouldn't be a problem with our items but we thought it’s worth mentioning. Please inform yourself.

RESSELERS

I run a business and would like to resell the SITABIT, what should I do?
Briefly: head on! 
Please consider the RESELLERS PACK (and you can double your pledge at any level to order a larger number of SITABITs !). 
If you are a reseller and want to get more than one 10x SIT'ABIT Cork Jr. Stool RESELLERS PACK, please contact us (goeasy@plyeco.com) to know about especially advantageous shipping costs for more than 10 SIT’ABITs.

Who can choose the Reseller Pack?
The Reseller Pack is only for resellers with a VAT ID number (e-store, retail shop, design center, museum shop,etc...).

Does the Reseller Pack include VAT?
No. This perk is taxed at 0% VAT for all countries except Portugal. 
Resellers from Portugal please add 96€ to the 10x SIT'ABIT Cork Jr. Stool RESELLERS PACK for VAT.  > Perk: 420€  + Additional gift: 96€ = 516€

SHIPPING + PAYMENT

Is international shipping included?
No, except for the SIT’ABIT mini. 
We use major courier companies, so the shipping is available worldwide to most perks. Remember our flat-pack concept always pays off when getting multiple > please check PACK perks !

Note: The payment method used in Indiegogo is the PayPal. So, if you already have an account, you know how it works. Just "Log in to your PayPal account".

If you don´t have a Paypal account, don't worry! You can use it as one time only in "Pay with a credit or debit card",  without paying extra fees. Or just create a Free Paypal Account.

Don't forget to un-check the option PayPal sign up, and choose "Continue without logging in". Then, finish the payment.

 

How much does shipping cost? Why added?
Often more than we wish, sometimes a lot. 
International shipping is not an easy job. We've been working hard to get the better conditions of shipping to various countries.
You must check the Shipping Cost listed in the SHIPPING ZONES and COST TABLES.
It can be a hassle, but don’t despair, please check our Saver Packs and you’ll see why we were born to travel!
We could simply level up the shipping costs and include them in the perk value, raising it. That just wouldn’t be fair. But check this next FAQ…

Shipping to US, Canada and others (Zones 4 and 5 – see table above)
The more we sell the lower this figure will become, it will not go up. 
We won't change the value but we’ll be more than glad to compensate you later in face of success! That may mean adding an AMAZING TREAT that doesn’t increase the shipping, such as our 100% organic cotton, hand-made Tote Bag ! - Retail value of 15€ (20 USD)

When are the perks expected to ship?
As soon as the campaign gives us “thumbs up” we'll be set to immediately start producing.
First to fund first to get it. Priority will be given to first funders and, among those, to the resellers.
We expect to begin shipping yet in November 2015. Not all perks will be shipped this soon, as we will ship in the order that purchases are received.

I can't find an answer to my question on this page, what should i do?
If you have any further questions or just want more informations about the SIT'ABIT please visit our website or send an e-mail to  goeasy@plyeco.com

Português


A PLY&co. é uma marca de mobiliário ecológico, de produção 100% portuguesa, que utiliza madeiras e derivados, provenientes de florestas geridas de forma sustentável e com certificação, tais como, o contraplacado de bétula, o Valchromat® e a cortiça portuguesa.
O conceito base da PLYco. é composto por uma ‘história’ de consciência ambiental que se revela em cada opção tomada desde a concepção das peças até à satisfação dos nossos clientes, passando por princípios como a minimização do desperdício de matérias-primas ou o acabamento, aplicado integralmente à mão por artesãos tradicionais, recorrendo sempre a produtos ecológicos.


As matérias-primas e acessórios foram reduzidos ao máximo, pelo que todas as peças nascem da mesma placa. As poucas "sobras" são recicladas, integrando outros projectos e o serrim também serve para produzir energia.
Trazemos-lhe aqui no INDIEGOGO a nossa pequena grande ideia - o SIT'ABIT !

O SIT'ABIT não é apenas um banco!
É uma peça de mobiliário sofisticada, trabalhada e acabada individual e manualmente, que traz consigo uma historia para contar.
O banco SIT’ABIT é constituído por 3 peças que se encaixam num piscar-de-olhos: sem colas, pregos ou parafusos nem quaisquer ferramentas para o montar!



O banco SIT'ABIT Cork Jr., por exemplo, foi concebido para as crianças, com uma forte componente lúdica e ecológica e é totalmente feito em cortiça - um material natural, simultaneamente resistente e macio.

Com possibilidade de aplicar a diversos usos, desmontável e de armazenamento fácil, reduz os custos de transporte.

Leve-o no nosso Tote-bag feito à mão com algodão 100% orgânico, para onde quer que vá !

Será seu em recompensas superiores a 50€ !

Acreditamos que estamos perante um produto notável de simplicidade da forma com um bom equilíbrio entre a elegância e a preocupação ambiental. Adapta-se facilmente à sua decoração, levando consigo uma história que interessa a todos.






Estamos ‘no mercado’ há algum tempo tendo já alcançado um grande reconhecimento e aplauso dos nossos seguidores e do público nacional em geral, mas queremos chegar até todos!
Isso significa mostrar-nos ao mundo, começando aqui no Indiegogo !
E para atingir este objectivo precisamos: de uma maior produção que nos permita negociar, com os fornecedores locais, melhores preços; optimizar todo o processo de logística de modo a levar a marca aos mercados internacionais, estando presente em feiras de design mundialmente conhecidas.


Precisamos de uma determinada quantidade de encomendas que nos garanta uma produção mínima de modo a entregar mais pelo melhor preço!
Ao dar aqui o seu contributo estará também a revitalizar  a indústria e os ofícios tradicionais, apoiando a economia local e garantindo empregos às pessoas que constituem a PLY&co.

Queremos garantir que as nossas futuras produções sucedam de um modo eficiente, maximizando a sustentabilidade ao garantir emprego aos trabalhadores da prestigiada indústria de carpintaria local, que já viu tempos melhores.
Não é apenas a produção de mais um objecto com função mas acima de tudo simboliza uma atitude para com o planeta e para com a vida.
Vivemos o design intensamente praticando estilos de vida simples e sustentáveis que nos mantêm em contacto com as nossas raízes. Comprometemos-nos a produzir peças versáteis, acabadas manualmente e que promovam uma consciência ambiental e uma ligação de volta à Natureza !


- comprar matéria-prima em quantidade suficiente 
- fazer uma grande encomenda aos nossos fabricantes artesãos locais
- personalizar a nossa embalagem reduzida (impressão em serigrafia)
- garantir a entrega ao nosso contribuidor ao melhor preço

Em seguida, vamos conquistar o mundo! :-) Se nos valoriza, haverão muitos outros que provavelmente também nos valorizarão. 
A web é óptima, mas temos que chegar a meios físicos também. Nomeadamente: feiras e exposições internacionais !


A lã está para a ovelha assim como a cortiça está para a árvore - o sobreiro.


A casca é retirada sem danificar a árvore - que na verdade se torna mais forte e mais saudável após cada descasque, feito por trabalhadores especializados a cada 9 anos. O Montado Português tem o maior número de sobreiros do mundo, apoiado por legislação que zela pela manutenção desse legado.

A cortiça tem excelentes características termo-acústicas e repelentes de água, além de ter um toque e visual acolhedor.

A montagem de encaixe preciso, conseguida através da tecnologia CAD/CAM, é o ponto de partida do trabalho de acabamento manual dado a cada peça por artesãos locais e com produtos não-tóxicos, dando assim ao nosso mobiliário, não só um carácter único, mas também um boleado de contornos suaves.




As peças são montadas sem colas, pregos ou parafusos, promovendo assim a sua posterior reutilização e reciclagem. Assim, o design simples e a montagem por encaixe, revela-se uma experiência divertida e educacional, tanto para as crianças, como para os adultos.
Ao contrário da maioria dos móveis desmontados, este banco monta-se e desmonta-se em menos de 30 segundos!
Numa das suas pernas tem uma pega para o poder levar para qualquer lado, e a sua embalagem reutilizável, plana, permite transportar o banco numa viagem ou apenas guarda-lo em sua casa sempre que necessário.
Com agradáveis e suaves linhas curvas, o SIT'ABIT potencia o entendimento da sua lógica construtiva pelas crianças. É também aí que reside o seu poder didáctico e lúdico.


Com as nossas peças leva-se também uma história para contar aos outros. Especialmente àqueles que continuarão o nosso trabalho - as crianças! Queremos que eles também sejam empreendedores ambientais juntamente com a PLY&co.!
As crianças adoram interagir de forma segura com ele. A versão Cork Jr. é integralmente à prova de danos e nele o seu filho encontrará um repousante amigo num intervalo entre brincadeiras!!

A redução do volume de transporte através do armazenamento plano do banco permite levar o SIT’ABIT para qualquer lado. Também para actividades ao ar livre!





Não estamos perante uma peça de mobiliário que recorre à alta tecnologia, mas sim como um simples banco pode fazer-nos regressar à Natureza e ao ser humano.

A riqueza vem com a história da consciência ambiental que está por trás deste processo!


"A atitude com que a PLY&co. se apresentou no panorama do design e no mercado tem uma curiosa "frescura". A associação dos materiais tradicionais portugueses com um desenho essencial, puro e elegante, são as características dos produtos. As formas "práticas" que os objetos declaram são um exemplo de como as coisas bem realizadas podem ser uma ferramenta indispensável no nosso dia-a-dia."   Roberto Cremascoli, arquitecto, 
Curador do Remade in Portugal

“Sendo a cortiça um material exemplar na vertente da sustentabilidade por ser um produto natural, renovável e reciclável, a concepção do banco SIT’ABIT da PLY&co. assenta perfeitamente na mesma lógica da cortiça: nada se desperdiça, tudo se transforma!"
Lino Rocha
Amorim Cork Composites Manager

"The stool found a great spot in my apartment. It feels good to see people that truly believe in their project, especially when these are beautiful.
I didn't expect to find this in a music festival and it was a really good surprise.
Thank you very much!"
Mathieu Bonnin, cliente de Paris, França

"The SIT’ABIT stools are super! They're perfect for the adults and the children in our house and I'm a huge fan of the photo frames.
I love the shape and design, I have 3 now, all different colours but due to the unifying design they work really well together.
Thanks again!"
Claire Ransom, cliente do Reino Unido



 

Qualquer dúvida sobre o envio para o seu país, não hesite em CONTACTAR-NOS !  goeasy@plyeco.com

Tenha em atenção a redução nas taxas de envio para encomendas múltiplas/ PACKS! (veja as recompensas nº 7, 8, 10 e 11 ) 
Visto as nossas peças serem desmontáveis e com embalagem compacta...
Convença os seus amigos a apoiar esta campanha e poupe no envio e na pegada ecológica !

É fácil de transportar, mesmo no avião! Entrega local disponível para todos!

Visite o Porto e reduza a pegada - Faça-nos uma visita, leve-os consigo e poupe mais a sua carteira e o Planeta, levando também... o elegante tote-BAG em algodão orgânico!

• O nosso objectivo é entregar todas as peças antes de Dezembro, mas a data vai depender da quantidade de bancos encomendados.

Nota: será dada prioridade aos primeiros contribuidores e, entre esses, aos revendedores.

*Sabemos que não parece uma grande melhoria nem iremos colocar uma slot USB em nenhuma parte do banco, mas exige Pesquisa & Desenvolvimento para alcançar o que muitos dos nossos seguidores nos pedem:
Smart Simplicity ! Produzir este adorável banco de cortiça em tamanho adulto!

E POR QUE AINDA NÃO O FIZEMOS?
A cortiça é um material resistente, mas flexível. A fim de ter uma boa estabilidade aumentamos a espessura das peças do actual banco SIT’ABIT CORK Jr. para 25 mm, de modo a aguentar com segurança o peso de uma pessoa até 70 kg. Mas, para crescer em altura de 35 para 45 centímetros (+ 10 cm) e a carga até 120 kg precisamos de tempo e ensaios para o garantir sem perder o nosso conceito simples e ecológico.
Isso é o que iremos fazer dando aos nossos financiadores a oportunidade de o comprar mais tarde a um preço de lançamento surpreendente !




Somos arquitectos e designers apaixonados pelo bom design e a vida saudável.


Sendo designers experientes, sabemos que cada projecto acarreta riscos... No entanto, uma vez que já produzimos estas peças algumas vezes, o risco associado à gestão de uma produção maior é reduzido.
Na verdade, o maior risco seria uma enorme quantidade de pedidos mas, assim que adquirirmos sucesso que permita fazer a GRANDE ENCOMENDA, imediatamente garantiremos um lugar seguro na agenda dos nossos fornecedores.
Entretanto, seremos transparentes e mantê-los-emos informados sobre o progresso da campanha.


 “… ligar o artesanato ao processo industrial, de modo a que o produto tenha algumas imperfeições, um toque humano e que assim as pessoas se identifiquem mais com ele. A manualidade num produto mostra que o seu design tem mais a ver com a condição humana, com o quotidiano.”
Hella Jongerius


Muito obrigado por nos ajudar a crescer !
