PLY&co. is a Portuguese brand of ecological furniture established in Porto, Portugal, that only uses woods and derivatives from sustainably managed forests, namely birch plywood, Valchromat® and Portuguese cork.

Our concept minimizes the waste of the raw materials and promotes an entirely manual finishing, with ecologic products, by traditional craftsmen.







The raw materials used and fittings were reduced to the maximum, so that all the pieces are born of the same board. The few “leftovers” go for recycling and saw dust for energy producing. 
We bring you here on Indiegogo our small big idea - the SIT'ABIT !


SIT'ABIT is not just a stool. 
It is made from wood, without chopping forests down! A cool piece of furniture crafted with individual care and holding a story to tell.
Composed by just 3 pieces that fit together at a shake of a lamb’s tail: no glue, nails or screws, nor any tools for setting it up! 



For example, the SIT’ABIT Cork Jr. is a seriously playful and ecological children’s stool, made of this unique natural material, resistant yet soft, that is cork, is a didactic yet funny piece. 


Dismountable it allows flexibility of use, easy storage and the transportation costs get reduced.

Take it in our 100% organic cotton, hand-made Tote Bag anywhere you go !
It will be yours with perks above 50€ !

We eliminated all complexity, resulting in a minimal form that holds elegant simplicity while being a friend of Nature. SIT'ABIT is a cool, remarkable product that will catches the eye… and  conveys a story that matters to all.























We are "on the market" for sometime now, acquiring great applause and continuous reconaissance from our peers and national public but we want to deliver more to the most!
This means showing our work to the world, starting here on Indiegogo !
If successful, we'll take it to selected fairs and exhibitions, for which we are often invited to, but can´t afford the cost!
And to reach this we need the usual: a bigger production run that enables us to negotiate the best prices with our local suppliers and optimize logistics, rewarding your support and attaining cash-flow to do the following...




... we need a certain amount of orders that ensures us a minimum production to deliver more at the best prices ! 
By helping us in this process, we'll continue supporting the pretty much depleted local economy, ensuring the jobs of the people that make PLY&co.

We want to ensure our future productions run efficiently, maximizing sustainability, by providing work to us and our local specialized wood-workers, that are living not-so-easy times.
What we do are not just more stuff with a function; above all they must symbolize an attitude towards the planet and towards life. You see, we love design, yet we live simple and sustainable lifestyles that keep us in touch with our roots right here in Portugal, taking care in producing individual, hand crafted, versatile pieces that, above all, connect us back to Nature!










- buying the best quality materials; 
- placing a substantial order to the CNC-milling providers; 
- paying for local craftsmen to finish it; 
- making our reduced packaging customized (manual silk screen print);
- delivering your stool(s) to you.
Then, we'll conquer the world! :-) If you value us, there are a lot more that probably will too.
The web is great, but we must go physical too. We named it: trade shows and international exhibitions !













Pretty much like the lambs wool the cork is the bark of this peculiar Mediterranean tree: the sobreiro (cork oak).

The bark is peeled without harming the tree - which actually becomes stronger and healthier after each crop - by specialized labourers every 9 years. 
The Portuguese Montado has the biggest number of cork oaks in the world, whereas strong legislation monitors the keeping of this legacy.

Cork has great thermal, acoustic and water repellent characteristics besides its cozy touch and looks. A material that keeps the best wines and champagnes ageing for better speaks for itself.


In order to make this possible, accurate snap-fit assembling, achieved through CAD/CAM technology is the base of the craftsmen’s work that hand-finish each piece, with local artisans and non-toxic products, giving our furniture its character but also an actual good fit and ability for the user to maintain it.





 





The pieces are assembled without glues, nails or screws, thereby promoting its reuse and later recycling. As well, the simple design and snap-fit assemblage reveals an educational and joyful experience for children and grown-ups.
The stool isn't a pain to put together like other ready-to-assemble furniture. It is assembled or taken apart in less than 30 seconds!  
It features a handle on one of its legs and is very practical to take, to travel or to store away with its reusable packaging when not needed.
With a smooth safe design it aims boosting the understanding of the constructive logic by children. Therein lies its educational and playful power.


With these products one also takes a story to tell to others. Especially to the ones that will continue our work – the children! We want them to also be an environmental entrepreneur along with PLY&co.!
Kids love to safely interact with it. And the cork stool is pretty much damage-proof. Its child-friendliness and safety indeed invite kids to hang around with it, finding a restful friend when tired of playing…!

The amount of packaging is reduced as well, making it possible to go with the SIT'ABIT anywhere. Take it outdoors and enjoy the lawn even when it’s wet.


















It’s not about intricate high-tech features but how simple things can connect us back to Nature and to each other. 




Richness comes with the Storytelling of the sustainable process behind stuff!










"The attitude that PLY&co. introduced in the market and design panorama has a curious freshness. The combination of traditional Portuguese materials with an essential design, pure and elegant, are pramount in these products. The practical forms they declare are an example of how well-made objects can be an indispensable tool in our day-to-day. " 
Roberto Cremascoli, architectCurator of the Remade in Portugal
"Cork is an exemplary material in the area of sustainability for being a natural product, renewable and recyclable. The conception of the SIT'ABIT stool matches perfectly with the whole cork logic: nothing is wasted, everything is transformed!"
Lino Rocha
Amorim Cork Composites Manager
"The stool found a great spot in my apartment. It feels good to see people that truly believe in their project, especially when these are beautiful.
I didn't expect to find this in a music festival and it was a really good surprise.Thank you very much!"Mathieu Bonnin, client from Paris, France


"The SIT’ABIT stools are super! They're perfect for the adults and the children in our house and I'm a huge fan of the photo frames.
I love the shape and design, I have 3 now, all different colours but due to the unifying design they work really well together.Thanks again!"Claire Ransom, client from the UK














Any doubts about the shipping to your country, please CONTACT US !   goeasy@plyeco.com




Our flat-pack concept always pays off when contributing more!
Engage your friends on this campaign and save more ! 
> Please check the PACK perks, nr. 7, 8, 10 and 11 above !




It's easy to carry, even as aircraft cabin luggage ! 
Local pick-up available to all !
Travel to Porto and reduce the footprint - Pay us a visit, take it with you and save more, taking also a bio tote-bag for free (or the paid shipping cost in equivalent perks value).
A win-win situation.


• We aim to deliver all items before December, the date will depend on how many stools are ordered, if we can do it faster, we will.
Note: priority will be given to first funders and, among those, to the resellers



*We know it doesn’t look a huge improvement nor we'll put an USB slot anywhere, but it does require Research & Development to achieve what many grow-up’s ask from us: 
Smart simplicity ! Just having this cool and friendly cork stool made bigger! 
BUT WHY WE CANT MAKE IT RIGHT NOW ?
Cork is a durable yet flexible material. In order to have stability we improved
the thickness of the actual stool's parts to 25mm, to safely carry the weight
of a person up to 70kg. But to extend the height 10cm more, from 35 to 45cm and the load up to 120kg we need time and testing to achieve it, without losing our simple, affordable and honest concept.
That’s what we’ll aim for, giving our funders the opportunity to buy it later at an astonishing launching price !









We are architects and designers that love good design and healthy living.



As designers with years of experience, we know that every project comes with risks... However, since we already produced some small runs, there is little ones associated with
managing a bigger production.
Bigger risk would actually be a HUGE amount of orders, while a blessing it could also cause some delays. In order to overcome that as soon as we acquire success to order large quantities, we'll secure a safe place at our suppliers agenda.
And we will always be transparent and keep everyone appraised about the progress of things.






 “…to connect craftsmanship with the industrial process so that you can have some imperfections, more human touch in the product, so that people also connect themselves with it. Craftsmanship in a product shows that a design is about human condition, is about daily life.”
Hella Jongerius



Thank you so much for supporting us growing ! 











CHARACTERISTICS

What are the dimensions and weight of the SIT'ABITs?
SIT’ABIT Cork jr. mm: W260 x L260 x H350 / in: 10,23”x10,23”x13,77” weight 2,4kg /5,28lbs
SIT’ABIT adult size mm: W300 x L300 x H450 / in: 11,81”x11,81”x17,71” weight 3,3kg / 7,26lbs
SIT’ABIT HIGH mm: W300 x L300 x H750 / in: 11,81”x11,81”x29,53” weight 5kg / 11,02lbs


Is the SITABIT waterproof?
				It has been designed without electronic components to hassle you. Therefore it withstands harsh environments and weather conditions. As any wooden piece shouldn’t be left wet for long. A dry cloth will do it, the Cork version even comes with a fine sandpaper to remove stains or scribbles. Easy, safe and simple.
Can I keep my stools shiny and new?
As long as you’re not the kind of person that can’t tell a pair of pliers from a screwdriver you will.
The finishings are either RAW (fine sanding, varnishes free), ECO (natural waxes and oils) or ECO-Dur (water based matt varnish). The first 2 are totally DIY maintainable and the 3rd only goes over the birch plywood and is stronger yet very easy to renew if deeply scratched.

I'm 1,80m / 6"4, Can the stool be bigger?
Besides the 2 SIZES - Junior (Cork) and Adult (Birch) - we have a fine barstool version that you can order, benefiting from your 20% discount, and making sure you’ll be the master of entertaining among your friends. 
PRODUCTION
Where are the SIT’ABIT made?
				100% produced in Portugal. 
95% of the raw material is Portuguese and the rest is from Europe. 
We want Children to only PLAY WITH, not DOING THEM.

Is there a warranty?
				Yes, we offer a standard 2 years warranty against manufacturer’s defects. (but the fact that our products are free from messy High-Tech features gives us confidence to assure you a flawless product).

* Important: The finishing process lends itself to small variations. Those just highlight
the artisanal nature of the project, as each SIT’ABIT is finished by hand and
absolutely unique, just like the trees are.
** Outside the E.U.? Please
be aware that certain items may be subject to import duties. As far as we
know, this shouldn't be a problem with our items but we thought it’s worth
mentioning. Please inform yourself.
RESSELERS
I run a business and would like to resell the SITABIT, what should I do?
Briefly: head on! 
Please consider the RESELLERS PACK (and you can double your pledge at any level to order a larger number of SITABITs !). 
If you are a reseller and want to get more than one 10x SIT'ABIT Cork Jr. Stool RESELLERS PACK, please contact us (goeasy@plyeco.com) to know about especially advantageous shipping costs for more than 10 SIT’ABITs.
Who can choose the Reseller Pack?
				The Reseller Pack is only for resellers with a VAT ID number (e-store, retail shop, design center, museum shop,etc...).

Does the Reseller Pack include VAT?
No. This perk is taxed at 0% VAT for all countries except Portugal. 
Resellers from Portugal please add 96€ to the 10x SIT'ABIT Cork Jr. Stool RESELLERS PACK for VAT.  > Perk: 420€  + Additional gift: 96€ = 516€

SHIPPING + PAYMENT

Is international shipping included?
No, except for the SIT’ABIT mini. 
We use major courier companies, so the shipping is available worldwide to most perks. Remember our flat-pack concept always pays off when getting multiple > please check PACK perks !


Note: The payment method used in Indiegogo is the PayPal. So, if you already have an account, you know how it works. Just "Log in to your PayPal account".


If you don´t have a Paypal account, don't worry! You can use it as one time only in "Pay with a credit or debit card",  without paying extra fees. Or just create a Free Paypal Account.



Don't forget to un-check the option PayPal sign up, and choose "Continue without logging in". Then, finish the payment.


 




How much does shipping cost? Why added?
Often more than we wish, sometimes a lot. 
International shipping is not an easy job. We've been working hard to get the better conditions of shipping to various countries.
You must check the Shipping Cost listed in the SHIPPING ZONES and COST TABLES.
It can be a hassle, but don’t despair, please check our Saver Packs and you’ll see why we were born to travel!
We could simply level up the shipping costs and include them in the perk value, raising it. That just wouldn’t be fair. But check this next FAQ…
Shipping to US, Canada and others (Zones 4 and 5 – see table above)
The more we sell the lower this figure will become, it will not go up. 
We won't change the value but we’ll be more than glad to compensate you later in face of success! That may mean adding an AMAZING TREAT that doesn’t increase the shipping, such as our 100% organic cotton, hand-made Tote Bag ! - Retail value of 15€ (20 USD)
When are the perks expected to ship?
As soon as the campaign gives us “thumbs up” we'll be set to immediately start producing.
First to fund first to get it. Priority will be given to first funders and, among those, to the resellers.
We expect to begin shipping yet in November 2015. Not all perks will be shipped this soon, as we will ship in the order that purchases are received.
I can't find an answer to my question on this page, what should i do?
If you have any further questions or just want more informations about the SIT'ABIT please visit our website or send an e-mail to  goeasy@plyeco.com

...........................................................................................................................................
Português





A PLY&co. é uma marca de mobiliário ecológico, de produção 100% portuguesa, que utiliza madeiras e derivados, provenientes de florestas geridas de forma sustentável e com certificação, tais como, o contraplacado de bétula, o Valchromat® e a cortiça portuguesa.
O conceito base da PLYco. é composto por uma ‘história’ de consciência ambiental que se revela em cada opção tomada desde a concepção das peças até à satisfação dos nossos clientes, passando por princípios como a minimização do desperdício de matérias-primas ou o acabamento, aplicado integralmente à mão por artesãos tradicionais, recorrendo sempre a produtos ecológicos.




As matérias-primas e acessórios foram reduzidos ao máximo, pelo que todas as peças nascem da mesma placa. As poucas "sobras" são recicladas, integrando outros projectos e o serrim também serve para produzir energia.
Trazemos-lhe aqui no INDIEGOGO a nossa pequena grande ideia - o SIT'ABIT !


O SIT'ABIT não é apenas um banco!
É uma peça de mobiliário sofisticada, trabalhada e acabada individual e manualmente, que traz consigo uma historia para contar.
O banco SIT’ABIT é constituído por 3 peças que se encaixam num piscar-de-olhos: sem colas, pregos ou parafusos nem quaisquer ferramentas para o montar!




O banco SIT'ABIT Cork Jr., por exemplo, foi concebido para as crianças, com uma forte componente lúdica e ecológica e é totalmente feito em cortiça - um material natural, simultaneamente resistente e macio.



Com possibilidade de aplicar a diversos usos, desmontável e de armazenamento fácil, reduz os custos de transporte.Leve-o no nosso Tote-bag feito à mão com algodão 100% orgânico, para onde quer que vá !Será seu em recompensas superiores a 50€ !
Acreditamos que estamos perante um produto notável de simplicidade da forma com um bom equilíbrio entre a elegância e a preocupação ambiental. Adapta-se facilmente à sua decoração, levando consigo uma história que interessa a todos.



















Estamos ‘no mercado’ há algum tempo tendo já alcançado um grande reconhecimento e aplauso dos nossos seguidores e do público nacional em geral, mas queremos chegar até todos!
Isso significa mostrar-nos ao mundo, começando aqui no Indiegogo !
E para atingir este objectivo precisamos: de uma maior produção que nos permita negociar, com os fornecedores locais, melhores preços; optimizar todo o processo de logística de modo a levar a marca aos mercados internacionais, estando presente em feiras de design mundialmente conhecidas.







Precisamos de uma determinada quantidade de encomendas que nos garanta uma produção mínima de modo a entregar mais pelo melhor preço!
Ao dar aqui o seu contributo estará também a revitalizar  a indústria e os ofícios tradicionais, apoiando a economia local e garantindo empregos às pessoas que constituem a PLY&co.


Queremos garantir que as nossas futuras produções sucedam de um modo eficiente, maximizando a sustentabilidade ao garantir emprego aos trabalhadores da prestigiada indústria de carpintaria local, que já viu tempos melhores.
Não é apenas a produção de mais um objecto com função mas acima de tudo simboliza uma atitude para com o planeta e para com a vida.Vivemos o design intensamente praticando estilos de vida simples e sustentáveis que nos mantêm em contacto com as nossas raízes. Comprometemos-nos a produzir peças versáteis, acabadas manualmente e que promovam uma consciência ambiental e uma ligação de volta à Natureza !








- comprar matéria-prima em quantidade suficiente 
- fazer uma grande encomenda aos nossos fabricantes artesãos locais
- personalizar a nossa embalagem reduzida (impressão em serigrafia)
- garantir a entrega ao nosso contribuidor ao melhor preço
Em seguida, vamos conquistar o mundo! :-) Se nos valoriza, haverão muitos outros que provavelmente também nos valorizarão. 
A web é óptima, mas temos que chegar a meios físicos também. Nomeadamente: feiras e exposições internacionais !







A lã está para a ovelha assim como a cortiça está para a árvore - o sobreiro.


A casca é retirada sem danificar a árvore - que na verdade se torna mais forte e mais saudável após cada descasque, feito por trabalhadores especializados a cada 9 anos. O Montado Português tem o maior número de sobreiros do mundo, apoiado por legislação que zela pela manutenção desse legado.

A cortiça tem excelentes características termo-acústicas e repelentes de água, além de ter um toque e visual acolhedor.



A montagem de encaixe preciso, conseguida através da tecnologia CAD/CAM, é o ponto de partida do trabalho de acabamento manual dado a cada peça por artesãos locais e com produtos não-tóxicos, dando assim ao nosso mobiliário, não só um carácter único, mas também um boleado de contornos suaves.









As peças são montadas sem colas, pregos ou parafusos, promovendo assim a sua
posterior reutilização e reciclagem. Assim, o design simples e a montagem por encaixe, revela-se uma experiência divertida e educacional, tanto para as crianças, como para os adultos.
Ao contrário da maioria dos móveis desmontados, este banco monta-se e desmonta-se em menos de 30 segundos!
Numa das suas pernas tem uma pega para o poder levar para qualquer lado, e a sua embalagem reutilizável, plana, permite transportar o banco numa viagem ou apenas guarda-lo em sua casa sempre que necessário.
Com agradáveis e suaves linhas curvas, o SIT'ABIT potencia o entendimento da sua lógica construtiva pelas crianças. É também aí que reside o seu poder didáctico e lúdico.

Com as nossas peças leva-se também uma história para contar aos outros. Especialmente àqueles que continuarão o nosso trabalho - as crianças! Queremos que eles também sejam empreendedores ambientais juntamente com a PLY&co.!
As crianças adoram interagir de forma segura com ele. A versão Cork Jr. é integralmente à prova de danos e nele o seu filho encontrará um repousante amigo num intervalo entre brincadeiras!!


A redução do volume de transporte através do armazenamento plano do banco permite levar o SIT’ABIT para qualquer lado. Também para actividades ao ar livre!















Não estamos perante uma peça de mobiliário que recorre à alta tecnologia, mas sim como um simples banco pode fazer-nos regressar à Natureza e ao ser humano.



A riqueza vem com a história da consciência ambiental que está por trás deste processo!









"A atitude com que a PLY&co. se apresentou no panorama do design e no mercado tem uma curiosa "frescura". A associação dos materiais tradicionais portugueses com um desenho essencial, puro e elegante, são as características dos produtos. As formas "práticas" que os objetos declaram são um exemplo de como as coisas bem realizadas podem ser uma ferramenta indispensável no nosso dia-a-dia."   Roberto Cremascoli, arquitecto, Curador do Remade in Portugal
“Sendo a cortiça um material exemplar na vertente da sustentabilidade por ser um produto natural, renovável e reciclável, a concepção do banco SIT’ABIT da PLY&co. assenta perfeitamente na mesma lógica da cortiça: nada se desperdiça, tudo se transforma!"
Lino Rocha
Amorim Cork Composites Manager

"The stool found a great spot in my apartment. It feels good to see people that truly believe in their project, especially when these are beautiful.I didn't expect to find this in a music festival and it was a really good surprise.Thank you very much!"Mathieu Bonnin, cliente de Paris, França

"The SIT’ABIT stools are super! They're perfect for the adults and the children in our house and I'm a huge fan of the photo frames.I love the shape and design, I have 3 now, all different colours but due to the unifying design they work really well together.Thanks again!"Claire Ransom, cliente do Reino Unido





 










Qualquer dúvida sobre o envio para o seu país, não hesite em CONTACTAR-NOS !  goeasy@plyeco.com




Tenha em atenção a redução nas taxas de envio para encomendas múltiplas/ PACKS! (veja as recompensas nº 7, 8, 10 e 11 ) 
Visto as nossas peças serem desmontáveis e com embalagem compacta...
Convença os seus amigos a apoiar esta campanha e poupe no envio e na pegada ecológica !



É fácil de transportar, mesmo no avião! Entrega local disponível para todos!
Visite o Porto e reduza a pegada - Faça-nos uma visita, leve-os consigo e poupe mais a sua carteira e o Planeta, levando também... o elegante tote-BAG em algodão orgânico!




• O nosso objectivo é entregar todas as peças antes de Dezembro, mas a data vai depender da quantidade de bancos encomendados.
Nota: será dada prioridade aos primeiros contribuidores e, entre esses, aos revendedores.



*Sabemos que não parece uma grande melhoria nem iremos colocar uma slot USB em nenhuma parte do banco, mas exige Pesquisa & Desenvolvimento para alcançar o que muitos dos nossos seguidores nos pedem:
Smart Simplicity ! Produzir este adorável banco de cortiça em tamanho adulto!
E POR QUE AINDA NÃO O FIZEMOS?
A cortiça é um material resistente, mas flexível. A fim de ter uma boa estabilidade aumentamos a espessura das peças do actual banco SIT’ABIT CORK Jr. para 25 mm, de modo a aguentar com segurança o peso de uma pessoa até 70 kg. Mas, para crescer em altura de 35 para 45 centímetros (+ 10 cm) e a carga até 120 kg precisamos de tempo e ensaios para o garantir sem perder o nosso conceito simples e ecológico.
Isso é o que iremos fazer dando aos nossos financiadores a oportunidade de o comprar mais tarde a um preço de lançamento surpreendente !









Somos arquitectos e designers apaixonados pelo bom design e a vida saudável.




Sendo designers experientes, sabemos que cada projecto acarreta riscos... No entanto, uma vez que já produzimos estas peças algumas vezes, o risco associado à gestão de uma produção maior é reduzido.
Na verdade, o maior risco seria uma enorme quantidade de pedidos mas, assim que adquirirmos sucesso que permita fazer a GRANDE ENCOMENDA, imediatamente garantiremos um lugar seguro na agenda dos nossos fornecedores.
Entretanto, seremos transparentes e mantê-los-emos informados sobre o progresso da campanha.







 “… ligar o artesanato ao processo industrial, de modo a que o produto tenha algumas imperfeições, um toque humano e que assim as pessoas se identifiquem mais com ele. A manualidade num produto mostra que o seu design tem mais a ver com a condição humana, com o quotidiano.”
Hella Jongerius





Muito obrigado por nos ajudar a crescer ! 







NOTA: Por respeito à tradição e à língua portuguesa este texto não foi escrito ao abrigo do novo acordo ortográfico.

story:
The product you're about to explore maybe the health and wellness product of the century. The current status of the mattress industry is that they continue to use outdated mattress technology based on industry age technology. This is why this industry is so confusing to the general populate. My name is John Baxter, I'm the founder of Anti Aging Bed®. We  created a new category of sleep, that will transform the way the world sleeps. This groundbreaking technology utilizes 2 US approved patents we created over 5 years ago.  This secures our place as a recognized category of sleep that celebrity doctors, top engineers, and myself helped create and pioneer. This technology was built in the information age using modern electron, nano, and ion technologies where the Anti Aging Bed® was born.
 

 

Many items in this sleep system have never been done before. It took five years to create this product. I'm also a innovator in this space so I've taken on and actually beat billion dollar corporations in federal court. This disruption in the industry was started long ago as I've been a veteran in the mattress industry started nearly 20 years ago. I came to this industry after severely injuring my neck. It has been my passion to not only help others. I've always been searching and create technologies that would improve overall health and sleep. In my wildest dreams I never thought I would be the chosen one to bring this to the world. As an innovator that wants to do nothing more  than to help others and myself, I had the passion to push through many obstacles technological, financial, and competitor related.

This project is bigger than myself. Our orders are about ready to ship as our prototype was over 5 years in the making. We are disrupting the industry once again and I'm doing it with you. There will be incentives if you wish to join me and others transform the way the world sleeps! :)

 

 

We have worked on our prototypes for 5 years. Before I go completely public with it, I was wanting to start a kickstarter campaign to see how we could do. I believe it could truly catapult this new sleep category that helps all of us. We need help, I've put all my eggs in one basket, and I did all this with my own money. We need more inventory. The company currently has no debt; However, we need more money to develop new products technology. We want this product all over the world. Product is 100% USA made! We are even wanting to launch a pet bed that can offer the same for benefits for pets. The great thing our product is that it is ready, products will ship relatively quickly since the product and manufacturing side is already completed. We gave you a significant discount over our website for our kickstarter supports. Thank You!

SOME SAY THIS IS THE BEST VIDEO TO EXPLAIN THE TECHNOLOGY!!

 

INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW THIS STUFF WORKS!!!

story:
Hey y'all! Based out of the great state of Texas, we are Dove and Devin, a father and son team that has been in business together for the last 6 years as a general contractor.  It wasn't until about a month before finishing our last project that Dove came up with the idea of the screwless wall plates that simply push directly onto electrical outlets and switches. Before going forward full steam ahead with our new wall plates,  we were focused on finishing our construction project while sticking to our motto of "under promise and over deliver". However, after completing the project, we are sitting in a meeting with a custom design team out of Plano, Texas to get started on our new project that we have become so passionate about!

 

The birth of Push Plates™  

 

 

Revolutionizing the original outlet and switch plate covers, our 100% screwless Push Plates™ (patent pending) are made of a single mold application. Now featuring a prong instead of the unsightly screws, our wall plates make for a clean, modern look. Push Plates™ install with ease and take as little as 1 second to push on. Home owners and contractors can now save time and money without having to worry about dropping, losing or overtightening screws. We also understand the hassle, time and money it creates for contractors having to service call backs because of cracked wall plates or hot screws...but no longer is that the case! Our new and improved wall plates are 100% non conductive and screw free, which means no more overtightening or hot screws! 

 

The Look

   You'll never look at wall plates the same again. After researching almost every wall plate on the market and talking to several of the experts about what's selling, we've decided to start by offering 4 of the most common and widely used styles in white. With screws no longer a part of the equation, the first thing you'll notice is the clean design of the front of our Push Plates™. Once installed you will admire the transformation it makes to your home or business. With the clean, modern look you'll be sure to capture the attention of your friends and guests! 

 

 

How they Install

   On the back of Push Plates™ are the one-of-a kind prong feature that aligns and fits perfectly into the screw holes on any electrical outlet or switch. Once removing our wall plates from the plastic packaging and removing your old wall plate from the electrical device, you will simply align the prongs of the Push Plates™ with the screw holes of your electrical device and push on. It's as simple as 1,2,3! 

 

 

 

Where We Stand

   We have been working non-stop since the end of March to bring our idea from concept to your household! Now that we have 4 well perfected prototypes, our team is excited to announce that the contract is currently being finalized with manufacturing! Simultaneously, we are working on getting Push Plates™ UL listed to meet the electrical standards for safety requirements, along with talking to distribution to ensure we offer our customers great pricing. 

 

 

 

 

 

The Vision of Push Plates™

      Our team is working diligently to get the first round of orders delivered before Christmas! Having already found an excellent local design team, executed our 4 prototypes that are going to market, working with one of the top custom injection mold manufacturers right here in the USA, currently executing the contract and on the way to manufacturing our first Push Plates™. We are looking for your help!

A fixed goal of $75K will allow us to do the following: 

  • Purchase the first round of orders and start the first production runs!
  • Purchase and install automated software programing!
  • Marketing and Sales 
  • Ship the first round of Push Plates™  

 

 

Keeping Up 

    Like and follow Push Plates™ on our website, social media and right here to keep up with our latest news! From the bottom of our hearts, we are so thankful and greatly appreciate your help! Whether you are telling your friends or have donated directly to our campaign, we are so honored to have you be a part of the journey of taking Push Plates™ from its current prototypes to a reality across America!  Thank you for visiting! 

 

Can't Donate? No Problem!

   We understand that not everyone is able to donate, however, if you like our product and feel like helping in another way. Please see how to help us below:

  • Tell your friends and family about Push Plates™
  • Invite people to check out our website and Indiegogo!
  •  Share our story using the sharing tools offered at the top of our Indiegogo campaign! 
  •  Send us what you think! 

 

 

Thank you, Push Plates™ Team
story_txt:
Hey y'all! Based out of the great state of Texas, we are Dove and Devin, a father and son team that has been in business together for the last 6 years as a general contractor.  It wasn't until about a month before finishing our last project that Dove came up with the idea of the screwless wall plates that simply push directly onto electrical outlets and switches. Before going forward full steam ahead with our new wall plates,  we were focused on finishing our construction project while sticking to our motto of "under promise and over deliver". However, after completing the project, we are sitting in a meeting with a custom design team out of Plano, Texas to get started on our new project that we have become so passionate about!
 
The birth of Push Plates™  
 

 
Revolutionizing the original outlet and switch plate covers, our 100% screwless Push Plates™ (patent pending) are made of a single mold application. Now featuring a prong instead of the unsightly screws, our wall plates make for a clean, modern look. Push Plates™ install with ease and take as little as 1 second to push on. Home owners and contractors can now save time and money without having to worry about dropping, losing or overtightening screws. We also understand the hassle, time and money it creates for contractors having to service call backs because of cracked wall plates or hot screws...but no longer is that the case! Our new and improved wall plates are 100% non conductive and screw free, which means no more overtightening or hot screws! 
 


The Look
   You'll never look at wall plates the same again. After researching almost every wall plate on the market and talking to several of the experts about what's selling, we've decided to start by offering 4 of the most common and widely used styles in white. With screws no longer a part of the equation, the first thing you'll notice is the clean design of the front of our Push Plates™. Once installed you will admire the transformation it makes to your home or business. With the clean, modern look you'll be sure to capture the attention of your friends and guests! 
 


 
How they Install
   On the back of Push Plates™ are the one-of-a kind prong feature that aligns and fits perfectly into the screw holes on any electrical outlet or switch. Once removing our wall plates from the plastic packaging and removing your old wall plate from the electrical device, you will simply align the prongs of the Push Plates™ with the screw holes of your electrical device and push on. It's as simple as 1,2,3! 
 
 


 
Where We Stand
   We have been working non-stop since the end of March to bring our idea from concept to your household! Now that we have 4 well perfected prototypes, our team is excited to announce that the contract is currently being finalized with manufacturing! Simultaneously, we are working on getting Push Plates™ UL listed to meet the electrical standards for safety requirements, along with talking to distribution to ensure we offer our customers great pricing. 
 
 

 
 


 
The Vision of Push Plates™
      Our team is working diligently to get the first round of orders delivered before Christmas! Having already found an excellent local design team, executed our 4 prototypes that are going to market, working with one of the top custom injection mold manufacturers right here in the USA, currently executing the contract and on the way to manufacturing our first Push Plates™. We are looking for your help!
A fixed goal of $75K will allow us to do the following: 

Purchase the first round of orders and start the first production runs!
Purchase and install automated software programing!
Marketing and Sales 
Ship the first round of Push Plates™  

 


 
Keeping Up 
    Like and follow Push Plates™ on our website, social media and right here to keep up with our latest news! From the bottom of our hearts, we are so thankful and greatly appreciate your help! Whether you are telling your friends or have donated directly to our campaign, we are so honored to have you be a part of the journey of taking Push Plates™ from its current prototypes to a reality across America!  Thank you for visiting! 
 
Can't Donate? No Problem!
   We understand that not everyone is able to donate, however, if you like our product and feel like helping in another way. Please see how to help us below:

Tell your friends and family about Push Plates™
Invite people to check out our website and Indiegogo!
 Share our story using the sharing tools offered at the top of our Indiegogo campaign! 
 Send us what you think! 

  Thank you, Push Plates™ Team

story:
MrIdeas is a young startup that was founded to make artificial intelligence accessible to everyone. We created Murphy, the first vocal command drone that uses artificial intelligence to interact with humans.

Have you ever heard of Murphy's law? Anything that can possibly go wrong, does. Murphy, your little friend, challenges the paradox itself: anything that can possibly go right, does.

Murphy is the most advanced home robot ever made at a price that means you can actually bring him home. He begins to fulfill the promise of living with robots in ways we’ve only seen in science-fiction movies. He’s a curious little guy who is aware of his surroundings. He can see, hear, and feel, allowing him to react naturally to the world around him.

However, his most remarkable feature is life. Murphy feels alive.

Murphy will be ready for shipment in late November and is currently available for the Indiegogo community. We have chosen to make it available here before for two main reasons:

1. The Indiegogo community invests in the future. We are creating a world where robots have relationships with people and improve our lives. We are looking for people with the same mentality to be the first to bring him home.

2. Murphy will be shipped in late November, but it is only the beginning. We want it to come at a lower cost to people who want to help us determine its future. It is you! To do this we want your help to identify future features and functionality. And if you want to go even deeper, you will have early access to Murphy's software development kit (SDK) so you can tinker with its impressive technology array.

 

Home care

Murphy represents a revolution, as we are talking about a voice-activated mini-drone that can turn on its own and manage your home. Murphy is able to recognize and interact with people. Murphy is part of the "Age of Experience" philosophy which aims to transform the way we take care of ourselves and our family, to personalize our homes and meet individual needs.

 

The best sharing

A small robot that thanks to artificial intelligence is able to control appliances and connected accesses, find solutions or call in case of problems. Murphy silently helps to adjust some IoTs, such as curtains, lights, starting a vacuum cleaner, and turning on the TV. Murphy also features AI functionality to act as a fitness assistant and help users to stay fit.

 

Interaction and more

Murphy is made up of 3 types of switchable wing and 1 body. Murphy can play an interaction with smart home equipment; reminder for its owner, detection of falls for the elderly, an additional entertainment function for pets in the absence of their owner and sending videos of what is happening at home.

 

 

Murphy's Tech

Murphy's realistic character is possible thanks to the advanced technology inside that allows him to observe the world and respond in a realistic way. Its processing power comes from the Qualcomm 200 processing platform. Its view is guaranteed by a 4K video camera with an ultra wide angle field of view of 180 degrees. It has directional hearing thanks to a four-microphone array that forms the rays. It is complemented by a 6-axis IMU and a WiFi connection.

 

Robotics and AI

Murphy's physical design gives him access to a variety of sensors, but the way he processes that information is just as important. Murphy's integrated 4K camera has an ultra-wide 180-degree field of view, which it uses to view the room it is in, identify people and objects, and detect movements. Murphy also uses an infrared laser scanner to track the distance between objects and map his environment as he explores, and a four-microphone array capable of locating positional audio. These and other sensors provide the inputs that drive Murphy's engine of emotions, with each data point influencing whether he is happy, sad, curious or any other emotion. The level of each emotion informs how Murphy will react to stimuli. When he takes over his owner, he is excited and ready to help. When it detects a sound behind it, it will rotate 180 degrees to investigate.

 

Safety Function

 

Empowered HelthCare

 

History

What We Need & What You Get

  • The project is in the finalization phase of testing for the subsequent scale production, the funding requested on the platform is for the first production of murphy, which will go on sale at Christmas 2020.
  • Aim to transform the way we take care of ourselves and our family, to personalize our homes and meet individual needs.
  • All the funds that arrive in the countryside are used to produce each product requested, our goal is to show Murphy's skills and make him unique for each person

The Impact

  • Interaction and more - Murphy is made up of 3 types of switchable wing and 1 body. Murphy can play an interaction with smart home equipment; reminder for its owner, detection of falls for the elderly, an additional entertainment function for pets in the absence of their owner and sending videos of what is happening at home.

  • The best sharing - A small robot that thanks to artificial intelligence is able to control appliances and connected accesses, find solutions or call in case of problems. Murphy silently helps to adjust some IoTs, such as curtains, lights, starting a vacuum cleaner, and turning on the TV. Murphy also features AI functionality to act as a fitness assistant and help users to stay fit.

Risks & Challenges

  • We define futures with cutting-edge technology that integrates into your daily life to facilitate family connections from all over the world.

  • This concept is based on collective intelligence - The goal was to make meaning and emotion emerge from the collaboration and interaction of basic objects.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • What happens when full integration of technology meets no effort towards better sustainability?

  • Pre-order your Murphy! Start with Indiegogo - To know the information on the project
    and pre-order the device, write to us!

story:
Introducing the beautiful bicycle wall mount by Huxlo. It's not rocket science! We just made the most simple, beautiful wall mounted bicycle rack yet. Designed by our team in Bristol, and manufactured in the UK. Maurad is a pleasure; from its step by step self-assembly to its everyday use in the home or office.

MAURAD arrives at your door flat packed, ready for assembly which is quick and easy and can be done with basic household tools. For installation, we recommend using a 7mm drill bit and a 10mm spanner or wrench if you prefer. 

Included in a pack is:

  • A simple 4 step installation guide
  • 1 x MAURAD bike rack (unassembled)
  • 4 x M6 Hex bolts
  • 4 x M6 Locking Dowl Nuts
  • 2 x Wall plugs
  • 2 x 5mm Cross head screws
  • A thank you card from the team at Huxlo

Check out just how easy it is to install MAURAD in the video below:

Huxlo is a design and build studio in Bristol. We are specialists in sheet timber and digital manufacturing. Our products are designed, prototyped and tested in house. Here we also optimise the manufacturing process on our own CNC machines ensuring our products leave us in the best possible shape to satisfy our customers.

 

Established in 2016, we've been going for just over two years now, designing and building products of all kinds. Flat-packed chairs, tables and even buildings are some of the many things we are putting to market! This is our first campaign, and a stepping stone for us, for a product that we love. Be nice!

These are some of our clients and awards we have won:

And this is some of our press coverage that we're featured in:

Bike Biz - A hub of news and events for the cycling Industry

Vamper - A performance and style cycling blog

​This is where we stand so far:

  1. Final design CAD, Engineering drawings & BOM: DONE 
  2. Batch production run and & tests: DONE
  3. Packaging design, manual design: DONE
  4. Orders collated, procurement documents produced.
  5. Machining, clean up, varnish, polish.
  6. Collating parts, packaging.
  7. Global Shipping of Maurad to your door!

Here's a timeline of our estimated MAURAD production schedule:

What we've done before:

  • Designed, prototyped and manufactured MAURAD.
  • Designed and optimised a manufacturing process.
  • Produced small batches of MAURAD and shipped them around the UK.
  • Designed economical instruction manuals and packaging.

What we haven't done before:

  • Produced large batches of MAURAD.
  • Shipped worldwide on mass.

Lastly, thank you for your time and for checking out our campaign! Without your pledges of support this project wouldn't be possible. 

Nowhere to hang? No bike? Here's how you can still help:

  • Share with your biking buddies or local bike shop- We'd love to get in contact.
  • Follow Huxlo on social media, we have lots of great non-bike related products in the pipeline and coming to our website soon. Go on... give us a cheeky follow!

TWITTER | FACEBOOK | INSTAGRAM

 

Q. Does MAURAD come assembled?

A.  No. MAURAD is a flat packed kit. It can easily be assembled at home using basic tools. Each MAURAD comes with a handy, 4 step assembly sticker on the back of the stand. This is an economical way to give information and its hidden once MAURAD is attached to the wall. Clever right? If you need a hand you can also watch our installation video here. 

Q. Does MAURAD work outdoors?

A. Yeah! MAURAD was designed to be used indoors BUT It can work on any load bearing wall or surface so if you have a nice spot to hang outside then go ahead! We at Huxlo would recommend applying a coat of Exterior clear varnish once a year, just to keep it looking tip top. 

Q. Is there a maximum load?

A. Be Sensible. Huxlo is designed to take the weight of one bike only. We recommend not exceeding a weight of 15kg when using the product on a load bearing wall. Huxlo take no responsibility for the mis-use of MAURAD (including chin up accidents).

Q. What protects my bike from scratching?

A. Research into material science* 

(*Hardness of Birch plywood MAURAD < Hardness of a Steel/Aluminium/Composite frame.) 

The timber and finish we use on MAURAD means that your treasured bike frame will not receive any scratching or damage when placing it onto the MAURAD mount as shown. Its unnecessary to have anything else their unlike a metal bike mount that would cause damage. If your bike has exterior cabling on the top tube and you're still worried we recommend using two small strips of handlebar or electrical tape on the underside of the top tube between the cabling and the frame where MAURAD touches. This really shouldn't be necessary however.

Q. Does MAURAD ship globally?

A. You Bet! We are proud to say we can and will be shipping our Products globally after the campaign has ended in line with our manufacturing timeline.

Q. What tools and bits are required to assemble and instal MAURAD?

A. To assemble and instal MAURAD you will need the following:

  1. A drill (with a 10mm drill bit and cross-head screw bit)
  2. A 7mm spanner (or wrench if you're fancy)
  3. A level (or a level app on iPhone or Android)
  4. Roughly 5-10 minutes of your time (We can do it in 4 minutes if you're up for a challenge)

Q. Does MAURAD come in other colours and finishes?

A. That's up to you! If we receive enough support for MAURAD then yes! We'll unlock some surprise perks on the campaign and prepare our manufacturing partners accordingly.

Q. What other products and services can I expect from Huxlo in the future?

A. Check out our website! We're soon launching a series of flat packed outbuildings and various exciting products. Check in with us or follow us on social media to keep in touch!

story:
The World Health Organization (WHO) claims that noise during sleep has a harmful effect on the visual and vestibular analyzers and reduces the stability of clear vision and reflex activity. The information provided by the WHO refers including to people whose activity is under stress and the high concentration of attention. The noise produced by air conditioning units in rooms is thought to be a leading cause in sleep disruption, which can potentially lead to adverse health issues.

The company "Sound Traps Systems" (STS) was founded in 2016 in Tucson Arizona*. STS provides service in solving problems of acoustics.

The level of solving problems is based on high professionalism and long-term experience in theoretical and experimental of acoustics the company's founders:

Arkadiy Tsionskiy – Ph.D. of Engineering physics/ Acoustics/ vibration, sound, noise control

Lev Nemenman – Ph.D. of Mechanical Engineering

Engineering support and bringing the solution of problems to full implementation is the standard carried by the company STS.

We evaluate the noise level of the all stages of the project for minimizing noise and provide a comfortable environment. Tasks are addressed in accordance with the recommendations of the World Health Organization (WHO) and Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA).

Organization of production, development of technology and technical documentation for individual orders of products "Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" are made by our company.

"Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" provides minimization of noise and a cozy breeze, as well as additional cleaning of the air in the room (from allergic components, dust, etc.).

To place your individual order, please give the measurements (A x B) of your backside damper or ceiling/wall register.  See the attached pictures below:

Damper

 

Ceiling/wall register


 

Indicate the quantity of each type of product.

One "Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" just $9 (size is not relevant to the price).

The use of the "Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" to all the dampers or ceiling/wall registers included in one central air conditioning system improves the effect of a balanced airflow distribution. This provides extra room comfort.

The product "Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" will appear on the market for the first time.                       “Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze” is made of non-toxic, non-allergenic and non-flammable high-tech materials, subject to standard disposal. The design of  “Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze” is original.

With positive demand, the value of the product may increase in the next 4 months. 

Projects to minimize noise in rooms with a central air-conditioning system by the distribution of airflow through air ducts provide the following positive results:

- minimized the noise level in the rooms at constant parameters of temperature and humidity of air;

- changed inconvenient and bothersome flow of air to a comfortable "Cozy Breeze";

- provides further control: dust, dirt, smoke, pollen;

- provides the opportunity to optimize the use of each room in terms of the location of furniture.

Modernization of the air conditioner's ducts with the elements designed by "Sound Traps Systems" company do not violate and do not alter the exist structure of the air conditioner's ducts.

Our challenge is based on the size of A and B, sent by the backers.

This challenge is permitted tolerance adoption sizes when using ~ + ¼”.

Since our product “Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze” for the first time on the market solves the problems of minimizing noise when using the air conditioner, we are interested in various kinds of advertising of our product.

https://sites.google.com/view/soundtrapssystems/home
story_txt:
The World Health Organization (WHO) claims that noise during sleep has a harmful effect on the visual and vestibular analyzers and reduces the stability of clear vision and reflex activity. The information provided by the WHO refers including to people whose activity is under stress and the high concentration of attention. The noise produced by air conditioning units in rooms is thought to be a leading cause in sleep disruption, which can potentially lead to adverse health issues.
The company "Sound Traps Systems" (STS) was founded in 2016 in Tucson Arizona*. STS provides service in solving problems of acoustics.
The level of solving problems is based on high professionalism and long-term experience in theoretical and experimental of acoustics the company's founders:
Arkadiy Tsionskiy – Ph.D. of Engineering physics/ Acoustics/ vibration, sound, noise control
Lev Nemenman – Ph.D. of Mechanical Engineering
Engineering support and bringing the solution of problems to full implementation is the standard carried by the company STS.
We evaluate the noise level of the all stages of the project for minimizing noise and provide a comfortable environment. Tasks are addressed in accordance with the recommendations of the World Health Organization (WHO) and Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA).

Organization of production, development of technology and technical documentation for individual orders of products "Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" are made by our company.
"Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" provides minimization of noise and a cozy breeze, as well as additional cleaning of the air in the room (from allergic components, dust, etc.).
To place your individual order, please give the measurements (A x B) of your backside damper or ceiling/wall register.  See the attached pictures below:
Damper

 
Ceiling/wall register
 
Indicate the quantity of each type of product.
One "Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" just $9 (size is not relevant to the price).
The use of the "Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" to all the dampers or ceiling/wall registers included in one central air conditioning system improves the effect of a balanced airflow distribution. This provides extra room comfort.
The product "Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze" will appear on the market for the first time.                       “Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze” is made of non-toxic, non-allergenic and non-flammable high-tech materials, subject to standard disposal. The design of  “Sound Trap, Cozy Breeze” is original.
With positive demand, the value of the product may increase in the next 4 months. 

Projects to minimize noise in rooms with a central air-conditioning system by the distribution of airflow through air ducts provide the following positive results:
- minimized the noise level in the rooms at constant parameters of temperature and humidity of air;
- changed inconvenient and bothersome flow of air to a comfortable "Cozy Breeze";
- provides further control: dust, dirt, smoke, pollen;
- provides the opportunity to optimize the use of each room in terms of the location of furniture.
Modernization of the air conditioner's ducts with the elements designed by "Sound Traps Systems" company do not violate and do not alter the exist structure of the air conditioner's ducts.

story:
With most cleaning applications being small or light clean up, there is need for a utility that allows ease of use and compact storage. Cleaning applications often require additional supplies such a bucket or hand scrubbing utility for viscid grime. These methods also require kneeling or bending to clean, causing undue strain on the body. Additionally, small areas such as bathrooms and kitchens seem to require the most attention and are often neglected due to the time required by current cleaning methods.

The patent pending utility ERGO surface cleaning system and ergonomic method provide a versatile solution for small surface areas. The apparatus makes daily use in high traffic areas convenient and accessible with little set up time.  Minimal strain on body is required utilizing the ergonomic shock cord adjustable surface cleaning method, allowing elderly or those having injury a solution to clean a surface with ease.  Simultaneous navigation of components allow for structured movement over the surface and a thorough cleaning of viscid grime, cornered areas and recessed joining surfaces making additional cleaning implements unnecessary.

story:
Weighted Blankets have become increasingly popular due to the level of physical, emotional, and psychological comfort they impart on their users.

And while many weighted blankets can be used without issue around the home, many of them are not designed to be travel-friendly...

From a purely visual standpoint, the classic quilt-like pattern of most weighted blankets is a poor look for the office, sporting events...

 

cars, or even living room sofas! 

 

Which is to say nothing of the portability of most weighted blankets. After all, it’s not easy carrying around a 20-pound blanket wherever you go. 

 

 

Here at Equiilibra, we’ve created a weighted blanket that you can comfortably take everywhere.

Actually, we’ve created two different blankets! 

Depending on their preference, backers will have the choice of either the Flannel or Super Soft Minky material options.

 

 

Regardless of the material, both blankets are soft and will keep you warm!

And not only will you have a choice of material, but also a choice in weight (7 or 10 pounds).

This way, both children and adults will be able to experience the unmatched comfort of an Equiilibra Weighted Blanket. 

 

 

 

Not only do our blankets have a travel-friendly weight, but they’re sized for portability at 50 x 60 inches.

A size small enough to make both blankets, easy to fold and carry and make compact.

 

…yet large enough to wrap around your body to get the benefits of traditional weighted blankets.

The blankets are also small enough to use as weighted lap blanket. By using cutting-edge machinery, we are able to reduce “stitching distance.” This leads to a stronger, more durable final product.

.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our Kickstarter, helped us prove our weighted blankets are something want and helped us see how customers can truly benefit from softer weighted blanket that's not weighted blanket.

Now, with Indiegogo we are looking to move into big box retail stores.

So your support will help us to:

1. Get Certifications Needed for Big Box Retail Chains

2. Create a Truly Beautiful Website

3. Create a Network of 3PL Warehouses

4. Get Us In Front of the Eyes of Distributors Worldwide

5. Fund Major Inventory Costs, Shipping, and Storage

Thanks for reading future backer!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We do plan to ship in January 2021!

You will be charged for shipping separately in a survey.  We do this to save you any fees brought on by Indiegogo, so we can pass this savings on to you.

Shipping will largely depend on the number and weights of the blanket you decide on.

You can expect shipping rates between $16-30 (at higher number of blankets and weight).

*Shipping will largely depend on the number and weights of the blanket you decide on.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

This product is no prototype, this is a finished product we can produce and send out to backers given the production time.

Any issues that could possibly arise would come from fulfillment, but we have partnered with serious fulfillment companies who can take on and deliver on this project. If any shipping delays should happen we will let you know. Our only goal is to get your products to your home as quickly as possible where ever you are in the world.

story:
The idea that led us to create SWR began with daily issues at our own homes...

We all open our windows on regular basis to get some fresh air. We wake up in the morning by traffic noise disturbing our sleep to close it again. Sometimes it is too hot and we want to ventilate. Sometimes it is quite cold outside and we want to close our windows to keep us warm. And we are not always at home when a storm comes. Sounds familiar?  

"Smart Window Regulator will do daily routines for you and helps prevent our home from unwanted damage or discomfort situations."


Watch the video to hear the full story 

(note: SWR presented in this the video is older prototype version)



What is SWR?

Smart Window Regulator is device you place on window in your home you want to ventilate. It will open and close window instead of you at any time you need plus provide opening or closing based on the situation inside or outside your house of flat. 

In other words it is an intelligent device for window ventilation that can react automatically to multiple events, work on a schedule or be controlled and programmed remotely via a phone or PC.

SWR is optimized for tilt-turn windows and due to its unique design you can easily install it yourself at home.

How it works?

Tilt-turn are common type of windows used in Europe and worldwide but not so much in US and some other countries. It allows to open window partially into ventilation position. If you have a tilt-turn window, SWR will work for you.



SWR installation is easy. There is no need to drill, simply stick SWR to your window. However you can mount it using screws (included) if required.


In order to make SWR even more intelligent device, there are two sets of sensors communicating with it remotely. This allows SWR to detect what is happening inside & outside your home.



Download the application into your phone and connect it to SWR via WiFi. All you need to control your window is now at your fingertips. 

Currently supported:
iOS   Android


     SCHEDULE your VENTILATION
         

Do you like to open your windows during days to get fresh air and during nights to enjoy healthier sleep? Use SWR to avoid manual window closing and opening. SWR will let you schedule full or partial window closing and opening in any time intervals you set.

                 Let SWR ventilate based on TEMPERATURE

If it's cold outside we want to ventilate just a little to keep temperature inside comfortable and not waste energy for heating. This is hard to estimate and close window at the right time.  Another way to use SWR is often with low energy houses for heat recuperation or protecting our homes from extra hot weather by closing in the morning and opening at night. Now precisely based on real temperature.  Anyway you can set opening/closing temperature for both inside/outside or difference, so we use SWR for excellent temperature control of our home every day.

    SWR will CLOSE window when it's RAINING

Detection of rain is an important feature of SWR protecting our home safely & quickly from situations when window is open and storm or rain comes quickly. Maybe you like to open your window after the rain to get air full of after-rain freshness to your home same as we do. No problem. You can set SWR to close on rain but to ventilate after it stops. After you get home from work, there is no disaster but fresh smelling home.

CLOSE/OPEN window when NOISY/QUIETE outside

SWR can close and open window automatically whenever the noise outside your home becomes loud or repeat itself for some time. For example car traffic getting heavier in the morning hours or just any unwanted noise appears. We usually use this function to prevent us from waking up and so making our sleep longer and uninterrupted. And there are many more occasions like this when we want not to be disturbed. SWR will let you set noise level and other relevant parameters, so once this happen your window will close fast and automatically to keep your home quiet.

    DARK outside LIGHT inside?  

Because of light sensors SWR detects inner and outer light intensity. This could we smartly use to close windows in the night while shining inside to protect our home from bugs. In some situations ventilating window should be closed because of sunrise or street lamps turning on. SWR knows when the sun is rising up and when it is setting down as well as when you turn light on at home. There are many opportunities to use it to increase comfort at your home. 

         Bothered by SMOKE? Let SWR REACT

Maybe not every day but still quite often we face situation like somebody smokes or burns something under our windows. It is usually extremely annoying and there is no worst experience then wake up or return to smelling home. SWR equipped with special smoke sensor (included in Sensor Package +)  can avoid this problem easily by closing your window once smoke is detected and open it again once air is clear. All you need to do is turn this feature on.

    SMART means to KNOW your HOME is under CONTROL

While having information from all SWR sensors accessible in your smartphone or PC you can check home status anytime anywhere. Sometimes this makes us feel better while not being at home sometimes it can save us from troubles. SWR can not only provide information but if authorized you can also set what to do via internet and react on unexpected situations. Advanced event configuration & reporting tool will be available online for free.


Please select perks to best fit your needs. 

Some customers need just to schedule window closing & opening. SWR BASIC is then the best fit for them. 

For those who require more advanced functions, like ability to react on rain, sound, light and temperature control, SWR SENSOR is the ideal solution. 

In order to react on all events plus smoke, SWR SENSOR+ is best choice (we set this as stand alone perx as the high quality smoke sensor is expensive and not critical for all customers).

For customers considering to equip their facilities (hotels, restaurants, warehouses, offices etc.) or looking for SWR distribution we have prepared SILVER, GOLD and PLATINUM packs for discounted price.




  


Risks & Challenges

Although there is always risk connected to fundraising, we went into campaign with proven working prototype and our ultimate goal is high quality serial production. Our way to product delivery is based on detailed business plan and our experience in this field.  We will keep you updated on regular basis and share with you our progress step by step.

Your funds will be used for:

  • Certification
  • Electronic board design for serial production
  • Final SW development
  • Advanced product performance & durability testing
  • Serial manufacturing setup
FAQ

1) With SWR installed can I still open & close the window manually?
Yes, SWR will not limit your window functionality, so you can manually open and close it as before. See the video to learn more.
2) Is there a battery powered version of SWR?
Not yet, but current version of SWR will be expandable with battery pack. Battery Pack will be available at our online store as well as other accessories.   
3) How fast can SWR close my window?
Speed of SWR movement can be set  in your mobile application based on specific event or purpose.  Speed ranges from 2 - 5 seconds for closing or opening. There is a night mode (slow closing) feature available for extra quiet  SWR operation.  
4) Do I have to drill into my window in order to install SWR?
No, simple stick SWR to window frame and window itself based on the manual. However if needed (older wooden windows with no smooth surface) SWR allows screw mounting installation as well.
5) What should I measure to make sure SWR fits my window?
First of all make sure your window is Tilt-Turn type. Then simply measure 3 basic dimensions as shown on picture below and compare it to maximal and minimal values. If your window opens more then 150mm for ventilation(regular EU standard), order anyway and just let us know. We will provide SWR with cusomised comb length.  We will contact each customer for verification(comb length, right/left window manual opening) before SWR expedition.

6) Does SWR works without connection to the internet?
Yes, SWR can be controlled via local wifi network without access to internet.
7) Are you going to you ship internationally?
Yes we will. Price of shipping is mentioned below each perks.
8) I bought SWR basic without sensors. Can I buy stand alone sensors and extend my SWR? 
 Yes, SWR basic can be extended by sensor set anytime. Sensor set will be available at our online store as well as other accessories. 
9) Can I operate multiple SWR with one application?
Yes, you can control & monitor multiple SWRs from one mobile application (phone) or web (PC). 
10) Can I monitor & control SWR from anywhere?
Yes, even while not at home, authorised user with internet connectivity can monitor and control SWR from anywhere anytime.

Our Team

Our team have both knowledge and commitment to deliver SWR to all customers who will support us by purchasing Smart Window Regulator. 

In case of any questions please contact us at info[at]smartwindowregulator.com
