story:
Für eine deutsche Zusammenfassung bitte nach unten scrollen

 

Introducing BIO-LIGHT 

You probably heard about the "secret life" of plants in the media. They are obviously more alive than you can see. With BIO-LIGHT you can make this "secret life" more visible. It is fun to let a plant control the color of your lightning!

BIO-LIGHT is a system which measures reactions of plants and turns them into different colors of light. Plants react to environmental influences like touching, watering, sunlight and even coming near to it. They also react due to their physiological processes. Without external influence plants change the color of the system slowly hour by hour. Sometimes the color starts changing quite a lot, without any visible influence.

BIO-LIGHT is a beautiful deco and you will develop a very new relationship to nature. It is for every household with flowers, but also for offices.

To our knowledge this system is completely new, we do not know of any similar product.

Here are some pictures:

 

How does it work?

Every living organism produces a small amount of voltage on its surface. You can prove this when you hold the electrodes of a voltmeter in your hands, you will see this voltage. It is not constant, it changes a little bit. A general rule is, the more alive an organism is, the more the voltage changes. This is also valid for plants, and that is what we measure.

Easy to install

You will receive your BIO-LIGHT with the country specific power supply. Just mount the electrodes on some leaves (you can also put it into the earth) and power up the system. You do not need to turn some knobs or adjust something, there is a microcontroller inside to adjust and control the system automatically. It is a simple plug and play system. We use "plant friendly " electrodes, as you can see in the following picture:

(if this electrodes look familiar to you - yeah, they are used by hair dressers)

 

Powerful RGB Led

For BIO-LIGHT we use a powerful 6W RGB Led of high quality, it is very bright and can clearly be seen also during daylight. 6W Led is equivalent to a 40W light bulb. It is mainly responsible for the pricing of the system.

 

We participated at the electronica fast forward award!

 

 

BIO-LIGHT was elected for the final round of the electronica fast forward award 2016. We were invited to exhibit the system on the Electronica exhibition in Munich, where BIO-LIGHT attracted many people. We also had to pitch our system there bevor a jury of experts. If you want to see it, here is a video of the pitch:

 

2 Versions

We will produce BIO-LIGHT in 2 versions: a cheaper one (but with equal quality!) in a black plastic case, and a noble one in a walnut wood case. Both use a ball of milky glas with a diameter of 8 cm.

Walnut

Plastic case. Note: this is a prototype Foto. The final product will probably be of the same size as the walnut case .

 

Behavior of the system

When you start up the system, it is usually white or yellow. The microcontroller needs some seconds to adjust the system. Then, within the first 5 or ten minutes, colors will change very rapidly. We do not know why, there must be some chemical reactions in the plant. After this period the system runs smoothly for the most part of the time, the color will change slowly hour by hour. Several times a day however the color starts to change very rapidly, this lasts up to 1 minute. The reason for this is also unknown to us, must be one of the "secrets" of plants. It has also been observed quite often that the color changes just when a person enters the room. We are sure, you will observe some very interesting behavior patterns.

 

How it all began

The original idea was born, when nurses in a kindergarten had the problem, how to teach your kids that flowers do not like it when you tear off their leaves. The first version was not with light, but with sound. The system made an awful sound, when you teared off the leaves. That handled the problem. But for a longer lasting application sound was not good, so we developed a new system that turned the reactions in colors of light. 

 

Experiences

We already sold a small amount of BIO-LIGHT systems to test the market reaction and get feedback to improve it. Here is what people said:

Lisa D.:  my awareness for flowers has totally changed, I treat them like pets. When I go into a     forest, I know trees can perceive me.

Ernesto N.:  Bio-Light is very relaxing for me, it shows me that plants are living beings. When it is  dark, this gives a wonderful light.

Christine Z.: I have the impression, that plants react different on different persons in the room. It  is very beautiful to observe.

 

Summary and status quo

When we developed BIO-LIGHT we thought, it is a nice innovation and people would like it. But we received another benefit from it, we did not expect: customers told us, that their relationship to nature has dramatically increased. We think, this is a wonderful thing. It is time for people to treat the Earth more carefully, we have only one. And we are very proud to contribute to this. So if you buy BIO-LIGHT, be aware that you will learn something from nature. If you do not want to buy it, please help us make it more known by sharing it on Facebook or other social media. We want to reach as many people as possible.

We have already sold a small amount of it for testing and feedback. We have a very good electronic company ready waiting for production and we have a carpenter ready for the wood cases. The biggest part of your money will be used for production, a smaller  amount for the certifications we need.

We are also very interested in distributors for Europe and for US. If you want to contact us, here is the email:  software.polleros@gmail.com

By the way: BIO-LIGHT works also on humans. Simply hold the electrodes in your hands and you will see how colors change.

 

Timeline

          2015               Idea  &  development

 

Mar  2016                First prototype

 

Nov 2016                 Participation electronica fast forward award

                                    On electronica Munich

Jan-July 2017                   Field tests

 

Oct   2017                Launch Indiegogo Campaign

 

Nov 2017                 End Indiegogo Campaign

 

Dec 2017                  Start production cycle

 

July 2018               Start shipping

 

Risks and challenges

The circuit is tested and works fine. There should not be a problem from this side. 

We need certifications for EU (ce) and US (fcc), it should not be a problem, but there could be a delay in the timeline.

BIO-LIGHT should work with all plants. However we have seen that some plants produce a very high voltage. Then the system cannot adjust the voltage anymore, it is simply to high. Then you should vary the placement of the electrodes. We have seen, you can always find a place for the electrodes, where the system works. If nothing works (in very rare cases on specific plants) you can simply just put the electrodes into ground, this always works. The roots of plants send their energy also into ground. The main risk we see in the lead time of the component companies, but we assume we have chosen a correct timeline.

The Team

      Walter Polleros, research and development

      Lisa Dollfuss, marketing, sales

    Nadja Chemmam, marketing, sales

  Gerald Fasching, Production and management

 

FAQs

What does it mean, when my plant has a specific color? Can you interpret it?

No, we cannot interpret it. Every plant is different from day to day. The only thing we can say, the healthier and more alive an organism is, the more it changes its color. Maybe you can get more familiar with your plant by experience and then interpret it.

My plant shows only one color, it does not change, even on touching it.

This is a sign that the voltage of the plant is to high and cannot be adjusted any more. Remedy: change the place of the electrodes. Vary it until you get changing colors again. If nothing helps, put the electrodes into ground. Keep in mind, the system needs some seconds to adjust.

Don't you hurt the plant when mounting the electrodes?

We spent a long time looking for appropriate electrodes. We found them finally, but not as electrodes. They are used by hair dresser for holding hair together. No, these electrodes do not hurt the leaves.

Is there a problem with corrosion?

Not if you mountain the electrodes on the leaves. If you put them into earth, you should clean them from time to time.

Does it any harm to my plant?

We could not observe any negative effects until now. (3 years of testing). On the contrary, it seems, they get more alive with BIO-LIGHT. We cannot prove it, but they seem to grow better when they notice, they can create an effect. Or maybe they simply like the colors, but many plants we have tested for a longer period  seem to have grown better.

Can I use BIO-LIGHT outdoor?

BIO-LIGHT is not water proved. If you build a shelter against rain around it, you can use it outdoor, otherwise not.

Do you ship all over the world ?

Yes, we intend to do so

What are the shipping costs?

The shipping costs differ corresponding to the distance. We add the specific shipping costs automatically to the perk you choose. You will see them as soon your country is known.

Do I have to pay VAT/GST?

For Non EU Countries:

Yes, customers are responsible for assuring that the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient.

For US and many other countries taxes are between 5% and 11% (you lucky ones!) of the price.

For EU countries:

We add the VAT to the shipping costs of your perk. This will be 20% of the price in EU.

Why is shipping in EU so expensive?

Because we have to add VAT in EU, this is 20% of the perk pricing.

What about refund?

Before shipping refund is no problem. After shipping refund is very unlikely, but we will try to handle it individually.

 

Deutsche Zusammenfassung

Kurzinfo: Diese Produkt mißt die Reaktionen von Pflanzen und wandelt sie in Farbe um. Die Farbe ändert sich bei Gießen, Berühren, aber auch nur bei Annäherung. Unbeeinflußt ändert sie sich langsam Stunde für Stunde auf Grund physiologischer Prozesse. Machmal reagiert sie auch extrem stark ohne ersichtlichen Grund.

Es gibt immer wieder Berichte in den Medien über das "geheimnisvolle Leben" der Pflanzen. Sie sind offensichtlich lebendiger, als die meisten Menschen annehmen. BIO-LIGHT macht dieses "geheimnisvolle" Leben sichtbarer.

BIO-LIGHT ist unseres Wissens nach einzigartig und neu auf dem Markt, es gibt keine vergleichbaren Produkte.

Wirkprinzip: jedes Lebewesen erzeugt an seiner Oberfläche eine kleine Spannung, die sich andauernd auf Grund physiologischer Prozesse ändert. BIO-LIGHT mißt eben diese kleine Änderungen in der Spannung und wandelt sie in entsprechende Lichtfarben um.

Allgemein: BIO-LIGHT wird in zwei Versionen geliefert: eine einfache in einem schwarzen Kunststoff Gehäuse und eine Edelvariante in Nußholz Gehäuse

Mit diesem System haben Sie:

  • einen wunderschönen Einrichtungsgegenstand
  • ein originelles Beleuchtungssystem (Pflanze steuert Lichtfarbe)
  • ein weltweit einzigartiges Produkt
  • ein völlig neues Verständnis für Pflanzen

 

Mit dieser Entwicklung durften wir 2016 beim electronica fast forward award  teilnehmen und auf der Electronica München das System präsentieren. Hier wurden auch wertvolle Kontakte für eine industrielle Produktion geknüpft.
story_txt:
Für eine deutsche Zusammenfassung bitte nach unten scrollen
 
Introducing BIO-LIGHT 
You probably heard about the "secret life" of plants in the media. They are obviously more alive than you can see. With BIO-LIGHT you can make this "secret life" more visible. It is fun to let a plant control the color of your lightning!
BIO-LIGHT is a system which measures reactions of plants and turns them into different colors of light. Plants react to environmental influences like touching, watering, sunlight and even coming near to it. They also react due to their physiological processes. Without external influence plants change the color of the system slowly hour by hour. Sometimes the color starts changing quite a lot, without any visible influence.
BIO-LIGHT is a beautiful deco and you will develop a very new relationship to nature. It is for every household with flowers, but also for offices.
To our knowledge this system is completely new, we do not know of any similar product.
Here are some pictures:





 
How does it work?
Every living organism produces a small amount of voltage on its surface. You can prove this when you hold the electrodes of a voltmeter in your hands, you will see this voltage. It is not constant, it changes a little bit. A general rule is, the more alive an organism is, the more the voltage changes. This is also valid for plants, and that is what we measure.
Easy to install
You will receive your BIO-LIGHT with the country specific power supply. Just mount the electrodes on some leaves (you can also put it into the earth) and power up the system. You do not need to turn some knobs or adjust something, there is a microcontroller inside to adjust and control the system automatically. It is a simple plug and play system. We use "plant friendly " electrodes, as you can see in the following picture:

(if this electrodes look familiar to you - yeah, they are used by hair dressers)
 
Powerful RGB Led
For BIO-LIGHT we use a powerful 6W RGB Led of high quality, it is very bright and can clearly be seen also during daylight. 6W Led is equivalent to a 40W light bulb. It is mainly responsible for the pricing of the system.
 
We participated at the electronica fast forward award!
 

 
BIO-LIGHT was elected for the final round of the electronica fast forward award 2016. We were invited to exhibit the system on the Electronica exhibition in Munich, where BIO-LIGHT attracted many people. We also had to pitch our system there bevor a jury of experts. If you want to see it, here is a video of the pitch:

 
2 Versions
We will produce BIO-LIGHT in 2 versions: a cheaper one (but with equal quality!) in a black plastic case, and a noble one in a walnut wood case. Both use a ball of milky glas with a diameter of 8 cm.

Walnut

Plastic case. Note: this is a prototype Foto. The final product will probably be of the same size as the walnut case .

story:
Livesglass - Your Pocket Sized Greenhouse  

Research shows that having potted plants in offices or home can reduce fatigue, stress, dry throat, headache, cough and dry skin.  

Livesglass is inspired by nature. Being working in a stressful environment myself, the initial idea is to introduce greenery to the modern workplace or home for stress relief and well-being.

Livesglass is an innovative device, it provides a low-maintenance, fuss-free way for individuals to have plant life in their environment. A concept inspired by the hourglass, Livesglass is also a metaphorical reminder of how important it is to protect our environment.  

Featured On:

How it works: 

The Livesglass planter irrigates itself through drip irrigation; simply water your Livesglass via the mini water tank located at the top. The water slowly filters into the flowerpot, so there’s no need to worry over excessive or insufficient watering. The opening at the bottom enables oxygen to be produced as a result of photosynthesis, which is then emitted for air purification. 

Livesglass is more than a modern-look decor for your home or office, it also provides a stress-free air purification system. 

Thanks to the specially designed valve system in Livesglass, a full tank of water can last up to 7 days, so there’s no need to worry if you travel overseas or are away from home. 

New Features of new Livesglass: 

1: removable outer display cylinder – the outer glass cylinder has now been separated from the main hourglass inner planter. It designed to display a full-grown plant. 

2: 3D curved glass outer display cylinder - We implemented 3D curved glass technique to achieve a seamless join between outer cylinder display glass and inner hourglass shaped planter. 3D curved glass requires the finest handcraftsmanship as it is the toughest verrerie in the glass making field. 

3: Interchangeable water valve – due to popular demand, we are proud to introduce interchangeable valve for Livesgalss, so now you can customize water dripping speed on the variety of plants. 

4: Float ball sensitive TPU valve - Slow and consistent water dripping is always a tough mission, a newly interchangeable valve in an incredible miniature form was required. Inside this TPU pressure sensitive valve, containing a 1mm diameter stainless steel ball bearing which allows water to flow consistently regardless of the quantity of remaining water in the glass. 

5: Wooden display base has also been redesigned to maximize Livesglass internal planting space. 

Goal: 

Our team has put a lot of effort into this product and we are looking forward to your support. We feel it is very important to ensure the final product is as functional and elegant as it can be, and our manufacturing goal has been to achieve the finest handcraftsmanship possible. In order to share our gratitude to our supporters, we would like to distribute Livesglass at a favorable price from AUD$58 per unit, which includes free shipping worldwide. We want all our supporters who enjoy Livesglass to have one in their home or office. 

We are hoping to raise AUD$50,000 on Indiegogo as there is a 3000 unit minimum run required. The funds will also be spent on tooling for mass production. 

Perks:

Miniature Plant Choices: 

So far we have tested the following plants: 

Succulent Plant 

Moss 

We would like to receive your planting experience via email, so we can add more plants onto our list. 

Specifications: 

Handmade Livesglass Outer Display Cylinder: 

Material: Laboratory Grade Borosilicate Glass BPA - Free 

Measurements: 180mm in tall x 100mm (outer wall diameter) 

Handmade Livesglass Planter:

Material: Laboratory Grade Borosilicate Glass BPA - Free  

Handmade Livesglass:  

Measurements: 178mm in tall x 93mm (outer wall diameter)

Plant Pot:

Material: HDPE Pot 

Measurements: 42mm in tall x diam 80mm (outer wall diameter) 

Plant Drain Tray:

Material: HDPE Drain Tray 

Measurements: 22mm in tall x diam 80mm (outer wall diameter) 

Interchangeable TPU Valve:

Material: TPU

Wooden Display Base:

Material: bamboo / oak

Measurements: 15mm in tall x diam 105mm (outer diameter)

Craftsmanship (Truly Handmade): 

Each Livesglass planter is handcrafted with the most exquisite handcraftsmanship. Making one piece requires a state of the art craftsmanship to achieve a better finish. It also means each individual Livesglass has its own unique characteristics. Each Livesglass planter must go through over 20 different manufacturing processes before it reaches the end user. 

Development Schedule: 

Our goal is to ensure the entire production line set up is completed by October 2017. By late-November 2017, we would like to commence full production, and if everything is in order, we will immediately dispatch the Livesglass to our backers. Dispatching Livesglass to end-users on time is very important for us. 

Testing: 

Testing is crucial for us to identify any issues with Livesglass. Our team has conducted many trials in growing various plants in Livesglass to confirm its primary function. However, various weather conditions may cause different results. We will continue further testing to gain more information which will be posted on our website. 

Risks and challenges

We are currently undergoing some refinements, and our team is currently liaising with our factory to make sure we deliver Livesglass to end users at anticipated delivery times. There are some challenges which may cause possible delays, but the main design is confirmed and pre-production proofs have been approved. If we receive sufficient contribution from this campaign for a production run, we hope to dispatch Liveglass promptly.

story:
Wait, what was that? No more broken sunglasses? No more having to search around the house to grab your glasses that were under your bed the whole time? 

Introducing Docky, the most affordable eye wear holder on the market.

We wanted to create a product that prevents people from losing or breaking their glasses ever again. Docky will keep your eyewear of all kinds (perfect for sunglasses too!) just where you left them.. It's easy to install, and can be placed anywhere and on any surface so it’s easy to find your eyewear in the car, office, bedroom, bathroom, or anywhere else you need them!

No screws or nails required, Docky can be securely placed on practically any surface with a safe but sturdy stick-on adhesive.  Much sturdier than suction cups or other stick-on methods, Docky makes holding your eyewear safer with its efficient and easy technology.

That's right, you no longer have to look through your drawer to find all of your broken glasses. 

Stop worrying or stressing but when you can’t remember where you left your glasses. Prevent losing your readers around the house today! But wait, just the house? Can it stick to your car, too?

Yes it can! Docky is the most affordable eye wear holder on the market with the best value and a 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed; making Docky a great gift idea for men and women of all ages...even your dog!

 

 

Who Are We?

 

Hello, I'm James Maida.  An inquisitive mind and always thinking about life’s nuisances and annoyances has led to a desire to invent simple products designed to make life easier. As an engineer by trade and after more than 30 years of developing products for other companies, I’m now able to design and produce my own products. While Docky is the first of many ideas, there are several more products on the drawing board I’m hoping to have the opportunity to bring to market. With your help and a successful campaign, I’ll be able to take my ideas from concept to realty. I thank you for believing in me and my mission of providing unique easy to use life-improving solutions.
